{'Location': '1/6B, Gallint, Opp. 1st Navy Gate, Alto Dabolim, Bogmalo, Goa, India, 403801', 'overall_rating': '7', 'Name': 'Mariaariose - Melody of the Sea', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'best among'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Very nice and quiet place. ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very nice and quiet place. We stayed at a doble room for 2 days, bedroom is very nice and spacious,  the shower was broken but the staff fixed it next morning. We enjoyed the swimming pool since the hotel is a 20-minute walk uphill from the beach.
Food is good also and the staff is very kind! '}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Uncooperative‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I reached here in the morning at 9:30, had requested beforehand for a room for 15 mins just for freshening up as their check in time is 2 pm. But i was treated very badly. 
The way Peter spoke to the staff & the travelers was very rude.'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Worst hotel ever‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'No service no hygiene nothing charges extra money '}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Not properly clean and no ventilation for air ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'No ventilation in room and door lock was also not working from Inside of the room.'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nice'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Decent property near to Dambolim‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Selected this place because this was nearby to the airport and for a 6-7 hours stay.
The property is value for money, the staff is helpful with whatever resources they have.

The rooms were spacious however the bed was very dirty and the mattress was really uncomfortable.

The budget rooms are however really poor. they don't have ventilation in bathrooms. 
The cafeteria is pricey to the food quality it offers. 

I would rate it value for money if you just want to stay overnight and catch a early morning flight. The prepaid taxi cost 450 from the airport."}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Location ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Best hotel near goa airport'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Best in class‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very near to airports '}, {'Review_Rating': '3.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Please dont Book‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very pathetic hotel actually its a guest house not hotel. Please dont book this until and unless its last option for you.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Close to the airport‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'If you have an early flight in the morning, you can choose this property as it is only 3 kms away from Goa dabolim airport.'}, {'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'There is no restaurants or shops nearby this hotel. '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Budget Friendly Hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'This property is good for a short term budget stay 15 minutes away from the Dabolim airport. The rooms are spacious and will suffice for your basic necessities for a few days. The breakfast preparation was decent. Staff was helpful and cooperative.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Beside airport and owner is very cool‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'This hotel is very near to airport and hotel people are very friendly especially owner he took care of everything and if you are planning to stay in goa you can prefer this hotel and you can pleasant environment with pool and food. '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Peaceful & Calm‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "The location is close to Dabolim Airport, Goa. Peaceful and Calm stay. The property is well maintained and kept very neat and tidy. You can park your vehicles out of the property, on the opposite side, if you have one. The food was ok, not bad though. There was only a shower with slow flow, a bucket and mug would help since the tap water flow was quite fast. Bogmalo beach is almost a couple of km's away from this property. Since we had been for Breakfast the crowd was less and gradually increasing. You can find some decent eateries near the beach. At times you can hear the flights...! Our check-in and check-out were quite smooth though it was a late check-in. Overall\xa0peaceful to spend a night here.\xa0"}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Good need improvement ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Friendly staff
Calm place
Food is reasonable

Pool wasn't clean
Rooms are small
"}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Good. Need to improve ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Staffs are good
Place is calm
Food is reasonable 

Rooms are small
Don't provide complimentary bottle water for drinking.. instead they provide reusable bottle
Pool wasn't cleaned 
"}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': "It's Not Best, but Not Worst as well. ‚Äù", 'Review_Body': 'Breakfast charges are very high 500 rupees per head, whereas you can easily find same breakfast within 150 rupees.

Though the hotel is amazing, rooms are quite good, amenities and facilities are up to the mark. Had amazing breakfast options, all the days we had different and amazingly tasty food.
Would definitelt recommend if you do not have a budget contraint.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Loved it '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Yellow the Theme Bloom Suites ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Best Hospitality ,Location and Vibes  all  good  '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'My stay was awesome , very clean , nice breakfast '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent üëåüèª Experience Highly Recommended ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Wonderful Property, excellent facilities,food, staff behavior, worth it.
Beautiful ambience.
Must stay at once.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The stay was quite nice with cleanliness all around the hotel. The house keeping guy named amol was of great help in guiding us about the places to hangout his work was excellent, he cleaned our room very nicely. The buffet breakfast was also nice.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good and comfortable stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'All things in a place '}, {'Review_Rating': '4.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Not value for money‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I paid 6k/day for a room the room comes with balcony. There was a complimentary breakfast but it was not that good. And the reception staff is not that co operative. 
Resturant and house keeping staff is good though.'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Service Not Upto the mark‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'No doubt about the fact that the property is well made and is placed at a very good location however I was very disappointed with the service. I was given room # 335 and most of the times the rooms were not cleaned when we were back from the daily routine and site seeing. Even the basic things for Eg. Tea Bags, Coffee Powder and Milk Powder Sachets used for instant tea or coffee making had to be summoned twice or thrice to room service which was a bit annoying.'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Complimentary breakfast to be made mandotary‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Need to facilitate with travel vehicles'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good hospitality ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'A very nice experience and comfortable stay.The staff is very helpful and courteous. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nice stay'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'It is a mid range property in Calangute area . ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It is good property in tourist district . Rooms are good and has good swimming pool . '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Neat and clean hotel with all the amenities‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The hotel is located around 1.7 km from Calangute beach. Pool timing should be increased.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "New hotel building with amazing facilities  and hotel staff members were also very polite. Enough parking space which is the best part that you'll get easily in North goa.overall good experience and will recommend to others too."}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Location, Clean, spacious room‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Had a very good experience at hotel centro, it's a decent stay with good parking space and at very good location from both Baga and Calangute, if u r getting it in ur budget then go for it. 

"}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nice amenities  '}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very poor service in this Hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I would never recommend anyone to go to this hotel. this has been my very bad experience. Go for it blindly.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Best stay within budget for family‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I have stayed in this hotel from Feb 11th to 16th..Writing in detail review of this hotel.

Pros:
It is just 2 mins walk from McDonald,Calangute beach road. After I entered into Hotel, Receptionist Priya and Manoranjan talked to us very politely and allotted a room. Also I requested Priya to allocate best view room and she accepted my request. They provided 2 small soaps and 3 shampoo packets, drinking water. After we were in room, They room was pretty spacious with balcony. As part of enquiry verified room cleaness,bed sheet and blankets,towels and wash room. They seem pretty clean and nice to me. For any help, they are just 3 mins away. They provided multiple times drinking water,soaps and shampoos and other needs. There is also a small good swimming pool available. Hotel is available with good amount of car parking space at front side only.

Cons:
- Way for going to this hotel from McDonald is a bit small way and 2 mins from main road.
- No wifi.

Compared to other resorts and fraud ones, I recommend this hotel within budget and feel like best stay.

I also request every one before going to Goa, please try to double check your hotel by reviews and youtube as there are edited hotel photos uploaded and fake hotels are uploaded. Also some people dont accept online bookings or double charge extra.'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'lack of Amenities‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Though the hotel is brand new, they did not provide the basic facilities that a Hotels provides for the cost.

There is no intercom between the room and the reception or room service.
No Tea making facility in the room.
No newspaper either in the room or in the reception.
The complimentary breakfast is a washout. '}, {'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Hotel rooms are good but the staff an service is very bad ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Hotel room are nice but the service is very bad u will not get any room service no food no water whenever u call on the reseption u will get answers no only so go only for sty but don't expect any room service u will get "}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Very clean rooms
Worth stay
Nly negative is little inside but safe but dogs in street
Very near to calangute beach nly 350mtrs walkable distance..
Nice balcony but small
For now it's new building hence few facilities like telephone for contact to reception ND once in 2 days room service , didn't matter to me since I was all time on beachside
Rooms wer large enough than my expectation 
Pls choose this location 
Really gud place to stay for families too 
I'll recommend everyone to go for it 

Mainly walkable distance ND cleanliness
Which ull not find anywhere for this price

I'll surely come back again 
Ty hotel centro"}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Good hotel bad staff ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Early arrivals were charged 1500 for 2 hours of early check in over and above regular room rent '}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Average‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'No water bottle provided, fan was not working, no value for the money'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Best place to stay at calangute with cleanliness, and supportive staff. {'Location': 'Ximer Arpora Bardez, Baga, Goa, India, 403518', 'overall_rating': '6.9', 'Name': 'DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Goa - Arpora - Baga', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Food and ambience ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I had the best breakfast staff is very good value for money.,'}, {'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'OLD AND BRAND NAME MISUSE‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'OLD AND BRAND NAME MISUSE'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Why we choose a brand‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Brand; where we can trust. In this hope i booked hilton property because Hilton is a name where we can blindly trust so i booked the property for stay but my expectations could not fulfilled as the Star rating was five Star but the property had not worthy like five star rating. For example wash room was too small , there was no air filtering system, hand-shower was also  not in the wash-room. The property is not earmark for five star rating at this present time. However the all staff was very good , they always ready to serve best services whether housekeeping, facility management ,restaurant services etc.'}, {'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Food served with cockroach ü™≥ ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'My kids ordered chicken pasta and  the food received was with a cockroach running on the plate .'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Wastage of money ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'With this money it is better to go to a beach resort..
Bad location, property under renovation, no vallet parking, no tubes for kids at swimming pool,no activity area, shame on the name of hilton, total waste of money. I only book due to brand image but totally disappointed. '}, {'Review_Rating': '3.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Pathetic Hotel ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'This is not hilton hospitality .  Bad management.'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Very Far from beach ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "This place is very near to saturday night market, but very very far from any of the beach. Very clean hotel , undergoing some maintenance. I wouldn't recomend if you want to stay near to beach."}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Best location n superb hospitality '}, {'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Not A Great Experience ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Wifi Doesn‚Äôt Work
Room service never answers.
Washrooms below standard.
The hotel is not renovated but under renovation, would not rate as a 5 Star Property.
It‚Äôs in Arapora locality not Baga.
Chose hotels in South Goa i.e Candolim Area, you won‚Äôt regret.'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Good property but under renovation ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Food is good and property is ok'}, {'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Difference between booking amount and charged amount ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'They charged more than which we have booked. Rooms are not value for money. Also asked for kids charge for breakfast even it was booked till 12 years of age for free.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'An excellent stay. The all the staff here are very humble, cooperative and very caring. I‚Äôll will give 10 on ten to the staff.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Value for Money‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Breakfast range was quite good !'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "I recently stayed here from 25-28 Dec'22. Hilton chains of hotel is known for their superb, excellent services. Here is my feedback for the hotel.
Overall Services - Exceptionally good. Each staff goes above and beyond.
Food - Amazing quality with multiple varities specially buffet breakfast. Live counter to serve hot and fresh breakfast.
Rooms - Great views and Great services. Use to clean everyday.
Location: Very nice location, 15-20 mins from beaches. 24/7 taxi services.
We are a family(2 adults+2kids) with little one 8 years daughter. Overall the hotel was amazing and would stay here back again.
Thankyou Hilton staff for amazing services."}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'All facilities were good except internet connectivity, later we were provided with dongle'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Amazing food and staff. Also asked for kids charge for breakfast even it was booked till 12 years of age for free.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'An excellent stay. The all the staff here are very humble, cooperative and very caring. I‚Äôll will give 10 on ten to the staff.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Value for Money‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Breakfast range was quite good !'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "I recently stayed here from 25-28 Dec'22. Hilton chains of hotel is known for their superb, excellent services. Here is my feedback for the hotel.
Overall Services - Exceptionally good. Each staff goes above and beyond.
Food - Amazing quality with multiple varities specially buffet breakfast. Live counter to serve hot and fresh breakfast.
Rooms - Great views and Great services. Use to clean everyday.
Location: Very nice location, 15-20 mins from beaches. 24/7 taxi services.
We are a family(2 adults+2kids) with little one 8 years daughter. Overall the hotel was amazing and would stay here back again.
Thankyou Hilton staff for amazing services."}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'All facilities were good except internet connectivity, later we were provided with dongle'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Amazing food and staff. Small room. '}, {'Review_Rating': '4.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Not value for mobey‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Staff parimal is nice, food is tasty but again and agin ask for toilteries otem, detal kit, water not aspected as five star hotel.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very good'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'good'}]

{'Location': 'Ozran Beach, 65 rooms, Vagator, Goa, India, 403519', 'overall_rating': '8.1', 'Name': 'Alcove Beach Resort', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Take a sea facing room for best enjoyment. ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very central. Every thing is in walking distance. It has a private beach. The cleanest in Goa with 80% foreigners. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Fun stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Clean room. Tasty food. Nice swimming pool. Other activities too. Very good for a family and office picnic.'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Food Price‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Food Price are higher than MRP price

We ordered 30rs havmor ice cream, alcove charged us 70rs. Though ice cream has written 30rs MRP on it as well. This is not acceptable as reputed resort that you charge more price on every item you sell. This behaviour lowers alcove reputation. I would not recommend to eat food at resort.'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Not as good as the pictures ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The facilities are really old. Our door is deformed and there are big gaps. The AC and fridge are so loud that people can‚Äôt sleep. There are about 8 cockroaches stones in the bathroom and the whole room smells like the cockroach stone. I‚Äôm not sure if it‚Äôs healthy for human. Some would consider the location good, if you just want to stay close to the beach and not going to the center. It‚Äôs not close to the center and the taxi is super expensive and rare in Goa. We have to call to book a taxi every time going out. The restaurant is good. '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Best location but room full of insects everywhere.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Room, fridge,bathroom tub, commod,water kettle everywhere a particular type insect was there.I showed the pics at the reception also.Rest all good.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Just go for it‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Lil far from Baga but u get bikes on rent from the hotel itself and ozran beach is right below the hotel. Very accessible. Also our stay had buffet breakfast included they have a variety of  delicious options. If you are just looking out to have a chill vacation with not much beach hopping this is the perfect place for you üòâ '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Resort was very good,food, location and staff are good üëç'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Not other than bestttt!!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Beach view is Next level 
'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Resort ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Resort is amazing but they need to improve the food quality as I stayed before that time food was superb '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Very gud location ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very gud location all party places are near by walking distance rooms are clean n big food is amazing '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very gud location clean n big rooms'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Awesome property very nice location ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very nice location rooms are spacious very nice property very clean and good rooms food is amazing worth it living here amazing view amazing staff nature must try '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Awesome Experience ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'This is the perfect budget friendly resort for family. Food is amazing (but only serves till 10.30 pm). Staff is also good. Will definitely visit again'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Need to improve on policies and staff behaviour‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Hotel is good but the behaviour of staff is bad and rude. They need to improve their policies or clearly mention them. We had our friends family with us who were staying in the adjoining hotel. Their kid came to our hotel for swimming once. They charged for swimming in that pool despite of the fact that we were staying in the hotel and we dint even use the pool. On asking them about why they have included swimming charges, the manager started shouting. I told them that if you saw child swimming why you did not bring it to my notice there and then that the child will be charged? The manager is extremely rude. I am definitely not going back to this hotel where guests are not respected. They also added additional food items which we dint consume and he was checking every waiter whether we actually had or not. The guest would lie for a food item? Really? After confirming he had to remove those charges as he confirmed that we did not consume that item. Hotel rooms are fine and the receptionist behaviour is good. Manager is pathetic. For beach access, you need to go down with a lot of stairs which is not easy. Also the adjoining beach area is dirty and not maintained.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Hotel with rustic look and private beach access ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "This hotel is in little vagator and has private beach access. The hotel is bit old but the rooms are maintained good. We asked for an upgrade if available, but they denied it straight away even though we could see rooms next to us locked. View from hotel balcony is soothing and beautiful.  They do have their own scooty rentals too, so no hassle with transport.

We tried the following food items in the restaurant:
Chicken xacauti - 9/10
Garlic naan - 6/10
Poori bhaji - 10/10
Choclate crepe - 1/10 (chef simply don't know what it is)

Beach access is the best part with the hotel. We went to Vagator beach and found it extremely unclean. So we were happy that we stayed in little vagator and enjoyed the private beach."}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Amazing location ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Amazing location'}], 'price': '4,819', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/31445758/508247423/b7da33a98f5b52f16ce26aef4ca95095.png?ca=29&ce=0&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '28m¬≤', 'amenities': ['No Windows view'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/alcove-beach-resort/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&los=1&searchrequestid=e32c5c52-549a-4d3b-a92a-33f5cf3f25e2'}

details:
{'Location': 'Calangute - Baga Road, Bagatel Boutique Hotel Goa, Calangute, Goa, India, 403516', 'overall_rating': '4.5', 'Name': 'Bagatel Boutique Hotel', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '2.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Not price worthy‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Photo as shown on site is not likely to match hotel condition. Very bad room as price. I would not recommend this hotel as there is no any room facilities and bathroom is not good. Cockroach are inside bathroom. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Best hotel experience '}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Worst Service‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'No proper service rooms are dirty pool is dirty staff doesn‚Äôt give any proper service when asked'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Ok property!! Family need to rethink‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Initially we were given room which had key issue and room was dirty. Bedsheets were not washed after complaining they gave new room.

New room was big and good.
Again bedsheets n blankets were not clean we managed to use our sheets.
There was no hot water which was bad thing next day morning they gave in buckets. They said some boiler issue.

Only.good thing is very near to calungate beach and all shopping places.

MC d is at walkable distance n lots of eateries near by. Property is in happening place.

Basement has navtara restaurant better to eat there then choosing breakfast at restaurant.




'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Absolutely  disgusting  Resort,  best  be  avoided  if you  want to be Alive‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I booked  this venue  on line  with  help  from Agoda,  and the venue  staff.  I was sold  this accommodation  with  totally  wrong  information  about  location,  quality and  description  to secure  a sell.  On arrival  at the property,  there  were  lousy,  drunkson the reception  floor,  it was not  4  star,  not  on the beach  as description and  sales  terms and  conditions. 
I then  requested  to  see  the  room,  it was like  a hostel  bedsit, with  some  goods  stored  in the room  and  the  reception  staff  has an  easy  access  to  your  personal  belonging  as there  was no  safe available  to  lock  your  valuable  items.  I requested  a refund,  the  yobs  from  the  reception  area  were  shouting,  threatening  verbal and physical  abuse  when  asked  for  my  money  back.  I was forced  out  of the  building  by  their  behaviour  as I felt  I would  compromise  my  personal  safety.  I eventually  with  great  struggle  spoke  to  a purported  manager,  who  totally  refused  refund.  I then  rang  Agoda  customer  service  to  raise  a complaint,  again,  that  was difficult  as I did  not  have  local india  phone  sim  card  but  the  taxi  driver  kindly  allowed  me  to  use  his  phone.  I then  had  great  difficulty  in finding  another  hotel  nearby  within  my  budget  as most  were  either  expensive  or fully  occupied  as it was wedding  season,  local  festivals and  also  a celebration  in place  for  India  independent  day.  I finally  found  another  suitable  hotel  very  pleasant  reception  staff,  beach  location,  3.5 star.  And  totally  enjoyed  my  stay.  Never  use  Bagatel boutique resort,  and  they  frequently  used  my  credit card  for  the  sale.  I was out  of pocket  by  700.00 more  then  I could  afford,  but  had  no  choice. 
Bharat chandarana,  from  uk,  19th  January  2023.'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Not really as expected‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The location is great and booking itself went smooth. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Best hotel experience '}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Worst Service‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'No proper service rooms are dirty pool is dirty staff doesn‚Äôt give any proper service when asked'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Ok property!! Family need to rethink‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Initially we were given room which had key issue and room was dirty. Bedsheets were not washed after complaining they gave new room.

New room was big and good.
Again bedsheets n blankets were not clean we managed to use our sheets.
There was no hot water which was bad thing next day morning they gave in buckets. They said some boiler issue.

Only.good thing is very near to calungate beach and all shopping places.

MC d is at walkable distance n lots of eateries near by. Property is in happening place.

Basement has navtara restaurant better to eat there then choosing breakfast at restaurant.




'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Absolutely  disgusting  Resort,  best  be  avoided  if you  want to be Alive‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I booked  this venue  on line  with  help  from Agoda,  and the venue  staff. On arrival  at the property,  there  were  lousy,  drunkson the reception  floor,  it was not  4  star,  not  on the beach  as description and  sales  terms and  conditions. 
I then  requested  to  see  the  room,  it was like  a hostel  bedsit, with  some  goods  stored  in the room  and  the  reception  staff  has an  easy  access  to  your  personal  belonging  as there  was no  safe available  to  lock  your  valuable  items.  I requested  a refund,  the  yobs  from  the  reception  area  were  shouting,  threatening  verbal and physical  abuse  when  asked  for  my  money  back.  I was forced  out  of the  building  by  their  behaviour  as I felt  I would  compromise  my  personal  safety.  I eventually  with  great  struggle  spoke  to  a purported  manager,  who  totally  refused  refund.  I then  rang  Agoda  customer  service  to  raise  a complaint,  again,  that  was difficult  as I did  not  have  local india  phone  sim  card  but  the  taxi  driver  kindly  allowed  me  to  use  his  phone.  I then  had  great  difficulty  in finding  another  hotel  nearby  within  my  budget  as most  were  either  expensive  or fully  occupied  as it was wedding  season,  local  festivals and  also  a celebration  in place  for  India  independent  day. details:
{'Location': 'calangute candolim road,next to decathlon mall, Calangute, Goa, India, 403516', 'overall_rating': '8.4', 'Name': 'Wotel Calangute', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Great choice ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Great choice, staff was polite, location was also safe'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Hotel location is best ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Staff is very polite  value for money '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Perfect place to stay at a very approachable location‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Few pros - 
1. Perfect location to stay. Walking distance from beach. 
2. Mid of Candolim and Calangute beach. Everything is close by.
3. Hotel staff is one of the best I have ever seen.
4. Very small hotel but it has everything that you need.

Cons - 
1. Breakfast is provided in packets as there is no kitchen and its basic. So you can skip it as well. 

I will definitely stay here again as its perfect value for money.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Paisa wassol hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Located in suparb location. Got steal deal from agoda. Service is good. Room is sufficient for couples. Staff is very helpful. Arranged bus also for sight seeing. Breakfast is also very neat and proper.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Staff is supportive, they maintained cleanliness and its value for money. They don't provide food but breakfast can be opted while booking. Only issue is wifi sometimes and water bottle, they only provides two small one per day as complementary "}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Amazing Stay!!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We had a great stay at this hotel the staff were very responsive and the manager too was helpful to us.
The complementary breakfast was also worth it.'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Top notch service but with some compramise ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'First of all , the staff and the service was top notch. 
However, the rooms were a bit congested with no ventilation apart from AC. 
We were given the ground floor rooms which I will not recommend to anyone. The ground floor rooms have a common washroom next to them and the parking outside the window . You have to keep the window shut all the time unelss you want to see people parking their bikes.  
The breakfast was the worst part. Out of our 4 nights stay, we only liked breakfast once. The puriea were too oily and cold, paav bhaji did not taste good. 

Location is good if you want to be near less crowded beaches like Candolim. However, its not a walking distance from any beach. '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Stay in hotel is Good ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "I would suggest to staying in this hotel but it's a little costly one as per room size, Also the breakfast is made available from outside so it is just ok. Location is good & staff is helpful."}, {'Review_Rating': '2.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The place was very dirty. The rooms smelt damp and had spider webs all around the walls. The swimming pool was not cleaned either. '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Decent stay at Calungute‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "This hotel is decent with courteous staff and it has even got a swimming pool. However they don't have a kitchen/restaurant so the complimentary breakfast is outsourced and it is average. According to the management they are opening their own restaurant soon so expect the food to be better in future. Oberall experience was very satisfactory."}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nice place to stay location is good'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Worth relaxing hotel ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Everything was perfect from checkin to checkout .
Near and clean rooms '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Value for money‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Don‚Äôt expect much from this hotel and you‚Äôll get a lot! If you come with expectations then you might get disappointed but this place is value for money. Great hospitality. Staff was great and prompt.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The experience was good'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Budget friendly ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good staying option, great hospitality, helpful staff and great breakfast option and walking distance to calanghute beach.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Family Trip (Economical)‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Its not premium, but you will like the stay, small hotel, not having pantry, so dont take breakfast there, pool is good. nearby area is good.'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Over priced‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Small property.
Room was small but was clean.
As a complementary breakfast they served only aloo Puri and that too were much oily n not properly cooked.
It's okay if u get it under 2500."}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Check in time‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Check in time check 1st than book'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Old property, not well maintained‚Äù', 'Review_Body': '2/5 rating for two good factors: staff and location. Rest all was not up to the mark.
Dirty linen, hair on the coffee table, old dirty closet, cramped old lift, no sound proof rooms(you can hear doors shutting from other rooms and even sound of locking them), small bathroom, breakfast was below average(tea was good).
Overall not worth the money!'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'EXCELLENT HOTEL‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "One of the best stays I have ever had. The checkin was very smooth and they welcomed us with a smile and a welcome drink. The rooms where clean and pretty decent.  We used the pool twice during our stay and they cleaned it every time before our use. The staffs were very friendly and open to any queries we had. They also arranged us rent scooter and car for very reasonable price. Best bedget hotel in Calangute I must say. These people had a customer first approach, and I believe that's the best way to shine in hospitality business. Thank you Wotel Calangute team for being part of a wonderful Goa experience."}], 'price': '2,170', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/25945037/-1/971ce12cf286f8e0a5e03db05d456043.jpg?ca=26&ce=0&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '12m¬≤', 'amenities': ['Shower', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Hair dryer', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'TV [flat screen]', 'Air conditioning', 'Fan', 'Linens', 'Wake-up service', 'Coffee/tea maker', 'Refrigerator', 'Tile/marble flooring', 'Closet', 'Ironing facilities', 'First aid kit', 'In-room safe box', 'Locker'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/wotel-calangute/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&tspTypes=1&los=1&searchrequestid=e32c5c52-549a-4d3b-a92a-33f5cf3f25e2'}

Room not clean. Pillow cover not found. Bed sheet dirty. They do not provide extra blanket for my child.
Bathroom not clean. They give dirty towel.

Don't go spa at eco comfort that is just a scam not worth it especially for men.
2. Bathroom was not great and sanitary fittings were leaking. They didn't repair even after informing.
3. Water bottles are given only 2 for a day. Which is really low. And they are selling water bottles quit expensive.
4. Mattress are not at all comfortable. You will surely experience back pain. They are using spring mattress which is really uneven.
5. Food is too much oily and very less options available.
6. Staff was good and well in behaviour.
7. Premium rooms are good in space 
8. All the electronic items are too old. TV, geyser, ac. 
9. Overall it was spacious, affordable and good staff. Rest nothing was great. 
10. If you are a non smoker then you might find it uncomfortable. As the smoke from outside comes directly in the other room, even if you close the doors. And they don't  request customer's to smoke some else where. An excellent place to stay.

{'Location': '197/37, Umta Vaddo, Behind McDonalds Restaurant, Calangute-Baga Road, Goa, India, Calangute, Goa, India, 403516', 'overall_rating': '8.2', 'Name': 'Bloom Hotel - Calangute', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Best for Group‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'If you are with a large group then this is the best place. Quality of service is not bad. Very good facilities for recreation. If you want to only stay for a night then, i suggest you to find another plac.
'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Good location‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good location good staff good food but rooms are very small and no ventilation '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Went for a short business trip. Nice rooms. Good location. Excellent staff.'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Do not use toilets‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Seriously the hotel does not have any exhaust fans in the toilet.. just a basic thing.. although there were AC‚Äôs in the room but windows also you can‚Äôt open cause they are sealed..ü§î kisne design kiya tha ye..'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Amazing‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Amazing for a budget stay. Perfect staff, always ready to help with a smile on their face'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Food and breakfast ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It could be better.. hotel has fixed limited menu for breakfast..no option of additional food items..range of edibles is also very limited '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good hotel....rooms small as per rates..but location excellent.......I would surely recommend it'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Okk okk..‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Okk if you can adjust in small room and that too without window and fan.

'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Worst Rooms‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The rooms are suffocating. The cost of the room is not justifiable, the space is too less. Breakfast is good, they do not clean the pool at all I stayed for three days but it was not cleaned even once.'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Not Supportive staff‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "I ask to extend 1 hrs during but they denied even though they don't have booking "}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Perfect location and friendly staff ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Stayed there for 2 days (myself, wife and our 3 year old son). Location wise it's near to Calangute beach around 800 metres. It's right in the middle so you have access to a lot of supermarkets and hotels.

 The check-in was quick, the room size according to me is a bit small, otherwise everything else is perfect. They have both 2 and 4 wheeler parking. 

Unlike other hotels, they have a water dispenser on every floor (cold, hot, regular). The welcome drink is always kept ready near the reception area for anyone to consume and it feels like heaven when you reach the hotel after roaming during the day time. 

 Will definitely recommend this hotel."}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Not Bad.. But Not Good Either..‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Well its good, but could have been better. Location is pretty nice.. Both baga and calangute beaches are pretty close. But rooms are not having that 3 star feel as per the tariff.. No cupboards.. No proper ventilation in toilets.. Pool is ok ok.. Staff is nice and supportive but ofcourse with few exceptions.. I stayed with my wife and 3 year old daughter for 6 nights and my thoughts are.. There are more better properties nearby with the same prices.. One should research properly before choosing this one..'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It was a pleasant experience '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Good hotel to stay near Beach‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good Hotel with pool and buffet breakfast. '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Comfortable stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Room and washroom was cleaned daily. Electric kettle in room with tea, coffee and milk powder. Good for couples, families. reviews:
[{'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Best for Group‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'If you are with a large group then this is the best place. Quality of service is not bad. Very good facilities for recreation. If you want to only stay for a night then, i suggest you to find another plac.
'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Good location‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good location good staff good food but rooms are very small and no ventilation '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Went for a short business trip. Nice rooms. Good location. Excellent staff.'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Do not use toilets‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Seriously the hotel does not have any exhaust fans in the toilet.. just a basic thing.. although there were AC‚Äôs in the room but windows also you can‚Äôt open cause they are sealed..ü§î kisne design kiya tha ye..'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Amazing‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Amazing for a budget stay. Perfect staff, always ready to help with a smile on their face'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Food and breakfast ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It could be better.. hotel has fixed limited menu for breakfast..no option of additional food items..range of edibles is also very limited '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good hotel....rooms small as per rates..but location excellent.......I would surely recommend it'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Okk okk..‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Okk if you can adjust in small room and that too without window and fan.

'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Worst Rooms‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The rooms are suffocating. The cost of the room is not justifiable, the space is too less. Breakfast is good, they do not clean the pool at all I stayed for three days but it was not cleaned even once.'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Not Supportive staff‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "I ask to extend 1 hrs during but they denied even though they don't have booking "}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Perfect location and friendly staff ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Stayed there for 2 days (myself, wife and our 3 year old son). Location wise it's near to Calangute beach around 800 metres. It's right in the middle so you have access to a lot of supermarkets and hotels.

 The check-in was quick, the room size according to me is a bit small, otherwise everything else is perfect. They have both 2 and 4 wheeler parking. 

Unlike other hotels, they have a water dispenser on every floor (cold, hot, regular). The welcome drink is always kept ready near the reception area for anyone to consume and it feels like heaven when you reach the hotel after roaming during the day time. 

 Will definitely recommend this hotel."}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Not Bad.. But Not Good Either..‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Well its good, but could have been better. Location is pretty nice.. Both baga and calangute beaches are pretty close. But rooms are not having that 3 star feel as per the tariff.. No cupboards.. No proper ventilation in toilets.. Pool is ok ok.. Staff is nice and supportive but ofcourse with few exceptions.. I stayed with my wife and 3 year old daughter for 6 nights and my thoughts are.. There are more better properties nearby with the same prices.. Daily room cleaning facilities and swimming pool is also you can use any time.'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'An ok ok stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Not too good to call it a must stay place.

When we entered there was water everywhere on the floor.. looked like people from swimming pool directly enters lifts and got to their rooms.
Food taste is okay. Breakfast is good but need to wait for everything. We waited for tea cup 15 mins then for tea for another 15 mins.. there was no hot water when we reached.. need to wait for an hour .. so waiting everywhere... 
Visit if no good option nearby.'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Service is very cheap ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very bad service '}, {'Review_Rating': '4.0', 'Review_Heading': 'No facilities. AFTER  GIVING HUGE AMOUNT FOR HOTEL. WE. WOULD LIKE TO CALL FOR SEVERAL TIME FOR SEVERAL BASIC REQUIREMENTS GIVEN BY HOTEL 

LIKE.  DRINKING WATER., TOWELS.    HOUSECLEANING , sleeper,. Tv. Connection,.   All we get. After. Calling reception 
We have 3 day staty in which we get tv connection wenn we are get to check out morning
 It's has.   Pool. Bar.  But. No service and in working condition 
  As they charge there are no facilities 

As per there advertising    height of service 
And. Parking. Issue. Also

Very much errors but. It should be basic services which hotel should provide to coustomer    so  no value for money "}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Good hotel for the price‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The staff was super supportive and assisted us in every need.'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Decent stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Over exp was fine. Secondly, breakfast was pathetic. No option of non veg even during new year time. Very upset with that.

Bar infront of swimming pool not good for family.'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Gud stay'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'No hygiene ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Rooms are full of cockroach also dining hall have cockroach.no proper hygiene maintained.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Best Location‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The property sits on the best location you can find in north goa with all the famous beaches within 2-3 km from te hotel.'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Above average‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'When we reach property room was not clean and bed sheet was not changed. We requested them cleaning and bedsheet change. We stayed 2 night there but no cleaning done even after request. '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'feedback‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'good place for stay. its very clean  pocket friendly. near to beach. '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Cleaness‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Place is very clean, staff also helping,
Daily room cleaning facilities and swimming pool is also you can use any time.'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'An ok ok stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Not too good to call it a must stay place.
Location is 1.8 kms away from Calangute beach. 20 mins by walk. 
When we entered there was water everywhere on the floor.. looked like people from swimming pool directly enters lifts and got to their rooms.
Food taste is okay. Breakfast is good but need to wait for everything. We waited for tea cup 15 mins then for tea for another 15 mins.. there was no hot water when we reached.. need to wait for an hour .. so waiting everywhere... 
Visit if no good option nearby.'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Service is very cheap ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very bad service '}, {'Review_Rating': '4.0', 'Review_Heading': 'No facilities.    By self.  For everything you should call for. Reception ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "WE ARE FREQUENTLY TRAVELLING TOWARDS INDIA AND INTERNATIONAL

AFTER  GIVING HUGE AMOUNT FOR HOTEL. WE. WOULD LIKE TO CALL FOR SEVERAL TIME FOR SEVERAL BASIC REQUIREMENTS GIVEN BY HOTEL 

LIKE.  DRINKING WATER., TOWELS.    HOUSECLEANING , sleeper,. Tv. Connection,.   All we get. After. Calling reception 
We have 3 day staty in which we get tv connection wenn we are get to check out morning
 It's has.   Pool. Bar.  But. No service and in working condition 
  As they charge there are no facilities 

As per there advertising    height of service 
And. Parking. Issue. Also

Very much errors but. It should be basic services which hotel should provide to coustomer    so  no value for money "}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Good hotel for the price‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The staff was super supportive and assisted us in every need.'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Decent stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Over exp was fine. Pool was very well maintained. Very surprised and shocked to see that a hotel does not accept Amex card for payment. On enquiring, they said HDFC Bank which had provided the EDC machine does not give that option.

Secondly, breakfast was pathetic. No option of non veg even during new year time. Very upset with that.
They need to take care of this fast.'}]

Acacia please improve the service as per the rates that you charge and don't call yourself a 4 star hotel. Also please train your male receptionist, he is very rude and not at all approachable."}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Family Stay with infant‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very nice stay at the hotel which is at a perfect location. 3. The rooms and hotel is decent. The staff is friendly. The breakfast buffet had quite many varieties. Roof top resturant was shut so coudnt experience that. The pool is little small but its indoors so protected from the burning heat in the day. Overall, pleasant stay.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Amazing stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We were group of 4. Travelled to goa on new year. We were not getting any value deals for our dates in 4 and 5 stars hotels. But luckily we got acacia hotel and spa deal in best price from agoda. Overall it was a nyc stay. Rooms were good and  spacious. Staff was cooperative. As my room almirah was stuck n i asked them to fix and they immediately fixed the issue. Restaurant food n drinks were good and prices were also reasonable. Breakfast was also good for the first day but then their chef was on off and food for rest 2 days was not good. details:
{'Location': 'Calangute Candolim Sinquerim Rd, opp. Jambleshwar Temple, Gaura Waddo, Calangute, Goa, Candolim, Goa, India, 403516', 'overall_rating': 'Select your room', 'Name': 'Bloomrooms @ Calangute', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '4.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Staff are so rude '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Good Choice‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It is worth to choose. Price are little higher but food and staff were good. '}, {'Review_Rating': '4.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Worst manager ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'First and last stay with bloom room ever .manager has anger issues.doesnt address customers complaints or requests.if you book through Agoda they will say for even minor problems talk to agoda..small compact rooms no attach balcony to any room.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good location '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Can give a try if you want to stay near Calangute or Candolim !!! ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I have stayed both in bloom hotels and bloomrooms. 

1. Ambience : Overall it‚Äôs good and clean (minimal furniture and space) 
- But the rooms can have more storage space. If you have a lot of luggage, these rooms can be small for you. 
- Washrooms can be more clean. Also toilet seat was not proper. 

2. Food : It‚Äôs good. The buffet breakfast is also good. The kitchen closing time is 10.30PM.

3. Service : The overall service was good except one negative experience we had that I would like to highlight. 

>> We opted for breakfast package for all days. On the last day, we were suppose to leave early due to our train timings. In advance, we asked and mentioned that we will be leaving at 7.30AM. I requested receptionist on the arrival only to transfer the breakfast. But no, he made us paid extra for the early checkin (1500/-) and breakfast(350/- per person) on the day1, which we understand could be some policy. But what happened later was very disappointing. On the last day, they gave us breakfast give was packed a day before. It was not the freshly cooked breakfast which was very disappointing. Finally, our cab got late and we managed to have some fresh breakfast. The staff asked us to give back the packed breakfast. 

Conclusion and suggestions : Some flexibility would not harm and don‚Äôt make customers feel like they are eating for free after paying a lot of money for the breakfast. And lastly, don‚Äôt make false commitments on timing and things that you can‚Äôt provide. 

>> I asked for more toilet rolls. The staff was like, we can provide only one. I asked them at a time to avoid calling multiple times and have things in place which staff should take care. And it‚Äôs just toilet roll, don‚Äôt bother to provide one extra. 

4. Price : It is costly I would say as we went in pick season. You can try exploring other hotels as well. 

5. Parking : Ample of parking space available. '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Cute and confy but a bit overpriced‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Very good property located at good location. Candolim beach is just a 10 mins walk.
This property is beautifully designed. Nice compact rooms and comfortable bed.

Pool is clean and well maintained and available between 8am to 8 pm

The parking area can accomodate 5-6 cars. There is a vallet available for your assistance.

Please remember that you can't drink in the pool area which i beleive is a fair expectation though, I found few blokes complaining about this.

Didn't try the buffet so won't be able to comment anything about it.
 
Special thanks to the chef Arjun Singh, who patiently handled my daughter's food requirements. I found the staff very polite.

Dental kit, electric kettle are available on request which i felt should be available by default.

Overall a satisfactory experience!!
"}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Small rooms ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Rooms were not clean and very small'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Employee are not friendly ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Worst service , not hygiene '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Unprofessional staff‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Hotel property is good... But staff is very unprofessional, non corporative, rude behavioural. They are puting so many restrictions on guest for everything which at the end spoil you mood. '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Great Place to be ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Great location,good ambience,food and staff are good '}, {'Review_Rating': '4.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Worst experience‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Hotel is not good at this price range....
No service staff available
Swimming pool is not clean
No fridge available on room
I need only 2 glass but hotel staff deny my request..so think paisa kyo liya tha be..
Behaviour is not good of receptionist...'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Good stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Stay was good but few things missing, which needs to be fixed like coastal area, nothing in room to put wet clothes. Bit expensive. '}], 'price': '3,780', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/121/12185878/12185878_20010816340086884398.jpg?ca=9&ce=1&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '16m¬≤', 'amenities': ['Non-smoking', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Satellite/cable channels', 'Telephone', 'Air conditioning', 'Wake-up service', 'Free bottled water', 'Mini bar', 'Desk', 'Closet', 'Ironing facilities', 'In-room safe box', 'Smoke detector'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/bloomrooms-candolim/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&tspTypes=9&los=1&searchrequestid=e32c5c52-549a-4d3b-a92a-33f5cf3f25e2'}

'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.4', 'Review_Heading': 'A very average experience‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "We stayed in the property for 1 night and the staff wasn't hospitable. "}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Mesmerising experience ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Property is fantastic, with good staff, good food and good location '}, {'Review_Rating': '4.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Location is good but the service is pathetic. The rooms look old and dilapidated. The break fast is not included in the package and resort is too costly for such basic amenities. The AC was not working, the washbasin was leaking, the bathtub was broken. Didn't have a pleasant stay. Not value for money at all."}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Need good food!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The property is awesome! Fantastic location for a peaceful holiday along the beach. Beautiful and good property, friendly staff! But food is not at all of the quality to be compared! There is nothing around in vicinity for someone to go and eat! Food delivery apps help!'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Superb relaxation ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'A great place to stay if you want to access the beach and yet get cottage feels. '}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Great location‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Was a great location, very quiet and away from the madding crowd. Place was well maintained too. 

Cons: Staff are not very particular about getting things done. If you want something done, you have to follow-up 2-3 times. 

1) My AC stopped cooling one night. They obviously didn't do a good job in fixing it and on my last night too, the AC stopped cooling. So, out of 5 nights, I had to spend 2 nights without the AC. 

2) The water in my basin was not draining properly. Had to tell them twice to get it done, as the plumber didn't do it the first time, and neither did the Supervisor check to see if the work was carried out. 

3) The Housekeeping staff were not tucking the sheets properly and while we slept, the entire sheet was coming undone. Moreover, on one day they didn't leave the moisturizer in the room. Obviously, it's a focus issue and hence they miss these little things. "}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Not worth it‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Yes, Nearest to the beach within 500mtr reach via 'kachcha Rasta', but that's not enough. 

1) Breakfast buffet - Very limited and cheap options - 1/5
2) Greenery, property ambience -5/5
3) Rooms - Antique old type but need renovation -1/5
4) DishTV - Needs recharge -1/5
5) GoaMiles app - drivers afraid of beating to come at resort because of private taxi mafia gang surrounding the resorts. For this reason, Our driver cancelled the booking. We had no other option but to rely and use that pvt taxi at double the price. So transfer out of the resort was a big mess. 1/5
6) location - not even a single shop/market nearby vicinity of 3-4 Km radius. Just a dense forest without street light. 1/5

First and last visit to this resort or perhaps South Goa."}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Good, but with some compromises‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Ohk, so things that I loved:

- Hotel's name is based off on the fact that you'll have to cross a beautiful coocnut grove laden road. It's beautiful and scenic
- The rooms are limited which means that each room will get you a bathtub for sure with garden or balcony
- the beach is so near that you can legit hear the waves from your room so that's amazing
- the food menu may seem a bit pricey, yes but you can have it in their restaurant overseeing the pool and it tastes good. 
- If you still aren't convinced, they allow you to get food delivered and you can then take cutlery from them


Now what I did not like

These are minute and may not bother but you got to know this so I'm writing it here.

- The rooms are clean but please check the electronic kettle and glasses provided in the room. Mine were smelly. Although the good thing was that we called the reception and their response was prompt and Swift. They replaced it and gave us new stuff so no harm done. 

- We had gotten two rooms. The one I checked in had a bathtub which was a little... Torn? Like, it had cracks. Now I understand that the hotel staff cannot change such a huge thing which is fine. I didn't particularly go for the bathtub as well. However, if you guys do, check the washroom once. 

Please note that this was true for only my room. The other room's bathtub was good and maintained. 


I hope this detailed review helped. "}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Coconut Grove Beach Resort‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very peaceful and quiet location & beautiful property. In house & room service menu and bar very limited. The water in the pool was not clean so did not swim. Rooms were nice and spacious but bathrooms need attention. On the whole was decent if you are not looking for a very fancy place to stay in South Goa'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Amazing property ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Property was amazing and staff was very supportive and helpful '}, {'Review_Rating': '4.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Secluded resort‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'If you want to live somewhere secluded, this is the place'}], 'price': '3,386', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/9361406/-1/460bc3c2bfed116b6fcaa9e6508ef73d.jpg?ca=13&ce=1&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '18m¬≤', 'amenities': ['Garden view', 'Shower', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Mirror', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'TV', 'Air conditioning', 'Free bottled water'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/coconut-grove-the-exotic-beach-resort/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&tspTypes=-1&los=1&searchrequestid=e32c5c52-549a-4d3b-a92a-33f5cf3f25e2'}

{'Location': 'Calangute, Goa, India', 'overall_rating': '8.7', 'Name': 'Mariners Bay Suites, Goa', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '4.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Ambiance ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'This is ok but not at all same as shown in pics . There is no pool facilities and the pool is not that much spacious as shown.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Peace‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Peace'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Yogita ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Great location friendly staff , clean neat and tidy location was very happy . '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Well maintained & clean place‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It‚Äôs a nice well maintained and clean place! Perfect for couples. They had good balcony and location was perfect. The power backup and WiFi is there with decent speed. I would love to stay here again. The staff and all are really helpful.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Highly recommended! Will surely come here again‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The stay at Mariners Bay suites was good. The apartment was well-maintained when I arrived there and newly painted.

Staff are responsive and polite, and cleaning is done regularly. The location is peaceful, away from traffic noise.  The caretaker will help arrange a bike rental too. Overall great stay.'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good  , Only if you get the good deal.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'If you are nature lover than you can stay. Suitable for Couples and family. Bachelor can ignore this as its not worth the location for you. 

Beaches are far away. This Suite is at centre from : 1. Calangute, Baga. 2. Anjuna Vagator Beaches, Chapora Fort. 3. Agauda Fort , Lower Agauda Fort and Candolim,sinquerim beaches.

For Food you can visit to VR supermarket Circle. There you can find HENRIES DINING . tasty food. Other food chains are far away .

We were still waiting
Not a happening place'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Best suited for Bagpackers!!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'A warm, quiet & a pleasant stay. 
4 stars for Rich on the mic ( Live music).
Food was nice.

Only Con - The guy @ the breakfast counter - ( the one with the beard). Please note - We are guests & but rationers.
 You need to take that rude nature elsewhere. 

Rec: Overall,Will definitely recommend at least a nights stay here.

P.S  Please avoid rooms where pest control was done recently.  The stench gives You a bad headache.'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Above average‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Only recommended as solo traveller'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Just check the price and go '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Moustache Go here!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I loved my stay here! If you‚Äôre looking for a peaceful and close location to Vagator then this is it. The place is beautiful and they take good care of cleanliness. The pool is always spotless. The highlight of my stay was interacting with the staff, especially the all the good fun and bants with Shreya and Devika.  I will be back for sure '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'decent but not as wow as the images‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The photographs promise a better maintained place, which this is not.  its hence not value for money. the staff was sweet and helpful. the place was rundown. '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Amazing ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We had a really good stay, breakfast here is amazing so please opt for stay with breakfast.
Staff is good, the whole vibe of the place is really good. 
I just have one suggestion, since you have complete french windows, please replace the curtains with blinders, privacy was our only concern throughout our stay'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Okay ish ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "I didn't like the staff, they're mean, and over priced private rooms!! "}, {'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Ok ok ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Room are nice.

Food can improve little bit. But stay is worth a penny'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Decent stay! Perfect place for solo travellers.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Hi,

My recent stay with Moustache Luxeria was decent. The property is newly opened and well maintained with big swimming pool.
We had booked Terrace room with balcony, which has a good room size but the drawback was the bathroom, was too small that a person will find difficulty to take shower. They have way specious balcony to sit and chill.
You can‚Äôt orders food and alcohol  from outside that was disappointing.
Breakfast was quite good.

Suggestion:- To increase the size of the bathroom.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'perfect‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'superb'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Confusion‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Shower/bathtub pls clarify first'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Highly recommended ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It‚Äôs an ideal place for a solo/couple/group travellers 
Polite and cooperative staff
Clean surroundings 
Good vibes
It has it all'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Need improvement‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Images shown here are different than actual. No parking space. Nothing special for honeymoon couple. Washbasin is inside room and private terrace is covered hence can‚Äôt see tree or garden view. Don‚Äôt feel value for money'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Lovely property but services could be better‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I rated 4/5. Nice big rooms and property, location is good, towards vagator but a couple of things to note- ours was a private room, they said there is intercom services in room but ours didn‚Äôt had and they didn‚Äôt bother,  the TV will not work and you need to deposit 2k rs. then they will provide you with amazon prime stick  which is very weird. Cleaning is only when you tell them, and food is overpriced and not good. The hosts are basically not much of  hosts but basically like any hotel staff. Just the property is good, location is a litte offbeat which i liked and the clubs we wanted to go are nearby like, thalasaa and soro. Also if you ask anything from hosts, they will majorly just point on the board behind them, not much of helpful people. 
We basically booked it coz we wanted a hostel with a pool.. üòä
Suggestion- don‚Äôt take breakfast with rooms, if wasn‚Äôt good, better order food or ala carte. The service of restaurant was good but food wasn‚Äôt much good. '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Comfortable stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Comfortable stay'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Disappointing stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The place is well designed but not worth of money we paid, they have outsourced there kitchen, bar and for a morning tea or any other restaurant services one needs to walk to their restaurant, the prices of bar are exorbitant. they have television sets in rooms but you need to rent firesticks to get them work which sounded more like money making thought process. The management looked quite amateur and with zero customer centric approach. Rooms are spacious . 
Car parking (4-5)
Cons:
Small swimming pool.
Limited options in buffet breakfast .Only 2 options for vegetarian.
Cleanliness is not upto the mark in the rooms(bedsheets/towels)

Overall average stay.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Beautiful cute hotel in good location‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The hotel was beautiful and clean. Staff are friendly, it was value for money. We enjoyed our stay there. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good hotel ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good hotel in nice location and perfect price for stay '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good place to stay with family or solo ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'A good place to stay, clean and with all amenities. The staff behaviour was very good and food was great '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Confort place‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Grt n very good place grt nice stay very good staff üëç '}, {'Review_Rating': '2.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Not a clean hotel ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I stayed three nights and paid 4000 per night hotel room was not clean and hygiene.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Absolutely amazing in terms of everything rooms were very clean and spacious, breakfast was too good and staff was very helpful.'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'The Staff is rude and needs training.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Won‚Äôt recommend if you‚Äôre looking to invite friends over. They create a lot of drama and don‚Äôt allow visitors which is ridiculous. 
You go to Goa to enjoy with friends and party. If you‚Äôre not creating any issues with sound and just inviting friends over for a quiet dinner, I don‚Äôt see why would they not allow visitors. Absolutely ridiculous!!!'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Budget stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "If you're looking for budget stay, this is one option you can go for. Food is average. "}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice property ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Comfortable stsy'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Best value for Money hotel in Candolim beach‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We are very much happy about our stay in Hotel Amogios,  Candolim Beach, this hotel is locating in good location which is walkable to beach, Room is clean with basic amenities, Bathroom is small but enough for stay, Swimming pool is clean. staffs are friendly. only issue which we faced in our stay is Breakfast, menu option for Buffet is minimal and food quality and taste is not worth of paying 250/- per person for breakfast but the prices outside also same.   Finally i recommend this hotel to my friends and family also.'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Facilities can be improved‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "No internet, no tv, no toiletries and no response from staff. TV got deactivated after 1 hr and and complained on the same and some guy came and recharged. After 1 hr deactivated again.

It's the basic things you ask for"}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Best place to stay in goa‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I am from bangalore and stayed at this place twice in 10 days. Excellent place to stay. Reasonably close to all places. Very clean rooms and excellent service by staff.'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'BAD RESPONSE‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'IF SOMEONE DEAD ALSO ITS NOT IMPORTANT FOR THEM THEY FOLLOW THEIR RULES NOT EXPECTED THIS PEOPLE WILL FALL THIS MUCH NOT GOING TO REFER AGAIN OR BOOK THIS HOTEL AGAIN ALSO WONT PREFER AGODA. THANKS FOR SPOILING TRIP PLAN'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Poor service ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Pathetic service adked to pay for dental kit
And even asked them to clean room staff replied that we have choice to clean room uptill 6pm 
No customer service '}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Low cost but not quite clean‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Don't recommend staying here if you would like a nice comfortable stay in Goa. They don't clean rooms regularly unless you ask them for it specifically. It is okay if you just want a place to keep your stuff and get ready and then roam around Goa. The room freshener they spray in rooms is a bit too strong making all the rooms too smelly to stay comfortably in.
Only good thing is that the food in the hotel is tasty. The breakfast makes it worth the price although there isn't much variety."}], 'price': '3,368', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/187/18766352/18766352_20102017250092809915.jpg?ca=14&ce=1&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '23m¬≤', 'amenities': ['Street view', 'Balcony/terrace', 'Non-smoking', 'Shower', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Hair dryer', 'Mirror', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Satellite/cable channels', 'Telephone', 'Wi-Fi [free]', 'Air conditioning', 'Fan', 'Linens', 'Wake-up service', 'Coffee/tea maker', 'Free bottled water', 'Mini bar', 'Fire extinguisher', 'First aid kit', 'Smoke detector'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/amigos-candolim-beach/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&los=1&searchrequestid=e32c5c52-549a-4d3b-a92a-33f5cf3f25e2'}
