"}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice property ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Comfortable stsy'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Best value for Money hotel in Candolim beach‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We are very much happy about our stay in Hotel Amogios,  Candolim Beach, this hotel is locating in good location which is walkable to beach, Room is clean with basic amenities, Bathroom is small but enough for stay, Swimming pool is clean. staffs are friendly. only issue which we faced in our stay is Breakfast, menu option for Buffet is minimal and food quality and taste is not worth of paying 250/- per person for breakfast but the prices outside also same.   Finally i recommend this hotel to my friends and family also.'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Facilities can be improved‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "No internet, no tv, no toiletries and no response from staff. TV got deactivated after 1 hr and and complained on the same and some guy came and recharged. After 1 hr deactivated again.

It's the basic things you ask for"}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Best place to stay in goa‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I am from bangalore and stayed at this place twice in 10 days. Excellent place to stay. Reasonably close to all places. Very clean rooms and excellent service by staff.'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'BAD RESPONSE‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'IF SOMEONE DEAD ALSO ITS NOT IMPORTANT FOR THEM THEY FOLLOW THEIR RULES NOT EXPECTED THIS PEOPLE WILL FALL THIS MUCH NOT GOING TO REFER AGAIN OR BOOK THIS HOTEL AGAIN ALSO WONT PREFER AGODA. THANKS FOR SPOILING TRIP PLAN'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Poor service ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Pathetic service adked to pay for dental kit
And even asked them to clean room staff replied that we have choice to clean room uptill 6pm 
No customer service '}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Low cost but not quite clean‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Don't recommend staying here if you would like a nice comfortable stay in Goa. They don't clean rooms regularly unless you ask them for it specifically. It is okay if you just want a place to keep your stuff and get ready and then roam around Goa. The room freshener they spray in rooms is a bit too strong making all the rooms too smelly to stay comfortably in.
Only good thing is that the food in the hotel is tasty. The breakfast makes it worth the price although there isn't much variety."}]

It is one of the worst hotels I have stayed till date. They tried to give us a stinking room on arrival and we ‚Äúhad to ask‚Äù for a change.  The bathrooms didn‚Äôt even have basic stuff like toothbrush, moisturiser etc. 
Although there is an option for ‚Äúspecial request‚Äù before booking, they do not entertain special requests like cake post booking stating they don‚Äôt have a bakery, which was very deceiving. The hotel is also quite a walk from the beach. The breakfast was also not impressive. 
I would not recommend this to anyone at the cost they ask for. Hello IBIS management staff, I stayed 4 days at Goa IBIS, I tried to contact customer care to enquiry about my local travel bill for my income tax claim from travel desk.. He refused to answer my query and forwarded my call to where no one answer. Today I ve called travel desk incharge they refused to give me bill for local travel, Airport travel.. It impact my income tax claim, really your travel desk team are unprofessional and showed worst behavior unwilling to provide local travel bills.. Can you sort my issues immediately.. Your customer care not taking my query seriously.. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Excellent '}, {'Review_Rating': '2.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Next to a Slum. This place is lower than average!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Please be careful of the hype created on reviews. This place is very ordinary. Not worth a penny more than Rs3k/night. Rooms are tiny( dont go by smartly taken pics on thier hotel ads). Rooms are v v basic, nothing fancy except the wall papers stuck behind the beds. Bathrooms are super tiny to accomodate one person, and if you are tall n well built you may not even fit in!! Food is super expensive. The location is atleast more than a kilometer from the beach but they advertise just few hundred meters which is entirely wrong info. Baga brach is more than 2.5kms away. You may get tired walking upto the beach, its that far! The hotel overlooks a slum as u walkup to you room. A strict no no for us next time in Goa. We kind of spoilt our holiday.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'ibis Styles is worth it‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Its worth the stay with the staff being very prompt and helpful. the location is decent too and a bike / car rent place nearby is just perfect for the trip. food wise the hotel had quite an option and lots of activities for kids too. '}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Indoor games Cricket was closed. Cons- extremely small bed...'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Wonderful stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It was a wonderful stay. Staff was courteous and polite. Just be cautious on your restaurant billing. {'Location': 'Morjim Ashwem Road, Mandrem, Morjim, Goa, India, 403519', 'overall_rating': '8.1', 'Name': 'Dallas Beach Resort', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Resort with a great location ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It is a new property so everything here is in a extremely good condition.
The rooms are big, clean & spacious. 
The best part is the location as it is right on the morjim beach. 
But, the in house restaurant has very limited options for dining. Staff here is not that friendly or helpful they seemed a little rude. Morning breakfast is just okay. 
Overall a good experience with the rooms and the location of the resort. Just plan to eat outside. '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Best Beach Resort ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "I wanted a beach front resort. And this was one of the best ones I've stayed at . It's new so it's sparkling and super clean. Good for the price. Amazing staff."}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Under construction ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Place is still being built and the staff could be more courteous. Staff very polite and soft spoken.'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Great room with no facilities in hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'If you just want good room and no facilities and no restaurant, then it is a good place to stay. So choose this hotel according to your preference.'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Can be better‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "No towels placed in room, hot water not upto the mark. I'm not saying the Hotel is bad, I'm just saying, they need to spruce up their services "}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Pleasant stay !!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "This is good hotel. Overall it's good hotel."}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Amazing Staff‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very pleasant staff

'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Cost Cutting by Hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Frankly speaking the experience was not great. Reason, cleanliness was a big mess. It took multiple follow ups to have basic things get done. The nanbai bakery is good, Hotel do not have there own food options. Overall just a normal stay. For room lock smart card quality very poor & after any damages they give additional billing to visitors

Manager behaviour very attitude type, power socket plugs not easy to access

And many more problem in this resort '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Above average‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Facility is neat and clean. However, usability is not planned well. Staff is courteous. Location is at walking distance from Colva Beach that is plus point.'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Near to beach‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We stayed in krishna beach resort from 23nd Feb to 25th Feb.It was good experience.we booked standard room and it was okay for couple.
Complimentary breakfast was okay not much choice are available.
Rent bikes , richshaw , taxi car are available outosde of the resort.
Betalbatim and Benaulim breach are nearby and must visit place.

Over all our experience in krishna beach resort is fine and we recommend others to book it if your looking for 3star rating hotel.

Thanks


'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Best Resort In South Goa!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "This should be the sole resort that is taken into consideration if someone has to stay in south Goa. The personnel is excellent, and the rooms are fantastic. They are professionally dressed, well-groomed, and trained. I can't express my gratitude to the entire staff enough, especially the receptionist who made our stay really pleasant.

I should have asked her name, but as the sole woman around during the day, she deserves recognition for her generosity and helpfulness."}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Nooooo stay here‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We have paid for deluxe room and stay in standard room...

breakfast is worst, no varieties, no taste and even flies roming on fruits, even one insect found inside cholaa'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice place to stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Services were good, staff was very nice an helpful, even the guard was very helpful.

Guys don't miss this place."}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice location.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We booked for couple cleaning was nice and upto the mark.

Will recommend to book '}, {'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It is not a good hotel at all. Feels like an Oyo room. We had to move out of the hotel. '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good place to stay in‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Clean and pretty spacious rooms, with all the basic amenities available. Highly recommended for people planning to stay near colva beach. Courteous and friendly staff, enjoyed my stay'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Best Resort lush green‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Good Ambience, clean room's, friendly staff"}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Resort was nice....cleanliness is awsome.....it was a pleasant stay in dis resort...overall resort was nice....i would love to stay in dis resort next time'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'spacious well-appointed rooms, balcony‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Spacious rooms with balcony
Bipu, the manager was very helpful in arranging local travel.
Well thought out furniture, nice bathroom
Can walk to the main road and the beach.
Isolated from main road. So very peaceful.
Attached Veg. Restaurant.
Veg. only breakfast with options for North Indians too (variety limited)'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'My go to property'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The stay was decent. Breakfast is good. There are just 2 small water bottles per day and if you need more you need to buy one which is unnecessarily expensive. Other than this the stay was good'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Best for couple and family'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Great place in Colva‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We‚Äôve stayed here twice. A change of owners in between. Staff are extremely keen to meet our needs. Facilities are more than adequate. Quiet but convenient location. Only thing: they could lift their game on whoever does their laundry. Sheets and towels a bit grimy, maybe a bit old. Good buffet veg breakfast on site. We would return. details:
{'Location': 'Naikavaddo, Calangute, Bardez, Calangute, Goa, India, 403516', 'overall_rating': '7.6', 'Name': 'FabHotel Prime Casa Kiara', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Worth the money‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very good hotel'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Good one to stay ..‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Cooperative and understanding staff.. property owner Sanjeev is very kind and polite...'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'fine'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Not recommend at this price‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Try some better option within the same budget 

Reasons:
- Security: there is no letch in door and '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Owner and staff is very good behaviour '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Budget hotel/Value for money‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Pros:
- Staff was amazing
- Food Taste - just like home (they prepare fresh)
- Location (Close to Calangute beach and local markets) - You will find a lot of eating options around
- Even the South Tour bus pick-up point is within 2 mins walking distance
- Room and bathroom are spacious

Cons:
The entrance way to the hotel is tricky (if you're coming by the cab) - you won't be able to find it (put the location as The avenue hotel, Calungate and then in 2 mins you will find it on the same road) - may ask the direction from the nearby shop
- don't go by the photos (you will be disappointed otherwise)
- They don't provide breakfast buffet (limited 2-3 options) that would be available
- Don't provide amenities like dental kit, hair dryer etc. (even the shower get and shampoo quality was poor) - advisable to bring your own
"}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Peaceful Stay In Budget ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very Nice Place to stay ...neat & Clean Rooms ....Good for Families and Couples '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'small rooms‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'rooms are quite small, queen size bed..... property owner is not so welcoming and adjusting.....'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Above average‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It was an average stay'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Spacious and excellent rooms‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The rooms in the hotel are so spacious...staff is so good and cooperative.. location was nearer to so many places in goa'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Good vacation hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Hotel doesn't have resturant, they serve breakfast with room service. 
The only drawback for hotel is its location. Although location is at calangute, still around 200-300 meters inside on street makes u feel lonely and scary at night"}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Hotel is good, service is good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Breakfast is not good which can be improved.
 '}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Wrong location updated in Google Map‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Hotel is not on the main road as shown in google map, approach road is small and Dark in night. Limited parking available. Rooms are spacious and staff are helpful. 
Food is nice but overpriced.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent but only 2 cons‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "I will suggest both pros n cons.

Pros.
Perfect hotel to stay in North Goa. Happy with all service. Just book this without any hesitation ..
Owner of this hotel is very polite and helpful. I'm staying 6 nights here with full comfort.
Spacious room, walking distance from calangute. Staff is also good n fast for service. Room has refrigerator, sofa, balcony , table for work. Swiming pool is quite clean n well maintained. Property is also neet& clean.

Cons.
Please ask for water bottle is free or not ? Otherwise at the time of checkout you will get shocked by water bottle charges !!

Swimming pool was closed after 6 PM, seriously is it hostel or something else!!!"}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good place to stay'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Terrible maintenance.. we saw stains on bed and bed spread and gutka packets in cupboards.. ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'When asked about the maintenance to the staff we were questioned back that we nade those stains.. we immediately checked out even after the payment was already done for 2 days'}], 'price': '2,768', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/10948315/-1/df809c1dd75fdd81e51d88c1e4bc4a8b.jpg?ca=9&ce=1&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '200m¬≤', 'amenities': ['Shared bathroom', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Mirror', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Satellite/cable channels', 'Telephone', 'Air conditioning', 'Daily newspaper', 'Fan', 'Linens', 'Free bottled water', 'Desk', 'Clothes rack', 'Fire extinguisher'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/fabhotel-casa-kiara-calangute/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&tspTypes=9,-1&los=1&searchrequestid=e32c5c52-549a-4d3b-a92a-33f5cf3f25e2'}

{'Location': 'House No. 131/11, Nagoa, Goa, Calangute, Goa, India, 403516', 'overall_rating': '8.3', 'Name': 'Regenta Central North Goa', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Very Good Property, Nice ambience‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very good property, Nice ambience, Rooms were neat, clean and spacious.. Staff is very supportive.. Breakfast was good.. '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It was a good property near by market . Beach is 3 km away but good for stay'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Very nice experience‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very nice place to stay in north goa. Also very peaceful place. Staff is cooperative and ready for service 24x7.

All games & activities like (swimming pool, zym) available in hotel. 

I take breakfast in my stay. There is lots of verity and tasty food.

Cleaning like thumb rule.

I book club room, amazing very large room with all facilities.

I give 101%.'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Disappointed with response time and food‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Food was pathetic comparing to other Regenta hotels.
Even for small housekeeping request response time is 45-min to an hour. we asked for mosquito repellent and bucket.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good ambience,  good food, good staff'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Pathetic Staff Interaction‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Someone named Ashok was so rude there and had a lot of attitude. I checked out within 2 hours even though I paid it for a day .
If someone with a different country comes in while he is working on your booking, he will immediately stop yours and go with them. If you ask why is it so, he will start arguing. Would never recommend this as the staff behaviour need to get improved a lot.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Outstanding ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Best experience '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Great place to stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very great place to stay if you want to stay somewhere quiet but be near the calangute circle'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Best place if you are travelling with baby ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The staff is very polite and courteous. I was travelling with my 1 year old baby and the staff were so helpful while providing complimentary baby food .. 
basic amenities for family to enjoy the hotel . 
The place is quite far from beach but if travelling to relax then can opt for this place '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Wonderful and delightful experience ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Stayed there for 2 days (myself, wife and our 3 year old son). The hotel is perfect for anyone travelling with kids, the entire staff is really helpful. The restaurant guys and the support staff are excellent.  The folks at front desk always greet you with smile and respect. Even the young boys interning are always ready to help, special thanks to the person from Uttarakhand (sorry forgot name).

It takes around 15 mins, to reach Baga beach. There is a super market at walkable distance where you will get all the basic necessary stuff. But if you are looking to explore, then bike is a must. 

 Must stay here if you are planning to visit Goa with a kid.'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Below average‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Overpriced hotel. Location is far off from main beach. Swimming pool was dirty. Food and staff behaviour was good though. One can easily get other good Hotels in same price near to beach.'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.8', 'Review_Heading': 'X‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Sddd'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Beautiful hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very nice hotel with tasty food and staff was really very nice. And food was really delicious. Good work thank u so much'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Location issue‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Away from main area'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Value for money property ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I stayed for 3 days in this property. The staff is so helpful and friendly. The breakfast buffet was also delicious with full of variety. '}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Carry your own basic requirements‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Carry dental kit, conditioner (they provide shampoo), hair dryer, shower cap.

Curtains of the washroom could have been cleaner.

Please ensure that kids (on a trip with school) do not knock other guest‚Äôs door at wee hours.

Food was good. Location was a bit distant from happening spots but not much of an issue. Clean bedding, towels were there. Nicely maintained room and furniture. 

Liked my overall stay. Positive referral in all.

'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'My stay at Regenta was the best stay I ever had into a hotel.
All the staffs were very courteous and helpful at every point 24*7.
They not only provided the service but also provided the support in my bad time I.e. after my car broke down in middle of the road after check out.
They again accommodated me and my family(myself, my wife and my 7 month old baby) properly.
Simon and Kushal from reception desk helped us alot in everything during our stay. Also, Sunup and Manish from their food department were very polite and ontoes everytime on our request. These 4 people made our stay comfortable especially for my family.
Would definitely come again here on my stay to goa.
Kudos to Regenta for everything and having such people with them ...üôÇüëè'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Great service ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Excellent staff like Christina Nelly and neeraj everyone appreciate their efforts.

Good service with food and rooms are excellent.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Great‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Great'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Great place to stay, away from all the hustle and bustle.'}], 'price': '4,184', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/7086497/-1/8c88d831341e61f813ed5d4f121164f5.jpg?ca=13&ce=1&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '0', 'amenities': ['Street view', 'Non-smoking', 'Shower', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Satellite/cable channels', 'Telephone', 'Daily newspaper', 'Fan', 'Coffee/tea maker', 'Free bottled water', 'Free welcome drink', 'Mini bar', 'Refrigerator', 'Desk', 'Sofa', 'First aid kit', 'In-room safe box', 'Smoke detector'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/regenta-central-north-goa/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&tspTypes=9,-1&los=1&searchrequestid=e32c5c52-549a-4d3b-a92a-33f5cf3f25e2'}

details:
{'Location': 'Bairo Alto Dos Pilotos, Jose Falcao Road, Panaji, Goa, India, 403001', 'overall_rating': '8.0', 'Name': 'The Crown Goa Hotel', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Not as marketed ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Not clear why this hotel is awarded 5 stars - it is more like 3 star. The service is slow, the food poor, the decor is old and uninviting - it needs an update and better maintenance.  The garden 'view' is of a fence, fire escape and a dilapidated kids playground. The view from the pool side is good.  The reception area and the salon are dismal. The approach road and steps to the hotel are dirty, narrow and dark and are forbidding to walk down after dark. It was close to noisy church bells ringing at 5 am. Brenda, one of the managers, was efficient and professional. "}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Things are not that good now.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'In 2020 I visited Goa with family first time and I booked this hotel since then I am going every year to celebrate my kid‚Äôs birthday there in Goa. In 2020 Crown Goa was very good but this time around it was expensive and below are day to day details:

Day 1 : we traveled from Bangalore to Goa by car and informed hotel that there will be late checkin. When we reached they told in their hotel there is water issue and they are doing some emergency fixes, so no water for 30 mins. We waited for 2 hours and left hotel without fresh up with 5 year old kid. God knows when water issue got resolved.

Day 2: Morning breakfast was so bad.  In night we ordered milk for my boy which caused health issues.

Day 3: Birthday day for my boy and he woke up with having stomach upset and started vomiting by the time we thought to go out to see the Dr. We checked with Hotel for Dr and they asked 2500 for Dr consultation on hotel. We found another Dr on google and that Dr helped my Child and things got normalised.
Hotel promised that they will do room decoration and cake arrangements (they did nothing) upon asking they gave excuse that kid was not well we thought that it won‚Äôt look good.

Day 4: Check our day. They gave fruits goodies to my kid as birthday token kind.

'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice hotel!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good location, good view of mandovi river. Highly maintained and spacious rooms. Breakfast is not at all good given the 5 star property and needs improvement. Very near to casinos and Panjim market if one plans to visit. '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Best location for Panaji!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The Crowns offers the best location for Panaji area in Goa. The staff is amazing, go out for their way to make your stay comfortable. Though the building itself is a little old and the rooms are outdated, it is one of the better hotels in Panaji area for the price. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Parents loved it‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I booked this hotel for my parents for their anniversary trip. Both my parents absolutely loved it. The location was amazing, right in the middle of the city. Additionally, the food was good and dinner options were reasonably priced. Plus, the staff was extremely friendly. My mother didn‚Äôt want to leave ;). Now she is already planning for next year‚Äôs trip.'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Staff Behaviour‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Night Duty Front Office Staff Behavior was not good.. Need to improve'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': "I wouldn't go again‚Äù", 'Review_Body': "A couple of staff were good else everything was ...........

Was offered upgrade room for free with great view. BUT, the air con does not work. Out of 6 nights, had 4 nights with no proper working air con.  Moved into a 3rd room to have a working air con. All air cons are very, very old and not working. The first room air con had water dripping  in the room! Had even got Agoda  to speak to hotel. Staff are helpless, as owners seem to do nothing about the upgrade of old, not working air cons.  We had nights with sweaty heads on our pillows, stuffy humid room, difficult to breath. My son struggled to sleep. Had to really be blunt to say that we don't want any free upgrade of a bigger room, but need working air con in any small room. May summer month in Goa!  Ruined our rest, impacting our trip. Offered no refund even on the intervention of Agoda.    Never, ever return back. Cheaper hotels and air b n b had better new air-cons in Goa. Pros - The food was good."}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'hotel is located opposite to mandovi river bridge. Near to Panaji bus stand. reviews:
[{'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Not as marketed ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Not clear why this hotel is awarded 5 stars - it is more like 3 star. The service is slow, the food poor, the decor is old and uninviting - it needs an update and better maintenance.  The garden 'view' is of a fence, fire escape and a dilapidated kids playground. The view from the pool side is good.  The reception area and the salon are dismal. The approach road and steps to the hotel are dirty, narrow and dark and are forbidding to walk down after dark. It was close to noisy church bells ringing at 5 am. Brenda, one of the managers, was efficient and professional. "}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Things are not that good now.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'In 2020 I visited Goa with family first time and I booked this hotel since then I am going every year to celebrate my kid‚Äôs birthday there in Goa. In 2020 Crown Goa was very good but this time around it was expensive and below are day to day details:

Day 1 : we traveled from Bangalore to Goa by car and informed hotel that there will be late checkin. When we reached they told in their hotel there is water issue and they are doing some emergency fixes, so no water for 30 mins. We waited for 2 hours and left hotel without fresh up with 5 year old kid. God knows when water issue got resolved.

Day 2: Morning breakfast was so bad.  In night we ordered milk for my boy which caused health issues.

Day 3: Birthday day for my boy and he woke up with having stomach upset and started vomiting by the time we thought to go out to see the Dr. We checked with Hotel for Dr and they asked 2500 for Dr consultation on hotel. We found another Dr on google and that Dr helped my Child and things got normalised.
Hotel promised that they will do room decoration and cake arrangements (they did nothing) upon asking they gave excuse that kid was not well we thought that it won‚Äôt look good.

Day 4: Check our day. They gave fruits goodies to my kid as birthday token kind.

'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice hotel!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good location, good view of mandovi river. Highly maintained and spacious rooms. Breakfast is not at all good given the 5 star property and needs improvement. Very near to casinos and Panjim market if one plans to visit. '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Best location for Panaji!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The Crowns offers the best location for Panaji area in Goa. The staff is amazing, go out for their way to make your stay comfortable. Though the building itself is a little old and the rooms are outdated, it is one of the better hotels in Panaji area for the price. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Parents loved it‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I booked this hotel for my parents for their anniversary trip. Both my parents absolutely loved it. No. 2/16 A, Naika Vaddo, Calangute, Goa, India, 403516', 'overall_rating': '8.2', 'Name': 'Zone Connect Goa, Calangute', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Neat and clean rooms. '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Awesome Experience‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Me and my wife enjoyed a lot our stay, it was bit far from beach but facilities side and staff, cleanliness side, everything was good.'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Location not so great‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Location away from the beach and very congested surroundings. Price on the higher side. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It was awsome experience to stay in this resort.....i love the ambience.....all over it was a pleasent stay in this resort'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Jabardast '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'New Year Stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I stayed in this hotel for 5 days, good food, cooperative helpful staaf. Good location no rush area and easily accessible from the main beaches walking distance from Calangute and Baga beach. Bike and Car Rental can be easily booked from this location and if you are looking for north or south Goa bus tours, pickup points are hardly 200 meters from the hotel. Only one thing which I did not liked about hotel is lifts are not there try to get the lower level before checking inside. Over all its a good hotel. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'This was one of the best hotels I stayed in goa. It‚Äôs so clean and worth every penny. Went there as a couple, enjoyed the beds and it has a great balcony and extra room with nice toilets '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Amazing hotel!!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Staff, food, prices, facilities.. everything is just amazing. Just go n book it. '}, {'Review_Rating': '4.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Not a very good experience‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'There is no network or wifi reception in the room. Breakfast buffet is not at all good. Restaurant server does not listen to any of the need. Room was clean but washroom was lacking amenities. Clean towel was not provided.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Affordable!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Worth the money.  Very clean and has all the facilities needed. '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice budget stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It is a good budget stay with minimal facilities.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Low key, but very comfortable and clean place. Have all basic amenities. Specially the staff was super-friendly - always there to help with a smile. That was really impressive. Would recommend to friends any time. Only don't use their Spa for body messages. It was quite disappointing."}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good hotel '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good Stay Near Calangute/Candolim‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It is a nice quaint hotel between Calangute & Candolim beaches. They had a decent breakfast spread and clean rooms, bedsheets etc. Would stay here again.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Definitely Recommend ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Great food, spacious rooms, kind staff and definitely at the best location. It is at the centre of the city and safe to drive down here at anytime of the day. Had the best time. Definitely recommended without a doubt. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Best Properties in North Goa‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Worth of every penny...nice stay and recommend to All..'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very rude staff'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'One of the best clean hotel in Goa‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Guys, i stayed here for 4 nights and its one of the best hotel i have ever stayed in. Its cleaned and tidy. Rooms are super clean and spacious. Hotel is exactly same as looks in the photos.'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Is not a 4 star hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I was told if rooms are available I would be getting early check in but rooms kept on getting check out but staff was like you get it only after 2 . Even after 2 , I was not given a room. Food is not good and options are very limited in breakfast.The positive I see about the hotel is location , cleanliness.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice place to stay.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Everything was good. Clean and tidy rooms. Nice designs. Swimming pool was spectacular. Food was great. They just need improvement in staff service. Otherwise worth the money.'}], 'price': '3,720', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/336653/14377018/9676ad05ae7489a4e81eba889fd686f9.jpg?ce=0&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '22m¬≤', 'amenities': ['City view', 'Non-smoking', 'Shower', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Additional bathroom', 'Hair dryer', 'Mirror', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Satellite/cable channels', 'Telephone', 'Air conditioning', 'Daily newspaper', 'Fan', 'Umbrella', 'Coffee/tea maker', 'Free bottled water', 'Mini bar', 'Closet', 'Clothes rack', 'Ironing facilities', 'Sewing kit', 'In-room safe box', 'Locker'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/azzure-by-spree-hotel/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&tspTypes=9&los=1&searchrequestid=e32c5c52-549a-4d3b-a92a-33f5cf3f25e2'}

details:
{'Location': 'ozran beach road, Vagator, Goa, India, 403509', 'overall_rating': '8.0', 'Name': 'Casa Comforts', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very very always‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very very good good for couple group clean good staff and for party people go for it'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': "If you want decent sleep, don't book.‚Äù", 'Review_Body': "We booked the best room, which is the suite that overlooks the cliff. The room is decent sized and views are not bad. There were 2 big problems. There is a cacophony of music from all the joints next door . Not just that, the blaring music from Casa Playa will keep you up till late hours. if you want a relaxing stay and want to sleep peacefully, stay clear.
The hot water pressure in the bath room was so bad. The water trickled. the only option is to take cold water bath. Am not sure if all rooms have that problem, but the suite definitely had it. With lack of sleep and not enough hot water to bathe in winters it wasn't comfortable."}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Great Location, View &Room‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Everything about this Hotel was nice.
Location, View, Room , Backyard, jacuzzi , Breakfast. Must stay!'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very bad experience üòû‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Too much nonveg smell in their room it's very tough to stay and did not get proper suppor from hotel and booking site"}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Best place for couples ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'They have 2 types of rooms with Jacuzzi, confirm with hotel before booking as Agoda shows only one type of room.
Amazing place to stayüëåüèª'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Great location and villa like rooms‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The staff and location was particularly great. The only downside was my room being near to kitchen. '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Minor Issues But great staff to over shadow thoses‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Overall clean and good location.
Service is Excellent. I arranged a surprise birthday for my gf they did fantastic job on the room decoration.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Good view of Ozran‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "The property has a very good view of Ozran. The lighting of the room is perfect. The room has a jacuzzi, which we couldn't try coz of tight schedule. The breakfast have limited options, but was tasty. Its not a buffet breakfast. Good staff."}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Room issues‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Rooms had cockroaches which is in-acceptable for a hotel of this class. Restaurant was closed due to renovation and in breakfast they offered only 1 dish to 1 person where we expected buffet. Later they changed our room but the hotel is not at all value for money'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Fridge was showed in facilities but was not there but staff were cooperative.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Amazing stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We were here for 4 comfortable days. Sanjay and his team were very good at hosting us here. This place is located with good access to beach and nearby pubs. Looking forward to visit again !!!!'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Above average‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'NOt so good as presented in the photos'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Amazing view of the beach.. clean beach nearby and lovely service‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Clean rooms and very good staff ! '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Best for a quality time with your loved one‚Äôs '}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Above average‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Property is excellent,  But the maintenance is worst.'}, {'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Not value for money.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'No breakfast, No pool, No proper cleaning, Non hygiene restaurant. 
Overall it‚Äôs not value for money 
'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Honeymoon Stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It was good stay at Casa Playa Comforts and ground staff was so helpful. I would suggest to all couples to go once.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Delighted !‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We stayed for 3 nights, it was delighted experiences. Highly impressed with there services. The staff is very cultured. Bigs thanks to Mr Sanjay and Krishna and there team. Strongly recommend if you are planning to stay around Vegator, Casa Comfort is the place. Looking forward to my next visit to the same place if coming to Goa.
The only bad experience at the place was there restaurant Casa Playa, when ordered at your cottage the service were unfriendly and unpleasant, only to know the management is different.
Overall it was delight at Casa Comfort. Go for it!'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Great place at an affordable price‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Great place to stay in Vagator. The rooms are a steal for the price you are paying. The jacuzzi adds to it. There were some things missing from the room like handwash, spoons, and the kettle was broken, so I had to call for service, but all these issues were fixed almost immediately. The service was great and the people there are very courteous. Highly recommended.'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nice location of the place, Titli, Anteras all are just beside it and also infront of the beach.'}], 'price': '8,244', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/6811388/601590705/fdbe0c4765d27eca76e8b8d5a91cc32d.jpg?ce=0&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '10m¬≤', 'amenities': ['Ocean view'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/casa-playa-comforts/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&tspTypes=-1&los=1&searchrequestid=e32c5c52-549a-4d3b-a92a-33f5cf3f25e2'}

The room is decent sized and views are not bad. There were 2 big problems. There is a cacophony of music from all the joints next door . Not just that, the blaring music from Casa Playa will keep you up till late hours. if you want a relaxing stay and want to sleep peacefully, stay clear.
The hot water pressure in the bath room was so bad. The water trickled. the only option is to take cold water bath. Am not sure if all rooms have that problem, but the suite definitely had it. {'Location': 'Benaulim Beach Rd, Colva, Goa, India, 403716', 'overall_rating': '9.3', 'Name': 'Fairfield by Marriott Goa Benaulim', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Close to the beach, good, clean rooms, very accommodating staff. Enjoyed the stay thoroughly.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice comfy stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We, group of 6 people visited this Hotel in Feb 23. Huge property, maintained properly, nice staff, good location, need improvement in food a bit,but overall good.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Breakfast Buffet too good!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Specifically live pancake and paratha counters!'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent place‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Room is a bit small, but balcony is nice'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Great deal‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'A bit of everything you expect'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Loved the hotel and facilities esp. with a toddler'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Fairfield Benaulim Goa ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good place to stay. Very good staff. A little costly compared to the location and facilities. Yet the beach is fabulous. Good place for leisurely stay. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Best Hotel in South Goa - Special Occasion on Anniversary ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'One of the best hotel in south goa
About Room Service: Quincy and Team made all possible efforts and all arrangements above my expectations during my 3 days stay.
About Hotel Cleanliness; located just near to beach.. and still I was not able to see any sand foot prints any where in property‚Ä¶ very well maintained and they take care of cleanliness the utmost..
Front Desk team: They made sure that we had an comfortable stay at all the times from check in till checkout. special clap to the lady.. sorry I don‚Äôt remember her name ( Friele not sure‚Ä¶ Very apologies for forgetting your name)
Kava Restaurant Team : All working staff made us comfortable whenever we were at Dinner/Linch or for breakfast. And they always made sure that what cherry on the rop can be provided for each meal‚Ä¶
Very very special Thanks to Aaron who made very special efforts on our anniversary, also he made sure that Mutton sabji was made as per our expectations and also the specialist Biryani was prepared by Team which was really beyond my expectations. Thanks Aaron once again for all your efforts
Last but not least even security man was well trained and was helpful when offloading and on loading the luggage 
Thanks Marriott for my wonderful stay on our special occasion of Anniversary 
'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Ideal location. Well appointed rooms. Polite and efficient staff who go out of the way to help. A sumptuous buffet breakfast. All add up to a memorable stay.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Excellent service‚Ä¶humble staff Hayden and ram'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'One of the best place to stay ‚Ä¶ amazing property surrounded by seashore ‚Ä¶ must stay.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Loved it ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Beautiful, calm 
Away from exact 'Goa Vibes'. 
A peaceful stay in a paradise with beach at a walkable distance. "}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Very enjoyable stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very friendly staff, excellent food.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Finest ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Had a best time there in goa !! Appreciate the team for their warmth '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Fantastic resort in an excellent location ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Friendly and accommodating staff. Delicious food. Clean facilities.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Perfect destination for relaxing.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Best location, well-mannered staff. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Excellent '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Simply the best ! Always ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Beautiful property  with absolutely the best location.  The beach is only a few hundred metres away. The staff here are exceptional ! Definitely the strongest selling point for me . They all deserve 5 stars. Very courteous and always willing to go through extra mile. And the food is excellent ! Everything one needs to enjoy that much needed R & R in my beautiful Goa ! '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Perfect place to relax‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We stayed here with a group of friends over the new year and it was a blast. The hotel is across the street from the beach and the facilities and staff were great! The food and especially the new year dinner was a highlight. We also spent a fair amount of time sitting around the pool and the facilities were very clean.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good Hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "New property which is just 5 minutes walk from the beach. Benaulim beach is sctually one of the best beaches I visited till now at GOA, it's clean and much less crowded compared to others. Nice hotel with all young staff trying to keep up with Guest demands."}], 'price': '11,099', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/26890158/-1/90a501b8795c6a01960f615dfd5c7b51.jpg?ca=27&ce=0&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '23m¬≤', 'amenities': ['Outdoor view', 'Balcony/terrace', 'Shower', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Roll-in shower', 'Hair dryer', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Pool facilities', 'TV', 'Air conditioning', 'Alarm clock', 'Hand sanitizer', 'Linens', 'Sleep comfort items', 'Slippers', 'Wake-up service', 'Coffee/tea maker', 'Free bottled water', 'Mini bar', 'Desk', 'Tile/marble flooring', 'Trash cans', 'Wooden/parqueted flooring', 'Closet', 'Clothes rack', 'Ironing facilities', 'Accessible by elevator', 'Accessible by stairs', 'In-room safe box', 'Locker', 'Safety/security feature', 'Smoke detector'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/fairfield-by-marriott-goa-benaulim/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&los=1&searchrequestid=e32c5c52-549a-4d3b-a92a-33f5cf3f25e2'}

details:
{'Location': 'Jack Sequeira Junction Calangute Goa, Calangute, Goa, India, 403516', 'overall_rating': '8.5', 'Name': 'The Avenue  Calangute ', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Great Location ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very good hotel with coperative staff and clean rooms .. only problem is swimming pool is on terrace
'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Ideal location‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Hi, we stayed at the hotel for 4 days, the ideal location to stay in goa'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Pathetic Experience!!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Had stayed for 8 nights during peak season 25th Dec to 2nd Jan and had worst ever staying experience in any hotel.

1. AC was not working for full one day. Imagine how we would have survived.
2. Not enough parking. Car keys were handed over to reception - the driver does not know even how to unlock through autocop a normal Maruti Swift. Had a heated argument with staff at 1 am.
2. Pathetic wifi - it never connects. Staff is also careless about it.
3. Big Rats roaming in the restaurants, wondering what would be the Kitchen condition.
4. Cockroaches coming out of the Electric Kettle.
5. Bathroom stinking 24/7. Even 4 Godrej air freshener was not able to make an impact on the stinking washroom.
6. Not enough options in breakfast.
7. No arrangements for Christmas dinner or New Year's Eve.

Above all, the Manager - Mr. Manoj was typical useless. Upon highlighting all the issues, he was not at all empathic with us. Asked for compensation since AC did not work for complete 1 day - he said I cannot help. Asked for management's number, he said he is the management and owner. Asked us to take the refund for remaining days and leave (if we want to). Just imagine how furious I would have been having such discussion with such an idiot. He does not deserve to be a hotel manager even for a tapri.

Got influenced by the rating as 8.9 - however, does not deserve to be even 1 star. Would never recommend this to anyone."}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Amazing stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We really enjoyed staying at The Avenue Calangute. The location is amazing and we really liked the rooms and hospitality. The only issue is no ventilation in washrooms which can cause it to be smelly sometimes. The breakfast spread is also really nice. However the overall positives exceed this one negative.'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Don‚Äôt stay here! Would not give even 1 star‚Äù', 'Review_Body': '
- from the day I have checked in pungent smell is coming from the room washroom
- wifi not working with the network that can support the devices 
- flush of the commode was leaking
- four aer pocket freshner have been kept still the smell of the gases is unbearable
- the manager and the hotel staff had come and personally experienced this and agreed to this smell but did not help
- we had to open the room door and sit in the room otherwise you will feel puckish
- the hotel staff comes and spray the air freshner but after a while that smell of gases again come which makes you leave the room
- from the time I have checked in the room I have been facing this issue and whole of my mood is spoiled discussing and raising this with hotel staff.
- even after putting napathalene balls and 4 pocket sized freshner the smell is coming now you can imagine the level of smell of the gases coming from the washroom
- the ventilation is next to zero as the exhaust fan is not solving its purpose

- when the room door is closed for a while it‚Äôs not bearable to enter the room you have to open the room door sit outside for minimum of ten minutes and then enter. All of the gases gets accumulated in the room and washroom. Either the sewage system of the hotel is blocked or not properly constructed.

It‚Äôs not possible to capture the smell in form of the photographs or video as an evidence however the entire staff including the manager is informed and have personally experienced as an evidence.  The staff including manager is not at all helpful

I would ask agoda to blacklist this hotel. I would repeat do not go ahead with any bookings in this hotel whatsoever ever is the price. '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Awesome Stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "The staff here is really welcoming and stay was amazing. Room is spacious and breakfast given is scrumptious as well. It's right in middle of area near beaches. Will love to visit again. "}, {'Review_Rating': '3.2', 'Review_Heading': 'This is the worst hotel I have stayed till date.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "1. AC of the room (Room No. 410) was down for more than 24 hours (from evening of 28th to night of 29th December 2022).  I along with my couldn't sleep whole night.  In the night, I requested to change my rooms but person at reception told me that it is not possible.
2. I tried to speak to manager of the hotel but the whole day person at the reception told me that manager is not available.
3. When I tried again in the evening,  receptionist at hotel told me that manager is not picking up the phone. After few minutes, hearing my voice, manager suddenly appeared at reception. 
4. I directly told him to compensate  me for the horrible night and day we had experienced,  but he said it is technical fault and he is not responsible for that. When I told him why should I pay for the services I didn't get? He told me to do whatever I wish to do but he will not refund me the money for the services I didn't get.
5. I had booked a room in hotel for 3 adults and 1 kid through Agoda but they said only confirmation of 3 adults is there and they made me to pay Rs.4000+ for my 1 kid.
6. Apart from above, additional bed provided is brocken, fresh bed sheets and towels not provided everyday of my stay, bed sheets were dirty, and toiletries & tea/coffee etc w
ere not filled-up daily.
7. Room service of the hotel is also very poor.
I will never stay in this again and will never recommend this hotel to anyone."}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Best location and family friendly hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very close to good restaurants and beach'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Awesome Experience ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Hotel Avenue best place to stay, My Experience was Awesome specially with the hotel staff & service.
Food is delicious and location is the best.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'THQ...‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'no..'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice Stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Stayed here for a 2nd time and have enjoyed both occasions. Rooms are modern and spacious and the location is great too.  Rooftop pool and breakfast choices need some attention but would stay again. reviews:
[{'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Great Location ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very good hotel with coperative staff and clean rooms .. only problem is swimming pool is on terrace
'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Ideal location‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Hi, we stayed at the hotel for 4 days, the ideal location to stay in goa'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Pathetic Experience!!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Had stayed for 8 nights during peak season 25th Dec to 2nd Jan and had worst ever staying experience in any hotel.

1. AC was not working for full one day. Imagine how we would have survived.
2. Not enough parking. Car keys were handed over to reception - the driver does not know even how to unlock through autocop a normal Maruti Swift. Had a heated argument with staff at 1 am.
2. Pathetic wifi - it never connects. Staff is also careless about it.
3. Big Rats roaming in the restaurants, wondering what would be the Kitchen condition.
4. Cockroaches coming out of the Electric Kettle.
5. Bathroom stinking 24/7. Even 4 Godrej air freshener was not able to make an impact on the stinking washroom.
6. Not enough options in breakfast.
7. No arrangements for Christmas dinner or New Year's Eve.

Above all, the Manager - Mr. Manoj was typical useless. Upon highlighting all the issues, he was not at all empathic with us. Asked for compensation since AC did not work for complete 1 day - he said I cannot help. Asked for management's number, he said he is the management and owner. Asked us to take the refund for remaining days and leave (if we want to). Just imagine how furious I would have been having such discussion with such an idiot. He does not deserve to be a hotel manager even for a tapri.

Got influenced by the rating as 8.9 - however, does not deserve to be even 1 star. Would never recommend this to anyone."}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Amazing stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We really enjoyed staying at The Avenue Calangute. The location is amazing and we really liked the rooms and hospitality. The only issue is no ventilation in washrooms which can cause it to be smelly sometimes. The breakfast spread is also really nice. However the overall positives exceed this one negative.'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Don‚Äôt stay here! Would not give even 1 star‚Äù', 'Review_Body': '
- from the day I have checked in pungent smell is coming from the room washroom
- wifi not working with the network that can support the devices 
- flush of the commode was leaking
- four aer pocket freshner have been kept still the smell of the gases is unbearable
- the manager and the hotel staff had come and personally experienced this and agreed to this smell but did not help
- we had to open the room door and sit in the room otherwise you will feel puckish
- the hotel staff comes and spray the air freshner but after a while that smell of gases again come which makes you leave the room
- from the time I have checked in the room I have been facing this issue and whole of my mood is spoiled discussing and raising this with hotel staff.
- even after putting napathalene balls and 4 pocket sized freshner the smell is coming now you can imagine the level of smell of the gases coming from the washroom
- the ventilation is next to zero as the exhaust fan is not solving its purpose

- when the room door is closed for a while it‚Äôs not bearable to enter the room you have to open the room door sit outside for minimum of ten minutes and then enter. All of the gases gets accumulated in the room and washroom. Either the sewage system of the hotel is blocked or not properly constructed.

It‚Äôs not possible to capture the smell in form of the photographs or video as an evidence however the entire staff including the manager is informed and have personally experienced as an evidence.  The staff including manager is not at all helpful

I would ask agoda to blacklist this hotel. I would repeat do not go ahead with any bookings in this hotel whatsoever ever is the price. '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Awesome Stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "The staff here is really welcoming and stay was amazing. Room is spacious and breakfast given is scrumptious as well. It's right in middle of area near beaches. Will love to visit again. "}, {'Review_Rating': '3.2', 'Review_Heading': 'This is the worst hotel I have stayed till date.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "1. AC of the room (Room No. 410) was down for more than 24 hours (from evening of 28th to night of 29th December 2022).  I along with my couldn't sleep whole night.  In the night, I requested to change my rooms but person at reception told me that it is not possible.
2. I tried to speak to manager of the hotel but the whole day person at the reception told me that manager is not available.
3. When I tried again in the evening,  receptionist at hotel told me that manager is not picking up the phone. After few minutes, hearing my voice, manager suddenly appeared at reception. 
4. I directly told him to compensate  me for the horrible night and day we had experienced,  but he said it is technical fault and he is not responsible for that. When I told him why should I pay for the services I didn't get? He told me to do whatever I wish to do but he will not refund me the money for the services I didn't get.
5. I had booked a room in hotel for 3 adults and 1 kid through Agoda but they said only confirmation of 3 adults is there and they made me to pay Rs.4000+ for my 1 kid.
6. Apart from above, additional bed provided is brocken, fresh bed sheets and towels not provided everyday of my stay, bed sheets were dirty, and toiletries & tea/coffee etc w
ere not filled-up daily.
7. Room service of the hotel is also very poor.

You will not get the mentioned food items in the menu when u order it. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Perfect location for a holiday‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Stayed in the premier river view room for 2 nights and the experience was very good and fulfilling.

Big size room, huge balcony with 2 big chairs and table, large bathroom.

Amazing river view from the balcony, fantastic food, polite and humble staff.

Loved my time here!'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Ok AND NOT OK !‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Location wise, You will feel it's a bit interior. Unless you have a vehicle with you, don't opt for it. Folks were not friendly. Even for plates we got stern answers like we need for guests. Food service is not good. We had to call again and again. Next to river , it's a good place to sit there and enjoy nature . Talk about traffic jam in this area. Almost 3-4 hours got wasted in total for  5 days we've spent here. Evening times you'll have huge traffic jam until you pass that church. Cleanliness wise, it's good. Room cleaning e.t.c are good. Have parking.. folks clean pool daily. F&B is charged beyond MRP. Hey, In simple, cleanliness, ambience, view wise it's good. In house hotel service and their prices suck big-time. Front desk folks are friendly but hotel closes by 10:30PM and be prepared to starve if you come late.   You won't even have access to plates. Oh btw.. You won't be provided buckets in rest room. They will be provided only on demand . "}, {'Review_Rating': '4.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Upgrade Provided‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We got the maharaja suite though we had opted for river view room. Its a 3 star property and the price is on the higher side. No proper parking facility. No good food. No proper war to reach the resort.'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Hi actually i had booked this riverfront view room which sufficient big in size the room was good staff was good but the maintenance of the hotel was too bad .
I informed in reception about the leakage of ac water it was continuously leaking my whole mattress bed got wet and me my baby and my wife were not able to sleep whole night because of the wet mattress and i called in reception but at night there is not a concern person available in reception.very bad with family but yes if your going with your friend or in couple you can enjoy a nice trip.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good location, nearby Vagator, river view.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good resort in Siolim, very good view, took cottage room, was good, nice view from room, spacious, food was also good, only thing felt unclean was the bathroom, although was cleaned on daily basis but still felt it like that. another thing to mention the glassed were not changed, the welcome drink glass still kept in the room although room was cleaned daily. service also good, overall good stay, enjoyed a lot.'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Not a good place for family with old ages‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Not a place for old people coming in family. No lifts. All rooms on second floor. '}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'MY WORST HOTEL EXPERIENCE EVER !! Never travel to this resort‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "This is an old resort. Very uncourteous staff and services. Even the view is not good. Its very remote, no mobile connectivity, cheap products used in rooms, AC wasn't working properly. The more I talk about this property, the more angry I get. 

They didn't allow my cab to get into the hotel. They informed the local union thugs that I have booked a cab from some online portal. Those local thugs damaged the cab, forced us to get out of the car in the middle of the road and forced us to take tab their tab to reach the airport. The resort was complacent and involved in all of this. This got so scary for me and my wife, that out of danger we travelled in local bus, hopping from bus stands to bus stands to reach the airport just in time for my flight. MY WORST HOTEL EXPERIENCE EVER   "}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good location and good food...‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Staff is little bit uncooperative '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Good ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It was my best experience in this hotel and great experience with good staff amenities.. the best is food... '}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice View‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'If you want to stay silent place , then i recommend for this place. {'Location': ' Near Ajit Kamat Hospital , Miramar, Panaji Goa, Dukes Villa house No- 13/394/2 , Panaji, Goa, India, 403001', 'overall_rating': '7.9', 'Name': 'Coastal Pearl Hotel Miramar Panaji ', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Guest house (not a hotel) ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Its not a hotel. Its a guest house. Rooms are too compact (although we had one with balcony). Bathroom is too narrow in width. Facilities are not like a hotel.  Staff tries to support but since facilities and staff are limited, they also cannot help. They do not have a kitchen and you have to order from outside if you want to eat something. Breakfast options are too limited. Breakfast prepared and served by 2 staff. One has to wait if more than 8-10 guests come to take breakfast at same time. Travel arranged by one external guy. '}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Only balcony rooms are good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Go for only balcony rooms nothing else its a good hotel good staff very good location.'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Good hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good hotel near to casinos and beach.
'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good location‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Hotel is located in a peaceful area.
Staff are polite and kind. Rooms were clean and hygienic.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Best of the best....too much good'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice and Cosy‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We completely recommend staying here'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Safety issues‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "The property is not interested in safety/ privacy of guests. Ground floor rooms don't have proper doors/ toilet window is exposed to. anyone who may be inclined to peep in/ staff could not care less "}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Simple yet sophisticated ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Tucked away in a calm and peaceful locality.
Rooms are compact and it's newly built.
Bathrooms are clean and tidy.
Staff is cheerful and courteous.
"}, {'Review_Rating': '4.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Avoid This hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'If you are not getting hotel anywhere else then choose this hotel. I had my worst experience, the room I booked was shown balcony but the one given to me was not having balcony. Bed was horrible and stinking. Bathroom door was not getting lock, this had so many issues. i wasted my money and a day on this hotel. plz avoid going there.'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Original GST bill/receipt was not given, Worst mobile network ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "I was told - You booked through Agoda and Agoda pay us after 45-60 days
We won't be able to give you GST bill now, you will receive mail for the same

I stayed in 2 other hotel's, Original GST bill was given at the time of checkout.

Their was no network, Wifi was also very poor "}, {'Review_Rating': '3.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Not worth‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'i paid almost 4000/night, this property is not even worth 1500/night, rooms are extremely small, there were cockroaches in bathroom, no cupboard, no common facilities, breakfast in open shed, you will get better spread at a YMCA hostel than this hotel.  '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Felt costlier for the room‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Bit. Costlier for the money paid..'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Too Expensive ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Facilities are not worthy of price.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Absolutely satisfied!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The hotel has just recently opened and is a very vlaue for money stay. Its located just one lane inside from the main road where all the casinos are located and the neighbourhood is very upscale. 
Being a new hotel, the staff is learning but does a good job. Only issue I faced was the sheets, although clean were gving out cotton lints. The rooms are very clean and have basic facilities. The free breakfast was also decent. I faced no problems at all. Special mention to the owner, Sunil for providing such good servuce'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Staff were fine, breakfast basic only from 9-10am. Location was 20min walk to city and 10min walk to Miramar Beach so awkward.  No aircon in room, big clean room though. Wifi not very good only worked in 2 spots in the room.'}], 'price': '2,374', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/33654128/547819591/c240ed1fdba5d6dafe76c0e8b2c839ea.jpg?ce=0&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '23m¬≤', 'amenities': ['Free Wi-Fi', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Air conditioning', 'Refrigerator', 'Individual air conditioning'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/coastal-pearl-hotel-miramar-panaji/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&tspTypes=2&los=1&searchrequestid=8225b61c-325c-4f9e-b7ba-f3d3492b1cd7'}

details:
{'Location': 'Shamiraj Hotels Pvt. Ltd, Near Colva Circle, Colva Beach Road, Colva, Goa, India, 403708', 'overall_rating': '7.6', 'Name': 'Hotel Sea coin', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '4.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Ok ok‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "The location is good since it's located near colva beach but the drawback is there is no pool inside property as well as there is no view from the balcony also. The staff is good. But the basic facility like Ro Water is not available. Markets are near by cafe also near the hotel. The hotel is ok ok to stay overall. Other things I like to mention it's located in South Goa the place is  very quite and it gave us chill vibes. "}, {'Review_Rating': '4.4', 'Review_Heading': 'The Receptionist Lady Was Rude and Disrespectful ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'During Check In and During Checkout 

The Reception Lady was being Rude and Disrespectful '}, {'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Awful hotel ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "If you are think of staying here dont! So I am currently staying at this hotel upon arrival last week I had to wait 5 hours for a room to then over the nest 48 hours to be moved rooms 3 times. I then get a half decent room so I wasn't happy but thought I can live with it. Then I go to turn my TV on and no remote I call someone in who takes my room key and shows me where to poke it to turn it on I was astonished then there were no TV channels anyway so when I ask about this I get told they don't want to pay a TV subscription so I offered to pay for the TV subscription as they have always had TV previously I have been staying in this same hotel for 23 years twice a year. In 1 week my room has been cleaned twice the first time it got cleaned at 7pm at night as they forgot so had to do it when j got back and told them second time today all they have done is made my bed not changed it. Left dirty towels on the floor no clean ones and no food or surface wiped. Every night the reception is full of teenagers playing music however they are not guests and do not work at the hotel they are they receptionist friends! And I still have 2 weeks remaining in this hell hole as agoda also will not help having spent hours on live chat to no avail. This has been my worst stay in 23 years and myself and my friends will not be returning again."}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Great location, service could be better‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Amazing location, close to the beach (recommend to walk another 5 mins south so it is less crowdy). All amenities for sim cards, bars, restaurants and money exchange close. The pure veg restaurant and Fiyelle on hotel premises was amazing for lunch or dinner: Super friendly waiters, cheap, safe and tasty food. Spacious rooms.
But the bathroom was leaking, therefore smelling really bad and not cleaned at all during room cleaning. Making the smell even worse. Room cleaning was unreliable in general and superficial if they came (fridge was so dirty and disgusting moving in that we couldn't use it). We had to ask for toilet paper everyday, as they always just gave away one extraordinary small and one-layered roll. Do not book the breakfast: Underhwelming is an understatement - they had white toast and jam + one Indian dish. That is it. Water is excluded. Reception staff was ok, but not extraordinarily helpful either."}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Average‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Not good internet, location is nice'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Good value for money ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Spent 3days here Good location next to beach. the room we had there was no balcony and there is no tea making facilities . We had a queen bed and the bathroom was ok hot water .you hand your keys in at desks for the room to be cleaned .breakfast was basic no eggs.we had toast and coffee. Went to cafe next morning.the staff were polite.we would come back again thank you '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'nice place in affordable price ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'rooms are good and its 100 meter only from colva beach.
they have good restaurants and bar with affordable price '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very good'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Best In Budget‚Äù', 'Review_Body': '1. Firstly The Location of hotel is very Good. It just a 1 min walk from Colva Beach.
2. The staff of the hotel is supportive and helpful on our request they allowed us early checkin.
3. The room used to get cleaned every day in our overall stay time.'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.8', 'Review_Heading': 'One night had fire in the hotel but no one alerted us or explained anything... ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'No info on fire, just thick smoke covered the 2nd floor and employees chatting about it in Konkani and Hindi. Had a massage and facial but was led out 30 minutes earlier than i paid for.  They had blackout every day at least 5 times. Due to blackouts TV had no sound. '}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Good Hotel (Expect Housekeeping)‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Hotel is very good, location also good, very near to beach. staffs are fine. Only problem with housekeeping. No proper daily cleaning of rooms.  Housekeeping time after 2PM which is irritating. Beach side hotels required more cleaning due to sands which was absent there. otherwise, good experience. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Best'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Agoda made smooth‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Awesome experience with booking with Agoda and hotel'}, {'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Worst staff ever seen‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I reached at hotel at 8 am but hotel staff is not allowed for check-in as telling reason bathroom dust cloths are unavailable and laundry services are getting delayed..we had to wait till 1 pm...even after telling we are check-in early prior to visit hotel 6 days ago....also worst thing is we have to tell staff we require towel, drinking water multiple times then they are providing..such a careless service...hotel location, cleanliness is good but services are worst....would not recommend anyone.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Best location in south goa situated at colva beach, madgaon railway station is at the distance of 6 km. '}, {'Review_Rating': '3.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Not at all recommended.'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very close to the Colva beach, has a spa and a bar, walking distance to the market and the beach, all basic amenities like TV, AC, Geyser and a mini fridge as well to keep your stay comfortable.
