reviews:
[{'Review_Rating': '4.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Ok ok‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "The location is good since it's located near colva beach but the drawback is there is no pool inside property as well as there is no view from the balcony also. The staff is good. But the basic facility like Ro Water is not available. Markets are near by cafe also near the hotel. The hotel is ok ok to stay overall. Other things I like to mention it's located in South Goa the place is  very quite and it gave us chill vibes. "}, {'Review_Rating': '4.4', 'Review_Heading': 'The Receptionist Lady Was Rude and Disrespectful ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'During Check In and During Checkout 

The Reception Lady was being Rude and Disrespectful '}, {'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Awful hotel ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "If you are think of staying here dont! So I am currently staying at this hotel upon arrival last week I had to wait 5 hours for a room to then over the nest 48 hours to be moved rooms 3 times. I then get a half decent room so I wasn't happy but thought I can live with it. Then I go to turn my TV on and no remote I call someone in who takes my room key and shows me where to poke it to turn it on I was astonished then there were no TV channels anyway so when I ask about this I get told they don't want to pay a TV subscription so I offered to pay for the TV subscription as they have always had TV previously I have been staying in this same hotel for 23 years twice a year. In 1 week my room has been cleaned twice the first time it got cleaned at 7pm at night as they forgot so had to do it when j got back and told them second time today all they have done is made my bed not changed it. Left dirty towels on the floor no clean ones and no food or surface wiped. Every night the reception is full of teenagers playing music however they are not guests and do not work at the hotel they are they receptionist friends! And I still have 2 weeks remaining in this hell hole as agoda also will not help having spent hours on live chat to no avail. This has been my worst stay in 23 years and myself and my friends will not be returning again."}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Great location, service could be better‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Amazing location, close to the beach (recommend to walk another 5 mins south so it is less crowdy). All amenities for sim cards, bars, restaurants and money exchange close. The pure veg restaurant and Fiyelle on hotel premises was amazing for lunch or dinner: Super friendly waiters, cheap, safe and tasty food. Spacious rooms.
But the bathroom was leaking, therefore smelling really bad and not cleaned at all during room cleaning. Making the smell even worse. Room cleaning was unreliable in general and superficial if they came (fridge was so dirty and disgusting moving in that we couldn't use it). We had to ask for toilet paper everyday, as they always just gave away one extraordinary small and one-layered roll. Do not book the breakfast: Underhwelming is an understatement - they had white toast and jam + one Indian dish. That is it. Water is excluded. Reception staff was ok, but not extraordinarily helpful either."}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Average‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Not good internet, location is nice'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Good value for money ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Spent 3days here Good location next to beach. the room we had there was no balcony and there is no tea making facilities . We had a queen bed and the bathroom was ok hot water .you hand your keys in at desks for the room to be cleaned .breakfast was basic no eggs.we had toast and coffee. Went to cafe next morning.the staff were polite.we would come back again thank you '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'nice place in affordable price ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'rooms are good and its 100 meter only from colva beach.
they have good restaurants and bar with affordable price '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good. details:
{'Location': 'Mobor Beach, Cavelossim, Cavelossim, Goa, India, 403731', 'overall_rating': '9.1', 'Name': 'Holiday Inn Resort Goa', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'My favorite destination with 3rd visit
Is par excellent in all aspect...a must visit resort for everyone..'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Great location, beach and amenities‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Spent year end 2022 at the resort. Recommend highly. '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nice place to relax '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Our stay at the resort was lovely. Our 5 year old had a blast, the staff were pleasant and extremely helpful. Location is great, with access to the beach, no crowds, a few shacks some distance away and also access to water sports a few hundred meters south of resort. Food was very good, buffet spread had a lot to choose from. Overall a great place to be at.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'WHAT A GREAT STAY‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Well I am a Holiday Inn (IHG) member and stayed in various other properties abroad. I spent four nights with my wife and two kids.. I am proud to say that this property is in par equivalent to the service and quality  Holiday Inn group gives abroad.
This property has a friendly approach towards its client right from the reception to house keeping to gardners...This makes the children comfortable and friendly to the surrounding environment...
The food is good (along with dinner live music)  and pleased to tell all people planning a trip that when you are at any buffet breakfast, lunch or dinner you can order children food at no additional cost...
When you do the booking, do not worry about extra children (more than 1) just book for at least one...
The room service, bar is also great..
A place to forget everything and just enjoy!!!  '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Awesome stay in holiday Inn‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Loved everything about the hotel..the location is superb. Close to pristine Mobor beach excellent for enjoying sea. staff is courteous and food is very good. 
'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Simple yet elegant'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Great Location, Amazing hospitality!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The location of the resort is very good. Mobor beach is very clean (as compared to the other beaches). The staff always greeted us with a smile and going the extra mile to make you feel comfortable. Special thanks to chef Anthony and the entire restaurant staff. Prashant and the housekeeping staff. '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Amazing experience!!'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Great Stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Beautiful property with all amenities. Breakfast spread was good and gad a lot of varities. Beach grill served delicious food, with great view. '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'good hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'beach and food are good'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Fantastic stay!! Loved it!!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "We stayed in the property for one night and I must say we Loved every bit of our stay..
As mentioned it's truly a 5 star property.
There was a wedding happening on the day we arrived so staff had to be on toes to get everything arranged but made sure our checkin happened smoothly.
Staff did give a brief on what all facilities were available.
We travelled with a 4 year old, so milk and khichdi was complimentary.
The Pool was clean and nice.
Beach was clean and less crowded. 
Breakfast was amazing, my daughter loved the masala dosa which was prepared by chef on request.
Checkout was hasslefree, since we had kid We did extend checkout by 45 mins and they were ok with it.
Book and enjoy. Will surely go back again to the same property."}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice beach property‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Fab resort, exceptional service and amazing garden, private beach and kids play area. Soothing ambience. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Great luxury stay ! ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Had a wonderful stay and great service provided. Highly recommended !'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Great experience and comfortable stay.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Superb location and great ambience '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'True Holiday !!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "One of the best resorts i've stayed at.
Location is one of the best in south goa
Food is good but i think could be a bit better (quality and flavors of everything we ordered was great but more toned to a foreigner palette) 
Staff is great and very helpful 
The property itself is amazing and has quite a few things to do
Would definitely recommend if travelling with kids /as family and if you are looking for the more peaceful, beautiful and clean side of goa"}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice Staycation ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Great place to spend time with your loved ones if you enjoy peace and quiet of South Goa. Bang on beach, the property is amazing with its food option, service and staff. Nice clean beach with gentle waves to enjoy the sea.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Luxury with a lot of personal touch‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We have visited a lot of resorts across the world, but when some dissapoint some stay true to the expectations, but some surprise you.
Holiday Inn resort Goa surpassed our expectations on all levels.
We waltzed into the property at 7 am while check in was at 3 pm. The staff welcomed us with an open heart and gave us an Early Check in post a hearty Breakfast at Zest. The housekeeping staff managed by Madam Tanuja are always around to ensure the room is super clean and serviced. The team really go out of their way to make you feel comfortable. We had the pleasure to be welcomed by Diksha and Rohini at Zest. We were here for 4 days and all the staff at the restaurant were very courteous polite and made us feel at home. The breakfast and lunch at Zest was of the highest standards in taste and quality. The dishes were were authentic to the names. The only improvement I would suggest at the restaurant is to include more dishes from the local goan cuisine, like a Goan counter, that would create an additional WOW factor to the already existing great variety that the chefs strive hard to put together. The beach grill restaurant is another feather in the cap for the resort as it features an open kitchen right on the beach with absolutely amazing sunset views with some great food and music. Beach Grill did not fail with their flavors either, we ordered prawns, Mushroom risotto, Prawns Peri Peri (Real Fresh), Murgh Malai tikka which was very well prepared and best of all I had the pleasure of hogging the best Goan Sausages in 2022 at Beach Grill, hats off the the chef once again.
It was Christmas season and so we had the opportunity to be a part of their Christmas party that was extremely well organised with lots of activities, dancing, zumba, games, acrobats, and some lovely food.
The property is massive with a cleaner and less crowded beach compared to north Goa. The swiming pool is adequate. The rooms are clean well equiped with a great view. But best of all is their staff, '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Best ever in south goa‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Excellent excellent excellent'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Fantastic‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Wonderful location, facilities & service!

'}], 'price': '10,980', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/667/6672/6672_14030614590018579908.jpg?ca=2&ce=1&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '31m¬≤', 'amenities': ['Garden view', 'Balcony/terrace', 'Shower', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Accessible toilet', 'Adapted bath', 'Bathrobes', 'Hair dryer', 'Mirror', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Reading light', 'Satellite/cable channels', 'Telephone', 'Adapter', 'Air conditioning', 'Blackout curtains', 'Concierge', 'Daily newspaper', 'Fan', 'Private entrance', 'Slippers', 'Coffee/tea maker', 'Free bottled water', 'Mini bar', 'Refrigerator', 'Desk', 'High chair', 'Seating area', 'Trash cans', 'Closet', 'Ironing facilities', 'Accessible by elevator', 'In-room safe box', 'Safety/security feature', 'Smoke detector'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/holiday-inn-resort-goa/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&los=1&searchrequestid=8225b61c-325c-4f9e-b7ba-f3d3492b1cd7'}

{'Location': 'Anna Waddo, Main Candolim Rd, Bardez, Goa, Candolim, Goa, India, 403515', 'overall_rating': 'Select your room', 'Name': 'Hyatt Centric Candolim Goa', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'If u r travelling with children pls don select this hotel.they are least bothered about your childs health .They juz know how make business .worst 5 star experience ever...'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Wonderful Stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We are a family of four (2 Adult 2 Kids) and we stayed there for 3N/4D.
Hospitality level was excellent, food was also very good specially Pizza. Overall a very satisfying and a wonderful experience, highly recommended.'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'All good - but got a stomach bug‚Äù', 'Review_Body': '2 of the 3 of us in the group had a stomach bug after breakfast on day 1‚Ä¶
That ruined our entire day & stay. 
The front desk manager, naturally said this is impossible, yet I will look into it - - really !!!!
No acknowledgment of a possibility, no apologies or regrets !!!
Otherwise - a good location '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Hyatt Condolim‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Beautiful place for a holiday with family'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Breakfast ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Was not upto the expectation. As a five star hotel, they have to improve on the quality and the contents of food. '}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Definitely didn't give 5 star vibes, if that's what you're looking for. There was webs in the room and dust under the table. Food plates left outside room were there was good many hours before being picked. I wasn't happy with the stay considering the hefty amount they charged per night"}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good facility with activity for children ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nice facility . Size of rooms was good along with cleanliness. Staff was very cooperative '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Amazing family stay option in Candolim‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'This is the best hotel with all resort facilities that a family will enjoy. The rooms are spacious and equipped with a sofa cum bed, capable of accomodating 3 adults and 2 kids. Hotel staff is very courteous and caring and ensures you will have no complaints throughout the stay. One can enjoy the swimming pool, indoor games, badminton, kids play area during the stay. Top notch cleanliness at all areas of hotel. You can feel the freshness the moment you step in through the main door into the reception. Breakfast spread is wide and you will also get a chance to enjoy local Goan delicacies everyday. We got a good deal via Agoda and we are glad we made this choice. Strongly recommend  for the family.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Had a great time staying here. Thanks to the entire team.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The stay was amazing, the staff was very courteous we enjoyed a lot. Will recommend the hotel to our friends. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good hotel for vacation with family.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good food. Very neat and clean property.'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Waste of money ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Inspite of paying extra terrif for holiday season the valet parking guy was missing for 3 days and the management was least bothered.

House keeping staff would only make the bed and do not bother cleaning the floor

The same breakfast repeated over the 4 day stay we had.

Swiming pool was not as good as the name and brand of the hotel.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Excellent 
Was upgraded 
'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Beautiful '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Awesomeness ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It was great experience with family and kids. Location will get 5 ‚≠ê. For a longer stay, food is repeated everyday with few good Live kitchen options. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Enjoyed Hyatt A Lot ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I stayed hyatt for 5 night with my family i enjoyed a lot Helping staff is quality of Hotel in evening staff come in room and asked any thing more you require like water tea coffee sachet etc.its superb Desk staff Toly is wonderful on my request she upgraded my Room with Bigger Room Pool facing with no extra charge.
Also wonder when we reached in Midnight to our Room she kept Beer in ice Bucket Complimentary and note Enjoy Beer.
This was fentastic.
Once again i want to thanks whole staff for very good Hospitality.
Kailash Kasturi Indore'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Value for money ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'If someone has to visit Goa, this is the place to stay. Very good hospitality, awesome food and total value for money.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Awesome service ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Everything was just perfect my child had so much comfort in the hotel. reviews:
[{'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'If u r travelling with children pls don select this hotel.they are least bothered about your childs health .They juz know how make business .worst 5 star experience ever...'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Wonderful Stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We are a family of four (2 Adult 2 Kids) and we stayed there for 3N/4D.
Hospitality level was excellent, food was also very good specially Pizza. Overall a very satisfying and a wonderful experience, highly recommended.'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'All good - but got a stomach bug‚Äù', 'Review_Body': '2 of the 3 of us in the group had a stomach bug after breakfast on day 1‚Ä¶
That ruined our entire day & stay. 
The front desk manager, naturally said this is impossible, yet I will look into it - - really !!!!
No acknowledgment of a possibility, no apologies or regrets !!!
Otherwise - a good location '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Hyatt Condolim‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Beautiful place for a holiday with family'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Breakfast ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Was not upto the expectation. As a five star hotel, they have to improve on the quality and the contents of food. '}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Definitely didn't give 5 star vibes, if that's what you're looking for. There was webs in the room and dust under the table. Food plates left outside room were there was good many hours before being picked. I wasn't happy with the stay considering the hefty amount they charged per night"}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good facility with activity for children ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nice facility . Size of rooms was good along with cleanliness. Staff was very cooperative '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Amazing family stay option in Candolim‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'This is the best hotel with all resort facilities that a family will enjoy. The rooms are spacious and equipped with a sofa cum bed, capable of accomodating 3 adults and 2 kids. Hotel staff is very courteous and caring and ensures you will have no complaints throughout the stay. One can enjoy the swimming pool, indoor games, badminton, kids play area during the stay. Top notch cleanliness at all areas of hotel. You can feel the freshness the moment you step in through the main door into the reception. Breakfast spread is wide and you will also get a chance to enjoy local Goan delicacies everyday. We got a good deal via Agoda and we are glad we made this choice. Strongly recommend  for the family.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Had a great time staying here. Thanks to the entire team.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The stay was amazing, the staff was very courteous we enjoyed a lot. Will recommend the hotel to our friends. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good hotel for vacation with family.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good food. Very neat and clean property.'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Waste of money ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Inspite of paying extra terrif for holiday season the valet parking guy was missing for 3 days and the management was least bothered.

House keeping staff would only make the bed and do not bother cleaning the floor

The same breakfast repeated over the 4 day stay we had.

Swiming pool was not as good as the name and brand of the hotel.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Excellent 
Was upgraded 
'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Beautiful '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Awesomeness ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It was great experience with family and kids. Location will get 5 ‚≠ê. For a longer stay, food is repeated everyday with few good Live kitchen options. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Enjoyed Hyatt A Lot ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I stayed hyatt for 5 night with my family i enjoyed a lot Helping staff is quality of Hotel in evening staff come in room and asked any thing more you require like water tea coffee sachet etc.its superb Desk staff Toly is wonderful on my request she upgraded my Room with Bigger Room Pool facing with no extra charge.
Also wonder when we reached in Midnight to our Room she kept Beer in ice Bucket Complimentary and note Enjoy Beer.
This was fentastic.
Once again i want to thanks whole staff for very good Hospitality.
Kailash Kasturi Indore'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Value for money ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'If someone has to visit Goa, this is the place to stay. {'Location': 'Pintos Vaddo, Candolim, Goa, India, 403515', 'overall_rating': 'Select your room', 'Name': 'Silver Sands Serenity', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Location and rate‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It is costly and far from the beach there are other options near beach and same rate, under the rate '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The room was spacious, but  the breakfast had few options.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Location is prime.. walkable distance from beach.. clean hotel,polite staff but only thing is we have to ask for everything in room ..'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Worst hotel I have ever stayed‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Worst hotel in goa, we have stayed there for 3 days,  we have booked its premium room, when we entered the room it was all stinky, washroom were not even flushed properly, when we asked to change our room, they told they have only this room available,  breakfast options was limited.

Worst part of this hotel is, the very unprofessional behavior of their staff members, specially the two girls dealing in the front desk. They literally don't know how to behave with their guest. 

Beware guys they also charge extra at the time of checkout by making fake allegations on you, that u damaged their hotel belongings .

I would suggest u if u want to stay peacefully in a good environment  plz avoid this hotel as they can ruin ur holiday mood every single day.
"}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Good experience ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good polite staff, nice bedroom vibes and an excellent location '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Awesome place to stay ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The hotel is well placed near the Candolim beach and has easy access to various multi cuisine restaurants and super markets near by which makes it a perfect spot to stay in‚Ä¶ the staff is very cooperative.. while the breakfast has limited options but overall the stay and being this as a prime location makes it to be a good option to stay.. I recommend folks to stay here and enjoy ‚Ä¶ '}, {'Review_Rating': '2.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Faulty lift got hurt‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Hotel has faulty lift, we got hurt and hotel doesn't even have first aid kit. Simply horrible "}, {'Review_Rating': '4.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Highly recommended ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Need to work on cleanliness..room was stinky I thought it was a good hotel but was not even upto the mark and moreover I was charged 3000 rs extra while checking in and it was a bloody surprise for me as I booked on agoda and adding my son or without was the same price‚Ä¶I personally didn‚Äôt liked the property and their services..'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Overall good experience‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We had a great time at Silver sand serenity'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Worthless‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'No value for this much money. the rooms were different from the photos. the telephonic wire was hanging in the room no outer view such an old third class rooms .'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': '3/5‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Rooms are Specious - 4/5
Location - 5/5
Service - 2.5/5
Cleanliness:- 2/5

Front desk POC- Sameer - always ready to help  6/5 :)
Poorly managed old property. Cleanliness is a major concern. '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Best in Candolim‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Pros : Spacious rooms, polite staff, a swimming pool on the top

Cons : food is very costly '}, {'Review_Rating': '4.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Not worth it‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Main attraction of this hotel is its infinity swimming pool but they alow it to use between 9 to 6 only which is absurd because that is usually the time when tourists explore the outer locations. Plus they have a very very limited in room food menu. If you order anything from their restaurant in room..they charge you 25% extra on the mentioned price which is already very high. They just tell you the do's and don'ts when you check in like its a school. Hotel is good but you cannot relax in it due to the rules. They value the rules only and do not think about the satisfaction of the customer "}, {'Review_Rating': '4.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "The staff were very polite and helpful.From hereon it was downhill and after nine of our twenty eight days we had to move out.The place was grubby,the pool and surrounding areas were dirty.When we returned to our room at 5pm it still hadn't been cleaned.I could go on and on."}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Worst service.. non worth of 4star rating... Poor service... Poor staff.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Candolim Main strip‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good value for the quality. Good option in Candolim'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Goa check in ! ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Not very welcoming staff/Managment. Refused to provide  plates or spoons don't give tissues. Basically average!!! 
"}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The location of this hotel was good‚Ä¶the room and the room service was also good‚Ä¶but the food and the service for the food was not that much good..it was quiet Ohk Ohk '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It was nice'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Charged breakfast for last day‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'They have collected charges for last day,i have book my stay for 3 days but they provided 2 days complement breakfast.'}], 'price': '4,229', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/2011961/11305393/040e5bc04a9b781c5ff1e26490ea18cf.jpeg?ce=0&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '17m¬≤', 'amenities': ['Balcony/terrace', 'Non-smoking', 'Shower', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Roll-in shower', 'Accessible toilet', 'Bathroom phone', 'Cleaning products', 'Hair dryer', 'Mirror', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Pool facilities', 'Satellite/cable channels', 'Telephone', 'Air conditioning', 'Daily newspaper', 'Fan', 'Linens', 'Private entrance', 'Slippers', 'Soundproofing', 'Wake-up service', 'Coffee/tea maker', 'Free bottled water', 'Mini bar', 'Refrigerator', 'Daily housekeeping', 'Desk', 'High floor', 'Seating area', 'Tile/marble flooring', 'Closet', 'Clothes rack', 'Dressing room', 'Ironing facilities', 'Sewing kit', 'Accessible by elevator', 'Accessible by stairs', 'In-room safe box'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/silver-sands-serenity/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&tspTypes=9&los=1&searchrequestid=8225b61c-325c-4f9e-b7ba-f3d3492b1cd7'}

{'Location': '1/63/1, BEHIND PANAJI POST OFFICE, NORTH GOA, PANAJI NORTH GOA, Panaji, Goa, India, 403001', 'overall_rating': '8', 'Name': 'O PIERRE', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Anyone looking to stay at Panjim and needs pin drop silence and opt for this property. It‚Äôs Very calm Very Safe and Very‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Excellent Property. very Friendly staff and AMAZING BREAKFAST..'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Ok for value but I dont stay again.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'All staff friendly and kind. Location is perfect.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Oh my gosh, favorite hotel of my visit to India so far.  And probably one of the most comfortable hotel beds I have ever slept in.  I love this hotel and if I could, would book a long-term stay.  I literally cannot wait to return.  Please - do yourself a favor.  If you're a city girl (or city boy), but you've been brought to Goa... stay here in Latin Quarters Panaji, and then book a couple nights at O'Pierre.  You'll be so happy you did.  You're surrounded by such a beautiful neighborhood with the best shopping options in Goa.  There are nail salons (Nailed It Goa), massage salons, and some of the best dining."}, {'Review_Rating': '7.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice place for one or two nights.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': '- felt safe in a quiet area
- good restaurants close by 
- staff helped with organizing transfers 
- design of hotel was nice'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Great place to stay!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very good place to stay in Panaji, very friendly staff, great, relax atmosphere. Location in the latin quarter was superb!'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'This could be a gem of a hotel, but as it is right now, the potential is rather unused.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The rooms were quite nice, but don't be fooled by the "river view" promise. No views to speak of. Also, you need to ask the reception to have them cleaned. 
There's a beautiful rooftop terrace, but it looks completely abandoned, you cannot have a drink or anything there.'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'It was okay, but not great.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It was a nice place with good vibes, lovely decor and cleanliness. nice aesthetics.'}, {'Review_Rating': '3.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Disappointed‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Location is fine if you plan to stay in panjim and it's hygienic."}, {'Review_Rating': '7.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Reasonable local breakfast.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very Good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'great location, kind staff, very clean!'}], 'price': '3,999', 'img_link': 'https://q-xx.bstatic.com/xdata/images/hotel/840x460/345525508.jpg?k=ee7d338809de7c408bf567447eb2e909a32a281c110769a89f38ed818e5ed1d9&o=', 'room_size': '32m¬≤', 'amenities': ['2 single beds', 'Shower', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Hair dryer', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Satellite/cable channels', 'Telephone', 'Air conditioning', 'Fan', 'Linens', 'Wake-up service', 'Coffee/tea maker', 'Free bottled water', 'Mini bar', 'Refrigerator', 'Desk', 'Tile/marble flooring', 'Trash cans', 'Closet', 'Ironing facilities', 'Accessible by elevator', 'Locker'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/o-pierre/hotel/all/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&los=1&searchrequestid=8225b61c-325c-4f9e-b7ba-f3d3492b1cd7'}

There's a beautiful rooftop terrace, but it looks completely abandoned, you cannot have a drink or anything there.'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'It was okay, but not great.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It was a nice place with good vibes, lovely decor and cleanliness. nice aesthetics.'}, {'Review_Rating': '3.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Disappointed‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Location is fine if you plan to stay in panjim and it's hygienic."}, {'Review_Rating': '7.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Reasonable local breakfast.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very Good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'great location, kind staff, very clean!'}]

'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Great location ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The hotel is located close to Calangute and the staff is really helpful. Overall great experience. '}, {'Review_Rating': '2.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Worst hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It was very bad hotel‚Ä¶
Worst food taste
Very Limited menu
No amenities
Restaurant is with limited sitting capacity
Very small property
No parking
Room ac was not working and complained throughout the trip but not able to resolve the problem
No ventilation in bathrooms, you will always experience bad smells
Wastage of money
I recommend you to not book this property at all
Spending 1500 per day is very much for this property.

Good luck
 '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Best‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I have booked an executive room. It was spacious and clean. Worth for the money we paid. Very near to the Calangute beach. The restaurant food was tasty and the staffs were really cooperative.  They also helped me to book packages for activities. Would surely recommend '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Hotels is good, rooms are clean.

But there is a paid parking near by.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'The flora residency‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nice Hotel and cooperative Staff'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Worst Service ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Never go to this hotel, Every room smelling unhygienic, in every room alots of cockroach, it's totally waste of money, even if you aksing for late check out due to your bus is scheduled on 7 or 8 pm, they even didn't arrange the guest room, even staff mostly reception people are totally worst behaviour, only the security guard is awesome, apart from the total service is worst waste of money "}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': '1 Star‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Food, breakfast is pathetic. The negative points are: (i) the location (in respect to Goa beaches), (ii) no proper closet, (iii) mosquitoes.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The hotel is near to airport.  Lots of open space,  nice environment. '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Cheek inn 6.45 pm instated of 2 pm‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Normaly all hotel cheek in 2 pm. Good place to stay.  '}, {'Review_Rating': '2.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Worst value for money !‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The premises was small, bounded and suffocating, facilities available were minimal!'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Great place ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'If you want a stay near airport this is a very good options. The places is really classy and the rooms are spacious. The breakfast spread is good enough for what you pay. Definitely on my list of I to to ever live bear airport in goa '}, {'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Horrible experience!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I would not recommend this hotel, especially for people traveling with small children. 

The list is long, including no taxi sent to airport even after receiving confirmation from hotel, blood stained pillow cover, water issue in bathroom, smell of fungus/smoke in the room, swimming pool in shower area as the drainage level is off, and more.:

I left within 6 hours of my arrival , and I requested the hotel to refund the amount for the rest of my stay - but no success!'}, {'Review_Rating': '3.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Extremely rude hotel manger, could not arrange sleep facility for our driver, 
Which we first time observed in our stays. 
Non veg Food was good üëç'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Nothing to complain but expensive as they don't have anything exceptional to the cost they charge "}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Wonderful homely atmosphere.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We had a very pleasant stay.  The check in and check out was smooth and very quick and efficient. Yashwant, Sonali, Jaisiya, Prasad and the duty manager Anand were very helpful and tried their best to attend to our needs / requirements which is much appreciated. Service at the restaurants and room service was excellent. We would like to make special mention of Umesh, Ronaldo and Rivaldo and chef Saquib Shaikh in this regard. The food was great - the veg as well as the non-veg selection. Housekeeping and other support staff were also good. The hotel has a nice ambience - good landscaping with old style goan decor / materials reportedly used.  Hope to visit again.'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Price heavy ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Not worthy. '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Vedatmana- Most convenient for BITS Goa visitors‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Closest (1.5 km) decent hotel for BITS Goa visitors/ parents, so very convenient
Very hardworking banquets staff despite being understaffed, served us well. Particularly Ronaldo 
Good for short 1-2 days visit. I will use when needed again'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Good option ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good option if you looking for stay near airport. Will not regret booking it for sure
Rooms are spacious and beautiful garden they have'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Fabulous Place, A well established exotic place. 10/10
Really helpful staff. 10/10
Looking forward to another weekend in Vedatmana Boa Ventures '}], 'price': '3,610', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/5902458/-1/6020aea20ba44cfd5a2f51ef67694bb0.jpg?ca=11&ce=1&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '270m¬≤', 'amenities': ['2 single beds', 'Garden view', 'Balcony/terrace', 'Non-smoking', 'Shower', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Hair dryer', 'Mirror', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Satellite/cable channels', 'Telephone', 'Air conditioning', 'Daily newspaper', 'Linens', 'Private entrance', 'Slippers', 'Umbrella', 'Wake-up service', 'Coffee/tea maker', 'Free bottled water', 'Mini bar', 'Refrigerator', 'Seating area', 'Wooden/parqueted flooring', 'Closet', 'Clothes rack', 'Ironing facilities', 'Sewing kit', 'Fire extinguisher', 'First aid kit', 'In-room safe box', 'Smoke detector'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/villa-boa-ventura/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&los=1&searchrequestid=8225b61c-325c-4f9e-b7ba-f3d3492b1cd7'}

{'Location': 'Porba Vaddo, Palmarinha De Goa , Calangute, Goa, India, 403516', 'overall_rating': 'Select your room', 'Name': 'Palmarinha De Goa', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'good stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'i specially like the restaurant food. the room is okay for stay but the view is amazing pool side. since i wanted to explore goa more and just booked room for rest so it was okay staycation for me. '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Above average‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It looks like old property but yes it has more open space..rooms are big enough.liftsare very old.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Worth the expense‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I would say it was really worth booking this resort as it was offering me everything that i wanted such as a pool, a restaurant, cleanliness, room service , helping staff and what not. I would recommend everyone for this. '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Awesome view from room‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Hotel was very nice, location and pool view is the heart of this hotel. Staff is very polite and food quality was also very amazing. Bathroom and bed mattress was a issue. Bed and bathroom needs an upgradation. '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Room with 2k budget only ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I did not like my stay with this Hotel.
- Rooms infrastructure is quite old, we paid around 7k for this room which is not worth at all.
- Lights in the Hotel room are not proper even if you keep all the lights open there will be darkness in the room.
- Multiple Cuts in electricity 
- Bathroom is Old build

reviews:
[{'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'good stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'i specially like the restaurant food. the room is okay for stay but the view is amazing pool side. since i wanted to explore goa more and just booked room for rest so it was okay staycation for me. '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Above average‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It looks like old property but yes it has more open space..rooms are big enough.liftsare very old.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Worth the expense‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I would say it was really worth booking this resort as it was offering me everything that i wanted such as a pool, a restaurant, cleanliness, room service , helping staff and what not. I would recommend everyone for this. '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Awesome view from room‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Hotel was very nice, location and pool view is the heart of this hotel. Staff is very polite and food quality was also very amazing. Bathroom and bed mattress was a issue. Bed and bathroom needs an upgradation. '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Room with 2k budget only ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I did not like my stay with this Hotel.
- Rooms infrastructure is quite old, we paid around 7k for this room which is not worth at all.
- Lights in the Hotel room are not proper even if you keep all the lights open there will be darkness in the room.
- Multiple Cuts in electricity 
- Bathroom is Old build
- Breakfast is quite food, '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Na‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Na'}]

details:
{'Location': 'Pequem Peddem, Opp flea market Road, Anjuna, Goa, India, 403509', 'overall_rating': 'Select your room', 'Name': 'The Banyan Soul', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Awesome ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very good should stay'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Relaxing Time ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Would suggest anyone who is looking for staying out of the crowd and basic amenities should stay here atleast once. Connectivity wouldn‚Äôt be a problem you‚Äôll get bikes readily available. The staff is good and overall smooth exp. This place is in a mid of Most of the North beaches and adjacent to German Bakery. Go for it. Even solo travellers can also opt for it. Happy to say this now.!!'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'NIce experience ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We stayed there for 5 days, our experience was good. Room was spacious, staff was helpful, near to Anjuna Beach, lush green property, budget friendly hotel. 
Recommended. '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Just ok‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The place is too inside the main road, difficult for someone coming with. Wheeler, no parking facility for 4 wheeler. Staff is cooperative and place is peaceful. But not many facilities. Go for it if you are unable to find good place and see if available at low price'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good place to stay '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Glass view‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Best view frm the bed '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Felt homely‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "The place is really good for a couple. The staff is very cooperative and the service is quick. I'd recommend this place to anyone who's looking for a comfortable stay without burning a hole in the pocket "}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Not Worth‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'OK for Solo travellers,

unbelievable prices'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Below Average ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Mosquitoes, rude staff, no proper water, unclean lawn etc'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'great place for value of money‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'if one is looking for value for money, it is the best place. '}, {'Review_Rating': '4.8', 'Review_Heading': 'All that glitters is not Gold ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "First of all  I will tell you what are the cons for this place

Accessibility
 You have  to belong to the genre of  Columbus to find this place without the aid of GPS.   It is almost 1 Km from the road to Anjuna beach .

Front desk 
It is nothing but  a hole with some sheet over it 

Early check in  ; In the brochure it was mentioned that check in is 24 hours .   So   I  made a  request for an early check in and as I didn't received a reply  I thought   there wont be any problem as this is not season time .  But we had to hang around for good three hours .  I dont want to describe abnout a common wash room we had used  


 "}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'The Young Owner is Dope‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Young Owner of this place is Dope, He suggested all cool places around Anjuna, Told me about all over rated places to avoid and on top of that, My workation was a breeze thanks to his round the clock Tea and Beer availablity.

Beware of Pets in the premise'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Connectivity to City is a Problem‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Explore other hotels at this price as connectivity to the city is a problem, especially without a Vehicle + It does not have its own restaurant.
Place is good for rest and stay. Does not stay up with the goa vibes.'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Within budget and good place‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Overall I had good experience. It is severly understaffed maybe bcoz of covid. Food is unavailable, can pose problems. Location is hard to find. 

Other than that ambience, environment, and cleanliness wise it is good. Staff is not very friendly but they are good and not rude (they behave like give and take and no hard feelings with no empathy).'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'An affordable place ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I had a great experience and the whole place was calm and quiet .
I would definitely recommend this place and it‚Äôs walking distance from Anjuna beach.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'One of the best places with privacy‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The location is bit inside but compared to other roads of Anjuna, the approach was spacious. We drove a dzire and the ambience on reaching was just relaxing. The place is very private and a great place to enjoy with your partner.'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.0', 'Review_Heading': "Don't fall for looks‚Äù", 'Review_Body': "This property look beautiful in pictures. But reality is different. Below are few things we were not happy with
1. Bed comfort
2. Bathroom cleanliness. There were lot of cockroaches and red color insects. Shower mixer was not at all functioning. Bathroom is conjusted
3.Room cleaning - No daily room cleaning. Every alternative day they clean. So it's not worth for long stay.
4. Room service- There is no room service available. You have to do everything yourself.
5. Property is situated one kilometer away from main road and 2.5 kms away from beach.
6. No good vegetarian restaurants available nearby.
7. Air Conditioner - cooling issue. 
8. Curtain is very thin for transparent glass room. Ladies and couple feel uncomfortable."}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Not a Pleasant stay !‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "We stayed here for 3 Nights 4 days and we weren't happy with it. First there's no signal reception as the hotel is isolated. Also, hard to find the hotel cause no sign boards or directions to guide us except Google maps. Room quality was average. AC was pathetic, in summers you expect at least AC to be functional but it was a joke. Helpers there give you only 1 water bottle, 2 towels(per day) and when asked for extra towel they deny it. Overall average to below average stay. Better options are available at same prices or less."}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Best in budget ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "I had a 2 night stay. The location is a plus point if you want to scale northern part of goa like anjuna, vegator, arambol etc. The place is kind of away from main road and Market but closer to aforementioned beaches and the club's around them.  Staff was good. Property was clean and there was peace. Only thing I feel they shud add is the black out curtains. As it gets difficult to nap during afternoon when one can't go out in the scorching heat. Food is sorted in the nearby German Bakery."}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Clean and cozy ! ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Staff helpful... All in all, a nice package ! '}], 'price': '2,073', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/291/291200/291200_15081318260034235999.jpg?ca=13&ce=1&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '25m¬≤', 'amenities': ['Garden view', 'Balcony/terrace', 'Non-smoking', 'Shower', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Toiletries', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Satellite/cable channels', 'Air conditioning', 'Fan', 'Daily housekeeping', 'Desk'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/the-banyan-soul/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&tspTypes=1&los=1&searchrequestid=8225b61c-325c-4f9e-b7ba-f3d3492b1cd7'}

details:
{'Location': 'Arambol, Goa, India', 'overall_rating': '8.0', 'Name': 'Sea Shell Beach Cottages & Suite', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '4.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Short Stay only, when there is no choice available ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Mr Manager Weather review is good or bad , please take it in positive way and refrain writing explanations.

The only good thing we had staying this property was ‚Äì some other guest with pets we made friends.

Felt overpriced , may be i booked on a long weekend , but these rooms should be around 1.5k only.
location - Bit inside from main road and hard to find .
Breakfast ‚Äì This is for Name sake, either 1 Old dry Bread sandwich or 1 aloo paratha, coffee or tea
Rooms ‚Äì Rooms is really good  but also Need some upgrade & maintainace  actually , bathroom shower needs a fix
Amenities ‚Äì This is good, surprisingly room has phone to contact manager , refrigerator  , TV which only gets ON but no channels ,Good Acon, and some cheap toiliteris 
Pool ‚Äì Small but ok , we did not use 
Staff ‚Äì OK, informative , talkative 
car Parking -Yes
- Will I go back - No , Not coz of property . coz  Location and area is not that great .


After a much hush bush we had a stay in this hotel. 
Disappointed by Hotel Policy on cancellation ‚Äì may be not their fault , just my fault that I booked without reading cancellation policy 
We booked two rooms for 2 days from Agoda, unfortunately another couple kid got sick and they could not make this trip , we contacted Agoda and hotel but hotel refused cancelling / rescheduling so we were forced to go only us and other room we just gave it back to hotel for free.
---
After reaching the hotel , We tried negotiate with hotel for at least 1 room refund but he said , i dont know agoda will pay me after 45 days , i have all booked room and still said "if this room gets occupied with someone then ill do a refund " but he lied - even some foreigner occupied room for the night , but he said no , no one in that room , next night someone else occupied the room and he said no they shifted from opposite room. I really feel bad the way this manager was lying but i just ignored it as i dont believe arguing with some one who is not willing to understand. I Just made my m'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Peaceful Place! Great host and Food.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "First and foremost it's a pet friendly with minimum charges of 400 per night.
Great ambiance and well maintained.
Very supportive staff and Host Mr.Gupta Ji. Not so difficult to reach out with the help of GPS but roads are bit muddy and narrow.
Beach doesn't seems to be too close if u wanted to reach out by walking with ur baby..Suggestion please Carry ur pet carrier if ur fur babies has difficult walking.
Best place for pet parents
"}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'A beautiful stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "It's away from the crowded city. Arambol beach is very near to this stay. The food is also good here."}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Amazing property with homely touch‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very cool owners who help you out in anything and everything that you need. They are very king and figure out things for you. '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice but not value for money.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The Hotel was nice with pool but had some power fluctuation problem in the day time. The location is good. Staff are are very cooperative. I just felt that the price is little high and it did not included breakfast also.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Wonderful‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'super'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Cool place ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'But 22 km away from baga and calangute'}], 'price': '2,189', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/31570299/0/5665546aced43b175d50770d7b36fdc7.png?ca=29&ce=0&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '14m¬≤', 'amenities': ['Smoking allowed', 'Shower', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Hair dryer', 'Mirror', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Satellite/cable channels', 'Air conditioning', 'Fan', 'Coffee/tea maker', 'Refrigerator', 'Seating area', 'Tile/marble flooring', 'Clothes rack', 'Fire extinguisher', 'Individual air conditioning', 'Smoke detector'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/sea-shell-beach-cottages-suite/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&los=1&searchrequestid=8225b61c-325c-4f9e-b7ba-f3d3492b1cd7'}

'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Our stay at W Goa was nothing short of fantastic. The property, the service, the hospitality, the food were all par excellence. A big shout out to Ragini who gave us a complimentary upgrade to a room with a courtyard so our young kids could have a gala time running around and having fun. The property in itself is a huge one wherein we have to use a buggy to reach our rooms. My six years old twin daughters particularly loved these rides on the buggy. The Rock pool was just awesome and we could click some amazing pictures during sunset. Also the hotel is in very close vicinity to a lot of happening places including Thalassa, Olive etc. that are just minutes away from the property. All in all a fabulous property and we made some beautiful memories here.  '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good Hospitality‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Took good care of us and our children.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': "The 'Wonderful' W Goa‚Äù", 'Review_Body': 'We had an amazing stay at W Goa. It lives up to every expectation. From  Farad and Rajat at welcome, the person who made the room special, the staff at the pool side, Praveen at Spices (oh what fab food and ambience), Laxmi, every single staff member being amazing!  Every small detail was taken care of to make the stay memorable. Thank you!!'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'W Goa ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Hello everyone.. Recently I stayed in W Goa for a couple of days.. I had to say,the property was awesome..The staff was very polite and courteous, especially front desk staff, Nikhil was very approaching and friendly.Coming to the property,it was very quite peaceful and serene, view at the rock pool bar was amazing and the Chinese cuisine at Spice traders restaurant was lip smacking.. I would definitely give it a 5 star rating..The housekeeping staff was friendly too.. I would recommend everyone to opt for W Goa Without any further doubts.. '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Not replying for lost item ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I stayed in w goa for three days between 4 oct to 07 oct 22 while my departure i lost my bunch of important keys, which according my vehicle driver ,taken by some staff at gate while checking, i called hotel but getting no help  it is very painful & sad experience.i request hotel team to kindly see the matter.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Amazing hotel ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "I've been to Goa over 30 times in the past few years. This is the best hotel I've stayed in. From the staff to the property to the food, everything is excellent. I would highly recommend this hotel."}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional service, great spread of food and awesome location‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'W Goa is one of the few 5 stars located in North Goa and offers much more with exceptional service, courteous staff, great spread of food and also brilliant location near to Vagator Beach.. morjim is 20 mins away which is an amazing beach.. would love to recommend to family travellers with young children'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'It was ok‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Not great value for money. What ever we needed was provided to us in a  blink !

special thanks to Farhan Mehta for getting the room decorated with balloons for my daughter's B'day ..!"}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'The best property once life time visit ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "It's excellent amazing masmarising once a life time best experience. Worth to visit. Keep the great working going. "}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Top notch service ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I usually don‚Äôt write reviews about any hotel, W Hotel Goa - the entire staff of the hotel extremely helpful - top notch service from Yohan, look for Rohit (F&B), Ankita front desk and everyone else, super helpful and friendly staff, very caring !'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Great Stay - W‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Though the property itself was nice, the staff and hospitality was fabulous and absolutely top notch, courteous, hospitable, well trained and mannered and eager to be of help in even with the smallest things

We had booked a sundown at the Rockpool for sunset , however on reaching the property we were told that there was a private function that evening. In what could have turned out to be a bad experience, our host, Farhad Mehta, more than made up by immediately hosting us for a dinner at the Spice Traders which turned out to quite memorable and amongst best oriental food we had in a long time.'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Not worth‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'W Goa is not worth at all cost of 20-25k per night ,please do not excited after seeing others status n all .
Apna paisa waste mat karo, westin,Taj, Grand Hyatt best option at that price '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Dream Hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The best amongst the best. For a very memorable experience, W is class apart! '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'a‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'a'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Stayed for three nights and it was amazing. details:
{'Location': 'Opposite Lotus Inn Hotel, Vagator, Goa, India, 403509', 'overall_rating': '7.0', 'Name': 'Okean De Goa', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '3.2', 'Review_Heading': "Below mediocre! Don't go because of location.‚Äù", 'Review_Body': "I had booked it for 4 nights initially, but by gods grace I changed it to 2 nights. Even those 2 nights I feel wasted. 

Let's start with cons:
1. Reception Staff is rude/ untrained/ below IQ people who are ready to start argument on any matter with which you will have discomfort. Let me tell you the instances
a. During checkout, the reception guy started arguing with lady whose family didn't get the balcony room even though she paid for and was there to discuss the matter after 4 days of stay. However, the reception guy started arguing and demanding payment in a roadside manner and this continued for 15 mins. The whole scenario was avoidable, if the staff would listen and understand what she was saying.
b. This is my incident. I left room at 10 in morning and asked the reception to get the room cleaned knowing that cleaning time is between 2-5 pm and i would return at around 5. Although returned at 4:15 only to find room was not cleaned. I called the reception to ask why and when it will be cleaned. Again the reception guy started, cleaning time is between 2-5 and it will be cleaned between 2-5, you were informed during check in and blah blah. I askef him what time it is and why is he saying 2-5 when it's 5 already. He cited other guests rooms are also to be cleaned and blah blah. He was very adamant and rude in his tone so I asked in how much time he can get it cleaned, he said can't commit. So for these petty things you have to unnecessarily argue with bone headed people.
2. Drinking water not available.
Unfulfilling the requests and not able to cater to guests requirements which is the basic of service industry. They don't give you regular water. They only give 2 bisleri bottles each day. I had asked for water after my packaged water got over. They sent 1 glass of water. This is snatching basic rights of humans by refusing regular water.
3. Restaurant services. 
Any decent place and even not so decent place would charge the restaurant bill to your room and you w"}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Avoid this hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Worst experience with this hotel, ac is broken, moisture on walls, dirty towels'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Horrible Experience‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Bed sheets were not clean having stains, towel were torn, staff were unfriendly.

Except for location nothing was up to mark.'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.4', 'Review_Heading': 'No like‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'No hood service'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Not recommended at all‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Restaurant was pathetic, tasteless breakfast 
Unfriendly and insecure staff
Hotel Images on Agoda are fake
Room was ok ok
Swimming pool was terribly dirty
'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Not that worthy ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Location is too remote from city and beach '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Recommending this hotel. Very good and clean hotel. Only break fast has to be improved.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Good for couple ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Neat and clean place to stay for couple with good breakfast '}, {'Review_Rating': '2.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'No good service, always short of staff, for every request "No sir" is their favourite word'}, {'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Not recommended ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Staff is lazy and irresponsible. There's no proper room arrangements and cleanliness is bare minimum."}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Good Hotel ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Paid Rs. 2000 and it's worth for the money "}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Service‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We are a group of 11 pax , no room service like cleaning of rooms change of bedsheets provided 
Rooms were nice 
Curtains were complete white resulting in sunrays which lead to no sleep '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Peaceful place‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "It was a comfortable stay.. Tasty Breakfast served.. Although I had issue with Air Conditioner and 4-5 times I called the maintenance team to check but they keep on trying for it for two days, then placed a request to change my room and the lady staff at the reception on the night shift understood and acknowledged my request and helped me in assiging a new room which was appreciating ü§ù
Staff's behavior ia also good.. Overall its a favourable experience.."}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Hotel is good restrictions like a hostel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We are going for enjoy the trip but not for only stay there. Timings for cleaning and food restrictions are not good. Who are they to restrict that.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Good hotel nice peaceful area‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Facilities are good rooms are also neat and clean but staff needs to be little active in responding to customer needs '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'One of the best places to stay if travelling solo as well as with friends/family. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Lovely little place‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The rooms are clean and well-lit. People are helpful. The food is really nice. The stay was very nice. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Amazing stay.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Comfortable stay with all amenities '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Great stay but around 1 km away from market.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice hotel ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Staff is very friendly '}], 'price': '2,891', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/28821037/467416612/495bde230216028191b002f768c9ed6c.jpg?ce=0&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '34m¬≤', 'amenities': ['Balcony/terrace', 'Non-smoking', 'Shower', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Bathrobes', 'Hair dryer', 'Mirror', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'TV [flat screen]', 'Air conditioning', 'Blackout curtains', 'Fan', 'Linens', 'Private entrance', 'Soundproofing', 'Refrigerator', 'Wine glasses', 'Laptop workspace', 'Outdoor furniture', 'Seating area', 'Trash cans', 'Window', 'Closet', 'Fire extinguisher', 'First aid kit', 'Individual air conditioning', 'In-room safe box', 'Locker', 'Smoke detector'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/okean-de-goa/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&tspTypes=-1&los=1&searchrequestid=8225b61c-325c-4f9e-b7ba-f3d3492b1cd7'}

reviews:
[{'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Great Experience ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Staff is very co-operative. Breakfast buffet is pretty good. Rooms and entire facility was very clean and maintained. The location is close to beach (10 mins walk).

Only thing is check-in should be allowed early, at least 12 PM, currently it's 2PM (but that's issue with all Goa resorts).  "}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Value for money ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Great staff and good food.. luxurious rooms'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Good Experience ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Rooms was clean‚Ä¶Hotel Staff is very Kind‚Ä¶Overall experience was very nice..but their is parking problems which need to be resolved.'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Too expensive for the service. I will not recommend this place to anyone "}, {'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Not clean at all ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Full or cockroach and smell'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Superb Experience ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Been to Mulberry Mint Calangute for two days. It was our third hotel of Goa as we were on week long trip. We liked the hotel and recommend people for this place. Good size, bed size and washroom is actually king size. Staff there was very caring and courteous and they ensured our stay is comfortable. Breakfast spread is decent. Food is tasty.  Overall very good experience '}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Rooms are ok‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Rooms are ok ... but breakfast option are very limited .....'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Great stay but not the service‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Room was wonderful and spacious. 
It's cozy and feels good, breakfast also decent but only few varieties with offering Rasna juice instead of real fruit juice. Service is not theat great and the night shift staff behavior as well. I have asked for the water, he said it's chargeable and he delivered after a hour of my request with 2,3 call reminds. 
They don't provide any dental kits. Even for two people they provided only one towel and You need to wait for towels if you ask extra. 
There is no lift in hotel, we got the room in 2nd floor I guess and we had to go in classic way. 
Finally at the checkout time the receptionist doesn't even check the bills instead he ask us for the bills do we have left any, it was soo annoying. He has no grooming and attention on duty. Body language is really worstworst ( night shift receptionist). "}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Worth 2k in Early December ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Agoda offers best price for this Hotel. Got the deal for 2k inc breakfast.
-Rooms were spacious and clean
-Appliances and fittings were Aged
-Swimming pool is very small.
-Breakfast was not bad. 
- Kitchen staff very helpful. 
-Early check in and Late check out not available.
-A budget place '}, {'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Argument with drunken staff‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I had an argument with a staff who was drunken. I would never visit this hotel again.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good and Friendly hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good hotel. The reception persons are good and friendly. They supported me for check-in 3 hours earlier.

One issue is the fridge is not closed and the phone has some noise issue.

Other than that, Hotel is good and recommended for couple.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Awesome Stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'This is an excellent place to stay as a couple as it offers you everything. Great ambience, Good rooms, excellent washrooms, superb hospitality. Overall, Very much satisfied!!'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Good stay!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Overall good stay. Initially the receptionist was hesitant as the booking was done by Agoda and he mentioned that there are payment issues with Agoda. But he honoured the booking thankfully. It is bit far from calangute beach and the beach is not walkable from here. But the pool is clean and basic amenities are provided.'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Rude behaviour by receptionist

Should upgrade the buffet breakfast menu '}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'There is no lift at the property stay is good they need a little bit of upgrade according to their prices'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Being Solo Traveler‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Being Solo Traveler this hotel is perfect choice for us , as near to market / beach / hygiene and staff is too good. '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Good hotel with good location‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good hotel, friendly staff, location is right in the middle to everywhere in north Goa. No issue with hot water, food was little over priced (250/- just for curd rice). Just the cruise people who were tied up with the hotel gave us a horrible experience but hotel people took our complaint seriously and did their best to solve the issue, we really appreciate the hotel management for atleast doing their bit in this matter. Cruise from hotel is never recommend I suggest you go directly to the port at Panaji and have a look at what you are paying for before you pay because there are many fraud cruises at Goa.'}, {'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Room was dirty , lot of cockroach and mosquitoes, freeze was dirty ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Never recommend any body , only staff are very good '}], 'price': '2,750', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/210/2102402/2102402_17032313400051717931.jpg?ca=6&ce=1&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '30m¬≤', 'amenities': ['Garden view', 'Shower', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Hair dryer', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Satellite/cable channels', 'Air conditioning', 'Daily newspaper', 'Wake-up service', 'Coffee/tea maker', 'Free bottled water', 'Seating area', 'Closet', 'Ironing facilities', 'In-room safe box'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/the-mint/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&tspTypes=-1&los=1&searchrequestid=8225b61c-325c-4f9e-b7ba-f3d3492b1cd7'}

'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Above average‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Located inside village, not great property '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Excellent '}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The location is very far from the city, the room was small and the wall color were peeling off. However, the food at the restaurant were excellence! And the staff were very attentive. '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'OK type stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We went with out kid of 6 months. We were two couples. Property has good pool, clean rooms, good breakfast. Location was bit odd as it was in interior, there is no ammenities than a swimming pool and small gym. People are cooperative.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Great value for money,Location close to nearby happening places!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'All over the experience was good! The staff were polite and helpful whenever required.'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Be aware and ask the right questions before checking in to the room !‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Booked a pool facing room and had condensation all over the floor for the entire duration of the stay. It used to be so slippery that we had to hold on to the room walls while walking. When complained and requested for a new room, were told that it's because of the weather in Goa and they can't do anything about it. This was my 8th time visit to Goa and I have stayed there in atleast 20 different resorts (North Goa + South Goa) - but never faced such an experience ! Infact, we were able to see the windows and balcony glass doors of many rooms from the pool area - all of them had the same condensation problem that we had (may be not as much as we were facing)"}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent Breakfast Spread and Pool‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good breakfast buffet with plenty of options and live stalls like Dosa,pavbhaji etc. Swimming pool is well maintained,clean and  in middle you have Jaccuzi. Rooms are little small, but all of them have balcony and pool view. Approach road of hotel is not so good, but its in middle of Anjuna and Baga.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good location ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good rooms'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Amazing stay ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very nice and clean property in Anjuna. Huge breakfast with great taste and quality.\nBig swimming pool. But kid playing area is not operational.\nOverall nice stay'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Fairfield by marriott is the best hotel i found as per my budget in anjuna..Staff was so polite..pool experience was excellent as it was so clean..Thankyou.!'}], 'price': '7,699', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/1199854/-1/71209e0e0bc857b47f80b07386c9bb6c.jpg?ca=8&ce=1&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '21m¬≤', 'amenities': ['Courtyard view', 'Balcony/terrace', 'Non-smoking', 'Shower', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Accessible vanities', 'Hair dryer', 'Mirror', 'Shower chair', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Walk-in shower', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Satellite/cable channels', 'Telephone', 'Air conditioning', 'Alarm clock', 'Blackout curtains', 'Fan', 'Hand sanitizer', 'Heating', 'Linens', 'Sleep comfort items', 'Slippers', 'Soundproofing', 'Wake-up service', 'Coffee/tea maker', 'Free bottled water', 'Mini bar', 'Wine glasses', 'Desk', 'Interconnecting room(s) available', 'Outdoor furniture', 'Seating area', 'Tile/marble flooring', 'Trash cans', 'Wooden/parqueted flooring', 'Closet', 'Clothes rack', 'Ironing facilities', 'Accessible by elevator', 'In-room safe box', 'Laptop safe box', 'Locker', 'Safety/security feature', 'Smoke detector'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/fairfield-by-marriott-goa-anjuna/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&los=1&searchrequestid=8225b61c-325c-4f9e-b7ba-f3d3492b1cd7'}
