4. When i complained about it to reception I got to know its chargeable water is an essential thing how can they charge for it and besides there is no written communication about it .
I would never recommend this hotel to anyone.Most pathetic service i have ever seen in my entire life'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Excellent location! Candolim beach is only 500 meters away from the property and about a minute's walk from the main road. We stayed for 5 days and received breakfast, lunch, and dinner as part of the package, and the cuisine was excellent.
Once they realized we were on our honeymoon, they upgraded our accommodation from deluxe to executive. This property's staff is fantastic! The staff's kindness made our time in Goa even more memorable. 
The Chief appears at our dining table and presents us with a surprise sweet dish that was specially cooked for us on the last day's lunch, making our experience even more unforgettable.
If you are considering a trip to North Goa, we strongly advise you to stay at this Hotel.
Thank you to everyone at Lemon Tree Hotel, Goa, India

details:
{'Location': '860/3, Soranto Waddo, Bardez North Goa, Anjuna, Goa, India, 403509', 'overall_rating': '7.6', 'Name': 'Hotel Regent Laguna', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Location is bit isolated '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Best budget hotel with great facilities ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "We were traveling in december 2nd week. The prices were very low and i think they are charging low as compared to others in terms of quality.

Check-in was super smooth. Staff is very helpful. They have 2-wheeler on rent facility with third party as well. So it was very convenient. Petrol pump was about 1.5-2km from the hotel as well.  Famous eating places like angry sardar etc are very close from here. 

It's located in a very quiet place with good parking space. I liked that little isolation after all the crowd in anjuna and baga. 

Rooms are comfy, modern with clean beddings, walls and small couch. Washrooms were clean as well. Hot water was available. 

We stayed here for 2 nights and i think I'll definitely stay here again. "}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Value for Money with Good Food‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The restaurant is value for money and staff is very friendly and helping. Sunil and all the restaurant staff took good care of us. Recommended if you are looking for a budget friendly stay in GOA.'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Bad Experince  ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Tv not work properly, light bhi khrab rehti hai, adult 3 book krke , '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very nice hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Loved my stay here, my 17 month old baby enjoyed himself a lot, staff was good, distance from beaches was good, clean place, well maintained, loved everything.'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Good hotel to stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We have enjoyed our stay.. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Appreciation To staff‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Captain Sunil and captain Vikas both are very helpful person with other staff.service are very good from the end.
Location of the property very odd but manageable.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Best and Comfortable Stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Hotel Regent Laguna is located at decent place  and you will find access and contact details of Rent-a-bike vendors at hotel itself.

{'Location': 'Bamonwaddo, Candolim, Goa, India, 403515', 'overall_rating': '7.8', 'Name': 'Country Inn & Suites By Radisson, Goa Candolim', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Best place to stay in goa‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It was very beautiful holiday and stay'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nice hotel with spacious rooms.
Good location.
Good food. 
Amazing pool.
Enjoyed with toddler.
'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Amazing hospitality‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Had a great experience, 
amazing hospitality  by staff, 
nice gestures on Valentine. 
Overall everything was great about the hotel. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Professional behaviour of all staff and prompt services each time i asked for.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Good hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The hotel is good especially the staff was very helpful and courteous '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Fair enough!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'This property does not justify Radisson‚Äôs reputation but it is ok( not that bad). Location is very good, staff is also nice but they don‚Äôt respond quickly ( have to call again and again). Food must be chosen outside unless very necessary to have in dining.

Rest about the property is ok. 

Thanks!'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Dont confuse with actual Radisson‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Rooms wete nice and big, cleanliness was good. Foos was pathetic. Both breakfast as well in room dinig options. Please prefer to eat outside. Tea served after 30
Mins that too cold. I had 5 rooms, with two infants, not much support provided. They were not cooperating. Its not what you expect in the hospitality sector. Overall 3 star rating. '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Good one‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good hotel if you get the same under 6 k'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Luxury at its best‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Be it location , ambiance, connectivity,  staff or food ‚Ä¶ every thing and service was upto the mark except for the GYM . '}, {'Review_Rating': '4.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Disappointing ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "We stayed at the Country Inn for a day on 25th Jan 2023. The room was filthy and the dirt under the bed wasn't cleaned. None of the facilities promised were working. All the equipment in the facilities room were non-functional. Table tennis racquets were broken, carom board without coins. The swimming pool wasnt maintained well. The towels were dirty. The bathroom floor would wet the toilet floor. Considering it is a Radisson facility it was genuinely disappointing. The staff at the buffet were very friendly. The staff at the gates were good too. The technicians were very helpful and nice...but the receiption and front desk was very bad."}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Plesant place for family‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good and friendly place for families..'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': "Hacked - Agoda didn't catch it‚Äù", 'Review_Body': 'I was not the one who stayed at this property. My account was hacked, someone made a bogus reservation in my name, which they somehow completed, and even though I told Agoda and got my credit card company involved, it has not been removed from my account. This happened twice. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Overall good stay'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'All good '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Great Stay as always'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.8', 'Review_Heading': 'dont go with high hopes‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'went by their  name of radisson brand.. not worth the money .. the worst part is the staff is not trained to even talk politely.. 
the restaurant service is very slow.'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Not Worth the Money for a 4 star hotel. You will get better around for the same price‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'As soon as I enter, I first take a look at the bathroom, this was the worst bathroom for a 4 star hotel, even 2 stars hotel have better bathrooms, mould everywhere, toilet was stained, even my 5 year old said dad I do not want to enter this bathroom. We took a video of the stained toilet and showed the duty manager, all he said is I apologize. Next I checked was the bed linen, even that was stained, pillow cases had holes, a video was taken for the same. Bed side sockets were all cracked and broken, didnt feel safe switching on any switches there. 2nd day we asked to clean our room, when we came back the room was neatly done however once we took out the duvet from the bed, there was sand on it, which means they only tugged in the duvet neatly but did not dust the bed. 
Positives: Location is close to almost any destination around North Goa. Staff are helpful. '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Great location but lots of mosquitoes in our balcony since our room was on the ground floor....'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Overall property is great. But, rooms require some renovation. I faced multiple issues with the room.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Amazing Stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Would recommend this hotel, staff is very friendly, specially the chefs and there subordinates'}], 'price': '10,245', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/9455250/354983650/02a72627b4f9f7732e18b74eac9a8a1b.jpg?ca=20&ce=1&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '24m¬≤', 'amenities': ['Pool view', 'Balcony/terrace', 'Non-smoking', 'Shower', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Additional toilet', 'Bathrobes', 'Bathroom phone', 'Cleaning products', 'Hair dryer', 'Mirror', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Satellite/cable channels', 'Telephone', 'Air conditioning', 'Alarm clock', 'Blackout curtains', 'Concierge', 'Daily newspaper', 'Fan', 'Hand sanitizer', 'Linens', 'Slippers', 'Wake-up service', 'Coffee/tea maker', 'Free bottled water', 'Mini bar', 'Daily housekeeping', 'Desk', 'Seating area', 'Sofa', 'Trash cans', 'Closet', 'Ironing facilities', 'Sewing kit', 'Shoeshine kit', 'Exterior corridor', 'Accessible by elevator', 'Accessible by stairs', 'In-room safe box', 'Locker', 'Safety/security feature', 'Smoke detector'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/country-inn-suites-by-radisson-goa-candolim_2/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&los=1&searchrequestid=8225b61c-325c-4f9e-b7ba-f3d3492b1cd7'}

details:
{'Location': 'Aguada Siolim Road, Calangute, Goa, India, 403516', 'overall_rating': '8.7', 'Name': 'Le M√©ridien Goa, Calangute', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Best in class‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "The stay at Le Meridien, Calangute was like visiting a family. The stay was one of the highly rated for us. Special call outs to Smriti and Ishabel at the restaurant, they're walking angels. Atbhouse keeping Hema, Leo were spot on, I was amazed at their proactive cleaning. Isha helped us with the decoration. She was superb and kind. Sameer Kapoor was such a gentleman who made sire constantly that we get best in class service. We were in awe of the hospitality. Thanks to Kamran at the restaurant for accomodating us well. In all it is the best stay ever. Truly worth, I highly recommend this to anyone visiting Goa. "}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Electric fluctuations and a burnt phone . ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The staff is courteous. Breakfast menu needs a serious revamp! The hotel is clean no issues here.

The biggest downside is the power fluctuations! Kept my iPhone on charging in the night only to find it not working in the morning.  As a traveller had to figure out / reschedule my days outing to first go to a nearby genuine apple store and get the phone fixed.    The guys @ apple store replaced the burnt charging strip and confirmed the frequent electricity fluctuations (power supply to generator and viceversa) as the culprit. As a precaution asked me to purchase a seperate power extension and plug the charger in it and not in the wall socket directly.
Had to shell out 10k for the phone repair along with all the mental agony.

reviews:
[{'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Best in class‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "The stay at Le Meridien, Calangute was like visiting a family. The stay was one of the highly rated for us. Special call outs to Smriti and Ishabel at the restaurant, they're walking angels. Atbhouse keeping Hema, Leo were spot on, I was amazed at their proactive cleaning. Isha helped us with the decoration. She was superb and kind. Sameer Kapoor was such a gentleman who made sire constantly that we get best in class service. We were in awe of the hospitality. Thanks to Kamran at the restaurant for accomodating us well. In all it is the best stay ever. Truly worth, I highly recommend this to anyone visiting Goa. "}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Electric fluctuations and a burnt phone . ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The staff is courteous. Breakfast menu needs a serious revamp! The hotel is clean no issues here.

The biggest downside is the power fluctuations! Kept my iPhone on charging in the night only to find it not working in the morning.  As a traveller had to figure out / reschedule my days outing to first go to a nearby genuine apple store and get the phone fixed.    The guys @ apple store replaced the burnt charging strip and confirmed the frequent electricity fluctuations (power supply to generator and viceversa) as the culprit. As a precaution asked me to purchase a seperate power extension and plug the charger in it and not in the wall socket directly.
Had to shell out 10k for the phone repair along with all the mental agony. 
This left the overall experience a lil sour.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Great stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The staff us super sweet and the room was amazing '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Great stay!'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Good place ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Hotel should add jacuzzi n infinity pool facilities at this price. details:
{'Location': 'mazal waddo anjuna, Anjuna, Goa, India, 403519', 'overall_rating': '7.1', 'Name': 'De Amour Holidays', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Perfect stay.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It‚Äôs a perfect stay at North Goa. Located in the prime location. All the major beaches are nearby and services and room was perfect. '}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'LOCATION IS FAB. BUT THATS IT!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "walking distance to the centre of Anjuna. Rooms are decent and clean.  No real view since its located in a narrow street. But thats where all the good bits end. They say breakfast included in the price. however, when we went down to the breakfast room, the bread was cold and was lying uncovered. They had packaged juice. when we asked for eggs of our choice, they said they'd provide for boiled egg only. the poha was stuck like a brick and cold. Staff was not around to take any orders. they were chilling in their basement / kitchen area. The service for the rooms was strictly ok. My intercom didn't work and wasn't fixed for the 3 nights that I stayed. Hot water was not available at all times. My sink was choking up and was only fixed when I personally went to the reception and asked for help. The pool is tiny (around 18-20 feet in length and 10 feet wide approx). It wasn't cleaned‚Äìlittered with dead leaves and insects and mud. I'd stay here only to go sleep (air conditioner was good, as are the beds) or for the proximity to the fun places (pubs restaurants, Vagator, Chapora) in the area. Try and book a car/bike (the hotel has free parking) since the cab can be very expensive even if just for a short distance."}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Good location‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Breasfast was not as per expectations. 
They weren‚Äôt cleaning rooms on daily basis. 
Even they weren‚Äôt  keeping toiletries once they got finished. 
Restaurant service was extremely poor. '}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Cheaters ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Staff are cheaters. They say something and cheat you '}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Above average‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Mosquitoes and flies galore...but was raining but still significant quantity of flies to rule out any consideration'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Its an  '}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Good hotel with bad service‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Location, hotel  and amenities was good but the service is worst.

No cleaning unless you emphasis. Need to ask for water bottle and worst they don‚Äôt provide toiletries and towel daily. '}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Sachin‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I didnt stayed in this ugly place and i am waiting for my refund.'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'very pathetic hotel cockroaches in room ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'very pathetic hotel cockroaches in room and bed'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Over all good stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Really liked the bathroom and the location. The front desk made us wait a bit for check in, even after arriving at 4pm. Overall you get what you paid for.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Perfect as the title Suggests ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'This hotel or might as well say a stay with my family in Goa as that is what they have become to me. My stay at the hotel has been the best memory in Goa this time other than the beaches. I owe to to the Staff of De Amour Holidays for their patience and being very accommodating to all of our requests. The best part is that the lobby always felt lively with all the smiling faces of the staff. I would definately recommend this stay to everyone and I myself with family would visit the hotel again and a special tanks to Swapnil the hotel manager who really knows how to treat each person with respect and a smiling face. You have the best staff that one can ask, Thank you for making this the best of Goa for us, God Bless.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Best Budget Hotel with all facilities‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The rooms were clean, very comfortable, and the staff was amazing. They went over and beyond to help make our stay enjoyable. I highly recommend this hotel for anyone visiting Goa. Took advantage of the location to walk to dinner, beaches like Anjuna checked out a couple clubs. It was great. Service top notch as always. Bed comfort can not be beat.
'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Amazing hotel in peaceful place . ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Best location near Anjuna lake . Must stay hotel with swimming pool and very good hospitality '}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Not a very great stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "The swimming pool was dirty for 3 days, we kept asking them to clean it and they would say we'll clean it today and never did for 3 days. The cleanliness is not very great, walls are pretty dirty, kettle had not been washed, bathroom drain clogs. But the staff is helpful, they helped us with renting bikes and cabs. "}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'HIGH COST‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'PROPERTY NOT AS SHOWN IN PHOTOS. I PAY FOR LUXURY SUIT BUT IT WAS JUST LIKE ORDINARY DELUXE ROOM. SO YOU CAN GET MORE BETTER ROOMS IN SAME COST '}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Above average‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Bel h√¥tel,bel emplacement, √©quipe sympathique, mais manque de propret√© de l'√©tablissement."}], 'price': '2,814', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/29283798/467642663/c77dd385e6d6867a1de092434730aa8b.jpg?ce=0&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '50m¬≤', 'amenities': ['Non-smoking', 'Shower', 'Shared bathroom', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Accessible toilet', 'Mirror', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Pool facilities', 'Satellite/cable channels', 'Telephone', 'Air conditioning', 'Blackout curtains', 'Daily newspaper', 'Fan', 'Linens', 'Private entrance', 'Soundproofing', 'Refrigerator', 'Desk', 'Tile/marble flooring', 'Trash cans', 'Window', 'Closet', 'Clothes rack', 'Ironing facilities', 'Accessible by elevator', 'Accessible by stairs', 'Fire extinguisher', 'First aid kit', 'In-room safe box', 'Locker', 'Smoke detector'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/de-amour-holidays-h29283798/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&los=1&searchrequestid=8225b61c-325c-4f9e-b7ba-f3d3492b1cd7'}

{'Location': 'Sonho do Mar, Agonda, Goa, India, 403702', 'overall_rating': '8.8', 'Name': 'Sonho Do Mar Goa', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '9.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice and relaxing!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Had a pleasure time at Sonho do Mar. Very cool and spacious room with beach view. Staff was really kind and servee food with reasonable prices.'}, {'Review_Rating': '1.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Bad‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nothing very good and nothing very bad. Price is not worthy one can get another one at half price'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Average‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'location and hospitality'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Superb‚Äù', 'Review_Body': '.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Perfect location, superb staff - definitely recommended‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Beautiful location, right on the beach. Binod and the rest of the staff were very helpful. Food is good as well. Sunsets are just Perfecttttttt üôÇ'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It was a great stay. The rooms are very comfy and with beautiful cozy details like a candle or incenses. I liked the simpliness of white walls with bright hints like rugs or red curtains. There is hot and cold water, nice shower, placeful bathroom with no ceiling. The bed is big and comfortable. All cool for a long stay.
The stuff is friendly and helpful. We got everything we needed - extra blankets as example.
The hotel is just in front of the sea and there is a restaurant where possible to dig the feet in the sand.
The territory is green and well mentained and the place is eco friendly.
I would definetely recommend this place to my friends and stay again myself.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice accommodation close to the beach‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Sonho do Mar is a beautiful place to stay at Agonda Beach. The rooms are very comfy and with beautiful cozy details like a candle or incenses. I liked the simpliness of white walls with bright hints like rugs or red curtains. There is hot and cold water, nice shower, placeful bathroom with no ceiling. The bed is big and comfortable. All cool for a long stay.
The stuff is friendly and helpful. We got everything we needed - extra blankets as example.
The hotel is just in front of the sea and there is a restaurant where possible to dig the feet in the sand.
The territory is green and well mentained and the place is eco friendly.
I would definetely recommend this place to my friends and stay again myself.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice accommodation close to the beach‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Sonho do Mar is a beautiful place to stay at Agonda Beach. Sonho Do Mar is a gem for both its on-the-beach location and the great staff! Rajesh and Binod and their staff were super attentive to all guests' needs, including mine. The food is wholesome and fresh. I spent all of my 6 days just waking up to the beautiful golden sand beach and blue water. Indulged in fresh breakfast - both non-veg and veg - after a refreshing swim in the sea. And chased the sunset right from my table with my feet in the sand and hands full of chilled beers and yummy cocktails. While there are more stays on this shore, I chose Sonho Do Mar for the staff and value-for-money experience. I have been eating at their restaurant for many visits over the years but chose to stay here this time and was very satisfied with my decision. I returned feeling refreshed and pampered. Strongly recommend!"}]

Candolim and Calangute beach both are near from the property.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent stay ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Had a great stay here . Also there is a complimentary head and feet massage but upon appointment also we don't get it and the staff are least bothered to inform us on that. "}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice place to stay ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nice place to stay, Nice ambience & food was also very good.'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Pathetic experience!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Small, congested,saffocating rooms...with no facility..Staff is lazy and if you request about anything they will tell you the timings are till 6pm and things can't be repaired (we complained about TV not working).They serve water in a Jar(RO water) not packed mineral water..I requested one of the staff to give a cup..the answer he gave was there is no cup available!

details: {'Location': '164/1A 1B, Khalcha Vada near Arambol Beach Main Parking, Arambol Beach, Goa, India, 403512', 'overall_rating': '7.9', 'Name': 'Sandbanks Beach Resort', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice room ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Ok the room itself is clean  good aircon comfortable bed however I had to ask for my room to be cleaned which for a hotel this should not happen also the power goes off at times not sure why the hotel is ok for a few days or bit longer it was clean that was the Main thing '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Great Value right on Arambol Beach‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Check in was friendly and very professional. We just had the standard room but it was perfectly comfortable and clean. Great fridge and a/c. The only window was in the bathroom but the lighting and design of the room was so good that one barely noticed. We will definitely be returning soon.  Hint for guests who arrive by bike or car. Drive into the main town car park, tell the ticket guys you‚Äôre staying at Sandbanks so you don‚Äôt have to pay. The entrance to the hotel reception is in the wall of large concrete building on the right of the car park. You can park right outside. '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Good stay at the beach ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good stay at the beach. Good staff and facilities. Website says kingsize beds, however you are offered only Double size bed which are small. Overpriced for the size of room and bed offered.'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'No hot water!!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The location is great, staff is polite and helpful. However, there was no hot water in both rooms for all 3 days. Complaining had no effect at all. They merely shrugged and said sorry, but there was no attempt to resolve this issue. I will not recommend this place. There are literally thousands of hotel rooms in this vicinity. Just walk into any one and get something better than this for less than half the cost.'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Worth if rates are low‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Overall the stay was comfortable, we were given upgrades to the suites than the huts. Rooms were clean, posh but were small though. Some rooms have good view of the sea but some don't. Rates are too high. I booked this resort for 2 reasons. One was everybody wrote food was good but it wasn't. Rates are on sky. Quality of the food was not up to mark especially the tandoor ones. Second reason I booked was everybody mentioned there will be events, which there wasn't even though on a Friday night. Every other beach shacks were open till midnight but this was closed at 11pm and next day opened on 11am. That was heart breaking, even though the manager personally came to us to ask about the hospitality (which was good anyway) but the food quality and no events made us look evening dull. "}], 'price': '2,500', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/34310378/566289704/807a87e3d28f4e7c00192856e17563ac.png?ce=0&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '20m¬≤', 'amenities': ['Balcony/terrace', 'Shower', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Reading light', 'Satellite/cable channels', 'Telephone', 'Air conditioning', 'Fan', 'Slippers', 'Coffee/tea maker', 'Free bottled water', 'Refrigerator', 'Desk', 'Tile/marble flooring', 'Trash cans', 'Locker'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/sandbanks-beach-resort/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&tspTypes=-1&los=1&searchrequestid=8225b61c-325c-4f9e-b7ba-f3d3492b1cd7'}

{'Location': 'Off Marine drive, Caranzalem, Dona Paula, Dona Paula, Goa, India, 403002', 'overall_rating': '6.8', 'Name': 'The Fern Residency Miramar', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "If you want to get locked up in the place . This place is far off from beach and doesn't give you the Goa feel"}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Enjoyed my stay, clean spacious and good rooms üëç '}, {'Review_Rating': '3.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Not upto the mark‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Pathetic breakfast.
Complete cost cutting in terms of providing drinking water bottle and toiletries.
Not recommended , far better options available at the same cost else where in Goa'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Not a place for family stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "This hotel is not at Miramor. It's located in Residential Area.  No support from House keeping. No swimming pool. Beaches are far off. You don't get the Goa feel. It's a place you wont enjoy. You need to call for housekeeping service repeatedly. They never turn up. "}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good but breakfast need to be improved '}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Meal inclusion has limitations‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The meal was included along with breakfast, the menu for meal is limited does not have many options, this should have been clarified before the booking. 
Such surprises don‚Äôt give a pleasant experience.
'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Don‚Äôt even think of going there‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very very bad experience‚Ä¶.no requests like twin beds taken care of‚Ä¶blaming Agoda for that commitment‚Ä¶requested to clean room for second day which they forgot ‚Ä¶had to forcefully make them clean at night when we arrived after our business meetings ‚Ä¶horrible water pressure in bathrooms‚Ä¶ nightmare stay ‚Ä¶please please don‚Äôt choose this Hotel '}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Good stay, away from city buzz‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Calm and quiet place to stay if you are in Panjim. Its a bit inside, but in a good locality. Well designed rooms, decent food options.. Overall a good stay.'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Not very clean and WiFi is almost useless ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Even for the supposedly discounted price it is not a value. The hotel was not clean and house keeping was only on request. We were not even advised of the latter at checkin. The WiFi was so slow that it was almost useless. Most of the time we could not check on our dog that is alone at home. Could not lookup directions before leaving the room as the poor WiFi would not load the maps. Restaurant was okay for Indian food. 

There is a swamp right across the hotel emitting some funky odor.  There were just 2 towels in the bathroom for 3 occupants. No bath tissues anywhere. {'Location': 'Padre Miranda Road, Margao, Salcette, Madgaon, Goa, India, 403601', 'overall_rating': '8.2', 'Name': 'Nanutel Hotel', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good experience ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'An good place to stay with family.
Easy location. Very close to Madgaon Rly Stn.
Excellent food in their Restaurant.
Very responsive staff.
Clean premises. 
Car parking is available.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Udayan New York‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Best & Clean affordable Hotel in South Goa. Stayed for five days. Best for the value.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Nil..‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nanutel is good hotel in Margaon City of Goa..and I would recommend it to  my Mumbai friends..'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Best Hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I was in Goqa for the New Year celebration with my family  Nanutel is Excellent Hotel with very friendly staff'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Best Hotel üè® ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Staff and services were very good, very good location and room was very clean and nice üëå '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Looks Like a Novice Hotel!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Overall property is well maintained but there are small gaps needs to be fixed. Hotel seems to be a novice in this industry as room layout planned is very congested & space utilization needs a serious rethinking. Also the room aesthetics could have been better. Just for example, the Minibar (Fridge) is simply placed on the floor below TV, it looks so shabby. It could have been covered under a table. 
Overall room & lobby's visible areas are clean & maintained but room had the cockroaches. A simple regular pest control could have helped in avoiding the cockroaches. 
Food quality & taste at Utsav restaurant is good, not so spicy & service is also good. The 24x7 Caffe at ground floor is also a plus point for the hotel. 
Its located at the heart of Margaon, its a major plus.  
Not giving 5 star just because of lack of minute details as mentioned above."}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'amazing!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'staff is so helpful and polite!'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Best 3 star ever‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good hotel i was very impressed with the quality of this hotel better than any other 3star hotel have stayed in '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Good hotel ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very clean helpful staff good food '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Legacy Continues‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'In April 2022 again visited and had same pleasant experience and warm welcome we received during our stay in 2010. Clean n spacious rooms with tasty food n pool.. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It is a very decent and clean hotel. Infact v liked the hotel so much that in north goa also v stayed in the same property of Nanu Hotel.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Fantastic..‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nice place very clean really good experience.... Good service .'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Excellent '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'good enough‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'bathing water temperature is at most luke warm. i prefer really hot water. their fish thali is very good. a gym is missing. view from suite 408 is partly of the city and rest of an under construction building.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice clean hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Room was very clean. Food was amazing. Dosa for breakfast was awesome. Staff was polite and followed covid guidelines by wearing mask at all times. Definitely would recommend.'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Hotel Tariff is NOT Fexibile and bit expensive‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Hotel Tariff is NOT Flexible and a bit expensive.

Hotel Management Need to Re-Work on its Stringent Room Tariff'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Pleasant stay. Breakfast not upto the mark‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Rooms were neat. Location was very good. Staff were very accommodating. could improve on the breakfast spread. '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Visiting family ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Delicious food. Must try the Goan fish thali.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'very receptive and welcoming staff, we although reached late in the afternoon. They extended their restaurant hours and served us lunch. one can find this type of staff service only in high end five star hotels. Every one from the vallet, gatekeeper, room service to restaurant manager and staff all were very courteous.
Breakfast was strictly satisfactory. room decor and sofa is the reason i feel were not worth the value of the room. Mattress and linen were very good though.
'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The place is located within a distance of 2km from Kadamba bus station. Check-in and check out process was hassle free. Staff and facilities were good. The Colva beach is around 5km. On request they can call taxi people. Breakfast was complementary. {'Location': 'Terekhol River, Pernem, Arambol, Goa, India, 403524', 'overall_rating': 'Select your room', 'Name': 'Fort Tiracol Heritage Hotel', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Amazing Location ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The hotel has a spectacular view irregardless of where you stand/stay. The staff is very friendly and warm. They have some guided activities that you can opt for. The food is simply amazing. Overall, its a must visit! '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Need more Facilities ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Fort Tiracol is very far from literally everything! The menu is so limited. For Indian food they don‚Äôt even make Roti/ Naan. The food menu needs an upgrade. The staff is good. But then since you are away from everything they need to update the facilities basis what they charge '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Overall good ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Ver nice place and good cooperative staff and owner. 
Need to fix frequent power failure issue. Proper paste control of property is must...lizerds were all over the place.'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Great place!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It is a fort! You will love the heritage part of the experience. The food is awesome. 
They are, however, short staffed. Basic amenities like handling luggage from the car to room are not there.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'What a View!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Fantastic view and location. Rooms are big with a old world charm and massive bathrooms.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Outstanding property ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Loved the views from the hotel and the food. Every dish we had was superb.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'lovely location ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Great for one or a maximum of 2 nights . Great food and service . Nothing much to do close by but  one can head to Arambol or Morjim for some more fun which is a hour away .  Otherwise its a great place to just relax  and enjoy the  isolation . '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Beautiful location and charming weekend gateway ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Amazing place. Highly recommended for a gateway from the city'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Great customised healthy food and romantic setting ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The chef was exceptional in matching all my dietary requirements for my birthday cake and special food, the receptionist has been super responsive since we started exchanging emails before checking in; the staff was kind and arranging as we could postpone breakfast after mass and the private balcony overlooking the bay was to die for on a romantic private dinner birthday! The church bells waking us up was also a nice exotic surprise and all in all the best blissfully restful sleep we had in Goa in the whole month: such silence and utter nature! Just wish you had more healthy options in the breakfast menu without having to customise everything and some kind of nature trails possible to walk on as apart from the premise itself there‚Äôs absolutely nothing else to do, even walking past the gate was kind of a dead end...
Anyhow we still had an amazing birthday celebration and the ferry to cross the river was all the more romantic at sunset: strongly recommended!'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'something Extra Ordinary‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "I have been travelling for more than 30 years and have been fortunate to stay at some of the world's finest Hotels..Fort Tiracol Heritage exceeded any experience I have ever had in my entire travelling life. Do yourself a favour, stay a few days in this magical property and absorb the +500 year old history of an incredible experiene"}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'A absolute disaster a good property but not at all managed professionally ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Had to move out of the hotel late at night with small kids as AC was not working and the staff had no clue what to do as the senior staff had left for the day.  We‚Äôre accomodated in a budget hotel after having paid a huge sum for a heritage hotel.  The worst part is that no one from the senior management has called or bothered to connect with me.  Such a shame.  Regret my decision. '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Ok Just!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "With only 7 rooms cannot really expect much. The location overlooking the sea, the ambience, the views are very much on the plus side. But really  it is  a long way from anywhere. Apart from the restaurant, there are no other facilities. So ok for a couple of days if you just want to unwind. 

Unfortunately for me I got food poisoning! doesn't really speak well for the hotel when it's only real selling point is its restaurant. "}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'A wonderful experience‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'A stunning place to stay and visit wonderful location and building and rooms and very attentive staff. Tavern location wonderful views with beautiful food '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Off Season Splendour!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Even in the off season, Fort Tiracol maintained superb levels of customer service, room maintenance/cleanliness and AMAZING food. It Was a wonderful place to relax and learn a little bit about this tiny corner or Goa and the people who live there. It takes something special to make a fort with a working church inside feel comfortable, intimate and homelike,  but the decorators and staff at Fort Tiracol manage it well! We loved that most of the staff were local to the villages surrounding the fort and we got to have several very interesting conversations about the area.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'The perfect getaway‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "The location and the staff make this the perfect retreat if you are looking to rejuvenate and renergise yourself. The hectic city life gives way to the sound of the ocean with stunning vistas as you finally read the book you have been wanting to, or discover new nuances to the song you are listening on repeat or just slow everything down to find a semblance of balance in your life. I know hat this review doesn't help much with the quality of stay or staff, or geting there but that was my takeaway from the place. By the way the staff is brilliant!"}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Great customer service‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "The space was clean and the view was beautiful. We had traveled from 3am in the morning and was exhausted when we reached. The person at the help desk said that we could go to sleep immediately after we arrived, and said he would keep the paperwork for the next day. The hotel is placed conveniently at thee edge of Goa and just next door to Mumbai. This is an excellent location for those who want to do the photographic, herpeto, birding, nature trails in Goa, Amboli, Sawantwadi and Ratnagiri. Just between these, you cover mountain, coast, plateau and shore. 
As the room was available when we arrived, they didn't charge us for the very early check in. I thought that was a very generous gesture. The only thing you may miss is a reliable network. And yes, keep the windows shut. The monkeys are very curious :)"}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent stay!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'This hotel is a hidden gem. The luxury rooms have been built in an old fort and staying here was quite a unique experience. The views from the room and the restaurant are amazing (overlooking the river and the sea). Restaurant food was delicious, fine-dining quality at half the price. Staff are very friendly and polite. This place is not really for beachheads as the nearest beaches can only be accessed by car, they are really beautiful though. Highly recommend this place.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'H√©bergement idyllique ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Nous √©tions venus √† plusieurs reprises visiter le Fort soit en couple soit avec des amis durant notre s√©jour de 6 semaines √† Goa et avions decid√© de terminer ces vacances dans ce lieu assez idyllique...Nous n'avons pas √©t√© d√©√ßu. C'est bien le must des h√¥tels de Goa ! A ne manquer sous aucun pretexte"}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Traumlage, sehr zuvorkommendes und freundliches Personal, sehr leckeres Essen. Was will man mehr. ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Wundersch√∂ne Lage. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Albergo fantastico, ottima posizione, bellissime camere con vista e servizi - personale gentile e competente. '}], 'price': '7,650', 'img_link': 'https://q-xx.bstatic.com/xdata/images/hotel/840x460/431521622.jpg?k=bad73565450ace09b7b0d5aea777f7cb28c18233efe9d0fa15b15ae8f1bb6ed3&o=', 'room_size': '37m¬≤', 'amenities': ['2 king beds', 'Sea view', 'Balcony/terrace', 'Shower', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Bathrobes', 'Hair dryer', 'Mirror', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Satellite/cable channels', 'Telephone', 'Air conditioning', 'Fan', 'Mosquito net', 'Private entrance', 'Slippers', 'Coffee/tea maker', 'Desk', 'Seating area', 'Sofa', 'Trash cans', 'Closet', 'Ironing facilities', 'In-room safe box', 'Safety/security feature'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/fort-tiracol-heritage-hotel/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&los=1&searchrequestid=8225b61c-325c-4f9e-b7ba-f3d3492b1cd7'}

{'Location': 'H No 421, Xim Vaddo Arpora , H No 421, Baga, Goa, India, 403516', 'overall_rating': 'Select your room', 'Name': "Hotel Casa Tito's", 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '3.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'No tv will be working in all group room  and hot water boiler is so small no heating properly
No one responseing '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'NYC '}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Not good ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The hotel doesn‚Äôt provide toiletries you will only get cold
Response from the staff members and my hotel bathroom door lock was a joke there is no television tata sky subscription is enabled when you pay extra. Not worth the cost a limited facility hotel at least gives something complementary but not here dont ask for water even if your about to die they will charge you and leave a bill even if you are dead üòÇ only  1 plus is the food is good but not worth the experience and frustration you will face while staying here. Agoda please remove this property from your website definitely not using agoda in the future. '}, {'Review_Rating': '3.2', 'Review_Heading': 'weird place‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Location of hotel is weird. staff is not welcoming. facilities are worst. no fan? i dont know why! no  breakfast! '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Overall gd ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I spend one night its gd hotel but i have one complaint my room tv was not working i ask 3-4 time but no one fix it rest of all gd'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Not a good option to stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I stayed here from 24 till 28th and honestly the locality is worst here. The neighbour is always disturbing you since they both share the parking space. Also there is always sense of fear that someone will hit your car and it was a bad experience for me.'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Not up to the mark.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Staff is not good and room service is very slow.'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Rude and Unfriendly Staff‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "The staff of the hotel doesn't help guests in booking cabs and bikes. Firstly, they will say no and if you request them again then they arrange cabs at a very higher price. Further, due to location of the Hotel, you will not find cabs there. Even, Goa Taxi app says that they don't serve this area. 
The swimming pool was dirty and room was just ok types."}, {'Review_Rating': '4.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Hospitality is bed‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Service is not good, bed experienced.'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Worst Amenities, ever came across in past 15years of experience of Hospitality ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'After paying 3000 per night.
3rd class Lenin used,
Worst Mattresses,
The towel I was given 1st day, same was given for 2nd day after drying it in sun,
No breakfast included after paying 3k per night of single occupancy,
Worst Furniture placed in rooms,
Worst cable connections,
THE WORST HOTEL, I HAVE EVER SEEN IN MY PAST 15 YEARS OF TRAVEL EXPERIENCE.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Great experience ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Everything was too good.'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very poor and pathetic  service ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Hi.

Sorry to say but i recommend  agoda travel  company  to dont share this property  on your website .

It will.impect on your value and service promotions. 

Very poor and pathetic  service ever .

Room was very dirty .
Poor management 
Cleanness  was very bad .
Food was very bad .
Even chilled water bottel was not available  in whole property. 
Wi fi was not working 

Ac machine was faulty make noise in whole night  . We wasn't able to sleep in whole night .

Very poor and pathetic  service i ever got from this .

Its only name of hotel other wise its like oyo room

Never recommended  any one n west of money and time ."}, {'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'not at all‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'big Nooooo for this hotel, worst hotel in which we ever stayed, please dont spoil your holiday by staying in this hotel, this should not be considered as hotel, this is worst than a loadge.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good Hotel ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Very good Hotel and staff was good .
We got a big room and it's amazing "}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Casa Tito‚Äôs hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The hotel was good in terms of value for money but no amenities and crowd was a little shady because of the room price. 

Not good for family stay but staff member Ainul was very helpful and very very understanding, made our stay very comfortable there. 

'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Good at this price(~2500INR per day)‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good at this price range'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Location is good on main road in Arpora, 3Km from Baga beach. It‚Äôs Value for money. Clean AC room, good Bathroom, fridge. Swimming pool, restaurant, music available. Staff is less, service slow.Lift available. Superb in budget hotels'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Wrost hotel no staff no service you have to carry your laugage ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'They did not treat like guest. Not good hotel at all.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Resort feedback‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Net and clean resort

Fast service

The staff is quick and service is 4/5. Restaurant is also good. Location is 2 min from the beach. Honestly except for the car parking situation there is nothing to actually complain about. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Stay at Ocean 7 Ashwem‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Stay was amazing, very clean rooms with cooperative staffs. Me and my friends had an amazing stay and enjoyed every bit of it. Special thanks to Mr Prashant for arranging whatever we asked for. I will definately love to stay here on my next visit. '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Second timer‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Stayed at this location for the second time. Liked it. Staff is polite and courteous. Food is tasty. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent, clean Beachfront property‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Special shoutout to Deepak,John Sir and front desk Mr Rane. Excellent hotel. Cook of the hotel was also good, for young child he made whatever we told him to make.
Overall it was best hotel in every aspect.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Top location in Ashvem beach.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Best place to stay !!! Top location,  clean and friendly service.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nice place to stay, value for money. Clean and tidy rooms, great location close to major beaches around.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Value for money‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Its value for money , nice location , facilities  with very good restaurant service '}, {'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': "Don't believe their lies..‚Äù", 'Review_Body': 'They charge you extra with a promise of an ocean view room. In reality the ocean is not visible from any of their rooms! 
Also the air conditioner did not work in my room. They then changed my room where too the air conditioner did not work! I then decided to check out of the hotel just 3 hours after checking in! True to form, the hotel ofcourse refused to refund the money even for 2 nights whereas they collected money in advance from me for 3 nights through agoda. '}, {'Review_Rating': '3.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Not recommended, bad decision to select this hotel.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "We booked 2 rooms for 2 nights, 1 for couple and 1 for family with 3 years child. We family reached there at 8.30 am and when we request them for early check-in they said it will be chargeable 1 room Rs. 1000/- I told them our 1 room (Couple) will check-in at late evening so please adjust with some less amount but they directly refused. So we pay them 800 after too much negotiations and checkin early. 
In room TV was not working and after following up complete day it finally starts at night. Food is too costly here with no taste. Overall experience is not good. Its not beach resort so if you want beach resort don't choose this. I will suggest Sibaya resort instead, near to beach and very pleasant resort. Go for Sibaya resort we visit there and when we compare it with Ocean 7 then Ocean 7 found at very low standard in all aspects. 
Not recommending."}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Overwhelming Stay with kids‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'This is very clean & tidy property located just 100 meters from Ashweem beach. Staff is very helpful. Special thanks to Mr. Prashant for hassle free check-in & providing us rooms of our choice. Service staff is very good. Rooms are spacious & very clean. Food is tasty here however they should provide tea coffee making arrangements in rooms as you have wait till 8 am till their kitchen is open. Overall we enjoyed our stay and highly recommend this property.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'A suprisingly beautiful stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Well while booking we weren't sure about the location as well the place because the pictures used on the site weren't giving justice to the location. Well after reaching the place we were so happy and satisfied with the vibe and overall stay, plus the prices were also very cheap as compared to our other stays in the same location. The staff was great, very peaceful locations, shacks, and beaches were right in front of us. Total justice for the price we paid!"}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': '–û—Ç–ª–∏—á–Ω—ã–π –æ—Ç–µ–ª—å —Å —á–∏—Å—Ç—ã–º–∏ –Ω–æ–º–µ—Ä–∞–º–∏, –ø—Ä–∏—è—Ç–Ω–æ–π —Ç–µ—Ä—Ä–∏—Ç–æ—Ä–∏–µ–π,  –ø–µ—Ä—Å–æ–Ω–∞–ª –æ—á–µ–Ω—å –æ—Ç–∑—ã–≤—á–∏–≤—ã–π. –° —É–¥–æ–≤–æ–ª—å—Å—Ç–≤–∏–µ–º –≤–µ—Ä–Ω–µ–º—Å—è –≤ —ç—Ç–æ—Ç –æ—Ç–µ–ª—å –µ—â–µ —Ä–∞–∑. details:
{'Location': 'Survey No. 52/5 & 8, Candolim, Bardez, North Goa - 403515, Candolim, Goa, India, 403515', 'overall_rating': '8.6', 'Name': 'Holiday Inn Goa Candolim', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Hotel staff was great and very nice ambience‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Breakfast buffet was awesome.

Debashish who is one of the staff member in the kitchen is very supportive and provided exceptional service (A+) .


 He is very determined and dedicated towards his work.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': '10 out of 10 in all aspects ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'This is an excellent property to stay and good near by surroundings.No scope of improvement there '}, {'Review_Rating': '4.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Overpriced stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The place has nothing but a pool. The staff denies you requests on your face. I would choose Mariott or other brands going ahead. 
The staff wont make you feel grand at this place. This is worth 5k or less. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Had a good stay with good service all the time'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Too uptight staff to cater guests needs‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "I travelled to Goa for my honeymoon and tried contracting the staff but to my surprise no response was received. After that the day I was going to check in I tried conveying the same thing to the reception but to my surprise instead of catering my needs for a simple decoration they simply said that it's chargeable ‚Çπ6000/- ( way of saying that we will not do anything). Security staff Gopal and Kajal were on duty everytime whenever I needed some assistance when it came to car accomodation.
Luggage boy looked a bit lost and there was no enthusiasm shown by any of the staff we met up until then.
Room was very clean and tidy but that was the only saving grace as there was cost cutting going on where even in the hallway area air-conditioning was switched off, i booked my hotel 2 months before (10 days +-) but my television didn't work and the response level of was very slow.
Room cleaning was done on daily basis and that too very properly but you need to call the reception for the accessories as I don't feel a checklist system is followed.

Also had an opportunity to have dinner there and I just loved the main course and the drinks. Jyoti and Arshi were catering us and they did quite a reasonable job üëç

One night there was a pest infestation and the guy just killed some of them and left it there! There was no cleaning done after that and also one of the insect bit me on the neck when I was sleeping.
All said and done this was also politely communicated to the reception but apart from an apology I didn't see any efforts to satisfy my dissatisfaction and I didn't reacted to it because I know things were taken for granted.
Just a thought that this is not a hate review at all and the people were quite nice in there but I hope you can take my review as a constructive feedback and work on it
I paid 35k+ for 3 nights and it was not worth it and my only suggestion is to have more training to how to treat and cater guests and their needs.

Thank you for letting me stay at your pr"}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'A decent option in North Goa‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "We spent 4 nights in February. And found this to be a decent property with mostly goods and few not so good points. 
Goods:
1. Staffs - most of the staffs at front desk or cafeteria or valet are so friendly and helpful. Felt we have known them for years
2. Food - In room food service available 24 hrs. And the food is awesome, in fact better than many nearby renowned food joints
3. Room - A standard room with all facilities. 
4. Location - Almost at the heart of everything

Bads:
1. View from room: it's called Garden view but what you see is some old construction under renovation. Nothing much to look at or that can ne called Garden
2. Breakfast spread - Decent options, could have been better"}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Always best by holiday inn‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Superb hotel. No negatives at all. Everything is at its best'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'The room we got had multiple problems like the bathroom was blocked and water was overflowing.the AC vent stopped working both of bathroom. And room.bed bugs in room.room service was extremely slow.to‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "It's a very neat and clean property.staff is very friendly but service is very slow.we had to shift to another room bcoz of multiple problems in the first room.the service staff seemed to be lazy and disinterested in providing help.the overall experience was good but little expensive for 12 . 5 k without breakfast "}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'One of the best properties in North Goa‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We loved our stay here .. it‚Äôs literally a 2 min walk to the sinquerim beach. The staff are so courteous, excellent service, absolutely stunning rooms and great food too. We enjoyed the swimming pool. Best decision to stay in candolim. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Best hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Too good to stay or relax'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Fantastic Stay!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': '- Well-maintained resort.
- Co-operative hotel staff.
- Location was Okay.
- Food was Okay.
- Many options in breakfast.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Great stay'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'They have taken care for all the minute details, so the guest can have a pleasant and wonderful stay. Shall definitely recommend the place for all age groups.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good location, family friendly ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The hotel is a small setup, compared to other Holiday Inn hotels due to lack of space in North Goa. Located in Candolim, which gives you vibes of North Goa with tranquility of South Goa. The beach is just 5 mins walk through a happening street.
Breakfast spread is decent and we got a good deal on the breakfast. Many options around for food and shopping.
There are a few down sides like pool is small, staff could be a little more trained, especially housekeeping. We had to request twice to clean the rooms. Bed size is small for couple with young kids, even in the premium room.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Amazing stay ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We really enjoyed our stay here...very peaceful hotel in great location, breakfast was amazing.
Would love to go for the next time '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Pleasent stay in Holiday Inn‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "There were issues with AC and the door on the first day, but we didn't have time to check further on it. Special thanks to Shroisi at the front desk and Shabana at the front entrance. Shabana and Kajal were very sweet and suggested me and my elderly parents to take a ride to Candolim beach at the check-out. Overall a pleasent stay."}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Amazing Hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The best place to stay in candolim. The rooms are clean, very friendly staff'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Family stay hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "New hotel (2021). Location in North Goa is amongst the best. Less crowded area. It's a boutique hotel. Breakfast was okay. Service at restaurant could have been better. "}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good stays overall nice property'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Superüëç‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Excellent location, just a walk to the beach and restaurants. The staff of the hotel were extremely courteous. Value for money and extremely clean rooms. One night there was a pest infestation and the guy just killed some of them and left it there! There was no cleaning done after that and also one of the insect bit me on the neck when I was sleeping.
All said and done this was also politely communicated to the reception but apart from an apology I didn't see any efforts to satisfy my dissatisfaction and I didn't reacted to it because I know things were taken for granted.
Just a thought that this is not a hate review at all and the people were quite nice in there but I hope you can take my review as a constructive feedback and work on it
I paid 35k+ for 3 nights and it was not worth it and my only suggestion is to have more training to how to treat and cater guests and their needs.

Thank you for letting me stay at your pr"}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'A decent option in North Goa‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "We spent 4 nights in February. And found this to be a decent property with mostly goods and few not so good points. 
Goods:
1. Staffs - most of the staffs at front desk or cafeteria or valet are so friendly and helpful. Felt we have known them for years
2. Food - In room food service available 24 hrs. And the food is awesome, in fact better than many nearby renowned food joints
3. Room - A standard room with all facilities. 
4. Location - Almost at the heart of everything

Bads:
1. View from room: it's called Garden view but what you see is some old construction under renovation. Nothing much to look at or that can ne called Garden
2. Breakfast spread - Decent options, could have been better"}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Always best by holiday inn‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Superb hotel. No negatives at all. Everything is at its best'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'The room we got had multiple problems like the bathroom was blocked and water was overflowing.the AC vent stopped working both of bathroom. And room.bed bugs in room.room service was extremely slow.to‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "It's a very neat and clean property.staff is very friendly but service is very slow.we had to shift to another room bcoz of multiple problems in the first room.the service staff seemed to be lazy and disinterested in providing help.the overall experience was good but little expensive for 12 . 5 k without breakfast "}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'One of the best properties in North Goa‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We loved our stay here .. it‚Äôs literally a 2 min walk to the sinquerim beach. The staff are so courteous, excellent service, absolutely stunning rooms and great food too. We enjoyed the swimming pool. Best decision to stay in candolim. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Best hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Too good to stay or relax'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Fantastic Stay!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': '- Well-maintained resort.
- Co-operative hotel staff.
- Location was Okay.
- Food was Okay.
- Many options in breakfast.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Great stay'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'They have taken care for all the minute details, so the guest can have a pleasant and wonderful stay. Shall definitely recommend the place for all age groups.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good location, family friendly ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The hotel is a small setup, compared to other Holiday Inn hotels due to lack of space in North Goa. Located in Candolim, which gives you vibes of North Goa with tranquility of South Goa. The beach is just 5 mins walk through a happening street.
Breakfast spread is decent and we got a good deal on the breakfast. Many options around for food and shopping.
There are a few down sides like pool is small, staff could be a little more trained, especially housekeeping. We had to request twice to clean the rooms. Bed size is small for couple with young kids, even in the premium room.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Amazing stay ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We really enjoyed our stay here...very peaceful hotel in great location, breakfast was amazing.
Would love to go for the next time '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Pleasent stay in Holiday Inn‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "There were issues with AC and the door on the first day, but we didn't have time to check further on it. Special thanks to Shroisi at the front desk and Shabana at the front entrance. Shabana and Kajal were very sweet and suggested me and my elderly parents to take a ride to Candolim beach at the check-out. Overall a pleasent stay."}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Amazing Hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The best place to stay in candolim. The rooms are clean, very friendly staff'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Family stay hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "New hotel (2021). Location in North Goa is amongst the best. Less crowded area. It's a boutique hotel. Breakfast was okay. Service at restaurant could have been better. "}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good stays overall nice property'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Superüëç‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Excellent location, just a walk to the beach and restaurants. The staff of the hotel were extremely courteous. Value for money and extremely clean rooms. Had an excellent stay with my family'}]

details: {'Location': 'Calangute, Goa, India', 'overall_rating': '5.2', 'Name': 'Smiley Holidays Serviced Apartments', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Bad‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Bad'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': "Don't book this hotel‚Äù", 'Review_Body': 'I have booked this hotel online from Agoda.com and paid amount on same time online. While at the time of check-in hotel staff saying there is no booking at there end. This is very frustrating experience. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'best home stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'this is my 4 stay in this apartment witout thinking u can book and the main thing the staff are so helpful to us and the mangner i dont know the name he is also a very helpful person'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'waste hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Dont go to this hotel...Nasty hotel'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'no'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'It was good to stay but no good service from agoda‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I enquired from agoda many times but there was no proper response from agoda on 2nd Sep 2016'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Worst experience at Smiley Holidays‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "I had booked for 2Nos of 2BHKs on 19th & 20th Dec. The staff changed it to 1 BHK on their own and did not even bother to inform me. Since we are made to pay 100% advance, we are at thrir mercy when we land their. They have 2 properties located in Calungate and both are cockroach infested. The staff is discourteous and wont address to issues. We were made to shift to different property when I complained about the hygiene of the first property. But both were equally bad. They don't deserve a 2 Star rating, rated by themselves. I mean they served coffees in jugs for Christ sake. Hello have they heard about flask or kettles? We get far better hotels in goa which have basic hygiene and facility. I strongly condemn Agoda.com for providing Smiley holidays as an option in the first place. reviews: [{'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Bad‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Bad'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': "Don't book this hotel‚Äù", 'Review_Body': 'I have booked this hotel online from Agoda.com and paid amount on same time online. While at the time of check-in hotel staff saying there is no booking at there end. This is very frustrating experience. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'best home stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'this is my 4 stay in this apartment witout thinking u can book and the main thing the staff are so helpful to us and the mangner i dont know the name he is also a very helpful person'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'waste hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Dont go to this hotel...Nasty hotel'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'no'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'It was good to stay but no good service from agoda‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I enquired from agoda many times but there was no proper response from agoda on 2nd Sep 2016'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Worst experience at Smiley Holidays‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "I had booked for 2Nos of 2BHKs on 19th & 20th Dec. The staff changed it to 1 BHK on their own and did not even bother to inform me. Since we are made to pay 100% advance, we are at thrir mercy when we land their. They have 2 properties located in Calungate and both are cockroach infested. The staff is discourteous and wont address to issues. We were made to shift to different property when I complained about the hygiene of the first property. But both were equally bad. They don't deserve a 2 Star rating, rated by themselves. I mean they served coffees in jugs for Christ sake. Hello have they heard about flask or kettles? We get far better hotels in goa which have basic hygiene and facility. I strongly condemn Agoda.com for providing Smiley holidays as an option in the first place.
