{'Location': 'Rua de Ourem, Near Old Patto Bridge, Panaji, Goa, India, 403001', 'overall_rating': '6.6', 'Name': 'Hotel Sona', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '4.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Pathetic experience ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I had one of the worst hotel experience. Only good thing about this hotel is location rest is worst. '}, {'Review_Rating': '2.8', 'Review_Heading': 'I booked deluxe room ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Not really deluxe room is show  on website 
Not clean ,Air Condition also not working also not having a single chair '}, {'Review_Rating': '4.8', 'Review_Heading': 'My stay at Sona Royale‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The room size was way smaller than the images. The length of the bed was not enough. Our feet were popping out. The washroom dint have any exhaust so it became really stiff and smelly after a point.
Most of all they provide hot water for bathing only in the morning so incase you are a person who wants to take a shower at night as well, be ready to enjoy a cold shower.'}, {'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Average Property ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Location wise it is really good rest everything is not so good. Hotel doesn't have their own parking, rooms are small, furniture, Toilet are too old, not maintained properly, since my stay was on last week of the year, hotel staff called several time and asked me to pay entire tariff in advance. During this conversation I spoke with the property owner and i find him quite rude. "}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Good budget hotel near Panjim Goa‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Location is great. You can find many options for food nearby. Rooms were small but clean  Parking were not available, but you can park your car on road near to hotel. Staff was cooperative specially Mr. Mahesh.
Sight seeing places are near to this place for North Goa  Overall good budget hotel to stay 2-3 days.'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Bad poor worst‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "No parking for cars , I hv to spend additional 500 Rs per day for 4 days I.e. 2000 Rs. , 

Very small rooms like lodge , very old hotel , bathroom condition is poor

No restaurant,  u hv to cry for breakfast every morning , they bought very late from cloud kitchen

Lift is not working

U cannot stop car infant of hotel , very small busy road , always unsafe for family 

Only one person can keep luggage , don't travel with family , very small space and cupboard

AC is like blower , noisy u cannot sleep 

Overall very bad , poor show , also very high cost 2500 Rs for lodge with no parking

Pl return my entire money of 4 days booking 10400 Rs."}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Near to panaji busstand ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "It's located in main area,suitable only for casino games and boat ride at mandovi river"}, {'Review_Rating': '2.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Dirty, Bad AC, Worst Hotel.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Everything is terrible about this hotel. I would price this room at INR. 500 to 1000 given their room condition and service. But they charge 2300 INR. I can find a much better room at this price‚Äîdirty bed sheets, tiny room, worn out AC. No food service, '}, {'Review_Rating': '4.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Nothing works apart from location‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Only the best thing about this hotel is location.. rest no parking facility. Air conditioner is installed ages ago.... Not working at all. Very small rooms. No service at all..'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'excellent'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'descent stay at the heart of panjim‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'the hotel has satisfactory arrangements. nothing too fancy or nothing too dull. just good enough for a stay.'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Not so good hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Avoid this hotel if possible not great experience'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'No gud internet and no towels‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "They don't have towel, and not gud internet at room"}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Above average‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'cheaper other than but hotel not specious'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Service not good '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Worth the money with good quality food'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Not Good As We Expected .‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Rooms Was Not Adjustable Not Value For Money .'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Value for money‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Stay over there in January place is quiet good. I can say it was pleasent stay at Hotel Sona.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Best Location in Panaji next to Bus stand'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Very bad stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Rooms were very small and the worst part of the hotel was that the staffs were even more worst. Non cooperative at all. '}], 'price': '2,000', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/18983284/-1/18be6a05c40a5793ce15d9e1dbfcf5a9.jpg?ca=16&ce=1&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '14m¬≤', 'amenities': ['Non-smoking', 'Shower', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Mirror', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Satellite/cable channels', 'Air conditioning', 'Blackout curtains', 'Fan', 'Linens', 'Private entrance', 'Desk', 'Seating area', 'Clothes rack'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/hotel-sona-h18983284/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&tspTypes=9&los=1&searchrequestid=0a976578-dc30-400c-9670-434a4700defb'}

details:
{'Location': 'Near Football Ground, Flee Market Road, Anjuna, Goa, India, 403509', 'overall_rating': '7.7', 'Name': 'Hotel Meraden La Oasis', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Above average‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The location was good, the staff was trying but seems that they did not have the training of a 4 star hotel. The place was not very clean and well maintained. Value for money was not awful but for same price you can get a better experience in Goa. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Amazing Stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The stay was amazing, Faculties was awesome like parking, restuarant. Staff was very generous. Our stay was very enjoyable.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Hotel is good but needs upgradation‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Hi, the hotel is definitely good. Room sizes are quite big and spacious. Hotel staff is also very cohrteous. The biggest flaw in the rooms are its bathroom, which needs some serious upgradation. Overall, a little upgradation to the rooms will also increase its aesthetic value. Overall, a pleasant stay.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Best Hotel in Goa‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The staff was very friendly. They helped us alot. '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'REVIEW‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We stayed in this hotel for 5 nights 
The staff of the hotel is very polite and very communicative 
Rooms are nice ,cozy and spacious 
The ambience is clean but they should work for the pool side area to be more clean and the water should be maintained regularly 
The food is okay can do better to upgrade taste
The location of the hotel is very nearby to many beaches like anjuna ,vagator .
Over all good experience and a nice stay at this would recommend to visit once
'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Very pleasant stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Only thing they need to improve is quality of breakfast '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Peacefully and relaxing your mind '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Okay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Don't pay more than 3k for this"}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': '5 star‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Staff is helpful. Food is awesome. the rooms are really spacious and clean.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Do not book breakfast option‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Everything is ok perfectly fine with property but if you are booking your breakfast with room then it‚Äôs not worth   The extra amount you gonna pay on your breakfast is definitely not worth it as they are giving you only limited option for your breakfast buffet   '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Worth the wait‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I was going to travel to north Goa for the first time and had never expected that we could get such an awesome stay near Anjuna Beach.
Talking about the hotel, it looks good especially at night when te lights are put on.
There is no point in talking about the staff because they are so friendly, caring just like your bffs and they well treat their customers (solo traveler, couple friendly, Family). Had more conversations with Ankit Bhaiya and Mir Bhaiya. 
Now i can suggest this hotel to someone who want a stay near Anjuna Beach

'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'bad noisy location and bad food‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'please avoid Hotel Meraden la oasis at anjuna 
unless u r left with no choice'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Hotel was good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Best hotel. Good staff. clean and mainatin rooms. Food is ok. 1.5 km away from anjuna beach. '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We had quite a comfortable stay in this hotel. Staff are warm, welcoming and upto the service. Room size is quite decent. Breakfast buffet are also good. Enjoyed our stay there
.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Best Hotel for Stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good and friendly staff, cleanness, food is delicious. good room service'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Value for money !!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It‚Äôs great value for money property !! This was my second stay with the hotel and they do not disappoint !! Rooms are clean spacious and well maintained , staff is too co operative . Restaurant is decent as well  you can go for it !! '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Relaxing‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Value for money. Good location'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent hospitality ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good big room with balcony and excellent hospitality '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Best hotel in low price.'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Good location and big rooms‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Except for some rules related to "No"guest visit in the room and "No" food from outside , Everything was good.

'}], 'price': '3,169', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/175372/3210510/80496ef0d6e1c4411c9506f9d72fb7bc.jpeg?ce=0&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '24m¬≤', 'amenities': ['Nature view', 'Balcony/terrace', 'Non-smoking', 'Shower', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Bathrobes', 'Hair dryer', 'Mirror', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Pool facilities', 'Satellite/cable channels', 'Telephone', 'Air conditioning', 'Daily newspaper', 'Fan', 'Slippers', 'Wake-up service', 'Coffee/tea maker', 'Free bottled water', 'Mini bar', 'Refrigerator', 'Desk', 'Fireplace', 'Interconnecting room(s) available', 'Laptop workspace', 'Seating area', 'Separate dining area', 'Tile/marble flooring', 'Wooden/parqueted flooring', 'Closet', 'Clothes rack', 'Ironing facilities', 'In-room safe box', 'Locker', 'Safety/security feature'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/hotel-meraden-la-oasis/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&tspTypes=9&los=1&searchrequestid=0a976578-dc30-400c-9670-434a4700defb'}

Good location'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent hospitality ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good big room with balcony and excellent hospitality '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Best hotel in low price.'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Good location and big rooms‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Except for some rules related to "No"guest visit in the room and "No" food from outside , Everything was good.

'}]

The photos look good but it is a very small property with small rooms. 
Rooms were clean. There was no refrigerator. The breakfast was mediocre at best. Honestly just felt like a better Oyo. 
It's ideal for people who're traveling alone, or plan to spend entire day out. 
Very close to Vagator beach, so that was a plus point. "}, {'Review_Rating': '4.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Not at all worth for the money‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Don‚Äôt go for it , my stay was upsetting, they didn‚Äôt have clean bathroom nor good rooms and you should keep it in mind that all rooms are the same as we were told by the hotel management so don‚Äôt pay extra'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Value for money‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Got this place for an absolute steal via Agoda. Other portals had it for nearly twice as much. The staff is very helpful, bunch of boys from North India who have made their home here. 
The room was spacious with the washroom clean. '}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Good place to stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Not too costly.. good place to stay over.. '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Awesome staff‚Äù', 'Review_Body': '100% value for money
Best staff
'}, {'Review_Rating': '3.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Television is useless with very minimal channels that you do not even watch.
Window lock was broken.
Water temperature rises out of no where and it gets so hot that your body would burn.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Comfortable stay with big rooms‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Staff was extremely accommodating and helped us through to get car rental and extra time baggage was also kept safely. Small property but it is at good location.'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Photos are not real, old photos as been updated in site ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Be careful when you book hotels through online better to go take a look on hotel and then can book through online, you have so many hotels in every 100m you can find hotels in Goa, best to can visit in person and can see your comfort and then you can book‚Ä¶. Fair field Marriot is also not good for 8k no cleanliness very poor toilet maintenance.'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': "Probably won't stay here again‚Äù", 'Review_Body': "I stayed literally one night (maybe like 10 hours) at the hotel and I'm happy it wasn't longer. 

The room seemed like it was still under construction with the bathroom opening up the pipes randomly. I've used public toilets that were cleaner.

The room is worth Rs 1,500 a night, at best. The thing it has going for it is it's location and proximity to everything. "}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'My Experience ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "~ REALITY : Pictures shown on booking sites are very different than the reality. In real the rooms/pool/parking space is very small and smelly everywhere.
~ STAFF : Staff is un-professional. The phone at room doesn't work and when i visited reception with a complaint that ( AC is not working ) - the staff just kept postponing and at the end did not bother to change room.
~ CLEANLINESS : The bathroom fittings are of good quality but the maintenance is so poor, you will find cockroaches. Rooms are filled with moisture and fungus can be seen on door and walls. NO Proper maintenance.
~ SERVICE : As hot water wall mixture was not working very well, i requested for providing a bucket and i noticed that the staff ( after an hour ) handed over a broken bucket which he was using for cleaning floor (with phenyl liquid still in bucket ) .
~ FOOD : Its breakfast buffet. They make available only 1-2 items along with machine tea/coffee. The food is below average in taste. Its better to opt for a no breakfast option and have breakfast at nearby restaurants( lot of options available )
OVERALL : Very expensive for the quality of rooms and service."}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Below average‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Hotel staff without properly checking my booking details said it does not include breakfast. Then they lied to Agoda customer rep saying guest denied breakfast. Swimming pool is small. '}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'STAFF IS NOT GOOD‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'BAD STAFF'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Very Good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Had a great stay. Rooms are value for money. Good location. Everything was nearby. 2-3 staff members were quite rude. Other than that everything was fine.'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Above average‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Average and not value for money'}], 'price': '4,208', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/268/26852693/26852693_210922181400105734177.jpg?s=1024x768', 'room_size': '25m¬≤', 'amenities': ['Garden view', 'Non-smoking', 'Shower', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Board games', 'Accessible toilet', 'Hair dryer', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Board games/puzzles', 'Books/DVDs/music for children', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Satellite/cable channels', 'Telephone', 'Air conditioning', 'Alarm clock', 'Fan', 'Hand sanitizer', 'Linens', 'Soundproofing', 'Wake-up service', 'Coffee/tea maker', 'Dining table', 'Free bottled water', 'Desk', 'Fireplace', 'Seating area', 'Separate dining area', 'Sofa', 'Tile/marble flooring', 'Trash cans', 'Wooden/parqueted flooring', 'Closet', 'Clothes dryer', 'Clothes rack', 'Ironing facilities', 'Accessible by elevator', 'Fire extinguisher', 'Individual air conditioning', 'Safety/security feature', 'Smoke detector'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/the-porto/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&tspTypes=9&los=1&searchrequestid=0a976578-dc30-400c-9670-434a4700defb'}

details:
{'Location': 'Baga road-Umtavaddo, Verpo Nixir House no 240, Shiroli Pulachi, Khobra Waddo, Calangute, Calangute, Goa, India, 403516', 'overall_rating': '8.4', 'Name': 'Treebo Trend Dona Eliza', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Decent and cost effective Stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nice hotel.
Spacious mahogany room. Daily supplies of tea coffee sachets and electric kettle in room.
Location is good. Walking distance to Calangute beach and water sports.
Good tasty unlimited breakfast.
Clean swimming pool.

Points to improve:
Service a bit slow.
Mineral water complimentary in room of 3 adults - only 2 bottles per day. (For 2 adults room - only 1 ltr bottle) However they provide regular water if required.
Drinking water is not provided without asking.(But this looks overall issue with Goa restaurants. Water is not provided with meals.)'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Best hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Best hotel for stay very clean and staff is very helpful.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Just WOW......‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Great hotel with good facilities.
Breakfast was good.
Staff is coperative and helpful.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Comfortable stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'They upgraded my room, the room including toilet was neat and clean. Staffs were really nice and professional. Overall excellent stay.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice, clean and very good location‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "The hotel was professional, clean and staff was nice. I had to extend my stay as I got unwell and by mistake I booked a different room of lower price on extension but they upgraded to my current room. The rooms and washrooms are big and clean with all required facilities. The location is superb and one can walk on foot to bus stop which is very helpful. The McD just downstairs is open 24x7 which is helpful too. The hotel doesn't have pantry but one can order from Zomato and the staff is very helpful in getting the order to the room along with needed cutlery. Overall a nice hotel from treebo chain."}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good stay'}, {'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Very dirty rooms‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Bed sheet were wrinkled ( felt like used ones ) , straightforward staff ( turns down small requests ) etc etc '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Good stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good stay overall with good facilities,. Staff is good and cooperative. 
Breakfast is available but need food facility in day time on order basis is highly appreciated. '}, {'Review_Rating': '4.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The rooms were very smelly and bedsheets were dirty, when we asked them to change they replaced it with old ones. Although the location is good but the hotel can do better. Pool was not cleaned for dayss, it remained dirty. 0 stars for cleanliness, hygiene and management.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Fantastic hotel, fantastic staffs, specially Hotel owner Mr. Ivan Lobo...amazing experience'}, {'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Not a good experience‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Already due to christmas eve weekend hotel was quite expensive as per the facilities provided and was charging 3 times its normal price . After that they charged us 2000 rs extra for stains in bedsheet and blanket cover which a found bit unprofessional at their end . They could have just leave that . Paying 9500 for a night in that hotel is not at all worthy.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Close to Calangute & Baga‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Located on Market road, above McD, opp to Chocolate Room, the hotel has good connectivity by Bus, easy to drive too. Amazed with vibrant color combination and cleanliness in room. 

*Hotel doesn't have its own kitchen / restaurant. They serve takeaway food for breakfast which is okay okay. You may have to ask reception for some basic things like soap, shampoo, bucket, etc.  "}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Pleasant Stay at Treebo Trend Dona Eliza‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Centrally located just 0.8 km from Calangute Beach, in the heart of Calangute Market. Spacious room, three of us could stay very comfortably. Very polite staff, ensured cleanliness of the highest order. Nice, cosy pool. Ashton and Ivan at the front desk were so affable and polite. '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Recommended for a budget stay in the center‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Recommended for a budget stay in the center'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice, Comfortable, Value for Money‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Rooms are nice and clean, staff are helpful, good breakfast, close to calangute and baga beach, lot of eateries nearby.
It would be great if they can add some more options in breakfast menu and some additional facilities like hair dryer, iron etc can be provided in rooms.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Best Property ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very Good location,  Polite Staff, Big Room , every thing ok'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nice Hotel..... Efficient staff'}], 'price': '3,980', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/21821709/-1/10f60cfb5073c65742bb3ab1f4999fa0.jpg?ca=24&ce=0&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '0', 'amenities': ['Balcony/terrace', 'Non-smoking', 'Shower', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Mirror', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'TV [flat screen]', 'Air conditioning', 'Fan', 'Hand sanitizer', 'Linens', 'Wake-up service', 'Coffee/tea maker', 'Free bottled water', 'Refrigerator', 'Desk', 'Laptop workspace', 'Seating area', 'Sofa', 'Trash cans', 'Wooden/parqueted flooring', 'Closet', 'Clothes rack', 'Ironing facilities', 'Accessible by elevator', 'Accessible by stairs', 'Smoke detector'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/treebo-trend-dona-eliza/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&tspTypes=1&los=1&searchrequestid=0a976578-dc30-400c-9670-434a4700defb'}

Hospitable staff.... Full value for money'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Worth to experience ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'They provided the complimentary room upgrade and also accomodate us for late check-out
Best for staycation
Food options are good
Suggestion : there are few activities within the property but events/ interactive activities can be added.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Great experience. '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Serene place‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Resort was clean and the responses from the staffs were great. We just had breakfast all days & it was really good. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Excellent choice
Ideal place to relax and enjoy the sunshine
Great hospitality
Enjoyed 15 nights stay thoroughly '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Watch the bed bugs. Beautiful place '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nice food and great staff'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very clean facility, very courteous and helpful staff, excellent restaurants and a nice location. It was very pleasant, worth staying at this resort. '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'One of the best Resorts in India!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Nicest staff, well appointed room, clean golden beach, amazing food, Nice big pool, PS5 equipped playroom,... Couldn't ask for much more. "}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Great resort ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Loved our stay here. The Asian restaurant is awesome. Right beside the beach.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Cost comfortable stay for family with kids‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Our stay was extremely comfortable... After a tiring road trip... The warm welcome by staff at reception was a delight... Salome at the reception was extremely warm with a smiling face and lovely with kids .. all the staff has been wondering.. the games that were organised or the food.... Everything was to perfection... Highly recommend this place for ones who are looking for a comfortable stay and cost stay'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Best experience ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Although we stayed for one day but it was memorable‚Ä¶.staff was very supporting and cooperating,locations was too good ‚Ä¶overall it was a fun day'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Awesome place with family‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'When we booked it, never thought that the experience would be so awesome. My kids liked it the most with so many curricular activities designed for the kids. Would love to visit again.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Oasis‚Äù', 'Review_Body': '100% chill factor at this hotel
So laid back and beautiful, it was unreal. 
Will be booking again '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Best hotel we had in India, but... ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "As a spoiled european traveler, I would expect little more for the price. But overall, it is a very nice place to stay if you're willing to pay. "}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Best family resort‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "I will try to categorise my reviews so that its more readable:
Room: Room was amazing. KingSize bed with ample space for all 3 of us. (Me, my wife and my baby). 
Great room service. They don't say no to any requests. We needed extra water bottles daily for boiling water for baby food and it was catered without any hesitation. Cleanliness was top notch. Got complimentary wine, chocolates, cookies, fruits and what not. Balcony had a cloth hanger for drying clothes which solved our problem of drying our wet beach clothes.

Food: Breakfast buffet is excellent. Lots of varieties, great taste and top notch service. We ordered lunch and dinner in our room and we got tasty food. One advice: The dinner buffet price should be a bit reasonable and having different prices for veg and non-veg would solve the problem to a great extent.

Resort Facilities: The resort has a great view, nice swimming pool with a separate kids pool. The best one I liked is the tuktuk drop and pickup provided for the beach. Saved us from carrying our baby and walking upto that.  

Other than these, the checkin and the checkout was super smooth. There were no hassles what so ever. I am sure I am visiting here again."}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Resort is 5 star Beach not  that great‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good resort as it was accessible most of the places ....still needs more accessibility features and u can stay with your furry friends.staff is extremely helpful....to name a few; Ganesh, Salome,Muriel, Gurunath, Dwayne, In the kitchen and bar Rohit,Jesmond, vegan, Muriel'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Slightly overrated !‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We opted for the highest category room but that too was quite congested.  Old property.   No private beach; one has to go outside and take a walk.  One more serious issue was that I spotted a "lizard" in the room.   You would not expect this in a so-called five star category hotel.   Overall the property was good.  Food was good.  Food and live music at their speciality restaurant was extraordinary.  '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': "Don't think twice, just book‚Äù", 'Review_Body': 'If you want to your Goa experience to be unforgettable, full of happy memories and good vibes only, book this property, their hospitality is top notch these guys  say yes to everything, they treat you like family, special mention for Solome, Wilfred, Antonio and everyone actually. They made special food for my daughter daily with utmost love, gave her their love and attention. The owners are animal lovers and the property is pet friendly.'}], 'price': '11,499', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/43793/-1/d100aa3dd0aef36a7269fb2fb762346e.jpg?ce=0&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '21m¬≤', 'amenities': ['2 single beds', 'Pool view', 'Balcony/terrace', 'Non-smoking', 'Shower', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Adapted bath', 'Bathrobes', 'Hair dryer', 'Mirror', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Walk-in shower', 'DVD/CD player', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Satellite/cable channels', 'Telephone', 'Adapter', 'Air conditioning', 'Blackout curtains', 'Daily newspaper', 'Fan', 'Hand sanitizer', 'Heating', 'Linens', 'Private entrance', 'Sleep comfort items', 'Slippers', 'Wake-up service', 'Coffee/tea maker', 'Free bottled water', 'Refrigerator', 'Desk', 'Seating area', 'Tile/marble flooring', 'Trash cans', 'Window', 'Wooden/parqueted flooring', 'Closet', 'Ironing facilities', 'Trouser press', 'Accessible by stairs', 'Fire extinguisher', 'Individual air conditioning', 'In-room safe box', 'Safety/security feature', 'Smoke detector'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/heritage-village-resort-spa-goa/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&los=1&searchrequestid=0a976578-dc30-400c-9670-434a4700defb'}

{'Location': '124/3, Gauravaddo, Near Calangute Mall,, Calangute, Goa, India, 403516', 'overall_rating': '6.7', 'Name': 'Sharanam Green Resort', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Good resort and Location ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good Hotel and pure veg so Recommended for Veg People. Also rooms are good'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Overall decent experience'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Agoda sharanam‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Don't use agoda and sharnam resort"}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice property but not maintained‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I went to this resort during the peak time at Goa, 26th Dec to 29th Dec. Pre-booked hotel via Agoda. The location of the property is very good, at the heart of North Goa, with 1.2 KM from Calingute beach. Following are Pros and Cons:
Pros:
- Big Room with smoking option
- Room had refrigerator also
- AC of room is quite good
- Ambience is good, comfortable
- Reception & Housing staff are courteous
Cons:
- Only Veg foods available, that too from restaurant common for boarders and outsiders, where you have to pay instantly for food. Too crowdy
- Restaurant service is very poor, takes too much time for serving
- Ambience is very poor of the restaurant
- Swimming pool condition is very poor, not maintained at all, no specific staff appointed for swimming pool, full of leaves and water not changed
- Complimentary breakfast is worst, no taste, no variety and timing is 8 to 10 for place like Goa where people stay for nightlife till 4 AM
- Too much mosquitoes and nothing kept for controlling the same, cannot seat in balcony for long time

Overall, stay was OK, but food and other services were not that Good. Only Veg food available, that too in place like Goa, which you should consider before booking. restaurant food quality, service and ambience is pathetic. Better to have food outside and just come here for staying only. Swimming pool is deep (5 to 5.3 ft) and not easy for children, no separate place in swimming pool for children'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nice Resort '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nice'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': ' Receptionist Don‚Äôt told me about free breakfast '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Looks like 4 star hotel.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Location could be little better , other than that it is good. '}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'There are no facilities‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Pool is useless'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Resort with reasonable cost‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "It's located in calangute road, the only challenge is missing elevators, else the resort is good, rooms are good, pool was clean and usable by visitors, opting for breakfast can be a good choice, overall good choice near the calangute area, beach is walking distance."}, {'Review_Rating': '4.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Price is high, but not up to expectations ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We stayed for 3 days 2 Night. According to per day price.. Resort is not that great. We stayed in Room No. 309 whose bathroom drain was clogged.. even after informing the staff issue was not resolved.
Breakfast provided not that good.. had dead mosquito in Dosa and hair in chutney..
Also alot of mosquitoes in room..'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Good Hotel to stay in North Goa without Breakfast‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'This is one amongst the best located hotel on main road across Candolim to stay and visit beaches in North Goa. Most of the ABC Beaches in North Goa are in closed proximity to this hotel along with famous restaurants & bars as well. Breakfast is not that good and can be avoided. The swimming pool is small in size and is used rarely by travellers. Cleanliness is good and hygenic & hotel staff are pretty much helpful and courteous.'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Smelly rooms and rude staff‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The rooms are really smelly. Staff Donot care about your stay. It would be the worst experience if you choose this place. I had stay for 5+ nights and it was a nightmare. Please stay away for your own good!'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It is a very old property, lot of defects in the rooms. I stayed in Executive suite but No charging point was working there. Booked for two nights but due to defects I had to change room twice.'}, {'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'ok‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Location is only plus point. No pool maintenance. Only South indian breakfast daily. Pathetic service.'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': "Don't stay‚Äù", 'Review_Body': 'Pool is so small
It is like bath tub
There was no garden
Hotel staff is very care less
'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Money dimande extra after booking by hotel members‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Money dimande extra after booking at the time check in'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Best for vegetarian family ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Room are good and clean. Best hotel under 3.5k budget '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': "Reception not 'well' studied..‚Äù", 'Review_Body': 'One of the reception staff told me the breakfast is free. Was billed. Her answer without proper verification of files was very bad.'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Property needs renovation‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Breakfast excellent 
Swimming pool not usable condition
Rooms rusted iron pillars, Luke warm water in mornings, loose fittings in bathroom'}], 'price': '2,748', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/292661/-1/87bfb8938f987d3c6f0f7404d419bc8a.jpg?ca=23&ce=0&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '217m¬≤', 'amenities': ['Garden view', 'Balcony/terrace', 'Smoking allowed', 'Shower', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Satellite/cable channels', 'Air conditioning', 'Fan', 'Coffee/tea maker', 'Mini bar', 'Desk', 'Seating area', 'Closet', 'Ironing facilities', 'In-room safe box'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/sharanam-green-resort/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&tspTypes=-1&los=1&searchrequestid=0a976578-dc30-400c-9670-434a4700defb'}

Pre-booked hotel via Agoda. The location of the property is very good, at the heart of North Goa, with 1.2 KM from Calingute beach. Following are Pros and Cons:
Pros:
- Big Room with smoking option
- Room had refrigerator also
- AC of room is quite good
- Ambience is good, comfortable
- Reception & Housing staff are courteous
Cons:
- Only Veg foods available, that too from restaurant common for boarders and outsiders, where you have to pay instantly for food. Too crowdy
- Restaurant service is very poor, takes too much time for serving
- Ambience is very poor of the restaurant
- Swimming pool condition is very poor, not maintained at all, no specific staff appointed for swimming pool, full of leaves and water not changed
- Complimentary breakfast is worst, no taste, no variety and timing is 8 to 10 for place like Goa where people stay for nightlife till 4 AM
- Too much mosquitoes and nothing kept for controlling the same, cannot seat in balcony for long time

Overall, stay was OK, but food and other services were not that Good. Only Veg food available, that too in place like Goa, which you should consider before booking. restaurant food quality, service and ambience is pathetic. Better to have food outside and just come here for staying only. Swimming pool is deep (5 to 5.3 ft) and not easy for children, no separate place in swimming pool for children'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nice Resort '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nice'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': ' Receptionist Don‚Äôt told me about free breakfast '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Looks like 4 star hotel.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Location could be little better , other than that it is good. '}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'There are no facilities‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Pool is useless'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Resort with reasonable cost‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "It's located in calangute road, the only challenge is missing elevators, else the resort is good, rooms are good, pool was clean and usable by visitors, opting for breakfast can be a good choice, overall good choice near the calangute area, beach is walking distance."}, {'Review_Rating': '4.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Price is high, but not up to expectations ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We stayed for 3 days 2 Night. According to per day price.. Resort is not that great. We stayed in Room No. 309 whose bathroom drain was clogged.. even after informing the staff issue was not resolved.
Breakfast provided not that good.. had dead mosquito in Dosa and hair in chutney..
Also alot of mosquitoes in room..'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Good Hotel to stay in North Goa without Breakfast‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'This is one amongst the best located hotel on main road across Candolim to stay and visit beaches in North Goa. Most of the ABC Beaches in North Goa are in closed proximity to this hotel along with famous restaurants & bars as well. Breakfast is not that good and can be avoided. The swimming pool is small in size and is used rarely by travellers. Cleanliness is good and hygenic & hotel staff are pretty much helpful and courteous.'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Smelly rooms and rude staff‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The rooms are really smelly. Staff Donot care about your stay. It would be the worst experience if you choose this place. I had stay for 5+ nights and it was a nightmare. Please stay away for your own good!'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It is a very old property, lot of defects in the rooms. I stayed in Executive suite but No charging point was working there. Booked for two nights but due to defects I had to change room twice.'}, {'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'ok‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Location is only plus point. No pool maintenance. Only South indian breakfast daily. Pathetic service.'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': "Don't stay‚Äù", 'Review_Body': 'Pool is so small
It is like bath tub
There was no garden
Hotel staff is very care less
'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Money dimande extra after booking by hotel members‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Money dimande extra after booking at the time check in'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Best for vegetarian family ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Room are good and clean. Best hotel under 3.5k budget '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': "Reception not 'well' studied..‚Äù", 'Review_Body': 'One of the reception staff told me the breakfast is free. Was billed. Her answer without proper verification of files was very bad.'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Property needs renovation‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Breakfast excellent 
Swimming pool not usable condition
Rooms rusted iron pillars, Luke warm water in mornings, loose fittings in bathroom'}]

details:
{'Location': 'Vainguinim Valley, Dona Paula, Dona Paula, Goa, India, 403 004', 'overall_rating': '7.6', 'Name': 'Sandalwood Hotel & Suites', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '4.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Not worth it ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "First no lift, they have given me fourth floor and we asked to give them below but they didn't provide it though there were many rooms empty.
There were no body wash, toothpaste ect.
They have given expired jam in the breakfast.
Overall worst experience."}, {'Review_Rating': '4.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Remote location, detached from all sorts of external facilities if own vehicles are not available.  Advertised pictures of the hotel and facilities are not the same as actuals. Food is very tasty though highly priced. Staff behaviour is ok.'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'The hotel stay  is value for money! ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Except  the food taste that we did not like, all other things in the hotel, the staff, the rooms and the facilities are good at the price we booked. The sea is just a few minutes walking from the hotel. You would need a vehicle on hire to navigate beyond the hotel if you need to buy small things for daily use. Worth a sty without doubt! '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good budget hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Staff is extremely courteous and helpful, buffet breakfast is good, on demand items are also available, which is a plus. Only problem is its location, located below the vanquilium valley, a small stretch of beach which is shared with 3 other hotels is available for accessing, but there's no seating arrangement nor a shack to have food or drinks. You have to have a car to reach any nearest beach to unwind or chill. Pool was inaccessible due to chlorine spreading. You can't have any view from room. Rooms are big no doubt, we stayed in suites, which were big enough for a house party."}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Overall Good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Overall Good'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Good hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It is a good hotel near to the beach however following are the key points to note before selecting this property  
1.   Food options are limited 
2.  You will not have food options and facilities at the beach 

I will still recommend to use this property for stay in Goa '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Great staff‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good location '}, {'Review_Rating': '4.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Stay at Sandalwood‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Day 1, the bar is unattented, in the evening there is again no on at the bar, the bar guy then says ur not allowed to come in to order as we were in the pool
Day 4 before checkout, we had requested for spa service the lady a day before said we will get the service it turned out to be a closed day for the spa the nxt day n we were uninformed, Bikes given for local travelling were pathetic and even pricey for that condition'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Way past its Glory Days‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Needs upkeep, needs refurbishment, needs a better trained staff. This place is slowly turning to seed. 
The furniture is ageing, the AC in my room was an ON-OFF affair - no controls were operational. The restaurants and bar were desolated. I saw nobody there in the 3 days I was there. The Reception Area is cramped and you start feeling dissapointed from that moment on. '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Relaxed location‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'First of all good place to stay with family and felt like home. I took penthouse for 2 nights and stay was excellent. 
Pros:
* Hotel is located outside and close to beach. The beach is 100 meter from hotel and clean location with less crowd. Spend whole evening with family on beach. This shore is shared by multiple luxury hotels.
* 10min drive to Panjim city and close to all the Old Goa tourist spot.
*Rooms are excellent and the staffs are very good.
  Cons :
* Little costly on all
* no lifts
* no parking '}, {'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Unpleasant experience ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Do not trust this hotel. I had booked multiple room online for a wedding and the hotel cancelled the room in the last moment without asking me. Then they asked for credit card info and full payment before I arrived for all rooms which I gave them then the hotel was trying to use my card online or given out my credit card details where I had a unknown transaction attempt online for huge cost. Hotel management did not care when explained it to them, not even a sorry. The reply was they are allowed to cancel booking at anytime and I can‚Äôt do anything about it. These guys are frauds. Do not book this hotel. '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'No transfers available ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'All the websites said an airport shuttle was available, but this is not true. '}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'No shuttle bus‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I booked this hotel as I was told there was a shuttle bus, but unfortunately not'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The staff are very attentive, check in was a breeze. The restaurant has a variety of food, breakfast buffet was good, I had fresh pancakes each morning.  Beds are very comfortable. 
There is a pool with a small area for babies, a pool table and separate bar area.  
A 4 minute walk  from the property is a cove with small beach, the property has some sun beds with umbrellas. There is a hotel security guard with the beds so that you can leave your stuff and enter the sea if you wish.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and would recommend.'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Pathetic service and staff... not even spoon or knife offered with bread butter.. ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Pathetic service and staff... not even spoon or knife offered with bread butter.. They expect us to apply butter with fingers or with what '}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Stayed for 5 days for Business Purpose‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I had booked for a Double Premium room through Agoda and when I checked in Sandalwood provided me with a Double Standard room (I did not know that the room was Standard untill i saw the room). After seeing the size of the room, i informed the manager that this was not what i had booked. But he claimed that what he had given me was indeed Premium room (but it was actually Standard room). Then I had to show him the images listed in Agoda to show the difference between Premium and standard. He tried to justify saying it was a mistake in Agoda website. Then I showed him the same room differences in other websites like makemytrip and expedia and he agreed finally. And after long session of convincing I got my desired room. 

Overall not a very happy experience. '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone. The staff were very friendly. The room and amenities were very clean. The food was of excellent quality.  Breakfast included was definitely the way to go.  The pool (although being renovated while I was there) was lovely.  They offered pool service at neighbouring property.  A very close walk to the beach. The only issue was the distance from the main town - this cost $17 aud a day to get in and back.  If you just want to relax and not do much then this place is perfect. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Just Awesome !!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Just Awesome !!'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Decent place, but with some serious defects‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "The location is far from the good beaches or any facilities. The rooms were fine, but the attention to customer needs are terrible. One the first night, my room had no hot water. I called the reception and nobody picked up the phone. Seems that you can't get anybody's attention late at night. I was forced to shower with cold water. The next day I complained 3 times before they turned the hot water on. At the 3rd time, I stayed in the room with the maintenance folks to ensure they did their jobs. WTF? The next day, they turned the water OFF till 1pm for maintenance work. Which bloody moron turns off water to the guests' rooms in the morning when the guests are washing up to prepare for the day? I was pissed. To make things worse, I and 2 others in our group had food poisoning at their restaurant, which made me sick for 3 days. One of the dishes tasted strangely sour, and when we asked the waiter, he claimed it was supposed to be sour. Turns out the dish has turned bad. Bloody idiots!!!"}], 'price': '3,999', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/187128/3172479/07729eeadc1e5a402514062becf3b3a5.jpg?ca=17&ce=1&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '50m¬≤', 'amenities': ['Garden view', 'Balcony/terrace', 'Non-smoking', 'Shower', 'Kitchenette', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Hair dryer', 'Toiletries', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Satellite/cable channels', 'Telephone', 'Air conditioning', 'Blackout curtains', 'Fan', 'Slippers', 'Wake-up service', 'Coffee/tea maker', 'Free bottled water', 'Microwave', 'Mini bar', 'Refrigerator', 'Daily housekeeping', 'Desk', 'Seating area', 'Separate dining area', 'Closet', 'Ironing facilities', 'In-room safe box', 'Laptop safe box'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/sandalwood-hotel-retreat/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&tspTypes=1&los=1&searchrequestid=0a976578-dc30-400c-9670-434a4700defb'}
Location: Vainguinim Valley, Dona Paula, Dona Paula, Goa, India, 403 004
Name: Sandalwood Hotel & Suites

details:
{'Location': 'H No 4/254/B Near Calangute Beach, Behind Idbi Atm Goa, Calangute, Goa, India, 403516', 'overall_rating': 'Select your room', 'Name': 'FabHotel Prime Sarala Crown', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Very nice rooms ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very nice large rooms and plenty of space to put luggage. Bed sheets and towels are clean.
Breakfast is good for local Indians but can be improved for foreigners. There was only the one same fruit everyday. Staff are helpfull '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'amazing property in main market‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'it is best place to stay.you will get all facilities from this hotel.breakfast is super.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice hotel ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Great location
Great room '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Value for money‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Hotel location is very nice. Staff is polite and helpfull. Breakfast spread is good. Good place to stay.'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Will not recommend this hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "My family and my friend's family travelled from Pune to Goa and stayed in FabHotel Prime Sarala Crown for one night and overall, we didn't have good experience. The most plus of hotel is location and negatives can be understood from our below experience:
- No water was available in bathroom in morning (both room)
- We were looking for a glass of milk for our daughter in morning, it was hard to get it as their main restaurant was closed until 12pm
- Their reception phone got dead in night and from night to until next morning, we had to go down to reception every time for anything
- In my friend's room, AC was also not working
- In breakfast, there was no fruit/salad available until I asked and then they brought only watermelon pieces
"}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Power outage in night and mosquito bite will not letting you sleep '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent Choice to stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'This hotel is exceptional. All facilities, location etc are very good. My choice is not disappointing. In house restaurant is very nice. Taste is exceptional. Location is the biggest advantage. Also, swimming pool is really good especially for children. I strongly recommend this. Only thing is, I feel tariff can be little lesser.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Rooms are good..nice location.. ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Rooms are clean..staff co operative..very near to beach..breakfast can be improved lot..very limited items available and taste also not upto the mark.. slightly overpriced ..got it at 5000per one night'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Fare Price for Fab Location‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Yep. The Location is the plus point of this Hotel.If you want to stay near to Baga or exactly in Calangute definitely this is the place.
The rooms are very spacious.I read some reviews stating the rooms are tiny.Truyst me the Rooms are spacious enough for a couple + 2 children. The Superior category has sofa cum bed as well which is again very comfortable. Breakfast is below average and needs lot of improvement. Breakfast timings also should be preponed to at least to start from 7:30. The pool is just 3-4 Feet but very clean and kids can have a good time. Delhi Darbar restaurant which is located at ground floor has good options for veg and Non Veg. Please note that if you want to get your rooms cleaned then inform before 5:00 P.M. After 5 they don't entertain the same which they didn't mention during check-in as well. With all these improvements the hotel can be easily rated 5.Overall if you ask is the place recommended ,then Yes is my Answer."}, {'Review_Rating': '2.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Waste‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Staff not good, room small, money waste, food and resturant good and like only
'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Real Good Hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Checking very Easy and Simple.. Done in 5 Mins

Room clean / big and fantastic. Absolutely same as the photos

Location Perfect.. Just near Calagunte beach Road. But just inside not to have the sound or the busy road.. 

Breakfast - On the 5 th Floor not a resturant, but good break fast every day is different. Also can get everything Hot, some times might have to wait 5 Mins

Cleanliness - Good House Keep.. Asked for additional soap and towels and was given in short time with ni fuss

Staff - Very Helpful and Nice.. 

Overall 4 rating as none can be a perfect 5'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Great Property, Helpful Staff‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good location, well furnished and spacious rooms, nice staff, value for money.
Breakfast variety and dining ambience could be improved.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Prime Location in the heart of Calangute market ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Everything easily accessible and polite and active  staff. 
Special request were fulfilled. reviews:
[{'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Very nice rooms ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very nice large rooms and plenty of space to put luggage. Bed sheets and towels are clean.
Breakfast is good for local Indians but can be improved for foreigners. There was only the one same fruit everyday. Staff are helpfull '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'amazing property in main market‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'it is best place to stay.you will get all facilities from this hotel.breakfast is super.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice hotel ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Great location
Great room '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Value for money‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Hotel location is very nice. Staff is polite and helpfull. Breakfast spread is good. Good place to stay.'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Will not recommend this hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "My family and my friend's family travelled from Pune to Goa and stayed in FabHotel Prime Sarala Crown for one night and overall, we didn't have good experience. The most plus of hotel is location and negatives can be understood from our below experience:
- No water was available in bathroom in morning (both room)
- We were looking for a glass of milk for our daughter in morning, it was hard to get it as their main restaurant was closed until 12pm
- Their reception phone got dead in night and from night to until next morning, we had to go down to reception every time for anything
- In my friend's room, AC was also not working
- In breakfast, there was no fruit/salad available until I asked and then they brought only watermelon pieces
"}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Power outage in night and mosquito bite will not letting you sleep '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent Choice to stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'This hotel is exceptional. All facilities, location etc are very good. My choice is not disappointing. In house restaurant is very nice. Taste is exceptional. Location is the biggest advantage. Also, swimming pool is really good especially for children. I strongly recommend this. Only thing is, I feel tariff can be little lesser.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Rooms are good..nice location.. ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Rooms are clean..staff co operative..very near to beach..breakfast can be improved lot..very limited items available and taste also not upto the mark.. slightly overpriced ..got it at 5000per one night'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Fare Price for Fab Location‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Yep. The Location is the plus point of this Hotel.If you want to stay near to Baga or exactly in Calangute definitely this is the place.
The rooms are very spacious.I read some reviews stating the rooms are tiny.Truyst me the Rooms are spacious enough for a couple + 2 children. The Superior category has sofa cum bed as well which is again very comfortable. Breakfast is below average and needs lot of improvement. Breakfast timings also should be preponed to at least to start from 7:30. The pool is just 3-4 Feet but very clean and kids can have a good time. Delhi Darbar restaurant which is located at ground floor has good options for veg and Non Veg. Please note that if you want to get your rooms cleaned then inform before 5:00 P.M. After 5 they don't entertain the same which they didn't mention during check-in as well. With all these improvements the hotel can be easily rated 5.Overall if you ask is the place recommended ,then Yes is my Answer."}, {'Review_Rating': '2.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Waste‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Staff not good, room small, money waste, food and resturant good and like only
'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Real Good Hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Checking very Easy and Simple.. Done in 5 Mins

Room clean / big and fantastic. Absolutely same as the photos

Location Perfect.. Just near Calagunte beach Road. But just inside not to have the sound or the busy road.. 

Breakfast - On the 5 th Floor not a resturant, but good break fast every day is different. Also can get everything Hot, some times might have to wait 5 Mins

Cleanliness - Good House Keep.. Asked for additional soap and towels and was given in short time with ni fuss

Staff - Very Helpful and Nice.. 

Overall 4 rating as none can be a perfect 5'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Great Property, Helpful Staff‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good location, well furnished and spacious rooms, nice staff, value for money.
Breakfast variety and dining ambience could be improved.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Prime Location in the heart of Calangute market ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Everything easily accessible and polite and active  staff. 
Special request were fulfilled. '}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Average Hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I went to hotel with family, but hotel denied to provide free breakfast to kids, and charged Rs. 150.00 per head for the kids, I have never seen this type of arrangement in other hotels.'}]

{'Location': "Pinto's Waddo, Candolim Bardez, Candolim, Goa, India, 403515", 'overall_rating': '7', 'Name': 'Silver Sands Hideaway Hotel', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Reasonable ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'This hotel is lovely and quiet 
Public areas are a little neglected but the room was huge and the bed very comfortable 
Reasonably clean in the bedroom 
Whole place looks like it needs a facelift but we did enjoy the stay 
Staff were kind and helpful too'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Beautiful rooms with Amazing swimming pool'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Okay stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I paid for Breakfast during booking through Agoda but when I checked in hotel staff said breakfast will not be provided.

'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Reception staff was rough '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Amazing stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nice location, helpful staff, good rooms and value for money.'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Complimentary benfits‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'One of staff is very rude, because of him entire hotel image is going to down as he was literally checking the room for 1 single water bottle.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Great Location‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Located near condolim beach, condolim and calangute are at walking distance. '}, {'Review_Rating': '2.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Average ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Bad service poor breakfast n overall average experience.. nothing value for money '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Hotel is ok but services could be much better‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Room we stayed is good. But room services are not great. Sheets are not changed for 2 days stay. Cleaning is done after we called couple of times to the room service. (Sheets not changed though). They dont even replace your daily complimentary water bottles. From second day they send you a jug of water and cut on bottles. 
Location is good.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Lovely location and helpful staff '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Best hotel overall‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "One thing holds this hotel back- It's a bit dated.
Everything else that is important to me is 100%   Comfort of bed, shower, pool area, friendly staff, away from main drag and i paid very low price at Agoda.
FANTASTIC "}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good location, hygienic conditions, polite and supportive staff.  '}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Not sufficient parking‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Lots of issue with Parking area. '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Hotel Silver Sand Hideaway‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very good stay for every age group people with nice, comfortable stay and affordable prices.
You get large and clean rooms with each and every amenities in the room.
You also get private balcony and a common but very good swimming pool '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Couple stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I had a weekend stay. Rooms are clean and services are very good. The hotel staff is very friendly and quick services. '}, {'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': '3rd class service‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We choose not go with the recent review given on other websites which had average of 2.5 stars and booked this property. Disappointment begun when we reached hotel and waited almost 30 minutes to see someone at reception. Final receptionist arrived and alloted us room. At 4pm same day called room service and found no one on the other hand to receive call and ended up
'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Not a good option‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We reached hotel late at night which was already communicated while booking through Agoda and there was no one at reception. One housekeeping guy received us and he was not aware of the room to be given. He was checking AC, linen of all the room and the one given to us was full of mosquitoes and washroom was not cleaned in recent days. Finally after checking for 2 hours, one room was prepared and linens was changed then can spend the night
 This property was closed and has re-opened recently without proper cleaning and repairing. This was discussed with property manager and he was kind enough and assured that these feedback will help them to improve'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Awful Stay!!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "I trusted the brand 'SILVER SANDS' as I have already stayed with them in Andamans, and had a pretty decent experience, but this one was a hell of pain. 
For the starter, it took them 2 full days to provide us with the shampoo. In fact, the people working here didn't even know how to read 'shampoo' on a bottle, every time they'd come up with body lotion or body wash bottles, telling us they might be shampoo bottles.
Secondly, the wifi wasn't at all stable there, and when we checked, the router in the room was not even connected.
The kettle they provided was stained with coffee, and when we mentioned the same, the guy told us that coffee stains don't leave, FUNNY.
The pillows they gave us, trust me, you might be having better ones at your home than theirs.
And I can go on and on.
And yes, I couldn't leave the hotel on the first-day coz it was peak time, and didn't have much options to hop around which could fit our budget."}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Value for Money‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Hotel is good, staff is very polite and cooperative. Mr. Sagar is helpful. 
Rooms are spacious with double bed, 2 chairs, study table, and small balcony. Bathroom is also spacious and clean. 
Hotel restaurant is good and they provide breakfast in package but only negative is restaurant is located in adjacent building (hotel silver sands serenity). They provide room service from restaurant for dinner. 
Location of hotel is very good, in Proper Candolim, 2 mins from main road (candolim-calangute).  Candolim beach is about 1 km. So it‚Äôs nicely connected yet far from calangure /bagha chaos. '}, {'Review_Rating': '4.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Single staff maintaining the property‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The cleanliness, staff service, and facilities were pathetic. Never recommend this property to any traveller'}], 'price': '3,619', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/292/292588/292588_120106171325099.jpg?ca=13&ce=1&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '25m¬≤', 'amenities': ['City view', 'Balcony/terrace', 'Non-smoking', 'Shower', 'Internet access ‚Äì wireless', 'Satellite/cable channels', 'Air conditioning', 'Mini bar', 'Desk', 'Closet', 'Ironing facilities'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/silver-sands-hideaway-hotel/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&los=1&searchrequestid=0a976578-dc30-400c-9670-434a4700defb'}

details:
{'Location': '415/G Opposite Holiday Inn Resort, Mobor Cavelossim Salcete, Cavelossim, Goa, India, 403731', 'overall_rating': '7.8', 'Name': 'Hills Den Guest House', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Decent Stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Book this hotel only if u have ur own vehicle. 
There are buses from Madgao bus stand to Holiday Inn. (just a suggestion if u want to save some of ur expense) 

Pros:
1. I booked Standard Room, decent stay with basic amenities like bed, 1 cupboard, mirror, bathroom
2. Polite staff and very good food( Paneer tikka, kadhai paneer, jeera rice, veg pulao, parathe, egg biryani) at reasonable price. 
3. You will get water bottles everyday
4. If you ask to change the towels, they do it

Cons:
1. No hot water till 9 am and sometimes the water clogged in bathroom...... TV dint work
2. If you ask to clean the room, they wont...... nobody was rude but they never returned after saying yes
3. The hotel is at extreme end near mobor beach and 10 mins from cavelossim there is jungle area, so you wont get many commute options, you have to hire cab which did cost us 1400 one way till madgao
'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Friendly and cooperative staff. 3kms from the Cavelossim beach. Overall a decent place to stay. '}], 'price': '2,400', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/29386969/-1/b2c823b2b2bf56923c4dcfcbffba3d57.jpg?ce=0&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '0', 'amenities': ['Bathrobes', 'Mirror', 'Towels', 'TV [flat screen]', 'Air conditioning', 'Fan', 'Window'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/hills-den-guest-house/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&los=1&searchrequestid=0a976578-dc30-400c-9670-434a4700defb'}

Rajbagh beach nearest... "}, {'Review_Rating': '3.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Lift is not working.
And room given at third floor'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Staff is very polite ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'For the people who love clean, peace environment. Staff is polite humble.'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Budget stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "The property is good for someone looking for a budget stay. The location was good withing walkable distance of beach...
Rooms were near and regularly cleaned.
Staff at the hotel is friendly.
Property Lack Facilites completely, even restaurant isn't operational, but there are couple of restaurants nearby and they also provide delivery to the hotel."}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Above average‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Not a good place for breakfast. '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Torn blankets and no toiletries provided other than small soap & shampoo.
Rooms are clean.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good experience‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good resort at very good locality'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'perfect stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': '‚Ä¢nice location adjacent to national highway
‚Ä¢close to patnem beach
‚Ä¢rooms are so cozy for couples
‚Ä¢good breakfast
‚Ä¢staff is very helpful'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The place and the people here are so friendly and kind. We loved our stay here so much that we decided to come back and stay here a day after our stay. 5 ‚≠ê'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Not Good Hotel '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nyc stay'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice property but in outskirts of palolem ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Property is nice but it was missing functional intercom, lift wasn't working . Although south goa is more silent then north goa, but this hotel is right on highway, south of palolem and patnem beach due to this it's very much secluded. Not much shops or anything around it. One can gate similar property close to palolem beach area, where there is some hustle and bussel(not like north goa) . But if you get this resort, staff was able to help us with scooters. By scooter it's 5min to palolem market and beach area.  I would recommend this property l, if you are looking for absoule peace else try getting something closer to palolem area.
