{'Location': 'Plot No. 1208-A, Anna Waddo, Candolim, Bardez Goa, Candolim, Goa, India, 403515', 'overall_rating': 'Select your room', 'Name': 'FabHotel Royal Mirage', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Big Rooms-Less Options for breakfast‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Finding hotel is difficult as they don't have any nameplates or directions from main road entry. Recommended for group or family for Big rooms"}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice and good accommodations‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nice and good accommodations with good and very helpful staff.'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Near to beach- 2 km‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Hotel has access to all good amenities near by and quite place. It is easy to check in and check out. Apart from that hotel staff is cool too.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Superb‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Room spaces very much.
Breakfast is much better.
Staff is very nice person.
Washroom  is very clean.'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Average'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Services ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Rooms was bad & service with breakfast was not good and specially I don't  recommend for family and couples.... stay away "}, {'Review_Rating': '3.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Not pleasant ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "There was cockroach in the bathtub and when we asked to manager to get it clean and try to give us different room. We gave the keys for cleaning our room and bathtub to the manager in noon and when we returned at night, it was the worst. Room was not cleaned and cockroach was still floating in the bathtub. Upon asking him, he said staff had cleaned it and i didn't check. Manager was very rude and was not ready to accept the mistake. He himself forgot to ask his staff to clean the room. It was the worst experience for us.."}, {'Review_Rating': '3.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Deceptive pictures‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'A poorly maintained swimming pool.No location signages.Stinky rooms.Old towels.Poor maintenance.Poor management.Pictures are deceptive.Overall not worth.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Awesome Hotel ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The hotel is located very near to all beaches. The rooms are very spacious. The breakfast spread is also good. Swimming pool is okay for children. Staff is very courteous and always smiling. The owner is very caring and humble. '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Facilities could be better ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The room was spacious, good location but difficult to find hotel in beginning. Staff and owner is friendly but not proactive in service. Breakfast was yummy but could have more options. There was issue with running hot water took a day to fix. But overall it was a pleasant stay.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good service staff is cooperative room is very good '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Hotel royal mirege is very good room good staff coperate staff all well good '}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Above average‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I have booked a suite and would say the room was very spacious.

Room - There are a lot of cockroaches in the room, the rooms are also not clean. 

Breakfast - If you are opting by paying additional amount then I would not recommend as they only serve different types bread for breakfast. One day the breakfast was bread omlet'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Irresponsible staff‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Main door borken lock. Least bothered to look into the matter.
Water bottles - broken seal, when asked they said it filter water and safe.
Power cut - staff least bothered to switch on generator until asked. 
Cleanliness, what's that?

Spacious rooms, I give you that Fab Hotels.

Definitely not recommended nor will visit again."}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': "Worst experience. Please please don't go‚Äù", 'Review_Body': 'We booked this hotel on Diwali vacation. We booked thier suit room. It was worst experience so far. Worst staff, no hygiene, no cleaning. Hotel is all dirty, AC was not working, tab is not working'}, {'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'not worth ...breakfast is poor 
lift was not working ..'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Not value for money‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Photos on Agoda website includes photos of swimming pool, gym but these facilities are not available.
In 2 days stay TV was not working on any day.
Hotels doors were closed during night and staff was awake to open the door. On 1 night we were standing outside hotel for 1 and half hour.
Towels were not kept in room though these were provided on demand.
As conclusion overall it was not value for money.'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Worst hotel in goa‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "They don't serve breakfast buffet, they don't change linen after request also, no hot water, in my room safe is also not working and there is no safety we can't lock the door from inside."}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Absolute cheaters ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'They changed our booking to Fabhotel ocean view apartment stating all amenities are same , charged more , There was  no food service,  wifi and staff was unhelpful'}], 'price': '3,790', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/12259616/-1/5b83f8e515d0f9b4f75606be6b55f6c0.jpg?ca=10&ce=1&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '180m¬≤', 'amenities': ['Free Wi-Fi', 'Mirror', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Telephone', 'TV', 'Air conditioning', 'Daily newspaper', 'Fan', 'Free bottled water', 'Fire extinguisher'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/fabhotel-royal-mirage/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&tspTypes=9,-1&los=1&searchrequestid=0a976578-dc30-400c-9670-434a4700defb'}
Location: Plot No. 1208-A, Anna Waddo, Candolim, Bardez Goa, Candolim, Goa, India, 403515

'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good place to stay & clean rooms'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Satisfied ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Wasn't that great an experience... But would recommend "}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good hotel but greediness of the staff caused me an extra money which i felt very unfortunate. '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Very Good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I had stayed 3 days in this hotel. It was a great stay and Pool is also very clean and well maintained, only this is Breakfast which is not that good.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice Property and VFM‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Its located at ideal place. Rooms and bathroom not too clean, but considering price its ok. I stayed for 1 night after my stay at some other property, as i had to just sleep for that night for few hrs and had to catch early mrng flight...
If you are looking to stay in budget, then its perfect property. '}, {'Review_Rating': '3.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Not worth‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Not worth'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Location of this hotel is good but service is very poor‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Hotel look is good from outside only.  
Room lights was poor.
Food quality is very worst.
Towels was provided alternative day.'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Hotel is not clean. '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'The rooms are old and cleanliness is less . ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Its budget friendly. But rooms are old . Some switches are not working. Bathroom is not neat. 
The swimming pool is neat and good. Food is average.

It‚Äôs not a bad selection but need to compromise with the cleaniness and bathromm nearness.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'All facilities are awesome...in prime location...near to beach ...10 mins away...
Bfast was ok ...
Rooms are good 
Staff is very friendly n helpful .
Only complaint was landline was not working...AC plug point a little loose connection '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It was a good stay and food was also nice'}]

details:
{'Location': '1435 kannaikwada Pemem, Morjim, Goa, India, 403512', 'overall_rating': 'Select your room', 'Name': 'Turtle Beach Resort - Morjim', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Great location and good value for money!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "It's a decent property located about a km away from the Morjim beach.
There's a taxi rental right outside the property which is an added advantage.
Staff are friendly but are not that hospitable..
Rooms are decent size and clean.
Breakfast can have some more variety, dosa everyday as standard should be changed and sambar should not be sweet..
Rest a good value for money.."}, {'Review_Rating': '2.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Not value for money‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Not recommended. Cleanliness, Room facilities needs improvement.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good hotel in good pocket friendly budget‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Recommended.'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'property over all is really great, food options limited though and the accessibility for cabs is not good , if available too costly . '}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'stay was comfortable. Breakfast area and pool was crowded and clumsy and perhaps not the ambience family with kids or couples looking for. Spreads were also not upto the mark. definitely not the standards of lemon tree.'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Pretty average hotel on every front‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "The cleanliness was pathetic. The room service plates were not even taken after 1 day. The breakfast spread was poor, it was not at all tasty. Don't recommend this hotel at all."}, {'Review_Rating': '4.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very average hotel,  Food is just ok, not worth the cost.'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Fair review‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'On the web location shows 5.5 km from baga beach but actually it is 15 km far and take 45 min by bike to reach baga beach and very internal location.I made online booking and when i reach all the room were occupied and  either way they provide rooms.Hotel staff,food quality and other amenities are good.In my conclusion not preffered property but optional.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Amazing hotel @ Morjim‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Great location, really pleasant and clean rooms, but the thing that makes this such a good place to stay are the staff. All of the people are incredibly helpful and generous with their time and advice.

Thanks for making our visit to Florence that much better.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Value for the money you spent‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I liked overall stay at Red Fox. But they need to improve certain things like, Providing Closed Cupboards in the room, providing basic Toiletries and finally food in the restaurant. The Cleanliness is Top-Notch. Staff are very courteous. Room Service is prompt. Location is average. beach is walkable distance. Most importantly the view of the stadium from my room is lovely. I enjoyed football and Kabaddi matches in the afternoon from my room along with a cold beer when it was hot outside.'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Decent hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': '10 minutes drive from Morjim beach. Hotel is good and clean. Rooms are good,but small. Staff is excellent, helpful and pleasant. Suggest having a travel desk, so that someone can advise tourists about the local places to visit, around Morjim and ashvem beach.'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It doesent seems like its a Lemon Tree hotel . Its a local 3 star category hotel where light goes no of times and backup comes after u call.
Location is in village and food dont have much option and quality was not good.

No cupboards in room
Beds are small
'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Average hotel in Morjim area.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'This is a average hotel situated in Morjim area. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Fantastic experience ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Hotel was soo good and staff was excellent. Chef santosh made sure we won‚Äôt miss our home food. Reception staff was too helpful. Overall very good experience would definitely come back again.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The staff was cordial and the facilities are excellent. Breakfast buffet is awesome.'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Full review 4 days Stay!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Got this Hotel at a very good rate from Agoda.
Was upgraded to Supreme Category on arrival. Rooms are clean and spacious. 
Room Service is top notch! Pool is well maintained. Wifi was working perfectly fine.
Negatives: 
They don't have closets to keep the clothes. Just open space with few hangers. Balcony was made Lil dirty by pigeons!
Due to festivals ongoing...there is loud music blaring from just 50 mts away ..sure to ruin your vacation.
Limited options in breakfast. Mobile network is not great.
Laundary is too costly! They charge ‚Çπ160 for a single t-shirt and for pant ‚Çπ350!"}, {'Review_Rating': '4.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Not so good location in October‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Its at a remote location. No activities or any good arrtactions near by beaches.
If you want some thing to enjoy you have to go to Baga beach or Calungute beach. 
Better to take the rooms or hotel near those places even its slightly expensive.
Because if you want tk go from Red fox hotel to those places it will cost min 1000 by taxi. No other mode of conveyance. Taxi people charge as per the rate card pri ted by them. You cant bring any other taxi also. 
Hotel doesn't help to support in finding near by attractions and also no help in taxi services.
Its a totally waste hotel for its location.
One good thing is Rooms are neat and clean. But no hot water. No one to respond to your requests."}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The best time to visit this place is only when the hotels around calangute and Baga are jamm packed. This is far from the Baga and anjuna. You will spend a lot in travelling from here to the major destinations and not save. Location and the transportation is the only issue. Rest hotel is a decent property staff is accommodating. They only told me about the cheap trick regarding bus that ply from here to Baga but it comes on hourly frequency. And costs only 30 rs '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Great ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Maintenance was so good.
Customer service was also very good.
Room was clean and hygiene. Great experience at affordable price.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'nice place‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'hotel is neat and clean,  highly recommended '}], 'price': '3,262', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/506/5060225/5060225_18061514500066238896.jpg?ca=0&ce=1&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '20m¬≤', 'amenities': ['Non-smoking', 'Shower', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Accessible toilet', 'Additional bathroom', 'Additional toilet', 'Hair dryer', 'Mirror', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Pool facilities', 'Satellite/cable channels', 'Telephone', 'Air conditioning', 'Blackout curtains', 'Daily newspaper', 'Fan', 'Linens', 'Slippers', 'Wake-up service', 'Coffee/tea maker', 'Free bottled water', 'Mini bar', 'Refrigerator', 'Desk', 'Seating area', 'Separate dining area', 'Trash cans', 'Closet', 'Clothes dryer', 'Clothes rack', 'Ironing facilities', 'Sewing kit', 'Baby safety gates', 'Fire extinguisher', 'First aid kit', 'In-room safe box', 'Locker', 'Smoke detector'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/red-fox-hotel-morjim-goa-by-lemon-tree-hotels/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&tspTypes=4&los=1&searchrequestid=0a976578-dc30-400c-9670-434a4700defb'}

{'Location': 'Dr. Constancio Maschrans, River View, Arpora, Baga, Goa, India, 403518', 'overall_rating': '8.6', 'Name': 'La Sunila Suites', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Good and Comfortable stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The staff were very welcoming, especially the gentleman that was at the reception desk the 1st two days, Breakfast was what you would expect with spread of south Indian/north Indian and choice of eggs, two pools attached to the property with a cozy little bar attached to one.'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Worst place to stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Ignorance ignorance. Lot of carelessness. I suggest you don‚Äôt pick this hotel ever '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Value for Money!!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Staff were always helpful & friendly. In regards to cleanliness & services, it was amazing at this reasonable cost. There is small game zone with multiple games which my kid enjoyed a lot. The image shown is of private villa just ahead of the resort but it‚Äôs doesn‚Äôt matter because the internal images were of the resort and we had a pleasant stay!! '}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Review‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The property was clean.. It is worth the price only if booked at4500-5000 rs per night.. staffs were cordial.. food tasted good..'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very nice stay with delicious food.
'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Pleasant budget friendly stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good amenities with pool facilities and good breakfast as well. Very kind and co-operative staff'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Very comfortable stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Property is very good, rooms are little small but maintained very properly
Room amenities could be more better at this price
Overall a good and comfortable stay'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I would just say, if you are looking for good stay near by Baga beach, book your stay with La Sunila Suites. It is perfect combo of location, staff, food quality, cleanliness, facilities, etc‚Ä¶'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'No more kids play area‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Booked this hotel for kids after seeing the pictures of kids play area but it isn't there now.
Staff is very good and hotel/rooms are in good condition."}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Over priced‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Location is near to Baga beach but you can get other good hotels at this price. Better to cross check other hotels. prices for food is over priced almost like 5 star hotel price.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice experience ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It was good staying in La Sunila suites. '}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Value of money ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Stay was good, had mosquito problems in room.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Best Hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Best stay'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Clean Accommodation,
Very Friendly staff,
Quick Service,
Great Ambience,
Swimming Pool, Bar and Game room available for fun time.
All together it's a nice property, well maintained with  good staff and service."}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Visited goa for the first time and I was impressed with the hospitality for this suite. 
Breakfast was good 
Services was on time 
Staff was very friendly and helping
Everything was good '}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'it was good experience apart from renovation work in march ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'it was good experience apart from renovation work in march , a bit far from baga beach but quite place..'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'A decent place to stay ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The location is good. The staff were polite and helpful. Cleanliness is good. There is gym and swimming pool. The food at restaurant is nice. The price was just right. Definitely recommend. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Great place‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Great service, GM Ritesh is very helpful, awesome food,'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Best value for money‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'This is the best place to stay if u are looking something to stay near Bhaga beach. Thought not pocket friendly but whatever u spend is value for money.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very pleasant stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We had a very pleasant stay here and the staffs were really courteous. details:
{'Location': 'H.No 6/281C Khobra Vaddo, Near to Titos lane or Ronil Hotel Calangute, Bardez, Goa, Baga, Goa, India, 403516', 'overall_rating': 'Select your room', 'Name': 'Villa Fatima Comfort', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Worst ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Don't ever come to this hotel! 
This is worse than a dharam shala. This hotel room should be worth 500rs max because of the standard of the room they provide, something i faced when i was staying in the hotel was: 
1) No service, there is only one staff member who is there and he only watches movies on his phone.
2) Service is so poor that they didn't provide us with blankets also, after asking they gave us 2 single bed blankets. 
3) I was shocked when i noticed that there was no mirror in the room.
4) The bathroom looks like a public bathroom. The tap was also leaking the whole day. The tiles in the bathroom were also broken.
5) The swimming pool is only for showcase purposes the water in the swimming pool is dirty and insects are breeding in them.
6) No wifi in the room.
7) They didn't even have garbage dustbin in there rooms."}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Good experience ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Smooth check-in. Good experience '}, {'Review_Rating': '2.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'WASTE  OF MONEY.  '}, {'Review_Rating': '3.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Choose another‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "This place needs a few more months to get fixed, that is if they agree that the AC isn't working, the WC is broken, the cabinets have pests roaming around. The receptionist was a decent woman but the rest of the staff was just too adamant and stubborn. You could choose to stay here only if you want a bed to sleep the night away."}], 'price': '1,754', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/32213902/0/337bd3b58293328f3937b9a9d8a87d37.jpg?ce=0&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '0', 'amenities': ['Free Wi-Fi', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Air conditioning'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/villa-fatima-comfort/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&los=1&searchrequestid=0a976578-dc30-400c-9670-434a4700defb'}

details:
{'Location': 'Next to Acacia Hotel, Fort Aguada Road, Candolim Bardez Goa, Candolim, Goa, India, 403515', 'overall_rating': '7.6', 'Name': 'Riva Gold Coast', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '4.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Pathetic hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Hotel doesn't have parking, u have to park your vehicle on road for the whole day and night, they don't take any responsibility of your vehicle, as per cleanliness it's not upto the mark. "}, {'Review_Rating': '3.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Worst stay ever ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'When we first entered room, There was no water supply, No Water heater  during entire stay, No lift was staying in 2nd floor, Small balcony where you can only stand, small swimming pool. Only Hindi channel will be available in TV no other language. '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Decent hotel, Very good location ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "We spent couple of days here. 

Positives:
1. Good location - in between the market and 200-300m from the candolim beach. The beach road is right in front of the hotel gate

2. Good staff
3. Good ambience 
4. Situated in between the market, lots of options for food on the road.

Negatives:
1. Room size is too small.
2. Also, in the breakfast buffet portion size was a concern. The quantity of food prepared wasn't enough, and they took hell lot of time to refill the items.  People had no choice but to have other items or look for something outside.

As an example, poha was prepared for breakfast, it got finished too early. Lot of people were still left to eat. The waiter took half an hour to bring new great poha but that too only a bowl of poha which got vanished in no time. 

We had to eat extra omelette to fill our tummy.

Also, the staff was in a hurry to wrap up the breakfast at 10.30 am.

My rating - 3/5 "}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Best hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Best opportunity '}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Decent !!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Pretty decent hotel with minimal amenities, good staffs and amazing location '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Misleading Photos of Rooms‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The photos available on Agoda site for this hotel were completely misleading. Our trip was ruined because we were forced into staying at a 10x10 room. The room offered for upgrade the next day was also similarly small. The hotel and Agoda website were completely unhelpful. Very misleading photos. '}, {'Review_Rating': '4.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Not comfortable ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Food was good bt rooms were not good '}, {'Review_Rating': '3.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Not a great experience ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Not what is shown and told when you book. It's not that clean. No proper wifi slow staff in short, not a great experience. "}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Good budget 3 star at a good location ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Great room, location and value for money, but low options for Vegetarians in the breakfast buffet, the buffet was passable at best. '}, {'Review_Rating': '4.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Rooms not adequate for 3 star hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Got room near street not able to sleep in sound'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Was convenient location and value for money.  '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Good Property, Great Service‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The staff was kind and provided timely service for in-room food orders, good clean rooms, the location is accessible from popular nearby attractions, Sanjay was very helpful.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Value for money‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Great location, cosy and clean rooms and very hospitable staff '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Decent stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good hotel, helpful staff and beautiful location.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Decent Stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Price is bit too high for the rooms provided. Location is USP; located next to Acacia hotel on the main road and just 6 mins walk from beach. Do not opt for the corridor end rooms provided to us; they are the smallest and inspire of other rooms being available, staff said all rooms are full, whereas rooms were clearly available as staffs were cleaning them. But given the fact that we travelled as friends, it worked for us. Food is okayish, but prompt on service. The pool seen is a baby pool.'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Above average‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Ok..not that exciting '}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Extremely Small Room ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Our Rooms was extremely small I was very disappointed. on top of that it was in the 2nd floors which was really difficult to climb everything. Door lock was broken felt very unsecured all the time. The staff of the hotel is also average. '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Hotel location & ambiance is great. Food is excellent. Staff is polite & attentive. You would not get hot water, we got Luke warm ( more like cold). Overall it‚Äôs value for money.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Overall a great experience ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Overall the hotel was good from every aspect. It was satisfactory stay. Coming to the aspects, the hotel was hygienic enough and the ambience was good. The hotel staff were extremely kind, they helped with early check-in and on the day of check-out they arranged breakfast early than the usual time, kudos to the hotel team. Location of the hotel is at great place, it doesn't feel crowded at all. As we booked this hotel being a couple we felt it was safe and we will definitely recommend for those who are looking for a family/couple kind a hotel.

Ambience:8/10
Staff: 10/10
Hygieni: 9/10
Location: 10/10
Breakfast:8/10
Checkin/checkout: 10/10
"}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Overall a great experience ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Overall the hotel was good from every aspect. It was satisfactory stay. '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Good Property, Great Service‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The staff was kind and provided timely service for in-room food orders, good clean rooms, the location is accessible from popular nearby attractions, Sanjay was very helpful.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Value for money‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Great location, cosy and clean rooms and very hospitable staff '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Decent stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good hotel, helpful staff and beautiful location.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Decent Stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Price is bit too high for the rooms provided. Location is USP; located next to Acacia hotel on the main road and just 6 mins walk from beach. Do not opt for the corridor end rooms provided to us; they are the smallest and inspire of other rooms being available, staff said all rooms are full, whereas rooms were clearly available as staffs were cleaning them. But given the fact that we travelled as friends, it worked for us. Food is okayish, but prompt on service. The pool seen is a baby pool.'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Above average‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Ok..not that exciting '}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Extremely Small Room ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Our Rooms was extremely small I was very disappointed. on top of that it was in the 2nd floors which was really difficult to climb everything. Door lock was broken felt very unsecured all the time. The staff of the hotel is also average. '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Hotel location & ambiance is great. Food is excellent. Staff is polite & attentive. You would not get hot water, we got Luke warm ( more like cold). Overall it‚Äôs value for money.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Overall a great experience ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Overall the hotel was good from every aspect. It was satisfactory stay. Coming to the aspects, the hotel was hygienic enough and the ambience was good. The hotel staff were extremely kind, they helped with early check-in and on the day of check-out they arranged breakfast early than the usual time, kudos to the hotel team. Location of the hotel is at great place, it doesn't feel crowded at all. As we booked this hotel being a couple we felt it was safe and we will definitely recommend for those who are looking for a family/couple kind a hotel.

Ambience:8/10
Staff: 10/10
Hygieni: 9/10
Location: 10/10
Breakfast:8/10
Checkin/checkout: 10/10
"}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Overall a great experience ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Overall the hotel was good from every aspect. It was satisfactory stay. Coming to the aspects, the hotel was hygienic enough and the ambience was good. The hotel staff were extremely kind, they helped with early check-in and on the day of check-out they arranged breakfast early than the usual time, kudos to the hotel team. Location of the hotel is at great place, it doesn't feel crowded at all. As we booked this hotel being a couple we felt it was safe and we will definitely recommend for those who are looking for a family/couple kind a hotel.

"}]

{'Location': 'National Highway 4A, Mollem, Goa, India, 581453', 'overall_rating': '8.1', 'Name': 'Shangri-La Jungle Village Resort', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good place to visit'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'This is a good place to relax away from traffic hazzards‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The resort is good with quality food the staff the manager r really humble n polite only issue was the network even there was no wifi so carry bsnl 2g sim along or else its a cool place to chill with fly '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Wilderness Bliss‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'This is a great escape to the wild!
No network, no wifi, no alcohol - bring your own if you can!
The place is serene! Lot of space and a lot of green! 
'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Best‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'No network
only family '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Best for parties ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'One the best resorts, well suited for Partying..!! Awesome location.
only drawback is mobile netWork , only BSNL is available.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Extremely peaceful and detoxifying resort for families and friends‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "We had a thoroughly relaxed time here. Sorry that I didn't book more than a night. Do plan with families and friends to make it more enjoyable. Some activities were missing due to holidaying staff. But others were good enough for a full day and night. Zip line, kayaking on the lazy stream...indoor games, karaoke and bon fire were all there to cheer you up. The food was also quite healthy and tasty. Staff are extremely helpful. Bathroom was big enough. Rooms are spacious and cozy. Brilliant stay In a long time. Hoping to go there with more people next time.. "}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice place for a weekend getaway‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very clean and beautiful property. Staff is very kind and helpfull. Food is very good. Provide wide range of adventure activities without any extra charges. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nice place and friendly staff.'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The place is unique kind of must visit . Nature lovers would like but little challenging for city based. No wifi or cellular network. Better to have one BSNL connection in case you want to remain connected. Food is good in quantity and quality and not jazzy as of hotels buffet. Outdoor games are dependent on weather and availability of staff. There is definite lack of staff which may ask you to wait long. Overall my experience was good for a day. '}, {'Review_Rating': '4.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Worst experience‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'No wifi no phone to communication worst staff worst welcoming. Bed with lot of marks '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Wonderful peaceful place‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The rooms were clean, they have many entertainment facilities, there is kayaking included. Loved the place '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Fabulous‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nice place to stay. Food is delicious, staff is very cooperative, clam place. The road entry to resort is adventurous. Totally woww.'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Vacation‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Kitchen management and restaurant management could be better. 
 Al-carte menu ordered took for ever to reach the table. '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'It was Christmas vacation time. ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The surrounding and atmosphere is very serene and beautiful.  
The food could have been better planned.  
As south Indians are used to eating white  rice( plain steamed rice) and curds. There was no white rice or curds on all the  4 days of stay
Breakfast was served very late around 9 am and later.  There was no stock of bread and butter on most of the days. Kitchen management could be better planned. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very nice resort..all the facilities are good and staff too..just one thing that there is no network available except BSNL..'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'One of the Best Jungle Resort ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We were 3 families for 2 nights. All the staff were very courteous and friendly.  Food was good and the resort is done up tastefully.  Had great time and it was relaxing. '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Yes'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Above average‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Games room not well maintained, restaurant staff need to coordinate better. The location is fantastic'}], 'price': '5,999', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/5527302/-1/03f0fbe53326036968f885f73163b2e5.jpg?ca=13&ce=1&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '16m¬≤', 'amenities': ['Garden view', 'Balcony/terrace', 'Non-smoking', 'Mirror', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Satellite/cable channels', 'Daily newspaper', 'Fan', 'Linens', 'Free bottled water', 'Free welcome drink', 'Desk'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/shangri-la-jungle-village-resort/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&los=1&searchrequestid=0a976578-dc30-400c-9670-434a4700defb'}

Basic facilities are there in rooms though ACs don't work properly, but servicing stands at 0 as the staff(right from room service, restaurant, pool staff and also reception) is least concerned about the customers need. details:
{'Location': 'Divar Island, Divar, Goa, India, 403403', 'overall_rating': '8.8', 'Name': 'Mercure Goa Devaaya Retreat', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Best place for a family vacation‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Beautiful place..peaceful..serene..I love it and my kids loved it too..'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Every that glitters is not gold ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Can completely skip this. Pictures doesn't do justice to the property. It's very small with hardly any place around"}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Amazing place! ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'This is a hidden beaty in goa. Completely secluded and chilled out. Lots to do the in resort. Good food and very happy memories!'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent for peaceful holiday‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Serene property with calm surrounding, speck and clean rooms and all the resort, food is good though slightly overpriced..overall excellent for peaceful holiday away from noisy places of Goa'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Weekend getaway‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'A beautiful property away from our busy lives. You will need to use the ferry service to reach this location. If is approximately 6 kms from the ferry.

It a place if you would like to be away from all the noise and only listen to birds chirping and river flowing.

The place is extremely peaceful. They have a beautiful bar river facing, an amazing massage salon and finger licking yummy food. The room we choose was river facing, it was clean and the wifi network is also very good.

Their areas of improvement are the pool was extremely dirty and a few places were very dusty.

Overall a great place for a solo traveller, family or a couple.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Awesome place‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'You need a quite place, free from hustle, an awesome view, enjoying nature at its best, Good hospitality, good food, recreational facilities, with a pool and spa.. i recommend this place'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Unclean rooms in a great resort!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Firstly, the front office staff are the worst I have ever seen! They don't know curtosey of greeting the guests!!! 


The rooms are dirty, the rooms are equiped with geyser so you will not get running hot water on tap.

The gym is worst, broken equipments mostly worked out by spiders! 

Call front office for any request and expect for a let down! They don't attend your request on first call. The AC wasn't working and they never addressed it!!!

Coming to restaurant, there are 4 tables with inside seating and AC, so enjoy your semi hot food under rosting sunlight.

Now comming to the best,
- Pool
- The landscaping and exteriors in resort
- The scenic beauty of nature around the resort
"}], 'price': '5,780', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/6180656/-1/a97408491548017794e90a9f8de01be4.jpg?ca=7&ce=1&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '42m¬≤', 'amenities': ['River view', 'Balcony/terrace', 'Shower', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Bathrobes', 'Hair dryer', 'Mirror', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Walk-in shower', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Pool facilities', 'Satellite/cable channels', 'Telephone', 'Air conditioning', 'Blackout curtains', 'Fan', 'Hand sanitizer', 'Private entrance', 'Slippers', 'Soundproofing', 'Wake-up service', 'Coffee/tea maker', 'Free bottled water', 'Mini bar', 'Daily housekeeping', 'Carpeting', 'Desk', 'Seating area', 'Tile/marble flooring', 'Trash cans', 'Wooden/parqueted flooring', 'Closet', 'Clothes rack', 'Ironing facilities', 'Accessible by elevator', 'Accessible by stairs', 'Individual air conditioning', 'In-room safe box', 'Smoke detector'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/mercure-goa-devaaya-retreat/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&los=1&searchrequestid=0a976578-dc30-400c-9670-434a4700defb'}

reviews:
[{'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Best place for a family vacation‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Beautiful place..peaceful..serene..I love it and my kids loved it too..'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Every that glitters is not gold ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Can completely skip this. Pictures doesn't do justice to the property. It's very small with hardly any place around"}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Amazing place! ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'This is a hidden beaty in goa. Completely secluded and chilled out. Lots to do the in resort. Good food and very happy memories!'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent for peaceful holiday‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Serene property with calm surrounding, speck and clean rooms and all the resort, food is good though slightly overpriced..overall excellent for peaceful holiday away from noisy places of Goa'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Weekend getaway‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'A beautiful property away from our busy lives. You will need to use the ferry service to reach this location. If is approximately 6 kms from the ferry.

It a place if you would like to be away from all the noise and only listen to birds chirping and river flowing.

The place is extremely peaceful. They have a beautiful bar river facing, an amazing massage salon and finger licking yummy food. The room we choose was river facing, it was clean and the wifi network is also very good.

Their areas of improvement are the pool was extremely dirty and a few places were very dusty.

Overall a great place for a solo traveller, family or a couple.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Awesome place‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'You need a quite place, free from hustle, an awesome view, enjoying nature at its best, Good hospitality, good food, recreational facilities, with a pool and spa.. i recommend this place'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Unclean rooms in a great resort!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Firstly, the front office staff are the worst I have ever seen! They don't know curtosey of greeting the guests!!! 


The rooms are dirty, the rooms are equiped with geyser so you will not get running hot water on tap.

The gym is worst, broken equipments mostly worked out by spiders! 

Call front office for any request and expect for a let down! They don't attend your request on first call. The AC wasn't working and they never addressed it!!!

Coming to restaurant, there are 4 tables with inside seating and AC, so enjoy your semi hot food under rosting sunlight.

Now comming to the best,
- Pool
- The landscaping and exteriors in resort
- The scenic beauty of nature around the resort
"}]
amenities: ['Balcony/terrace', 'Shower', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Bathrobes', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Walk-in shower', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Satellite/cable channels', 'Air conditioning', 'Fan', 'Slippers', 'Complimentary bottled water', 'Work desk', 'Wooden/parqueted flooring', 'Closet']

1. the food service was very slow but quantity was good. We got food almost after 1.5 hrs after ordering it.
2. Water is not kept in room ..we had to ask for it again n again.

Pros
1.Location is away from tourist places but hotel reception arranged for cab in d early morning too after a short notice at 2 o clock in the night.

I stayed here for more than 5 days. Hospitality, cleanliness, security and safety- all are good. As a solo traveller and someone who travels widely for business and work, i would suggest this hotel for everyone irrespective of the purpose of their visit. '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Reasonable charges with good location‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Hotel is situated on the mumbai goa highway and works out best for people  who are travelling by bus. '}, {'Review_Rating': '2.8', 'Review_Heading': 'VERY VERY BAD SERVICE‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "we had booked 4 beded room,when we got checked in we found Toilet was out side the room and it was common,Bed was wet with urine,smell was comming from room,after complain hotel authority changed the room,wash room was improper,and Toilet flush was not working condition,Tap was damaged,immproper hospitality services , hotel management werent responding to our queries, celling Fans were at an lower length due to which one of us meet with an accident and got major cut on his fingers but their wasn't any proper medical treatment for this
"}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Check in without a second thought‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I checked in for 2 nights in Jan 2020 with my parents to Saiesh International. 
I could locate the hotel v. easily with the help of google map; and I must mention it‚Äôs on the NH Highway close to Mapusa city. 
Vijay who was at the reception received us and ensured our comfort level at all times. 
We were allotted room 406.I must mention the rooms are v. Spacious, neat and clean with AC, Hot water 24/7 through geyser, and a comfortable washroom.
Apart from this room service is really appreciable as they were quick...
They have a restaurant in the hotel which offers sensible hygienic Breakfast, veg & non veg food(v. neat kitchen too). Amazing Tea & Coffee.
Apart from this the watchman a real humble guy who cleans the car for a nominal charge.
I specially thank the GM of the hotel Mr. Prabhu for ensuring the guests are provided with best services.
I highly recommend this hotel to every traveller who opts to visit in and around Mapusa Goa... '}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Barely Adequate‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Decent staff, and that's about it -- totally unsuitable for the foot traveller, being on the main Goa-Mumbai Highway; basic rooms, insanely early checkout time (9am, though equally early checkin time of 11am), which suited just fine, in this particular case. Use only if necessary, there are surely worse. "}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'GOOD‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'GOOD'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'not good'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'great value for money ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We needed an ivernight hotel close to tivim station so this hotels location was perfect. details: {'Location': 'Opposite Kamat Complex, Miramar, Panaji, Goa, India', 'overall_rating': 'Select your room', 'Name': 'Flagship Clausil Inn Near Immaculate Conception Church', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Budget '}, {'Review_Rating': '2.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very sad i chosen this hotel'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Moderate stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The rooms were clean but not the Rest rooms. This will be moderate stay for bachelors but not for family members. Before booking also make sure there are no near by hotels for morning food.'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Budget Hotel for a quick overnight stay. Rooms and amenities could be cleaner. Building common spaces were a little claustrophobic. But if you're looking to spend the day traveling and only gonna use the room for sleep, good budget option"}, {'Review_Rating': '2.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Not recommended!!!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Staff was not good. Totally not co-operative. They do not have co-ordination amongst themselves. One says stay in the room. Other comes shouting that stay away from room and co-operate. Rude staff. \nApart from wifi/internet, everything was worst. They used the old-used blanquet which was stainful and stincky. Not recommeneded at all!!'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Best stay üëå‚ù§Ô∏è‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I visited twice... I loved the stay and location specially, the staff is very helpful. Staff named Rajesh was very kind and helpful üëå '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Best Stay at  cheap price‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Highly recommended at Talegaon'}, {'Review_Rating': '3.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Worst Stay in the hotel ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "I would say that this was my worst experience of the trip . Absolutely Unclean Dingy room ,Linens were torn,room wasn't clean .We were put in a room which is on the terrace ,if you open the door it led to an unclean space ,filthy.Breakfast was terrific cooked in an unclean space.If you see their kitchen it's literally pukish.Its a shame on Oyo to deal with such properties and I would say zero worth for money paid. If i had a chance I would have cancelled it and taken the money back .Would never recommend Oyo neither will I stay ever in Oyo properties. I would rate a zero mark for my entire stay ."}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Clean, value for money, Peaceful‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Room was clean and cozy. Main attraction was its balcony which was bigger than room . It had table and chairs also where we used to take breakfast and dinner. Breakfast was free it was punctual at 8.30 am. They served in room itself. Lunch and dinner can be booked from outside , provided their menu also in room. Hot and cold water available , tv, cupboard , desk, phone, wifi with password was available. We wanted to iron our shirts, they provided  iron also when we asked. Cold  R.O water was also available. Overall we liked staying there and wished to stay more. Nice clean .Balcony no. 1üòä'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Facilities poor‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The Facilities make you feel like it‚Äôs a run down place. One of the staff was cutting his toenails on the stairs. It was just not right.'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Very noisy staff.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The hotel ticked all the boxes in terms of facilities (Aircon, WiFi, etc.) However the room was right next to the reception desk so you could hear everything going on late at night and early in the morning which severely disrupted our sleep. '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Comfortable stay'}], 'price': '1,531', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/5042721/-1/0f12dd84d325d13e7c8ca19f9e6c8bc8.jpg?ca=8&ce=1&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '16m¬≤', 'amenities': ['Shower', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Mirror', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Satellite/cable channels', 'Telephone', 'Air conditioning', 'Blackout curtains', 'Fan', 'Linens', 'Closet', 'Fire extinguisher', 'First aid kit', 'Individual air conditioning'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/oyo-4195-clausil-inn_2/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&tspTypes=-1&los=1&searchrequestid=0a976578-dc30-400c-9670-434a4700defb'}

Also some good eat outs nearby for breakfast, lunch and dinner makes it located at a prime location. Somethings which we didnt like was the power backup, very fluctuating power supply. Also there was no hot water in the bathroom for bathing. The knob of taps were broken and were not repaired. Overall to summarise the property is on the older side and is a bit poorly maintained. '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'good location & staff. The facilities could have been better else all good'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good staff good nature‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We are enjoying this trip thanks to all '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Review for Castle house ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It was totally good hotel where we stayed during November.
Location is near to palolem beach.
But, apart from facilities food was good.
But it was costlier and also quantities are not upto the mark'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Bad food and poor stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Food served was of a poor quality (especially breakfast). Stay was very average, not value for money. They will charge 200 bucks only for room service! What a joke!!! Washroom had a foul smell. Will not revisit. Beach is also far off. '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Great family getaway‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good room and facilities. Polite and helpful staff.'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very average - not worth the money‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "We decided to go with Castle House simply because after a few weeks travelling we were desperate to chill by a pool - there's a pool, but about 4 sun beds and very little sun reaches the pool area so I wouldn't bother. The location is good, in between Palolem and Patnem beaches but that's about the only good feature. The hotel staff are pretty lazy apart from the really nice guys who worked the restaurant, but the food was pretty dismal. Definitely not worth the money"}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good and well maintained Hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Excellent rooms and good restaurant. '}, {'Review_Rating': '5.7', 'Review_Heading': 'average hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'cleanliness,nice breakfast.'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.3', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice but overpriced ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Comfort food staff'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.7', 'Review_Heading': 'STAY AT  CASTLE HOUSE‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The location to the beautiful beach is awesome. details: {'Location': '252, Dandoswada, Mandrem, Mandrem, Goa, India, 403527', 'overall_rating': '9.6', 'Name': 'Wigwam', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very very very very poor...Third class‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Location is extremely disgusting. No welcome..tent quality is so disgusting.. unclean room no dustbin in tent no mirror..tent is so hot no AC..there are so many harmful insect in tent..there are frog and so many harmful things in toilet..no body is there for any help.. there are no privacy in tent..the door of tent completely open there are no option to close the tent door.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Great place ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'For solo travelers or couples with kids this is a great place. They have 2 apartments with a kitchen (ideal for a family), a few tipis (for singles and couples) and also a couple of cottages. The staff is great, the food is good but the restaurant serves only pizzas for dinner which are great. Swiggy serves the area well, madrem market is 2 kms away so the location is truly fantastic. The host, Tanya, is am amazing lady always willing to help! Must try atleast once. '}], 'price': '4,000', 'img_link': 'https://q-xx.bstatic.com/xdata/images/hotel/840x460/327797618.jpg?k=aad2ac06802392b829f67c8a299a797d9eebca3e00fa13765b209a86c7ec777f&o=', 'room_size': '19m¬≤', 'amenities': ['Garden view', 'Shower', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Bathrobes', 'Cleaning products', 'Mirror', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Board games/puzzles', 'Books/DVDs/music for children', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Sauna', 'Adapter', 'Air conditioning', 'Fan', 'Linens', 'Mosquito net', 'Private entrance', 'Wake-up service', 'Separate dining area', 'Trash cans', 'Clothes rack', 'Fire extinguisher', 'In-room safe box'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/wigwam/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&los=1&searchrequestid=3cd01d2c-b1a8-4693-b1ea-b80943a74688'}

Not even an apple juice or a can of coke! Overall, very over priced"}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Clean, good front office reception but restaurant & hotel need to communicate better‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Hotel check in is seamless, although there was no welcome drink as promised during booking. details:
{'Location': '376, Off Fort Aguada Road, Candolim, Goa, Candolim, Goa, India, 403515', 'overall_rating': '7.5', 'Name': 'Acron Candolim Regina Fully Vaccinated Staff', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Good location, great food.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Location is great,  food is nice.  Big king-size beds. Parking is a mess.'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Value for the money paid‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I have been visiting this property since the last 11 years since i started coming to goa.This property was earlier owned by the ITC group and was competing against the best in this locality like the likes of lemon tree amarante, country inn etc‚Ä¶but now it is owned by the acron group and the difference in services is visible‚Ä¶the quality of the admin staff at the reception is no way bear to a 4 star standard anymore though and they lack in numbers also, the house keeping and restaurant staff is still pretty good
I think whatever good infra the ITC group left still makes this a good property but if not maintained properly combines by the degraded staff quality could move this hotel down in the rankings
The receptiom staff needs to be increased as well as professionally trained to deal with customers
Keep the minibars in the rooms, thats needed in a usually hot city like goa
Keep the welcome drinks at check in
Have more staff ready to take luggage when someone arrives
Maintain and keep the decent bar that used to function with the pool etc etc‚Ä¶
Its an otherwise great property with a great location‚Ä¶'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Shittiest Hotel in Goa‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'poor experience
while checking in asked for 8k extra for new year party which was never told before taking 48k for 5 days stay
my partner got allergy after having food no courtesy to arrange emergency medical needs
all the reviews are bought. poor management '}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Great location, good Service'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent experience üëè ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'All Thanks to resort manager Mr Yatin for making it so comfortable in every aspect every day. From room service to breakfast to all other services in bar/restaurant/pool /spa, we have experienced nothing less than best in class. '}, {'Review_Rating': '3.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Food and service was average ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The food and service was below average. A small property and we paid almost double for hotel rent and that too for 4 days .  '}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good hotel '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Excellent location and excellent staff, hotel is looking a little tired but cleanliness and staff make up for this in every other way'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Disappointing desk lady‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Hotel checkin time is 2pm and Hotel checkout time is 11am. We requested the lady at the reception that since we had come just the day before, and had not really used the property and swimming pool, and if she can allow us to checkout at 12:30-1:00pm. But she became adamant that we have to check out before 12:00 noon and any delay of even a minute will incur half day charges. 
We were forced to vacate the room in a hurry. Though she allowed us to use the changing room and common bathroom which was ok, not so good.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Really nice experience'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Value for money Resort‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "It's location is very good.....just 600-700m from the Candolim beach (in early morning you can walk and go to beach by urself)and also close to market area and eating places.....you can easily walk from the hotel to market and back even upto 12'o clock in the night. Also staff is good and facilities like buffet breakfast, swimming pool, kids zone, Gym are all very good. Value for money stay."}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'One of the best hotel in candolim area...peaceful environment and courteous staff !!'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nice Resort with various amenities. Great Bfast and good Bartenders. Friendly loving people. Would really recommend anytime :)'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.0', 'Review_Heading': '2 star at best‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The reception area and dining area are very poor - the dining area is more like a works canteen.
The swimming pool is in need of renovation and has uneven broken tiles around it.
Our room was a suite which was a very good size but again in need of renovation - corridors are dark and have no soundproofing so you can here everything - upstairs, downstairs etc. Our room had a diesel generator running outside for part of the day making the balcony unusable.
We had booked for 7 nights but left after 2..........'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Great stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good food 
Awesome rooms with bath tub even 
Very spacious suits rooms

'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "We stayed two days and it's near to all prime locations in North Goa. We enjoyed our stay. Hotel premises looks bit old however maintained maximum possible. Complimentary breakfast was good but it was very crowded and no special attention provided even family with small kids (had a tuff time get all required breakfast). Rest all we felt very nice.."}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It was an awesome overall experience. I liked the stay, staff and buffet breakfast as well.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'A very comfortable stay with my better half ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good staff
Good food
Very nice hotel'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Food is very expensive in the hotel stay ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Breakfast was also not complimentary & reception staff was not professional in handling.'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': '3* hotel with some additional facilities ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The deluxe room that I stayed in had a pretty ordinary balcony view and the shower area had a plumbing issue. Also, pool table in the lounge is chargable!'}], 'price': '8,199', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/186656/-1/517ef318f55f667bd1c3e020f813f097.jpg?ca=11&ce=1&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '36m¬≤', 'amenities': ['City view', 'Balcony/terrace', 'Non-smoking', 'Shower', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Bathrobes', 'Hair dryer', 'Mirror', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Walk-in shower', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Pool facilities', 'Satellite/cable channels', 'Telephone', 'Air conditioning', 'Alarm clock', 'Blackout curtains', 'Daily newspaper', 'Fan', 'Linens', 'Private entrance', 'Slippers', 'Wake-up service', 'Coffee/tea maker', 'Free bottled water', 'Mini bar', 'Wine glasses', 'Daily housekeeping', 'Desk', 'Interconnecting room(s) available', 'Sofa', 'Tile/marble flooring', 'Trash cans', 'Closet', 'Clothes rack', 'Ironing facilities', 'In-room safe box', 'Safety/security feature', 'Smoke detector'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/fortune-acron-regina_9/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&tspTypes=5&los=1&searchrequestid=3cd01d2c-b1a8-4693-b1ea-b80943a74688'}

{'Location': '1609 Vasvaddo, Benaulim Beach Rd, Goa, 403716, Colva, Goa, India, 403716', 'overall_rating': 'Select your room', 'Name': 'Collection O 83452 Grand Royal Palms                                                      ', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Not the best service‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Stayed there for 3 nights 4 days...room was not cleaned for even once,tv was not working and even after the issue was raised mutiple times...room service was not provided wifi was not good..A complete disappointing experience '}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Don't book this hotel if you don't want to ruin your trip.

They only have 19 rooms in their hotel and they take 30 to 40 bookings every day.
Then they give you room somewhere else as a replacement which is very far from the hotel.
You'll get no services at all there and it is not worth it.

The manager and owner is very rude, i will not suggest to book this hotel at all.

"}, {'Review_Rating': '2.4', 'Review_Heading': 'The owner / manager who was Lady was very arrogant‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Owner said since you booked online you must pay additionally amount of 50% about Rs 700/- more. Also the guest was not working and she turned off her phone after we got the room. No breakfast, no water, absolutely nothing as promised on the website. '}, {'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'They scam people into paying extra '}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Please dnt go there‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'They will charge extra money for nothing '}, {'Review_Rating': '4.0', 'Review_Heading': "Don't book online‚Äù", 'Review_Body': "Don't book online they ask for extra money and the reason is we don't provide on these low budget booking"}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Good budget hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The swimming pool was clean and good. The rooms were clean and staff was helpful. [{'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Not the best service‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Stayed there for 3 nights 4 days...room was not cleaned for even once,tv was not working and even after the issue was raised mutiple times...room service was not provided wifi was not good..A complete disappointing experience '}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Don't book this hotel if you don't want to ruin your trip.

They only have 19 rooms in their hotel and they take 30 to 40 bookings every day.
Then they give you room somewhere else as a replacement which is very far from the hotel.
You'll get no services at all there and it is not worth it.

The manager and owner is very rude, i will not suggest to book this hotel at all.

"}, {'Review_Rating': '2.4', 'Review_Heading': 'The owner / manager who was Lady was very arrogant‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Owner said since you booked online you must pay additionally amount of 50% about Rs 700/- more. {'Location': 'P.O. Goa University, Bambolim, Dona Paula, Goa, India, 403206', 'overall_rating': 'Select your room', 'Name': 'Grand Hyatt Goa', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Staff not service oriented, cutlery not clean‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Some of the staff particularly in breakfast area need to be retrained and sensitized  towards customer satisfaction. They don't really bother to cater to customer needs, very absent minded and at times are in such hurry that they almost push their way through the customers. The cutlery almost on all days of our stay had stains of food. It is such a beautiful and iconic property, i am sure with better trained staff this can be one of the best in Goa. "}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'It‚Äôs outstanding ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'One of the best beach resorts in Goa. We had a lovely time here. And the food here the a must try  .'}, {'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Pathetic!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Took 45 min to check in. Wedding in the hotel, so all the staff was busy with it. No service for regular leisure travelers. Wait time for buggy was 30 min each time. Very poor responses!'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Great place to stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Great facilities, great staff and kids loved their kids area and staff there'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Top notch luxury resort‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Been here for my wife's birthday,
Hospitality and service was authentic.
Staff is very friendly and we had lots of complimentary stuff as per birthday occasion.
Spa is a must visit with there hot pool jacuzzi and good therapy!"}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Unsafe for family WORST Experience in grand Hyatt goa‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We have check on 29th October 2022 and  we will be  check out on 31 st October 2022 Room no 2120 I will tell you my experience in hotel for last 24 hours in following points.
1- We reach hotel at around 2.45-3pm check in takes 45-55 mins nobody ask for water or any welcome drinks after 30 mins we ask for water then they serve coconut water.
2-We order lunch after lunch we were sleeping after 45mins bell rings for clearing plates we did not call to clear plates we were in deep sleep then master key used to enter room that was our luck we have locked room.
3-AC was not working so hotel  changed our room we informed to shift luggage in 10 mins staff come to pick luggage after 30-35 mins after 3-4 calls 
4-We call reception to connect us to hotel manager they said we arrange call back in 10 mins but no call received from manager 
5- In pool we order a cocktail.And cocktail is received in broken glass find attached image of broken glass cocktail serving staff it‚Äôs as style it‚Äôs not broken.'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Good stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Well organized and nice facility and food'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Luxury resort but not many amenities‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'View is nice from resort, outdoor area is vast, swimming pool is big. But amenities are under renovation. Kids activity centre is chargeable, all adventure activities are chargeable, no evening complementry tea, beach is not clean and accesibility is problem. Bathroom is very good compared to other similar resorts. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Food is amazing.
View is great.
Spa is excellent.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'One of the best properties I‚Äôve been to‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Amazing staff , clean , gorgeous ‚Ä¶ had a fantastic stay '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Great Goa Monsoon Holiday!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Grand Hyatt Goa is a perfect holiday resort, just half an hour from the airport with expansive rooms with brilliant ocean views, decks and large bathrooms. Large pools and lawns make hours just pass by without you realizing the same. The food at the dining room was brilliant with good non-veg options, a rarity these days, for both breakfast and dinner! And what made the stay memorable was the staff - Sonu, Niaz and Malik in housekeeping, Suraj by the poolside and the entire team at The Dining Roomwho took such good care of us! Will be back again for sure!'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "It's really grand faboulous stay, good food, but need to work on there beach areas"}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Amazing stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Awesome food vast variety in menu. Great ambience, 
Loved to visit again'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Expensive but worth it‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good location. Has a beach. Good food..'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'only garden and see view‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'good for business travellers and old people but not for young people '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Beautiful location‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The property is right by the beach, its a little far from all the clubs in North Goa but if you wish to not leave the property, this place is amazing. Would highly recommend the Bay view room. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Great stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Been to this wonderful property filled with lovely ambience and great staff. The property had loads of activities to offer for our young children. Perfect family getway.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Good stay but got stomach upset after lunch‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Did not like the food for lunch. I got my stomach upset. Stay was good, loved the room.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good for what it is and what you pay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Great place to spend 3 nights to unwind. What‚Äôs not great-beach is not classic sand and palms. It disappears at high tide. Lots of windowpane oyster shells and lapping waves otherwise. A bit away from anything else. Reasonable and helpful car service will get you to town or beaches. A sprawling, well designed and well maintained and supported resort. Strong food and drink. Great service all around. '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Only one issue‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The staff was excellent. I ve only one issue with the property. Being vegetarian I prefer veg n non-veg counter separate in buffet. The counter was so close that It can be mixed up while taking from it.'}], 'price': '25,000', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/290/290442/290442_15050219150027218766.jpg?ca=13&ce=1&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '50m¬≤', 'amenities': ['Garden view', 'Balcony/terrace', 'Non-smoking', 'Separate shower/bathtub', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Bathrobes', 'Hair dryer', 'Mirror', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'iPod docking station', 'Satellite/cable channels', 'Telephone', 'Air conditioning', 'Blackout curtains', 'Daily newspaper', 'Fan', 'Linens', 'Slippers', 'Soundproofing', 'Wake-up service', 'Coffee/tea maker', 'Free bottled water', 'Mini bar', 'Daily housekeeping', 'Desk', 'Seating area', 'Trash cans', 'Closet', 'Ironing facilities', 'Accessible by elevator', 'In-room safe box', 'Smoke detector'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/grand-hyatt-goa/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&los=1&searchrequestid=3cd01d2c-b1a8-4693-b1ea-b80943a74688'}

'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good staff‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good and co-operative staff'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Dont get what you see in the pics‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'To all the couples who are trying to stay at this hotel, if you are very budget conscious and dont care about cleanliness than this hotel will be a great fit for you . Also please have a thorough look at all the items in the bar fridge, water bottles/peanuts etc. they tend to charge for the No of things missing out while checking out even though you have not consumed anything. Once again be careful. Wil not recommend this hotel to anyone '}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Dirty! ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'South African

This was the dirtiest hotel I‚Äôve been to. Bathroom had smells and floor was dirty n sticky (couldn‚Äôt take a shower or eat their food ü§Æ)

'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Food‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Chef was too good. Breakfast was simple but finger licking good. One of the finest food I have tasted. '}, {'Review_Rating': '4.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Staff‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Staff is not helpful. Never picks up calls on reception. Als very small rooms as compared to prices not a value for money '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Great hotel at great price‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'This is a very good hotel .
