"}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'thank you‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "it's good "}, {'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Needs improvement‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We family friends of 6 with 2 toddler checked in this hotel. While booking we asked for adjacent rooms which reception has confirmed. When we reached to our surprise rooms wasn‚Äôt allocated as requested. 

Food : The buffet spread wasn‚Äôt good, in Ala-Cart the Goan cook was on leave so haven‚Äôt got chance to eat anything which is special. 

Service: staff is polite and well behaved.

Location: completely isolated, it‚Äôs in industrial estate, not recommended for family tours. You won‚Äôt get anything nearby.

Final recommendation : don‚Äôt book for any leisure trip. Book if you have any official work around Verna platue. 

Special Mention: bring your own water, they just provide 1 liter per day. 

'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Could be a good option for a holiday not for business‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very less vegetarian options. details:
{'Location': '1 Assagao, Vagator, Goa, India, 403507', 'overall_rating': '6.9', 'Name': 'The Royale Assagao Resort', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Solo hotel ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Bed size is small. More facilities required. However look like farm house.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Wah'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Good place‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Reasonable rooms with sorted basic requirements '}, {'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Worst Experience Ever!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I booked a suite for just the couple of us since the other rooms were unavailable due to New Years . But the property lacks the most basic facilities. The bathroom door knob was broken thereby requiring us to not try to lock while we are using it because it may not open again.

The property has no wi-fi except in the lobby and when I asked for it they only said that E block didn‚Äôt have it temporarily. However, going by other reviews on Agoda and google this has been a pattern. Wifi was never available in any of the rooms.

The furniture too seemed shabby and the side tables were broken rendering them useless. The drawer would not close if opened. 

The plus side is that they have ample parking available on the property and the staff is trying their best but they don‚Äôt have much to defend really. '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Economical place ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good place but no restaurent'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good budget place‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good place and economical as well. Only lacking thing was a restaurent. '}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Really good property ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Enjoyed our 2 day stay at the property '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice property ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Cool and safe property even though it away from main centre.
Staff are highly helpful thru the request.'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Recommended hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Rooms are good with cosy bedding. Spacious. Do have regular room cleaning for freshness. I recommend not to check in room which has been just checkout few hours before as room has some wetness & smell. Pool is really nice I just loved it . Food was not good earlier but problem resolved with change of cook. Had breakfast by new cook on checkout ,it was tasty. Thanks @royal Assagao senior executive for early resolution. Pillows & bedsheet give gracious look. Hotel is little bit away from baga/calunguate but closer to anjuna/Vagator beach. If someone can manage distance,Royal Assagao is the Destination for u. This hotel is also part of royal international club of hotels.
Overall it was nice staying at your royal Assagao. Would love to visit again in future and recommend my delhites friends.'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Below normal room‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'This is okay kind of a room, and the swimming pool is also bit okay but they never change the water'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Value for money ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We went with a group of 9 and it was more than what we expected for the money. The rooms are huge and spacious and quite clean with good bathrooms and very good view and atmosphere '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Agoda Best Deals‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Happy using Agoda for my Travelling with family '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'paisa vasul'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Location is preety far from main goa ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The hotel is good ,  big ,pool is working . but the distance of hotel is pretty far from main goa like baga beach.  '}, {'Review_Rating': '4.4', 'Review_Heading': "Don't opt for this hotel‚Äù", 'Review_Body': 'I was regular to this last 3 years, but this time the maintenance NAD cleanliness gone weird....nothing is working there....this is mere waste of money now.'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': "Don't provide  complimentary  water ‚Äù", 'Review_Body': "They don't provide complimentary  water bottles  in room  they give you on the check in day 2 bottles only doesn't matter  how many nights you are staying in the  hotel cheap service  cheap hotel  will nit stay in this hotel "}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'very disappointment‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'very bad'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'good stay ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'hotel was good and all thing was good .'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The rooms are good besides that the services were extremely poor, most of the amenities were missing, the door was locking properly, tv was not working, there was no water in the washroom, their service from the restaurant was very disappointing. When complained at the reception regarding the restaurant, we were told the restaurant is not operating under them. 

Overall it was a very disappointing experience, we would strongly recommend that the managers pay attention to the services provided.'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.0', 'Review_Heading': 'The food was worst‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "The food was worst, even the staffs are not  cooperative .The breakfast provided was worst.Don't book this hotel"}], 'price': '3,718', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/293517/-1/23ed280ff028b87d676ed796771deb0b.jpg?ce=0&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '33m¬≤', 'amenities': ['Nature view', 'Balcony/terrace', 'Non-smoking', 'Shower', 'Kitchenette', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Hair dryer', 'Mirror', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Satellite/cable channels', 'Telephone', 'Air conditioning', 'Linens', 'Private entrance', 'Sleep comfort items', 'Wake-up service', 'Mini bar', 'Seating area', 'Separate dining area', 'Sofa', 'Tile/marble flooring', 'Window', 'Closet', 'Sewing kit', 'Pets allowed in room', 'Fire extinguisher', 'In-room safe box', 'Locker', 'Safety/security feature', 'Smoke detector'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/the-royale-assagao-resort/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&los=1&searchrequestid=3cd01d2c-b1a8-4693-b1ea-b80943a74688'}

reviews:
[{'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Solo hotel ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Bed size is small. More facilities required. However look like farm house.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Wah'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Good place‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Reasonable rooms with sorted basic requirements '}, {'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Worst Experience Ever!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I booked a suite for just the couple of us since the other rooms were unavailable due to New Years . But the property lacks the most basic facilities. The bathroom door knob was broken thereby requiring us to not try to lock while we are using it because it may not open again.

The property has no wi-fi except in the lobby and when I asked for it they only said that E block didn‚Äôt have it temporarily. However, going by other reviews on Agoda and google this has been a pattern. Wifi was never available in any of the rooms.

The furniture too seemed shabby and the side tables were broken rendering them useless. The drawer would not close if opened. 

The plus side is that they have ample parking available on the property and the staff is trying their best but they don‚Äôt have much to defend really. '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Economical place ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good place but no restaurent'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good budget place‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good place and economical as well. Only lacking thing was a restaurent. '}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Really good property ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Enjoyed our 2 day stay at the property '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice property ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Cool and safe property even though it away from main centre.
Staff are highly helpful thru the request.'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Recommended hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Rooms are good with cosy bedding. Spacious. Do have regular room cleaning for freshness. I recommend not to check in room which has been just checkout few hours before as room has some wetness & smell. Pool is really nice I just loved it . Food was not good earlier but problem resolved with change of cook. Had breakfast by new cook on checkout ,it was tasty. Thanks @royal Assagao senior executive for early resolution. Pillows & bedsheet give gracious look. Hotel is little bit away from baga/calunguate but closer to anjuna/Vagator beach. If someone can manage distance,Royal Assagao is the Destination for u. This hotel is also part of royal international club of hotels.
Overall it was nice staying at your royal Assagao. Would love to visit again in future and recommend my delhites friends.'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Below normal room‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'This is okay kind of a room, and the swimming pool is also bit okay but they never change the water'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Value for money ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We went with a group of 9 and it was more than what we expected for the money. Location: Riverside street, near new Baga Bridge, Baga Goa, 403516, Baga, Goa, India, 403519
Name: ALOHA HOLIDAY RESORT
reviews:
[{'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The property is located in a quite area and is well connected with the lively Baga lane. There are multiple cafes/restaurants to choose from nearby and even the in-house restaurant is good enough. The pool is average sized and good too. The rooms are spacious (3 pax per room easily) and equipped with all the necessities. Parking is limited. Overall, it was a pleasant stay.  '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Aloha Holiday Resort Stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Stay was pleasant and located very near to Baga beach.

Hospitality from staff and food was really great. Staff were polite and friendly.

Overall highly recommended for family or group.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Perfect hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Hotel is good & couple friendly. Near by to beaches plus in buged '}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Check in‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "We had an early morning flight, and requested an early check in. Also, we were checking out in the middle of the night because we had an early morning return flight as well. But early checkin wasn't facilitated despite prior intimation, which is understood in case the hotel was fully booked. But when we arrived the hotel was empty and they could've easily given us one of the rooms to just freshen up and rest temporarily. We had to wait for 4-5 hours before we could get a room. That was the only negative."}]

details:
{'Location': ' Curlies Road Flea Market Road Front of close2c holiday home , Anjuna, Goa, India, 403509', 'overall_rating': '6.7', 'Name': 'Meraden Opus', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good hotel.the location is near to Anjuna beach. the restaurant food is also nice.
You also have a rooftop pool and seating area.'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Reception Staff is too rude and Haughty‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Not recommend anyone due to Reception staff behaviour.
stayed there for 3 days, and throughout that time, I got into arguments twice or more with the receptionists because some time they deined to accept the benifiet within the booking,they were rude to us and didn't know how to interact with guests. 

 they are finding point and Particularly at that awkward time during check-out, they claimed that the towel was dirty and that you had to pay for it. I protested, but the staff kept acting rudely and after some time, they finally confirmed that the towel was indeed dirty. 
They ought to learn customer service from such people.
Not recommended because of the uncoordinated behaviour of the reception employees."}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Pleasent stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "If you are a person who doesn't like much crowded places and want calm and chill out than this is best for you. "}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good North food and clean rooms and good service ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We stayed with our daughter on jan25-27th 2023. It was a good stay and they had a nice north Indian breakfast buffet. Rooms were neat and clean and staff were cordial. Reception n chef are quite responsive. We are very happy with stay and wanted to extend stay but unfortunately property was all sold out for 27th Jan due to republic day rush. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very near and tidy place to stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It‚Äôs right on the place where you need to be.  Near to all the happening places on Anjuna. Go for it'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Lovely hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Room was clean and modern, wonderful staff and a beautiful roof terrace pool. Short walk to Anjuna beach '}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Good Property, Bad food‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The hotel is newly constructed and rooms are big and clean. The staff is very helpful and polite. But the food is very bad. It was so spicy that it was in edible. We requested to be light on green chillies so the chef increased the amount of red chillie powder. They need to improve the food quality and understand the customer requirement. I am a North Indian and travelled the world have stayed in Nigeria for some time where I have had my share of red pepe. So trust me when I say the food was hot! 
Rest was a pleasent experience and no issues.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good clean n spacious rooms friendly n geniune staff food is good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Walking distance from anjuna beach food is good loved the stay '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good hotel ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Vry nice hotel wot nice staff nd location '}, {'Review_Rating': '4.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Okayish‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "It's an okayish place. Not as good as it looks in picture. The hotel is not well maintained. "}, {'Review_Rating': '3.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Worst stay ever‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Never expected such a bad stay. Poor management, green water swimming pool, bad breakfast. I Just wasted the money by staying here. Consider this a very genuine feedback.'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Not a good place to stay, lack facilities and cleanliness.'}, {'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Nothing like the pictures, over priced, disappointing.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'As a pair of backpackers, we thought we would ‚Äòsplash out‚Äô and treat ourselves to a nice stay in a proper hotel for a few days. Spending well over our budget, you can imagine our feelings when we arrived to a run down, mouldy room with dirty sheets which had to be changed. The balcony door didn‚Äôt lock, when we asked about this we were told that none of the balcony doors in the hotel lock?! This seems ridiculous. 
We also went up to enjoy the pool only to find there were no sunbeds out as pictured on the website.. one of the main reasons we booked this hotel was to make use of the pool. Furthermore the pool had metallic taste when we went swimming and so didn‚Äôt use it again during our stay. Our ‚Äòfree breakfast‚Äô consisted of a mouldy sandwich which we handed back and then had to pay to go elsewhere for the rest of our stay. Completely disappointing, I wouldn‚Äôt recommend staying here at all.. much better places available for the same price or less. '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Good value for money hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good clean rooms with most of the necessary facilities, breakfast was also good. I would recommend this hotel to all travellers staying at Anjuna beach'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Stay at Meraden Opus‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "We choose Opus based a distant friend's word of mouth. Overall it is quite far from the airport but so are most of hotels closer to beaches. While the rate offered was average, the hotel is available at even cheaper rate when contacted directly. There is no agoda advantage. Now talking about the hotel, I would recommend that this hotel be avoided in case if you are travelling with children or senior citizens.  The facilities in the hotel and the equipments are either dated or not well kept. In our 4 days of stay we had struggle with AC in 2 rooms.  The staff while tries its best to resolve issues. Lack of senior staff (manager etc) along with improper maintenance are quite clearly visible.

Breakfast is a sham. It is pathetic at best. But I would give 5 star to the hotel staff for accommodating request and going extra mile to satisfy customers. Will I come to this hotel again, only if I am Paid to stay given the conditions.
"}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Awesome‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Poor reception. Although rooms are best in class. Roof top pool is awesome.'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Awesome‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Best in class rooms. Pool bar is awesome. Poor reception.'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'average‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'the place was hard to find and the staff were not so friendly'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'this hotel is very bad and very bad service ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'plz change ur staff'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Decent‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Decent'}], 'price': '4,075', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/444395/-1/65a2a5bea9706df08df5e1a6530d5cc9.jpg?ce=0&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '0', 'amenities': ['Shared bathroom', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Hair dryer', 'Mirror', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/capital-o-558-hotel-meraden-opus/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&los=1&searchrequestid=3cd01d2c-b1a8-4693-b1ea-b80943a74688'}

{'Location': 'Pilerne Candolim Road, Saipem, Candolim, Goa, India, 403515', 'overall_rating': '8.2', 'Name': 'Hilton Goa Resort', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Great experience ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'One of the the most beautiful resorts we have stayed so far! A special mention to Tanisha from the Frontdesk  who was really welcoming and made sure we had an amazing experience.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Awesome ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nice place to stay in '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Nice resort
Spa not functional yet .. Strange for a 5 star
our package had buffet but wasn't given.. was on A La Carte on all days..
Staff was courteous and helpful. 
Overall a nice place to stay .."}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Pleasant stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Property is nestled in lush green surroundings away from busy North Goa bylanes which makes it a pleasant stay provided you have your vehicle to move around North Goa. Extremely hospitable and courteous staff.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Amazing‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'All facilities are amazing. Staff is very polite and helpful. Superb property with amazing staff! Keep it up!'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.4', 'Review_Heading': 'No cleanliness‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Saw wall lizard and frog in the room.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Top location‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Thank you for the special care'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Everygreen view and better hospitality ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'A must visit for getaway.
Hope they include spa and few more dinning options.'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Comfortable rooms‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nice property on a hill.  Room was really spacious and bathroom extraordinary.  Mayank at the frontdesk and chef Nikhil were really helpful.  Thank you guys !   However, there were some serious housekeeping issues in the property.  Cleanliness in open areas was not of Hilton standards.  Pool was not clean. No changing rooms either.  '}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Breakfast Experience Lousy ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Overall a beautiful facility with multiple pools and kids club to keep the kids occupied for sometime. 
Breakfast spread isnt great taste wise and the staff gets overwhelmed if it gets busy. You end up waiting 30 mins for a breakfast order. Clearly not ready to manage a crowd'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Spectacular Service and Place ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I booked a room in Hilton Goa for my girlfriends birthday. I came from Poland and when I was there, I started mailing with the staff, particularly Ms. Tanisha to execute my surprise plan. She helped me through and through with almost everything. Every special request of mine was accepted and executed even in a better way. From the moment we entered the hotel to leaving, we felt so special by an outstanding care of the staff. Everything went perfectly well. Highly recommend for those who look for a beautiful place for special occasions or personal relaxation!'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Great experience, highly recommended‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We travelled in July 2022, a group of 4 adults, in peak monsoon. The location is in a hill with great views (the beach is 3-4 km away). Beautiful property, excellent and prompt services, very courteous staff. We had a wonderful experience. It was raining crazily throughout the holiday, we had a great time at the property. '}, {'Review_Rating': '2.8', 'Review_Heading': 'At the time of check in only they started asking what time we ll check out ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Called again and again before 12 for check out '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Amazing Service‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'This hotel is amazing. reviews:
[{'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Great experience ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'One of the the most beautiful resorts we have stayed so far! A special mention to Tanisha from the Frontdesk  who was really welcoming and made sure we had an amazing experience.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Awesome ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nice place to stay in '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Nice resort
Spa not functional yet .. Strange for a 5 star
our package had buffet but wasn't given.. was on A La Carte on all days..
Staff was courteous and helpful. 
Overall a nice place to stay .."}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Pleasant stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Property is nestled in lush green surroundings away from busy North Goa bylanes which makes it a pleasant stay provided you have your vehicle to move around North Goa. Extremely hospitable and courteous staff.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Amazing‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'All facilities are amazing. Staff is very polite and helpful. Superb property with amazing staff! Keep it up!'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.4', 'Review_Heading': 'No cleanliness‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Saw wall lizard and frog in the room.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Top location‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Thank you for the special care'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Everygreen view and better hospitality ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'A must visit for getaway.
Hope they include spa and few more dinning options.'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Comfortable rooms‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nice property on a hill.  Room was really spacious and bathroom extraordinary.  Mayank at the frontdesk and chef Nikhil were really helpful.  Thank you guys !   However, there were some serious housekeeping issues in the property.  Cleanliness in open areas was not of Hilton standards.  Pool was not clean. No changing rooms either.  '}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Breakfast Experience Lousy ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Overall a beautiful facility with multiple pools and kids club to keep the kids occupied for sometime. 
Breakfast spread isnt great taste wise and the staff gets overwhelmed if it gets busy. You end up waiting 30 mins for a breakfast order. Clearly not ready to manage a crowd'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Spectacular Service and Place ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I booked a room in Hilton Goa for my girlfriends birthday. I came from Poland and when I was there, I started mailing with the staff, particularly Ms. Tanisha to execute my surprise plan. She helped me through and through with almost everything. Every special request of mine was accepted and executed even in a better way. From the moment we entered the hotel to leaving, we felt so special by an outstanding care of the staff. Everything went perfectly well. Highly recommend for those who look for a beautiful place for special occasions or personal relaxation!'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Great experience, highly recommended‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We travelled in July 2022, a group of 4 adults, in peak monsoon. The location is in a hill with great views (the beach is 3-4 km away). Beautiful property, excellent and prompt services, very courteous staff. We had a wonderful experience. It was raining crazily throughout the holiday, we had a great time at the property. details:
{'Location': "D'Mello Vaddo 66, Anjuna Bardez, Anjuna, Goa, India, 403509", 'overall_rating': '8.3', 'Name': 'Casa Anjuna', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Oasis in the middle of busy Anjuna‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Lovely space and very helpful staff'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Good Property‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Gorgeous property, nice rooms and really good location. 
But, the breakfast really isn't upto the mark for the price and the service is below average"}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Beautiful and well located‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Even though located in otherwise crowded Anjuna, Casa Anjuna itself is nestled away in a cul-de-sac. The property is amidst woods, and the rooms are great. The pool is also lovely. And the staff is accommodating and efficient. Overall, a place we'd return to again."}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Just what we were looking for‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Quaint property tucked into the small lanes near Anjuna. Follow the GPS even if you are in doubt and you'll land up with a surprise in a garden paradise. Great smiling and courteous staff who are always willing to please"}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Memorable stay at Casa Anjuna‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I stayed with my aged parents and we booked the star room which had an enormous bed that was sufficient for all 3. The place had an olden day charm with new age comfort. My folks enjoyed watchin me swim and the pool was big with an attached restaurant that served sandwiches & alcohol. Breakfast was served poolside which was refreshing out in the open. '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Great stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Was a little pricey but it was NYE so we accepted it would be more! The staff are really helpful and the complimentary breakfast was really tasty! Felt safe as there was a security guard posted 24 hours would stay again!'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Quaint and Boutiquey!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We loved this place. We decided to move from South Goa to North Goa because our original resort was taken out by a cyclone. We were not disappointed. This place has a beautiful little pool covered by palm trees and the people are lovely. It was the relaxed, casual and friendly environment we needed. Thanks team and we would recommend anyone that wants a relaxed holiday for an affordable price to go here. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Cute hotel  ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We loved the look of this hotel online - very design led with vibrant tropical colours and gorgeous vintage furniture and it was even better in real life!! Packed with natural plants everywhere - it felt like we were in the middle of a beautiful jungle. We loved our stay here - there are plenty of local places to eat and drink. The pool was beautiful and restful and the staff friendly and helpful. They arranged our airport pick up and made our visit seamless. The location is great for local beaches and exploring North Goa. Highly recommended!'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Located in the heart of Anjuna within walking distance to several famous beach clubs, Casa Anjuna offers a stunningly sublime experience for travelers who seek tranquil escape. It's not far off the beaten track (though it can feel that way at times) in a prime location close to both the Anjuna and Vagator areas.  

Casa Anjuna is a tastefully renovated 350 year-old Portuguese colonial estate outfitted with all the modern amenities needed for the unique experience it offers. Guests are left entranced by the lingering memories of a bygone era or by the serenity of the lush garden filled with the calls of exotic birds and animals. The rooms are replete with antique furniture, and the beds are very comfortable. Any of the three penthouse luxury suites come highly recommended for their spacious and stylish interiors. In the high season, the penthouse suites might be costly for some budget-minded travelers. In that case, there are many other affordable and appealing rooms to choose from. 
"}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Beautiful boutique hotel in anjuna‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The decor was amazing!! Very pretty hotel but facilities wise needs improvement...as it was in quite a hidden location what would have been nice was some sort of shuttle service out to the beach or eating places... being secluded with not much street lights we were quite afraid to walk out for dinner and when we wanted to order something in around 9.30 pm we were told that the kitchen closes at 9.30.  Not much flexibility... a few tweaks in the service would definitely make this place more desirable '}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Very nice!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Staff is very attentive. The house is lovely and the pool is a real highlight. The facilities and amenities are of high standard. The house is a bit dated but this is absolutely not an issue and part of the charm/ feel of the house. Enjoy it! '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Good location, not great place‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Overall this is a a charming old (emphasis on old) place that is tastefully decorated but there were multiple issues that made our stay not so great. Pros: good location within walking distance of many restaurants and bars, great pool/pool area, large rooms and bathrooms, cute outdoor patio. Cons: could never find the staff, reception was always empty with no way to call anyone (mb this was because we were there during Diwali but regardless the level of service was not great), broken AC which they never fixed (it was awful humid and very hot with just the fans running), bugs everywhere (if you stay on the first floor the doors have giant holes at the bottom and at night the room gets invaded with all kinds of bugs, mosquitos, even found a huge beetle in our bed), sheets and pillow smelled mildewed and moldy since there is no AC and not great circulation which was very unpleasant to say the least, the curtains were covered in cobwebs and were a cemetery of dead bugs. '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Beautiful place, well maintained. Basic breakfast. Be prepared for mosquitoes though.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent hotel, highly recommended‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Excellent hotel with amazing set of people taking care of the guests. '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Great value, clean rooms‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very friendly staff, beautiful place'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Amazing facility, amiable staff‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'A portuegese property well kept, full of great hues. Very refreshing experience '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Lovely staff , great location ,a lil overpriced ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Stayed at the luxury casa on top .. amazing spacious room with 2 beautiful balconies.
You should call the property and get clarity on the different rooms they have as agoda and the casa have different ideas of what these rooms are.
Sameer at the reception was extremely helpful and along with the efficient kitchen staff ,made our stay comfortable. 
Very few facilities at the casa , apart from a nice pool. Wifi connectivity is ok,not great.
All in all felt the price is a little on the higher side despite the nice central location, very close to starco.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Beautiful oasis in Anjuna‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "My friend and I booked casa anjuna very last minute and quite late in the day. Welcomed in, showed to our beautiful room and settled, we didn't actually leave the hotel much until we had to move on! The pool is a dream as are the friendly and helpful staff. It's understated old school Goa, highly recommended!! "}, {'Review_Rating': '2.7', 'Review_Heading': 'Not a hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Beautiful building and gardens'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.3', 'Review_Heading': 'Gorgeous heritage hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Antique rooms, garden setting, restaurant setting'}], 'price': '11,000', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/286/286625/286625_16050815090042150693.jpg?ca=13&ce=1&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '25m¬≤', 'amenities': ['Garden view', 'Balcony/terrace', 'Non-smoking', 'Shower', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Mirror', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Satellite/cable channels', 'Telephone', 'Air conditioning', 'Fan', 'Linens', 'Wake-up service', 'Mini bar', 'Desk', 'Seating area', 'Sofa', 'Closet', 'Ironing facilities', 'Trouser press'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/casa-anjuna/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&tspTypes=1&los=1&searchrequestid=3cd01d2c-b1a8-4693-b1ea-b80943a74688'}

The rooms are replete with antique furniture, and the beds are very comfortable. Any of the three penthouse luxury suites come highly recommended for their spacious and stylish interiors. In the high season, the penthouse suites might be costly for some budget-minded travelers. In that case, there are many other affordable and appealing rooms to choose from. 
"}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Beautiful boutique hotel in anjuna‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The decor was amazing!! Very pretty hotel but facilities wise needs improvement...as it was in quite a hidden location what would have been nice was some sort of shuttle service out to the beach or eating places... being secluded with not much street lights we were quite afraid to walk out for dinner and when we wanted to order something in around 9.30 pm we were told that the kitchen closes at 9.30.  Not much flexibility... a few tweaks in the service would definitely make this place more desirable '}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Very nice!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Staff is very attentive. The house is lovely and the pool is a real highlight. The facilities and amenities are of high standard. The house is a bit dated but this is absolutely not an issue and part of the charm/ feel of the house. Enjoy it! '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Good location, not great place‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Overall this is a a charming old (emphasis on old) place that is tastefully decorated but there were multiple issues that made our stay not so great. Pros: good location within walking distance of many restaurants and bars, great pool/pool area, large rooms and bathrooms, cute outdoor patio. Cons: could never find the staff, reception was always empty with no way to call anyone (mb this was because we were there during Diwali but regardless the level of service was not great), broken AC which they never fixed (it was awful humid and very hot with just the fans running), bugs everywhere (if you stay on the first floor the doors have giant holes at the bottom and at night the room gets invaded with all kinds of bugs, mosquitos, even found a huge beetle in our bed), sheets and pillow smelled mildewed and moldy since there is no AC and not great circulation which was very unpleasant to say the least, the curtains were covered in cobwebs and were a cemetery of dead bugs. '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Beautiful place, well maintained. Basic breakfast. Be prepared for mosquitoes though.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent hotel, highly recommended‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Excellent hotel with amazing set of people taking care of the guests. '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Great value, clean rooms‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very friendly staff, beautiful place'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Amazing facility, amiable staff‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'A portuegese property well kept, full of great hues. Very refreshing experience '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Lovely staff , great location ,a lil overpriced ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Stayed at the luxury casa on top .. amazing spacious room with 2 beautiful balconies.
You should call the property and get clarity on the different rooms they have as agoda and the casa have different ideas of what these rooms are.
Sameer at the reception was extremely helpful and along with the efficient kitchen staff ,made our stay comfortable. 
Very few facilities at the casa , apart from a nice pool. Wifi connectivity is ok,not great.
All in all felt the price is a little on the higher side despite the nice central location, very close to starco.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Beautiful oasis in Anjuna‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "My friend and I booked casa anjuna very last minute and quite late in the day. Welcomed in, showed to our beautiful room and settled, we didn't actually leave the hotel much until we had to move on! The pool is a dream as are the friendly and helpful staff. It's understated old school Goa, highly recommended!! "}, {'Review_Rating': '2.7', 'Review_Heading': 'Not a hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Beautiful building and gardens'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.3', 'Review_Heading': 'Gorgeous heritage hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Antique rooms, garden setting, restaurant setting'}]

They don't change bedsheets or the staff is horrible."}, {'Review_Rating': '3.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Not good service at all‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "The staff isn't aware of the room services. The room was ok, health faucet wasn't working and when i asked the house keeping to fix it, they didn't bothered to fix it. The breakfast was way too limited with only 3 options. However, on our 2nd day, the chef was not available at the time of breakfast and we were supposed to leave the hotel without eating. The place is located in a totally secluded area. You can't find any means of transportation from here. Only option is to rent a vehicle with help of the staff. That too is way costly then other hotels. Not a good experience. I won't recommended at all. {'Location': 'Vagator Beach Road, Anjuna, Vagator, Goa, India, 403509', 'overall_rating': 'Select your room', 'Name': 'Living Room Hotel', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Value for money '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good place at a great location‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Cons:

1. This property is at great location with some of the happening places nearby.

2. Staff was friendly and very helpful.

3. I booked a Premium Master Room and it was very spacious room.

Only cons that I faced was;
1. No proper car parking available at the property and you have to park outside on the road which is quite busy.

2. Bathrooms are bit smelly due to common exhaust duct.

I've booked it on Christmas so it was bit costly for me but on normal days this property is a value for money. "}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Above average‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The place is not clean at all, it‚Äôs very unhygienic '}, {'Review_Rating': '4.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Pictures shown on website is not the same'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Hotel is Old and Rooms very small‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Not worth the price.. Room was shown in the app as 334 sq ft and the room was not even 150 sq ft. Not sure whom to blame. Location is OK. Bit far from good eateries and shopping'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Comfiest mattress I‚Äôve even slept on   ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Great little hotel , very chilled , stayed twice now for 4 weeks , excellent helpful staff .. nice pool
& best mattress ever ..'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Clean, helpful and good location. ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Arrived at 6am Saturday morning, been travelling for around 14hrs. And I was in my room within 5 mins of arriving at the hotel. All the staff that worked there are so polite, breakfast was good had different variety. Pool was a nice size for being an adults hotel. Overall happy with the hotel. Very nice Punjabi restaurant 30seconds walk away from hotel called Apana Punjab. Food is so amazing. Local taxi they called for me " Rattna"  the best driver you could ask for so polite and value for money. Very honest guy. Overall I'm happy with my stay at Living Room. '}, {'Review_Rating': '5.7', 'Review_Heading': 'Bad management‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Location, the beds & interia decor of the hotel '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'THE BEST HOTEL IN VAGATOR‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'STAFF, FOOD, ENVIRONMENT'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'good hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'good. nice location'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'best hotel in goa‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'very clean'}, {'Review_Rating': '3.3', 'Review_Heading': 'Poor‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Rooms clean, budget hotel , good size of rooms'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Most memorable days of my life in living room‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nice design,Comfortable room, Good Food'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.7', 'Review_Heading': 'wonderful Stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': ' Professional  Staff, great service, nice decor'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.7', 'Review_Heading': 'Not upto the satisfaction‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'good bed, nice breakfast'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Relaxing‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Beautiful, relaxing and great massage'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.3', 'Review_Heading': 'Friendly staff,great rooms,over all- no complaints‚Äù', 'Review_Body': ' '}, {'Review_Rating': '7.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice place to stay. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'OK‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'OK'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Amazing Property‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Great Location,Great Food'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'worth it‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Awesome property'}, {'Review_Rating': '3.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Bad food, no facilities compared to the money charged. For 8000 per night, we felt like fools. Wasnt value for money at all. It was more like loot'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Perfect Stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Everything is good at this hotel, from the friendly staff to the clean rooms. Bed is big, a/c cools fast, pool is quite small. Location is also good 2mins walk to the beach....restaurant inside is a bit costly. But there are nearby restaurants outside the hotel. This is our 2nd visit here in 2months....'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Very near to Miramar beach and Panji City‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The hotel is a good property, right on the main road and very close to Miramar beach and Panji city. The staff was very courteous. Food was awesome and especially loved the bakery items. Those cookies with tea were just superb.'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Perfect stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Everything is good in this hotel...we were skeptical at first because this was our first visit in this hotel and first stay in Panaji side. We normally stay in calangute and candolim. But this time we tried in the city and this hotel didnt fail us. Rooms are big, A/c cools perfectly, swimming pool is quite small... food is excellent. Beach is just 2mins walk..Restaurants and cafes are also closeby, few meters away...Staffs are courteous and very helpful.  Overall stay is good and highly recommended to everyone. 
We will surely stay in this hotel on our next visit.'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Bad experience‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Hotel failed to provide transfer so I spent 1 hour looking for the driver at the airport with my 5 month daughter. 
Hotel didn't prepare room as requested(1 bed), no baby cot was provided so I waited for 3 hours as night guy can't make any decisions.
Same night got stuck in the elevator, ring bell inside wasn't working so I was insisted to shout and know to the elevator's door.
Location itself is not so good, there is nothing to do in Panji at all. I moved to Callangute some days after and it was much better.

Only thing that was good is restaurant food and waiters that really pays attention for you and make sure that your beer bottle is fair cold. Thank you, guys.

"}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Decent Hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Location : Its within the town of the island near to one of the casino.

A decent hotel to stay if you are not looking for any frill.  It's just convenient as it is within the vicinity of the town.

The front office staff are helpful.  We stayed at the hotel to attend an Indian wedding.  Being new to the culture, the front office staff offered to dress up my friend in sari and given us some tips on the Indian wedding culture.  Certainly appreciated the gesture.
"}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Superb hotel with great staff. Special mention to Himanshu the restaurant manager. Great customer service skill!!!! Other staff both reception and orchid restaurant very very good and helpful. I would highly recommend this hotel. Only negative it's a bit far from baga calangute area. Clean room, nice new hotel. I had a great stay. "}], 'price': '9,500', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/1639637/-1/3fc324d6d5b1004e99edcf2b676ee2c9.jpg?ca=21&ce=0&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '27m¬≤', 'amenities': ['Non-smoking', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Mirror', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Satellite/cable channels', 'Air conditioning', 'Daily newspaper', 'Hand sanitizer', 'Coffee/tea maker', 'Free bottled water', 'Desk', 'Seating area', 'Fire extinguisher', 'Smoke detector'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/fortune-miramar-goa/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&tspTypes=2&los=1&searchrequestid=3cd01d2c-b1a8-4693-b1ea-b80943a74688'}

details:
{'Location': 'Dando Football Ground, PO - Benaulim, Colva, Goa, India, 403716', 'overall_rating': '7.1', 'Name': 'Treehouse Silken Sands', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'good place in South goa ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good place in South goa, room is clean, but just breakfast should be included. '}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Great Location - Great View!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The hotel was located not to far from either Colva or Benaulim beaches. Although there was no breakfast buffet, there were a few options on the ala carte menu to choose from. The Staff were very friendly. Note, there is no lift at this hotel.'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Great Location - Great View!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The Hotel by itself is self-sustained with very accommodating staff. They had all the amenities required and were located a 5 min car ride from the beach.'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Great Hotel, Worst Food ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Hotel is not only about building maintenance. The hotel staff must understand that people like to eat nicely specially if you are charging hefty prices for the food items. 

Kitchen is way too long from the sittings, on first days experience of too much time to bring food, we ordered only two cup tea on next day and decided to take breakfast somewhere else. But guess what we waited 40 mins and left without the tea. 

Dear hotel staff, people have plans to start the day, if you think people will wait hours and hours and enjoy only the view of hotel, you are extremely wrong. Second thing your breakfast starts at 8.30 am which is already too late plus the time your cook makes food is very annoying. 

We could understand the time if the food you are serving is quality, but it was clearly not. Plus you are selling small water bottles,
Why? People need to drink water. Keep atleast 1 ltr watter bottle in room and in breakfast table. Why so cheap? 

Please train your staff properly, change your cook, adjust the kitchen to dining area and lastly give importance to peoples time.

Thanks.'}, {'Review_Rating': '3.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Poor‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We paid more due to weekend like 3800 per room but if its available at 1200 then good.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice comfortable stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very nice view nice staff comfortable n clean room'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'No restaurant ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "They don't serve breakfast and lunch &dinner"}, {'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Avoid‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'This is a very very basic place. Not maintained. Things falling apart. In addition, highly overpriced. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Hotel is good to stay, Staff is very co-operative'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Pathetic hotel,no facilities are available. '}, {'Review_Rating': '2.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Really really bad hotel experience ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "First of all, this hotel is not at all as it's shown in the images here. It's all fake.

1. No restaurant services are available here. You don't have any great options to eat nearby also.
2. Hotel reception  staff is very rude. Misbehaved multiple times.
3. Pools is not really a pool. It's a small baby pool which is dirty and you can see insects around all the time

Please don't go for this hotel. Better spend your money at a good hotel."}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Bathroom in our room always had Urine smell. Balcony is much bigger than the room itself. We stayed only for 1 day and didn't bother to raise our concerns as didn't feel the staff welcoming."}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Great experience‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Best hotel in that rate.. Amazing experience and room are  nice.. It was under maintenance but still great experience. '}, {'Review_Rating': '4.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Not good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Hotel looks in pic is completely different than actual. They are not maintaining hotel. Pool is also not clean, everywhere you will see lots of dust'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Above average‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good value for money, but not worth staying if you will be spending time at the hotel. If you need a place near Colva to store your luggage and a roof for the night, this is the perfect balance of cost and comfort. Staff is courteous and helpful, but communication needs work. '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Decent stay ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good for location, amenities can be better. '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "This is an old generation resort but the good thing is they are starting renovating this property . The rooms are spacious and the staff is good. Location wise, it's OK.  Better wait for this renovation, then only consider booking."}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'AVERAGE‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good place must visit rooms size is big. And staffs are also co-operative '}, {'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Not worth only pictures are good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Pictures are too old agoda no maintained property '}, {'Review_Rating': '2.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Waste of money. Worst service ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Hotel rooms were very dirty, staff is totally unresponsive. They have a receptionist who is always busy playing games on his mobile and least concerned about customers. Kitchen was shut so had to rely on Swiggy for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Remote location, no mini bar as shown in the website. Rooms are pretty dirty and you have to call staff multiple times for cleaning. I felt that they were least interested in hosting customers. Worst trip and I request Agoda to verify themselves before recommending to customer. It's cheating."}], 'price': '2,310', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/109609/-1/d8308d7756aadf43dc725ae52277d33d.jpg?ca=7&ce=1&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '20m¬≤', 'amenities': ['City view', 'Smoking allowed', 'Shower', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Satellite/cable channels', 'Telephone', 'Air conditioning', 'Blackout curtains', 'Fan', 'Linens', 'Wake-up service', 'Coffee/tea maker', 'Free bottled water', 'Desk', 'Closet', 'Clothes rack', 'Ironing facilities'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/treehouse-silken-sands/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&los=1&searchrequestid=3cd01d2c-b1a8-4693-b1ea-b80943a74688'}

Quality of room , bed , matress are lowset.
Hygine wise zero , you can find Lizards and big mosqueto in room when balocony is closed.
You can not use balcony you would feel bad smell .
Worst Breakfast, with worst quality.
A big big no, do not ever choose it.'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.0', 'Review_Heading': "Wouldn't recommend‚Äù", 'Review_Body': "Room is alright. Aircon and hot water works.

Pool is disgusting. 

Staff were very clueless. Check in was an interesting experience to say the least. Despite a seriously frustrating check in experience the part that seriously annoyed me was how they hounded me for my passport and visa every few minutes even though I had already given them the details multiple times. details:
{'Location': 'Amadi Beach Front Resort, Morjim, Goa, India, 403527', 'overall_rating': '8.4', 'Name': 'Amadi Beach Front Resort', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'One of the best properties over ashwem beachfront '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Bad restaurant, good staff, big rooms ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The restaurant food quality and service is extremely bad. They really need to make major upgrades to the same. 

The staff otherwise is really nice, including at the reception. Despite being completely sold out they gave us our rooms asap. The rooms and bathrooms were huge!! However, It was overpriced for the quality '}, {'Review_Rating': '3.2', 'Review_Heading': 'extremely overpriced for the value‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Below average rooms with restrooms smelling like public urinals. Poor quality linens and bedsheets. Loud music till late nights 1.30 AM from restaurant making it impossible to sleep even after mid night. Not enough towels at beach. Only positive is beach access but there are better options with beach access.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Location is best but service is not good ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We booked premium Suit here. The wifi is not working at all. The view is best. Beach side resort. Good is good but too costly. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice place with cosy environment ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Loved this place for following reasons
Location is at beach front. Room was decent and had all basic necessities except minibar. 
Food was good but little expensive.
Can surely recommend for family stays. 
'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Good beach setup‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'New resort. This place is secluded from the noise & is right on the beach. The beach in this part is suitable for bathing with family or lazying on couches laid on the beach under thd sun. Nice experience. Cleanliness inside room & buffet breakfast could be improved. '}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Chill stay at amadi‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Property location is top notch. View from the beach restaurant is heaven.  Cleanliness was average. Rooms are  ok and compact. Breakfast buffet is below average and no variety. Staff manager is good. They provided a temporary accomodation for our driver when requested at minimal charge. Overall a decent stay if you want to chill at a beach front resort in north goa.'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Overall a good stay ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "We stayed in room 201, which was at backside of their kitchen washarea,  that's why room and specially bathroom was stinking alot again n again even after spraying room freshner."}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent stay with my wife ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "I booked stay for 3 days, this property located on aswim beach, it's a quite beach. Food is bit costly but worth. We booked suit room which was best part of stay.  Staff is very helpful and friendly."}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Vibrant, soothing and beautiful ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Its a completely satisfying package with good food, clean and spacious rooms, courteous staff and excellent location '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Great Location‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Great Location!! '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Excellent location and view.... Well behaved and helpful staff...and not to forget beautiful pool'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'One of the best resorts on the beach‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "This was my 5th trip to Goa and this time with a large group of 11  people in the family. I am glad to share that this is one of nicest resorts that I chose to stay for a couple of nights
1) Its right there on the beach itself and hence offers an awesome view from the resort and their Beachfront restaurant named Breakers
2) They have their own parking area so no hassles if you are renting a car
3) They serve complimentary breakfast and it's really delicious
4) Swimming pool is well maintained
5) Staff is humble and eager to serve everytime

It's a new resort and I hope they will have many more things/facilities to offer in due course"}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Waaaaw what a location ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We enjoyed a lot, very good staff and service, nice food.
Best part was 100 number suite, with excellent view. Over all nice place to stay and get rejuvenated.
'}], 'price': '7,774', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/30672063/-1/1af24334c8ce34bc304c175b0c74e6bf.jpg?ce=0&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '0', 'amenities': ['Garden view', 'Balcony/terrace', 'Shower and bathtub', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Hair dryer', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Walk-in shower', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Pool facilities', 'Telephone', 'TV [flat screen]', 'Adapter', 'Air conditioning', 'Alarm clock', 'Fan', 'Linens', 'Private entrance', 'Wake-up service', 'Coffee/tea maker', 'Free bottled water', 'Outdoor furniture', 'Seating area', 'Trash cans', 'Closet', 'Clothes rack', 'Ironing facilities', 'In-room safe box', 'Locker', 'Safety/security feature'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/amadi-beach-front-resort/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&los=1&searchrequestid=3cd01d2c-b1a8-4693-b1ea-b80943a74688'}

details:
{'Location': '3rd Ward, Colva Beach Road, Colva, Goa, India, 403708', 'overall_rating': '7.5', 'Name': 'Salcete Beach Resort', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Excellent '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good location '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Good location, great pool, great amenities‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very nice location- a 5 to 10 min walk from the beach and all the beach shacks. you do have the walk the last part thro a fishermans village which is quite messy but other than that a great location. lifeguards at the ocean, fun beach shacks, clean beach.  beach is not very crowded unlike neighbouring beaches. we spent hours at a time in the beach.
pool is amazing! big, well maintained and beautiful. we spent a lot of time by the pool swimming, drinking and chilling. you can get a beer by the pool.
rooms: quite good- fairly spacious, well stocked. nice bathroom- modern.
good food, good staff- very attentive.
got us a cab last minute when all options were failing- truly obliged to them for that.
overall a great resort, lots of fun, everyone in our 10 person group had a blast.'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good facility, but poor customer service‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The reception staff (particularly the male staff) and security staff are rude. Long delay in service, even for a simple request. Breakfast had only french toast and pav bhaaji as options on day 1 - not worth it.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "It's a amazing hotel near to the beach. I will definitely recommend people to stay here. Staff is good, food is good, and the rooms are also well maintained and clean."}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice resort and staff‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nice resort, very clean rooms, restaurant staffs are so good, serves you better, swimming pool area is so clean and you feel like swim again and again, they serve snacks drinks to swimming pool, very good family resort. And colva beach is near. '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good hotel and good food. The best thing is that the prices of food items are very reasonable and for some items, even lower than outside restaurants in the locality.'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Location is too bad , no cabs available '}, {'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Overpriced not on the beach hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Has a pool, is some 500 meters to Colva beach. Rooms are okay and not very spacious. No lift. Service was poor. Very overpriced '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Awesome place the staff is very cool operative and helpful food was very tasty the swimming pool is huge the location it's not beach property the main beach is around 500m from hotel . We stayed in royal suite which was total worth the money superb amenities inside the suit overall 4.5out of 5 "}, {'Review_Rating': '4.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Hospitality   was not good. House meeting n cleaning staff was not aware about his/her duty. Food is also not tasty as per menu n price is high.hotel number is not contactable most of the time.'}], 'price': '5,826', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/22772035/320197315/3b0b9caca351c175eba233b80da447bc.jpg?ce=0&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '0', 'amenities': ['Free Wi-Fi', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Air conditioning', 'Daily newspaper', 'Fire extinguisher'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/salcete-beach-resort/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&tspTypes=4,-1&los=1&searchrequestid=3cd01d2c-b1a8-4693-b1ea-b80943a74688'}

{'Location': 'Post Office Road, Calangute, Calangute, Goa, India, 403 516', 'overall_rating': '7.2', 'Name': 'Neelams The Grand Hotel', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '2.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Total waste of money. Highly disappointed.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Ok very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very good rooms and food '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Perfect location to cover north Goa‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Hotel is at a great location providing all kind of facilities to make a stay peaceful and pleasurable. In house restaurant was amazing and the food was very delicious. Would surely recommend for a peaceful stay'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good hotel ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good hotel'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Luxury Hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good for couple, breakfast taste is too good. Enjoy Luxury stay with your solemate  . I recommend to all the couples and families.'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Neelams The Grand Family Suite Room‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We have booked a Family suite room but the room was not worthy for the money that we spent. The room is not well maintained. The A/C in the room was not working properly. The bath room fittings were also not maintained propely, most of them were damaged. Also the check out time given in the bolking app wa 11AM but hotel ask us to check out by 10AM. The positive things are the location of the hotel, the food and the pool. The breakfast provided was taste wise ok but not worthy for the money, they have only limited options. '}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'take it if you are looking for location‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'food and property is average. rooms are old. better to look for other options, new properties are much better.'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Lizards everywhere ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "We have stayed at this place multiple times but this time thy provided us room on top floor n to go down we had to take life. Near lift area there were so many lizards. It was so scary. I'll never visit this place again"}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Hotel is good!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Only one problem .. hotel room was big but furniture is old! kettle is also broken - Bathroom is also old! overall hotel ambience is preety good! Location is superb! big pool! '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Property is aging‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Rooms are ok, some new rooms are good. 

Staff is friendly. 

Buffet food is strictly ok. Order'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Everything gud‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Ac of room was not gud and working room no G20 not changed even after complain also. Rest all gud'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very good and friendly'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Good Stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'location is plus point. Most things you need are closely available. Hotel was clean, staff very cordial, lovely dining near pool with orchestra. We all loved it'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent Experience ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The manager of Hotel and other staff were very courteous.Food was really tasty.Pool is big enough for a group of 20 people.2 km from calangute beach.Big rooms with average size washrooms.One of the better properties of the area. 
'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Worst Ever 4 star hotel  we stayed, no value for Money‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I stayed with my family in February, we booked well in advance by Jan second week, and paid the entire amount, as they say free oick uo from airport firstly the pick up was delayed by 1 hour, then the reservation asked us to wait for check in another 1 hour or so.

Then to the biggest supprise the room category I booked was already sold out, They offred me a room which was so cheap I asked to arrange for the category I booked, then any how they managed and shifted me .

Belive me the room was not cleaned nor the bedsheet was changed it had stains all over it the floor was muddy cant work barefoot the was room was as good as a guest house common I told the receptioned Maya she told come down and ask for the room change, but she never sent a person to clean the wash room.

We will never ever book this hotel or recomend this. Total waste of Money'}, {'Review_Rating': '3.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Worst service ever‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The room was not even  cleaned. There were cobwebs everywhere. Sub standard services. Zero privacy. Smells dingy. Would never recommend it. Everything was under maintained. From room to vicinity. 
Had to checkout very next day. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Awesome!!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'This is my 3rd stay at the hotel and as always, it has made me very happy..will again go and stay there only'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'decent hotel with all ameneties‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'neelams the grand was a decent hotel with all basic ameneties. the location was a good one , close to beach. the food served here was also good.the room given bit old and the washroom was dirty. overall ok ok exeprience'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent hotel and service‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Excellent hotel and service'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Value For Money‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'good hotel with good food and facilities

'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Worst Ever 4 star hotel  we stayed, no value for Money‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I stayed with my family in February, we booked well in advance by Jan second week, and paid the entire amount, as they say free oick uo from airport firstly the pick up was delayed by 1 hour, then the reservation asked us to wait for check in another 1 hour or so.

Then to the biggest supprise the room category I booked was already sold out, They offred me a room which was so cheap I asked to arrange for the category I booked, then any how they managed and shifted me .

Belive me the room was not cleaned nor the bedsheet was changed it had stains all over it the floor was muddy cant work barefoot the was room was as good as a guest house common I told the receptioned Maya she told come down and ask for the room change, but she never sent a person to clean the wash room.

We will never ever book this hotel or recomend this. Total waste of Money'}, {'Review_Rating': '3.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Worst service ever‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The room was not even  cleaned. There were cobwebs everywhere. Sub standard services. Zero privacy. Smells dingy. Would never recommend it. Everything was under maintained. From room to vicinity. 
Had to checkout very next day. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Awesome!!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'This is my 3rd stay at the hotel and as always, it has made me very happy..will again go and stay there only'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'decent hotel with all ameneties‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'neelams the grand was a decent hotel with all basic ameneties. the location was a good one , close to beach. the food served here was also good.the room given bit old and the washroom was dirty. overall ok ok exeprience'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent hotel and service‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Excellent hotel and service'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Value For Money‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'good hotel with good food and facilities 
'}]
