details:
{'Location': '296, Colomb, Palolem, Palolem, Goa, India, 403702', 'overall_rating': '8.2', 'Name': 'Bhakti Kutir Huts', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '4.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Mosquitoes and creepy crawlies‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "These are actual bamboo huts without any walls! So be preapered to share your 'room' with insects and other local wildlife"}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Be one with nature‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Oldest property in South Goa. The huts, the people, the restaurant, the animals...the best.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good food‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'healthy, sustainable and very delicious'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Different experience - very nice place‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Highly recommended, very good staff, connect with nature & amazing food'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'The place is very beautiful and cool. ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nice and cozy '}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Soothing experience ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Urban population will love the nature at its best in bhakti kutir. There are many more huts in palolem area. I recommend the traveller to must explore it.'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good place for stay'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Must visit if in South Goa‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Beautiful place created with lots of love. Its rustic, in middle of nature, lots of plants and trees, beautifully done huts, a nice restaurant to eat and chill out. Beach at walking distance. Lots of birds.

Would highly recommend to stay.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Peaceful stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Everything is at its best here, food is bit costly at this place but you have many other options outside that you can go for.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "It's a good hotel but it's not near palolem Beach and it will take 100/- auto fare to reach the Beach.  Overall stay in this is excellent. "}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Great stay!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'For people who want something low-key, close to nature, in greenery, this place is perfect! Beach is 5 minute walk away and this place has everything for a comfortable stay. We enjoyed the Ayurveda massage a lot, and it was reasonable too (60 mins for 1200), and the food here is nutritious and tasty. Loved the breakfast we had - aloo paratha, omlette, toast and smoothie. '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Okay but ‚Ä¶‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Pros - good food, very friendly and welcoming staff, nature, well located and eco-friendly huts. 

Cons - huts are not insulated hence you hear everything very loudly and it can get pretty cold at night. I wouldn‚Äôt recommend this place during monsoon season. Mosquitos and ants are really an issue since you are the forest. Dont underestimate this aspect and if you choose this place, come prepared. 

I dont think it‚Äôs worth the price for the reasons mentioned above but that‚Äôs my opinion. It is surely worth coming and seeing for yourself. '}, {'Review_Rating': '4.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Disappointed ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I booked this place because I thought it was going to be a relaxing end to my travels, it wasn‚Äôt. It was such a noisy room, I was there for a week and didn‚Äôt sleep through the night once, it was noisy until about 11.00 and then noise starts with mad cockerels at about 4.30. The bed felt dirty, the pillows smelt musty and the bed was so hard that I woke up feeling like I had been camping. I dreaded trying to go to sleep in that hut every night. '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Great place‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'great location, amazing restaurant, staff very helpful'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Peaceful place!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Loved the location ‚Äî\xa0away from the noise and crowd of Palolem ‚Äî but such a short walk to get there through an easy little trail (5 mins with my 6 year old). Such a peaceful and chill property.  Lots of old-school details that Wes Anderson would appreciate. Food was excellent. Yoga was great. I'm sorry to have missed the Sunday music night. I would/will stay again ‚Äî\xa0though cottages could definitely use small repairs, upkeep and better cleaning. I really, really hope they put some more care into this place -- it is a gem. I imagine at one time it was fantastic. For now though, if you don't mind rugged and a little run down ‚Äî\xa0it's an excellent choice. "}, {'Review_Rating': '2.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I had already been there years ago and remembered it was a wonderful place.
Probably the owner / management has changed in the meantime.
extremely dirty, the plants and flowers that used to be so beautiful are completely neglected and dry. 
Rooms impossible to stay in.  
The location is ok and could be a wonderful place if only they would take good care of it and clean it.
Hope this review helps them to do so.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Was I in heaven? Bhakti Kutir was that kind of solitude...pure bliss‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Seldom there are places which are not just hotels, but a part of you stays with them forever and a part of them, you carry back with you!
Bhakti Kutir was one such experience for me...my long cherished and dreamt of solo birthday trip and I booked Bhakti Kutir on pure impulse...I couldn't have been more right in that moment.

The cottages are lovely, the greens around you are infectiously charming...the little ghungroo hung at your door is like poetry in itself and the awesomely quiet monsoon beach of Palolem...I was intrigued, mesmerised and amazed by the place!

A word of caution...the resort is far far away from the hustle and bustle of Touristy Goa...secluded and preserved like a gem...but then who was complaining! and over that, a lovely spa and awesomely sumptuous organic meals; that serenely pale ginger tea in cold evenings and a cat whisking away around me. I was, as if transported into a Ruskin Bond novel.

Loved it totally...can't wait to go back to Bhakti Kutir...truly!"}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Was I in heaven...Bhakti Kutir was that kind of solitude! Pure bliss‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Seldom there are places which are not just hotels, but a part of you stays with them forever and a part of them, you carry back with you!
Bhakti Kutir was one such experience for me...my long cherished and dreamt of solo birthday trip and I booked Bhakti Kutir on pure impulse...I couldn't have been more right in that moment.

The cottages are lovely, the greens around you are infectiously charming...the little ghungroo hung at your door is like poetry in itself and the awesomely quiet monsoon beach of Palolem...I was intrigued, mesmerised and amazed by the place!

A word of caution...the resort is far far away from the hustle and bustle of Touristy Goa...secluded and preserved like a gem...but then who was complaining! and over that, a lovely spa and awesomely sumptuous organic meals; that serenely pale ginger tea in cold evenings and a cat whisking away around me. I was, as if transported into a Ruskin Bond novel.

Loved it totally...can't wait to go back to Bhakti Kutir...truly!"}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Stunning setting‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "The Eco huts are in the middle of the rainforest yet you can hear the sea a few hundred metres away. The food is great, staff obliging and the beds comfortable.

The aryuveda massage onsite was fantastic and it's all reasonably priced.

You need to pack your bug spray, but it's more than worth it - the place is amazing."}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'A little bit of Paradise here‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I loved being in this wonderful place, next year I hope to return for three weeks instead of one.'}], 'price': '2,600', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/522/522652/522652_14021513580018350173.jpg?ca=13&ce=1&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '25m¬≤', 'amenities': ['2 double beds', 'Garden view', 'Non-smoking', 'Shower', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Mirror', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Fan', 'Mosquito net', 'Desk'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/bhakti-kutir-huts/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&tspTypes=2&los=1&searchrequestid=3cd01d2c-b1a8-4693-b1ea-b80943a74688'}

details: {'Location': 'Lane Opposite Ajay Wines, Calangute Arpora Road, Porba Vaddo Calangute, Goa, Calangute, Goa, India, 403516', 'overall_rating': '7.4', 'Name': 'TSK Di Maru', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Above average‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Got a 1bhk in budget but cleaning area needs some improvement.'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Customer service poor'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Best & affordable place to stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "It is the most affordable and excellent place you'll find in Calangute. The staff is friendly, the rooms are spacious, and you've parking facilities. I would really recommend staying here. "}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'A bit disappointed‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Rooms were clean. Smell was good. Had a bit more than enough space for 2 people. However there are things that needs to be taken care of. There was water jug or anything given to us. We have to give a bottle to them and they will fill it which is kind of annoying. Rooms and foors were plastered '}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Value for money üí∏‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Hard to find the hotel .Local are not inform of its new name.U can search : :  TSK Crystal Homestay on Google Maps for location.TV was not working.Rest of all is good.Good Service and hospitality.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'best property‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'i love the place the ambience rooms are very pretty nice and cozy place to stay'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Value for money place‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Not easy to locate but .. near to beach .. clean n pure hotel facilities are there. \nAlso you need to carry identity cards like aadhar card they keep it with them .'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Best Hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very nice Hotel'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'This was my third time booking in Di Maru and I love this property very much especially Room No. 104 (my favourite). You will get everything in this budget hotel.Rooms are big, spacious, neat and clean, peaceful and calm, good staff etc....Trust me again when I visit to Goa in the next year I will book Di Maru once again. Thanks!'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice stay at Di Maru‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Only thing is we didn't have a geyser provided. I would like this to happen soon so that I can come again to Goa n to the same hotel. üòä"}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "It's a good property situated in the vicinity of Calangute and Baga beach. Hot water is not guaranteed since they have solar heaters installed, also the linen is changed on an alternate day basis and not daily. Although the owner was kind enough to take care of this request for us. Would recommend it for its location and pocket-friendliness. "}, {'Review_Rating': '2.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Worst Stay.... Better to avoid ... interior place..‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Worst Stay...... No hot water.... No transport facilities..... No parking...... And mostly.... No entrance too.... "}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'A bit disappointed‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Rooms were clean. Smell was good. Had a bit more than enough space for 2 people. {'Location': 'Calangute Baga Road, Umta Vaddo, Calangute, Goa, India, 403516', 'overall_rating': '7.4', 'Name': 'Ticlo Resort', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Kjerstin‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Would'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Cheater‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Strongly not recommend this hotel for a family. There are lots of loopholes in prebooking. Would recommend you to check at least twice about ammenities before check in. Don't trap in pictures of swimming pool. "}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'One of the best services we have received till now‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'As per their motto they are actually redefining the hospitality. This is one of the best services i have received till now. Everything was superb. As i had checked in on my birthday they have surprised me with Complimentary birthday cake too.

Very Good location
Very good breakfast
Very good Staff

I will definitely recommend it. Thanks ticlo resort for making our holidays memorable 
'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice stay in Ticlo Calngute ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Location is very close to Calngute beach and market on walking distance, baaga beach also hardly 1 km from resort.
Staffs are very cooperative and helpful.

The hotel kept menu Card in rooms are not updated one ,so while placing order check with restaurant the menu actual price.

Food was good , fresh and delicious.

We used to stay in ticlo from last 4-5 years.
Best part of hotel the owner who is interactive with guest and with his staff which good sign of  management.


Love you Ticlo.... we keep visiting and hoping better and better service in future as well.'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good location, limited stuff, lack of maintenance ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Old building.  The front image is fir super expensive rooms than the quality.  The Delux room on ground floor pathetic ( Damp room ). Top room better . Bigger in size . Daily cleaning avl. Food quality poor . Swimming pool maintained properly.  Still my opening to find alternative option @ hotel rooms tarrief '}, {'Review_Rating': '4.8', 'Review_Heading': 'standard rooms are general building behind hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'showing online photo of resort with swimming pool but have to stay behind dirty building. '}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Value for money ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Great location very central '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Decent Rooms.....Very Convinient to reach beaches Like Baga, Calangute from this place.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Economical rooms.... very cooperative staff.....Breakfast was not great....very limited option in it.'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I thought it was grotty.'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Terrible experience‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Me and a friend had a late night journey and wanted to rest at the hotel. When I booked the hotel, I requested late check in and late check out (2 pm). They said they would try to accommodate. 

My friend reached at 5 am and checked in. When I reached at 11:30, they informed me that I couldn't check in. I had asked for half an hour more, and they refused to give me the half hour. 

They said they would do so, but for half hour they would charge a half day rate. I was really upset because I literally booked the room so I could get a late check out and the hotel refused to accommodate. 

The better part? They would let my friend have half hour more in the room, but they would not let me go up. 

Terrible experience and I definitely do not reccomend the hotel to anyone. "}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Wonderful stay !!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Dont expect 5 star service or amenities. But for the price a very nice and clean room.
Right in the middle of all the action.
Reception staff member mr joseph very helpful and polite.
Clean linen
Only hitch was that the room was dated.  But then what would you expect for 2500 rs in goa in december? 
I would definitely visit again. '}, {'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Poor hospitalilty‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Insensitive staff.. poor breakfast ... Unreachable manager.. room condition pathetic..only grace is d location. '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Very Good Staff‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'GooD FooD , good place '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.7', 'Review_Heading': 'it is located  at great location‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'worth for money'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.3', 'Review_Heading': 'nice resort‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'nice, supportive,good '}, {'Review_Rating': '3.0', 'Review_Heading': 'it is worest hotel i had visited in goa‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'first price issue.
staff behavior is not good because we book from u not directly. Supermarket,beach and restaurants can easily access '}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Worst hotel ever‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "If you'll ever want to waste your vacation than please book this hotel. There is no proper WiFi connection. And TV is just a piece of decorative item.

"}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Best Stay at Morjim‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Best place to stay near to the beach in morjim silent atmosphere walkable distance to beach and beach shacks centre place to roam around easily in both Goa. Clean rooms tasty food and safe parking. Staff is very responsive '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Really good room‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It‚Äôs everything you want from a room - clean, hot water shower, duvet, good pillows & mattress, fridge, kettle, balcony, ashtray, seats, amenities (water, coffee and tea) and a restaurant (which is OK at best) great room to reset or worth the money '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': "It's good ‚Äù", 'Review_Body': "I got this property at the rate of 1300 ...as per this price property was good ... small room with balcony .... morning hot water problem....they don't have gyser they used solar energy for hot water .... Location was good near by morjim beache 10 min walking distance "}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very good location a few minutes from the beach in a green area of Morjim. '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Best stay and very lively place recommended 100%'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'The best hotel in Morjim ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'excellent quality and a good price'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Great value stay near Morjim beach‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "The hotel corresponds to the photos 100%. There is no pool, but you don't need it, the hotel is 5 minutes away from the sea. The staff is very attentive to vacationers and immediately ready to help, even with questions unrelated to the hotel. The rooms have snow-white linen like in expensive hotels. The hotel itself has everything you need for a pleasant stay. We really enjoyed our stay here"}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Great hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Great hotel,  very clean, good services, just some minor things like water is not very hot, or window is not locking. details:
{'Location': 'Arambol Beach, Goa, India', 'overall_rating': '8.0', 'Name': '12 Monks Hostel Goa', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "1. Google map shows another 12 monk hostel, but don't waste your time it is on main beach
2. Location wise it is superb
3. Better hostel environment
4. Having little issue of cleanliness and staff behaviour, but it doesn't matter much
Overall I'll recommend if you are a budget backpack and loves meeting people 
"}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Arambol‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Everything was Good'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Arambol‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Everything was Good'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Below average experience‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "The dorm rooms are okayish. There is just one common washroom. This is used by the people of all dorms & even the other people. This washroom is also not maintained properly. There is no hostel culture as such so don't expect that, if you are a backpacker. The only pro is the location. The hostel is directly facing the  Arambol Beach. The hostel reception area gives nice view of the beach. Apart from the locational advantage, I didn't find this hostel to be worth the money (if you are paying any amount more than Rs 500). The wi-fi was also a bit flaky/unstable. I personally wouldn't recommend staying here."}], 'price': '1,200', 'img_link': 'https://q-xx.bstatic.com/xdata/images/hotel/840x460/400285160.jpg?k=ffff1b1d87a1ccf4bba6e207a8f84214d6a4920376b0a1f3d28883281f9b97ba&o=', 'room_size': '13m¬≤', 'amenities': ['Sea view', 'Balcony/terrace', 'Shower and bathtub', 'Cleaning products', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Internet access ‚Äì wireless', 'Air conditioning', 'Fan', 'Hand sanitizer', 'Linens', 'Sleep comfort items', 'Wake-up service', 'Refrigerator', 'Desk', 'Outdoor furniture', 'Seating area', 'Separate dining area', 'Tile/marble flooring', 'Trash cans', 'Dressing room', 'Safety/security feature'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/12-monks-goa/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&los=1&searchrequestid=68e9a36c-cbca-4eb0-b3e0-c2ad18a7c6bf'}

details: {'Location': 'Ourem Rd Paloem Canacona Goa 403702, Palolem, Goa, India, 403702', 'overall_rating': '8.6', 'Name': 'Papillon Beach Huts ', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Great position and delightful staff‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Lovely welcome on arrival.  Initially shown to a garden hut, which was fine except that the tiles on the bathroom floor were quite damaged. So gladly accepted the offer to upgrade to a brand new room. This was very confortable and clean. The only downside being that it was attached directly to the neighbouring hut and you could hear every word and movement from there, so would defiantly go for a detached option next time.   The restaurant menu was very extensive and everything we ate was tasty and good value.  All the staff were very helpful and pleasant. Would definitely recommend and stay again. '}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Not so good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "The rooms weren't good, all smelly wooden and not in a good condition. We saw cockroach and lizard in the room."}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': '5-Star hospitality‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The location is excellent and is right next to the beach. Ferry rides to Monkey island and Kayaking are available just as you step out of the hotel into the beach.\nThe owner treated us very well and we thank him for serving us the late night dinner even when the kitchen was closed well before. Food was great, especially the thin crust pizza. Indian food was comforting and mocktails were just fine. There are a few restaurants in the neighborhood which also serve good food.\nThe rooms are very basic and only have the bare minimum facilities, but are clean. There is no AC in any of the rooms (if present, they are charged extra).'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Awesome papillon‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Host is wonderful. Best people to be around with. Nice place and awesome wholesome location. Foods are yumm .. we can even order foods that not in the menu.  Miss you all Papillons. Lots of love from assam'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Best beach hut‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very economical, good tasty food , nice environment, clean and tidy rooms. parking space available,  beach front huts, candle dinner on the beach was awesome. My family loved the facility will visit again'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We enjoyed every bit of our stay at Papillon Beach Huts. The staffs are super friendly and cooperative. We stayed at the sea view huts,globally one of the best views are available from there. Surreal experience due to the view from room. The only thing they lack is that there is no provision for room service, one needs to go to their beach shack for food.'}], 'price': '1,999', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/297/29746766/29746766_220108144000110406682.png?s=1024x768', 'room_size': '0', 'amenities': ['Free Wi-Fi', 'Wi-Fi [free]', 'Mosquito net', 'Window', 'First aid kit'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/papillon-beach-huts/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&los=1&searchrequestid=68e9a36c-cbca-4eb0-b3e0-c2ad18a7c6bf'}

details:
{'Location': '31st January Road, Fontainhas, Panaji, Panaji, Goa, India, 403 001', 'overall_rating': '8.4', 'Name': 'WelcomHeritage Panjim Inn Hotel', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Best hotel and staff ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very good stay Good food ...Restaurant service Fish kajufeni best ...nice staff and breakfast morning superb '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Great and vibrate location in Fontainhas with quaint bars and eating houses.   The old Portuguese accommodation was neat and clean.  Excellent food! 
Thank you to all the staff. 
G & J'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "people traveling to goa and looking to stay in panjim, then its a great place because of its location.
However, if you're looking for in-house entertainment and relaxation, then this is not the right place for you"}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'One of the last remaining pieces of the colonial Goa.  A perfect place to experience joie de vivre. Stay here if you love to explore Fontainhas, art and good food. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Great boutique hotel in Panjim‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "It's a nice boutique hotel near Panjim Market and in the middle of the heritage street Fontainhas Latin quarters. The breakfast is decent the staff is courteous and helpful.  Must stay at this place once rooms are clean and the oner is great. "}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': ' decent stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Food option for city stay'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Bathroom ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Bathroom located outside of room, particularly for Room No. 15.  Since hotel is antique in nature no lift is available.  '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Best place to explore  the Fontainhas Culture‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The hotel gives the vibe of old Portuguese style architecture. Good place to explore the Fontainhas, area (colorful villas, cafes, bars and pubs)  '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Old Goa Charm ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nice place... gives a really nice feel with all old world items '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Unique (Boutique) Hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I was visiting from UK and was keen to spend sometime in Panjim, visiting friends. The hotel has two parts andI stayed in the other bit, which has a small museum/ art gallery downstairs. This aspect gives it an unique ambience and the main part too has a lot of paintings and sculptures and lovingly restored. It feels one is in a "period" setting. Staff were excellent and whilst it may not have mod coms of a Five star place, the quiet elegance is unmatched. Main negative is the extensive road  works in the area, which is beyond control of the hotel and the area was over-run by tourists. I did not eat there, but did have breakfast and the surroundings and the breakfast itself was excellent. '}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Property is very old‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Yes, that‚Äôs the point of a heritage property but the bathrooms are very old.. 
old yellow linen and towels'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Vintage feelings ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'My stay felt like living in 18th or early 19th century in middle of 21st Century. '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good for stay. Food needs improvement. '}, {'Review_Rating': '4.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The price charged is higher than quoted while booking '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Location & Heritage- the only Positives ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Location is bang on.. The most photographed area in the Fountainhas.. All other attractions are at walking distance. The property is old with Heritage furniture and interiors, rooms are small though. Support staff is good, but the management isn't interested in you after check in, no feedbacks are taken about stay, small requests "}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Quality of Breakfast should be improved.'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Old Heritage premises‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It‚Äôs a good hotel to stay for once. The room no. 12 where in I was staying, wooden door was not shutting properly. There is no room service in the room. You have visit their restaurant & eat. Limited options for breakfast. But location was good, hence my suggestion is any one can try once‚Ä¶'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Heritage Hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "
Pros
Good Location
Beautiful Heritage interiors
Good Reception Staff
Flight ticket copy printing done
Reasonable Breakfast
Cons
Food service is bad.  Don't get coffee by 7 AM.
Few Staff don't know English
Food service not professionally carried out
TV was not working.  Complaint not taken seriously
GST Bill not provided, asked to get from website"}, {'Review_Rating': '4.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Disappointed ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The reality is that the owners are not concerned. Rooms were not clean, staff untrained and menu limited. Especially the breakfast was a big disappointment, last day of three day stay we could get something worthwhile after making complaints. 
House keeping is pathetic, TV despite of repeated requests they were not able to start. 
WiFi was not at all good, they gave excuses of poor bandwidth etc., which was supposed to be basic facility these days.
Please do not select this property, there are many options available with much better facilities and prices in this area. '}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Poor facility‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The services are not upto the mark'}], 'price': '6,500', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/109/109584/109584_14123012310024221953.jpg?ca=13&ce=1&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '20m¬≤', 'amenities': ['2 king beds', 'River view', 'Balcony/terrace', 'Non-smoking', 'Shower', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Hair dryer', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Walk-in shower', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Mobile hotspot device', 'Pool facilities', 'Satellite/cable channels', 'Telephone', 'Air conditioning', 'Alarm clock', 'Fan', 'Hand sanitizer', 'Linens', 'Private entrance', 'Sleep comfort items', 'Slippers', 'Wake-up service', 'Coffee/tea maker', 'Free bottled water', 'Fruits/snacks', 'Mini bar', 'Refrigerator', 'Wine glasses', 'Desk', 'Seating area', 'Trash cans', 'Window', 'Wooden/parqueted flooring', 'Closet', 'Clothes rack', 'Ironing facilities', 'Trouser press', 'Accessible by stairs', 'Individual air conditioning', 'In-room safe box', 'Locker', 'Smoke detector'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/welcomheritage-panjim-inn-hotel/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&tspTypes=2&los=1&searchrequestid=68e9a36c-cbca-4eb0-b3e0-c2ad18a7c6bf'}

'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Great boutique hotel in Panjim‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "It's a nice boutique hotel near Panjim Market and in the middle of the heritage street Fontainhas Latin quarters. The breakfast is decent the staff is courteous and helpful.  Must stay at this place once rooms are clean and the oner is great. "}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': ' decent stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Food option for city stay'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Bathroom ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Bathroom located outside of room, particularly for Room No. 15.  Since hotel is antique in nature no lift is available.  '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Best place to explore  the Fontainhas Culture‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The hotel gives the vibe of old Portuguese style architecture. Good place to explore the Fontainhas, area (colorful villas, cafes, bars and pubs)  '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Old Goa Charm ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nice place... gives a really nice feel with all old world items '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Unique (Boutique) Hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I was visiting from UK and was keen to spend sometime in Panjim, visiting friends. The hotel has two parts andI stayed in the other bit, which has a small museum/ art gallery downstairs. This aspect gives it an unique ambience and the main part too has a lot of paintings and sculptures and lovingly restored. It feels one is in a "period" setting. Staff were excellent and whilst it may not have mod coms of a Five star place, the quiet elegance is unmatched. Main negative is the extensive road  works in the area, which is beyond control of the hotel and the area was over-run by tourists. I did not eat there, but did have breakfast and the surroundings and the breakfast itself was excellent. '}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Property is very old‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Yes, that‚Äôs the point of a heritage property but the bathrooms are very old.. 
old yellow linen and towels'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Vintage feelings ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'My stay felt like living in 18th or early 19th century in middle of 21st Century. '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good for stay. Food needs improvement. '}, {'Review_Rating': '4.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The price charged is higher than quoted while booking '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Location & Heritage- the only Positives ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Location is bang on.. The most photographed area in the Fountainhas.. All other attractions are at walking distance. The property is old with Heritage furniture and interiors, rooms are small though. Support staff is good, but the management isn't interested in you after check in, no feedbacks are taken about stay, small requests "}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Quality of Breakfast should be improved.'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Old Heritage premises‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It‚Äôs a good hotel to stay for once. The room no. 12 where in I was staying, wooden door was not shutting properly. There is no room service in the room. You have visit their restaurant & eat. Limited options for breakfast. But location was good, hence my suggestion is any one can try once‚Ä¶'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Heritage Hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "
Pros
Good Location
Beautiful Heritage interiors
Good Reception Staff
Flight ticket copy printing done
Reasonable Breakfast
Cons
Food service is bad.  Don't get coffee by 7 AM.
Few Staff don't know English
Food service not professionally carried out
TV was not working.  Complaint not taken seriously
GST Bill not provided, asked to get from website"}, {'Review_Rating': '4.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Disappointed ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The reality is that the owners are not concerned. Rooms were not clean, staff untrained and menu limited. Especially the breakfast was a big disappointment, last day of three day stay we could get something worthwhile after making complaints. 
House keeping is pathetic, TV despite of repeated requests they were not able to start. 
WiFi was not at all good, they gave excuses of poor bandwidth etc., which was supposed to be basic facility these days.
Please do not select this property, there are many options available with much better facilities and prices in this area. '}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Poor facility‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The services are not upto the mark'}]

No natural view other than weeds on left side of so called hotel... Yes you can find some coconut treesüå≤üå≥üå¥ and enjoy natural view. 
5-7 minutes walk to calangute beach. 
A/c was good

details: {'Location': 'Colva Beach Road, Colva, Goa, India, 403708', 'overall_rating': '7.8', 'Name': 'Ocean Residency', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice property but go for premium room‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Do not go for deluxe untill you are bachlor.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good hospitality‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Our entire group loved the stay there. The hotel is having the best features - location, staff, amenities, rooms, cleanliness, food, pocket friendly tariff etc. You can get anything at a walking distance. Food was amazing. The sitting area with sofas is another experience - we sat there till 2 AM and had meals there too. Colva beach and the market is also few hundred metres from the hotel. The hotel deserves 5 stars for the entire experience. '}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Good accommodation at lower rate‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It is good deal at lower rate compare to other. Only thing is you need to specify if you need anything like put new towel or clean room or get new batteries for tv remote. staff is good, reception is always empty but person will be around somewhere near. and Yes water included in stay means only 1 ltr per day they might not mentioned this but in end it will be charged '}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Wifi doesn't work, please review"}, {'Review_Rating': '2.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Worse accommodation experience ever‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Checked in to dust, piles of rubble and construction going all over the hotel. Right outside my door was wet cement and drills going constantly. It was horrific. I requested to change properties and they took me to a place which was completely unacceptable, dirty and unclean. They eventually put me in Margoa 7kms away from the beach with noise from trains. Worse accommodation experience ever.  This ruined my Colva experience, I didn't even get to see the beach. Photos are not correct. Please don't bother 0/10."}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Only the wifi was not there otherwise it's a very good hotel"}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Complete waste of money‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'One word Pathetic !!! No hygiene standards‚Ä¶.water was continously dripping from ac‚Ä¶.broken switches‚Ä¶..unclean bathrooms‚Ä¶loud noises from surroundings till late night'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Overall okay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Stayed for 4 days, rooms are good but not very clean..the area is quiet, one can spend good time there, there's a super mart right next to the hotel which is very useful, the room is not that clean but okay, ask them to show delux, super deluxe and suit rooms coz they might fool around. Also no food provided in super deluxe. Room service was okay, if you ask you'll get the things."}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Economy stay. Very close to beach with good veg options.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good hotel in ideal location. Apart from beach, very little options for tourist spots. Located in south Goa. Good veg options are available near the hotel. Breakfast is good with limited option. 24 hours hot water. Big room sufficient for 4 member family. Extra bed available on request. No room cleaning during the stay. On request provided extra towel for 3rd day. Neat Bathroom.  Toiletries are available. Very small lift. No covered car parking. Car parking in front of hotel. Found safe. Had damage on the Bonnet due to some liquid spill over. \n\nOverall enjoyed the stay with family. Value for money.'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Good!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good room food ok! Nice people. In the presentation is mention 300 metres from the sea but it is 300 meters from the board Colva, it is actually at minimum 1 kilometre from the sea'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "The receptionist was very friendly and helpful which was first impression of the hotel. Couldn't have been more sweet, giving me directions to a tournment that my daughter was attending.I was impressed by all of the staff with the hotel and the room was very comfortable in every way. Normally, I don't give praise lightly, the rooms are very clean and was well equipped and comfortable, with excellent service in the restaurant. Food was beyond good and great value for money and service is attentive and efficient(Spl thanks to the chef for preparing such a tasteful dishes). I could go on, but suffice it to say, I was very pleased with my stay, and although short and sweet this time, I hope to be back for a longer visit in the future without doubt. Far from city but very close to beach'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Best location ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very comfortable üòç'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good budget hotel next to beach‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We were 6 of friends and we really enjoyed our stay at this hotel . Just bang opposite to beach,  it made it very easy to access beach anytime we want .'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent stay ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The place was very close to the beach..good cottages to stay the owners ( Mr Albert & Eva )were very friendly ....had booked 2 cottages next to each other as was traveling with children however one of the cottages had a faulty AC so me and my wife shifted to a nearby room which was good and spacious..however we could not enjoy the coziness of the cottages but our children enjoyed it. The Breakfast was simple and good very homely and is personally prepared by Eva and her team.
The only drawback is the approach road to the resort from the main road especially by 4wheelers it‚Äôs a muddy road and extremely narrow..though it‚Äôs just a km inside however private parking is available.
Overall we loved our stay and had an excellent stay..
Pss.. please do try the Morjim Deck Restraurant on the main road..excellent food and much reasonably priced as compared to the beach shaks.'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Overall Good experience, Located right on beach. '}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Bad loation and Unsuppotive staff‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very bad experience.
When we reached the resort first the person at reception said that our booking was not confirmed.
We were stranded there waiting for almost 4 hours for their action. Sometime their internet was not working and sometimes their phone.
There was only 1 guy who is everything there receptionist , room boy. During our 4 hour waiting period we were not even asked for the water which is total shame to humanity and even worse when you are accompanied by kids as well.
'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Simple no-frills resort‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nothing that merits a travelogue'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.3', 'Review_Heading': 'Morjim Hermitage‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Location, Friendly Staff'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.3', 'Review_Heading': 'Horrible‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "It was horrible. The staff was horrible, they didn't care to take our details or info us about the checkout. And since they were short of a room, they threw their stuff out of the ro into the laudry room. When we asked them about it they said we had exceeded the checkout time. We asked for a compensation they tried to bribe us from writing any review."}, {'Review_Rating': '9.0', 'Review_Heading': '–û—Ç–µ–ª—å –Ω–∞ –±–µ—Ä–µ–≥—É –∫—Ä–∞—Å–∏–≤–æ–≥–æ –ø–ª—è–∂–∞.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': '–†–∞—Å–ø–æ–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏–µ –æ—Ç–µ–ª—è –Ω–∞ –±–µ—Ä–µ–≥—É –∫—Ä–∞—Å–∏–≤–æ–≥–æ –ø–ª—è–∂–∞. –û—á–µ–Ω—å —Ö–æ—Ä–æ—à–∏–π –ø–æ–≤–∞—Ä –≤ –∫–∞—Ñ–µ –æ—Ç–µ–ª—è. –¢–∏—Ö–æ–µ –º–µ—Å—Ç–æ.'}], 'price': '2,280', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/457501/-1/d0b85e26fdd3dd775a6e8ad15b2b8e73.jpg?ca=15&ce=1&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '0', 'amenities': ['Garden view', 'Balcony/terrace', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Toiletries', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'TV [flat screen]', 'Air conditioning', 'Fan', 'Free bottled water', 'Trouser press'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/morjim-hermitage-resort/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&los=1&searchrequestid=68e9a36c-cbca-4eb0-b3e0-c2ad18a7c6bf'}

I enjoyed it'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.0', 'Review_Heading': 'lovely staff which made the stay better!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'very helpful staff, good value'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good experience‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'My room was a little small but clean. Very good shower with hot water. The guest house is near a good part of the beach. Several restaurants and shops all around.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Gods gift‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Food was really good and reasonably priced. Loved whole vibe of this place. very close to the beach'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'nice restaurant for breakfast and meals'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Pleasant stay with friendly connection to the owners and staff. I felt heard and seen and welcomed!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The family and staff were very helpful and attentive to my needs. I came with few requests and they always tried to find a way how to support me! 
first I was in old house where the Wi-Fi is not strong and the rooms quite small and then I moved to the front house which has a balcony and good internet and comfortable bed. I stayed longer and this nice room was really good to return to. 
The restaurant is also amazing, great food and staff. 
I would recommend this place and will be happy to come back again'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Great location, food and value for money.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Value for money, close to the beach, and great food make this place a great place to stay if you are not looking to spend lots of money. The staff is friendly, the food is good and not expensive, location is great. 2 mins to the beach and lots of great places to eat and relax nearby.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Superb‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "It's a nice place. Several buildings, situated around something like a little square with palm trees, including a restaurant. The buildings have a different age and with that different standards. I guess the different categories they offer depend on the building. The beach is very close. The restaurant is nice, sometimes it was quite full of people."}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very Good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good stuff, very helpful. Perfect location and restaurant near.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'great location, helpful staff and excellent restaurant.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'excellent location and friendly helpful staff. excellent restaurant with good reasonably priced dishes and good variety.'}], 'price': '999', 'img_link': 'https://q-xx.bstatic.com/xdata/images/hotel/max500/328891326.jpg?k=5088407405c2acbdcdbc590de8c210c07177ce580c8b7ca7b6a74b9791fcd575&o=', 'room_size': '20m¬≤', 'amenities': ['Shower', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Air conditioning', 'Fan', 'Linens', 'Sleep comfort items', 'Trash cans', 'Clothes rack'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/gods-gift-guesthouse_3/hotel/all/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&los=1&searchrequestid=68e9a36c-cbca-4eb0-b3e0-c2ad18a7c6bf'}

details:
{'Location': 'Candolim Beach, Bardez , Candolim, Goa, India, 403515', 'overall_rating': '8.2', 'Name': 'Sonesta Inns', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Solo traveller ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Safe and near the beach '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Awesome stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Location right on the beach.
Well maintained. Breakfast needs to be improved '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Great show‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'This was my 2nd stay at this resort. Perfect location for vacations with good ambience & helping staff!!'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice property, right on the beach ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Clean, spacious rooms. Very friendly staff and easy on pocket too '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Sonesta Inns is a very nice place. Good access to the Candolim beach, good food and very courteous staff.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Wonderful resort for stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I would strongly recommend any traveller to stay at Sonesta Inns .  I have visited several countries and stayed in different hotels but this one stands in top 3 of my list. God bless all staff for their services. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Best stay in Goa‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'What a amazing experience it was to stay in sonesta. Food is awesome, from brkfast to dinner everything was delicious.
Staff is really helpfull and polite 
Walking distance from beach and really private'}, {'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "No spa or swimming pool. Not money's worth. Very remote."}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent hotel ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Everything is fine here, direct access to sea beach, Swimpool, good breakfast, cooperative staff & clean rooms. Means u r getting 5 star facilities by paying fr 3 star.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good location‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Near the beach'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Great location and hotel ambience‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Stay with sonesta was great , they need to put room number boards outside the building gate, some drunked customer tried unbolt my room at 1 am night and it 2as very disturbing. 

Otherwise Staff was friendly and cleanliness was great. Resort has direct beach accessibility  which is awesome.

I am giving 4 out of 5 rating.'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Decent. Could be cleaner.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'An excellent property for any customer segments‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'A bit costly, otherwise an excellent option.'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Good resort and value for money. ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The location is safe and good ,access to beach and a very clean resort. The wifi is very poor. And the food was bad.  '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice place ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good location rite on the beach .. worth re visiting '}, {'Review_Rating': '4.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Inconvenient place ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Location of sonesta inn is 500 mt to the main road condolim Calangute. That  narrow dark road is full with road side dogs,  pigs, and others. 
When u reach the main Road u are in the most undeveloped part of condolim.  It‚Äôs center s 1,5 km away. 
The walkways to get downtown are all broken or non existing at all. 
U are forced to walk with the constant fear to be invested. 
The other side of the main road goes towards Calangute... 3 km away. Some road condition as just said. 
The hotel manager is an old man, non flexible at all. 
Only hotel resident are allowed.in the premises.  Even if u want to register by a proper ID a friend,  that s refused.
Considering that 80-90 percent of customers are Caucasian, the breakfast is obviously made by 80-90 percent of Indian food :-(
The spa is closed indefinitely. 
The gym s simply horrible. Small with rusted dumbbells. 
I had to enroll to a gym outside sonesta. 
The rooms are large and cleaned. 
The swimming pool s a nice one. .  '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Great Resort with beach side location‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The resort was very well maintained with spacious and clean rooms. Great swimming pool with very helpful staff. Proximity to beach through well maintained garden was added advantage. Tasty breakfast. Certainly recommended.   '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Great Experience‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Closest to the beach this is a real great hotel and liked very much. Hotel was very clean and has nice layout, good facilities. Swimming pool was great too!!!  very comfortable.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Great Experience. Excellent facility and location. Good Food Quality. Beautifully maintained Property.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Sun, Seaside and Sonesta ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Really well organised rooms that surround a lovely pool. It is located in a perfect place away from the maddening crowds but near enough to easy get out and about. The private function put on was well catered, friendly and although a solo artist the entertainer  had us all up dancing. The beach is easiky accessible through the well maintained gardens. I was here with a friend from the UK. The wifi is very poor. And the food was bad.  '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice place ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good location rite on the beach .. worth re visiting '}, {'Review_Rating': '4.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Inconvenient place ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Location of sonesta inn is 500 mt to the main road condolim Calangute. That  narrow dark road is full with road side dogs,  pigs, and others. 
When u reach the main Road u are in the most undeveloped part of condolim.  It‚Äôs center s 1,5 km away. 
The walkways to get downtown are all broken or non existing at all. 
U are forced to walk with the constant fear to be invested. 
The other side of the main road goes towards Calangute... 3 km away. Some road condition as just said. 
The hotel manager is an old man, non flexible at all. 
Only hotel resident are allowed.in the premises.  Even if u want to register by a proper ID a friend,  that s refused.
Considering that 80-90 percent of customers are Caucasian, the breakfast is obviously made by 80-90 percent of Indian food :-(
The spa is closed indefinitely. 
The gym s simply horrible. Small with rusted dumbbells. 
I had to enroll to a gym outside sonesta. 
The rooms are large and cleaned. 
The swimming pool s a nice one. .  '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Great Resort with beach side location‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The resort was very well maintained with spacious and clean rooms. Great swimming pool with very helpful staff. Proximity to beach through well maintained garden was added advantage. Tasty breakfast. Certainly recommended.   '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Great Experience‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Closest to the beach this is a real great hotel and liked very much. Hotel was very clean and has nice layout, good facilities. Swimming pool was great too!!!  very comfortable.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Great Experience. Excellent facility and location. Good Food Quality. Beautifully maintained Property.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Sun, Seaside and Sonesta ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Really well organised rooms that surround a lovely pool. It is located in a perfect place away from the maddening crowds but near enough to easy get out and about. The private function put on was well catered, friendly and although a solo artist the entertainer  had us all up dancing. The beach is easiky accessible through the well maintained gardens. I was here with a friend from the UK. We both loved our stay and would happily book again.'}]

It‚Äôs very well connected to calangute beach by straight road'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Very Nice property we have enjoined 3 nights stay here‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good resort near to beach, My kids liked it 
Recomend to stay heare value for money'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Nearby Beach stay with great food option‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Excellent location with just 3 mins walk from beach and main market. Very accommodative staff with the special mention to Raj for being such a warm host. Food was also exceptional both in taste & flavour. Would certainly recommend this property for fellow travellers planning to stay near Candolim beach.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'The best experience !!! kudos‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Few drawback 
1. Need minimum 3 broadband connection since one broadband with repeaters doesn‚Äôt provide well/enough wifi coverage.
2. The breakfast/dining open area needs cleaning attention since the water stays and makes tiles slippery.
3. Need was basin in the open dining area for washing hands before and after meals.
4. The plastic filters around the pool are old and few in number needs attention/replacement.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'great‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Really a  good place to stay. No complains. Food in the restaurant is awesome too.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Best place ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very good and excellent place... Good food n location... Will surely visit again ...'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Property is very good. But having common parking ( if u lucky them u will get place to park) and staff is slow in service.  Inhouse hotel also close at 10.30pm which is surprising at place like goa.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Great Resort near the beach‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "This is a very beautiful place, with lovely rooms that have Amazon fire stick for watching your favourite moves and shows when you relax with you beer. The fridge in the room works superbly and cools all your drinks with a few mins unlike other hotels. AC was supercool and the room done up great. The staff even though were short staffed were always friendly and helpful. The resort is 2 mins from Candolim Beach. Loved this hotel. Breakfast was ok but for thr deal I got. It's great. "}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Sunset Beach resort family vacation ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The Sunset beach resort is ideally located away from the crowded area and also accessible to all good locations. The hotel is good value for the services provided. Staff are excellent and helpful. Much recommended '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'grate service, location with awesome food quality ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Staff is so good, specially on reception and restaurant.
so happy to stay here.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Cool place to stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Neat and clean hotel , with very fresh rooms. Nice location and love to stay the place. Total value for money.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Cosy Hotel by the beach‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The best thing about this hotel is its location (just 2 minutes from Candolim beach)  and 2 staff members here - Mr. Anjum at the front desk and Mr. Raj at the Bistro. 
The rooms are spacious, clean with wifi. There is ample space around the rooms and quiet inside the rooms. There are many shops in the vicinity. We had a good time during the 4 days we were there. Thank you Mr Anjum and Mr Raj.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good place but‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Place is good location is great. Some employees are very good. Some just don‚Äôt care. Tv didn‚Äôt work asked twice to fix it but no luck. If you are vegetarian food is not that great. Overall it‚Äôs better then most places we saw. '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Good location, amazing rooms but not so good restaurant‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Pros- 
very nice location, beach is hardly 400m
Swimming pool
Clean and big rooms
Clean and big washrooms
Outside food delivery allowed

Cons -
Restaurant service, food is not so good
Rooms dont have intercom so you have to rely on phone network which is very poor.
Wifi range is not so good
No other amenities for children and family to enjoy.

Choose this hotel if you are not concerned about eating within hotel restaurant.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Amazing stay!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Definitely, will recommend this. Friendly staff. Clean rooms. Descent swimming pool. 
Only drawback is the food which tastes really bad. 
Apart from that, everything else is awesome!'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very good location. '}, {'Review_Rating': '4.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Not so pleasant experience‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We had booked 2 family rooms for 3 nights during Xmas 2019 and receptionist alloted last bldng 2nd room floor inspite of knowing the fact that rooms are not good.On request they shifted us to another room next day,there TV unit hardly work, Dish Tv is not recharged,room service not there,room boys have language issue,buffet breakfast very basic n not up to the mark.Only plus point about resort is location as its hardly 5 min walk from beach.However few staff members (Nilesh) and owner are warm n friendly n helped us to shift our room.Overall an Average rated hotel. '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Scruffy and overpriced‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Location was good at the quieter  end of Candolim with plenty of places to eat, drink and shop nearby. I had a nice large room but the pool area and general maintenance was all a bit tired. Drinks  were very overpriced and breakfast  was just toast and jam. The walk to the beach each day was a hassle with everybody trying to sell you something.'}], 'price': '3,303', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/299690/7393752/f8a4639e247abdfa91c65f0223d21a80.jpeg?ce=0&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '25m¬≤', 'amenities': ['Garden view', 'Balcony/terrace', 'Non-smoking', 'Shower', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'TV [flat screen]', 'Adapter', 'Air conditioning', 'Fan', 'Linens', 'Sleep comfort items', 'Wake-up service', 'Desk', 'Tile/marble flooring', 'Wooden/parqueted flooring', 'Closet', 'Clothes rack', 'Safety/security feature'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/sunset-beach-resort/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&los=1&searchrequestid=68e9a36c-cbca-4eb0-b3e0-c2ad18a7c6bf'}

details:
{'Location': 'Taj Exotica Road, Colva, Goa, India, 403716', 'overall_rating': '8.4', 'Name': 'Hotel Royal Anthurium', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'NOT UP TO EXPECTATIONS.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Wifi was limited. Housekeeping is very poor. Breakfast was good but was told to limit it to one dish only by the Cashier. International credit cards not working ( Maybe on Purpose). as they insist on cash payment. Check-in was said 24 hours but at the hotel, they tell its 12:00noon check and I had to pay Rs1000/- additional for an early check-in even though the room was empty. Even though i check out early morning no adjustment on the additional Rs1000/- was considered.'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Above average‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Go for it only if you don't find any other better option. Having said that if you only want to spend a night and leave early then can be a Choice although price is bit high for the facility offered."}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Value for money‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Overall property is small but well maintained.  Only drawback I found is the lack of lift but not a big cause of concern.  Rooms are hygenic and spacious enough. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Excellent service. Good food. Good location. Staff were too polite. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Awesome hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I personally recommend this hotel which situated at south Goa near bellinium beach for stay ,the hotel staff is so humble and helping nature and here complementary fast is so yummy and good quality..i personally recommend'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good hotel near Benaulim beach‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Overall satisfied with the stay.Hotel staffs were coperative and food was good.Room was clean.
Only issue I have faced was no mobile network (Airtel or Vodafone) in my room but wifi was there.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent Hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Best experience in South Goa Stay. Great staffs, clean hotel. Also they have inhouse restaurant cum cafe point which serves best food.  Definitely recommended. '}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Not couple friendly‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'This hotel is very good but situated in south goa, so for couples, it is not good, as there are no any good spots nearby, also the beaches in south goa are not good. this hotel is in the village side area, not having proper mobile network, also wifi provided by the hotel is worst. '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Amazing hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Rooms are clean , spacious, well maintained..very similar to the images shown. food is tasty. Overall this is one the best u can get at this price.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Great place for the price‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Low cost, newly built place
Far more spacious than expected
Great toiletries
Clean well maintained rooms'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Above average‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Executive room was very big,  but it was ok hotel.  staff was very courteous ready to help. not tried any food, very small property, no pool, parking is also limited'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Peace of mind is assured....‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Well maintained rooms with proper cleanliness, prompt action to sort out issues, polite/courteous/supporting staff & hassle free check in/out with all types of payment support. Closeness to beaches (1.6Km Betalbatim beach) is added bonus. 

Restaurant menu has good options to chose from, damn tasty food with sufficient portion/serving size. Except for few dishes, most other dishes rates are on higher side. Fabulous room service from restaurant too. {'Location': 'H-no_477/3, sankwagi, Near Park regis Hotel , Baga, Goa, India, 403516', 'overall_rating': 'Select your room', 'Name': "Hotel Vaggi's Place", 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '4.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Highly overpriced with no amenities ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It‚Äôs just a renovated lodge with steep pricing that‚Äôs not justified. No personal parking facility. We need to park the vehicles at a little distance. 2nd floor approach stairs are steep. No direct ventilation facility for one row of rooms towards the back.
Breakfast is for namesake and is served late and cold as they buy it from local shops. One of the days we were given bread and butter for breakfast.'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Good amenities but unbearable due to poor maintenance‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Strictly required cleaning - left a strong foul smell in all  of my clothes. I had to wash them twice to remove the smell'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'No value for money ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Hotel is not for family or business stay it's like a local lodge. frustrating moment in front of wife after seeing nearby hotels. Booked for Rs. 6718 for two night which should not be more than Rs. 2000, it's a shear loot. Entire room is full of cigarette smell. After coming home still the smell persist to entire clothes which were carried for journey. Brekfast, after 9:30 am if time is missed you will not get afterward,only one menu which is not of quality. Because of which we skip both breakfast and tea. No tea or coffee facility in room. No no proper answer from attendee.
Wastge of money and frustrating stay. "}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very bad experience. Not supportive hotel staff.'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'DO NOT BOOK THIS..‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "This is a very genuine feedback on my recent stay with this property. I booked it online considering the price and the spacious photos but that is all just a trap. This place will surely lower down your trip experience. And this review is for all traveller types - couples or families....
Problems I faced - 
1. After reaching and realising space issue- they denied for the refund if I checkout for rest of the nights 
2. On the second day, the tap water and the shower water was all brown and dirty and they said their water tank broke(after asking)
3. Every customer was coming one after the other at the reception to fight for different issues like breakfast delays or cleanliness.
4. The reception is handed over to 2 amateur boys who don't know how to talk, assist or how to give a good hospitality. (Just giving vague replies)
5. The locality is worse. Feels like a scary and shady place. "}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Don‚Äôt expect any good services ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The room was good and worth the money but the other services such as breakfast and cleaning services were very bad. If you are looking only for room than it‚Äôs okay to stay here but don‚Äôt expect any other services.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good stay.. '}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Not a place to recommend ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Breakfast was very limited.
They dont have kitchen or restaurant.
Very small cupboards
If you want only room, go for it, else find a different property.
Location was a bit good, centred from all main points'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Pls do not go ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'No cleanliness , also room is not so good , If you add the breakfast they gave you the same @10am .  Room is differently from pics .'}, {'Review_Rating': '3.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Alluded the pictures provided by the owner on Google/any other hotel booking platform and think its the right choice?
It is not. The room is mediocre and cannot complaint. The price rage if highly affordable in that region. However, the area surrounded is excruciating and tiring. They do not have a proper parking and if you are booking a room for three people, one person must sleep on a couch!
Overall the whole ambience is too poor.
Would not recommend to family/couples.
An okay choices for bachelors who visit Goa on a budget.'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'After reaching the place thru denied room even though payment was done, it was only after heavy persistence they decided to give me alternate room. '}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Don't book rooms are so small and no management very bad experience "}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Best for budget travelers‚Äù', 'Review_Body': '‡§∏‡•ç‡§ü‡§æ‡§´ ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶‡§ó‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§π‡•à'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Hotel is very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Staff behaviour cleanliness breakfast location all are good.In Lunch Fish thali try it. It's was Amazingüòç"}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Great‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The staff is really polite and helpful.They handle all requests very professionally.Had a really comfortable stay here.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Best budget stay!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Perfect location and stay! Very cooperative staff and smooth checkin.. {'Location': '14A, DB Marg, Fontainhas (quater), Altinho, Goa, Panaji, Goa, India, 403001', 'overall_rating': '6', 'Name': 'OYO Roshan Villa Near Immaculate Conception Church', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Best hotel in the budget. ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Little more cleanness is needed '}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Worst customer service‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Never recommend.. scam happened with me'}, {'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Cheating‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I have booked standard hotel room for 1 day for 1800 and later on I extended my stay for another day this time I have got it 1000 rupees, the receptionist said he can‚Äôt accept the booking and demanded extra 500rupees for stay otherwise asked me to check out. And this is legally unfair practice, the staff are also rude to me. I have called to oyo regarding this issue for 2 times and they put me on call for 15 times and later disconnected. Bad experience for me.'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Okay for Emergency Stay ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Rooms very conjusted and looks like prison rooms. Good for Emergency Stay and pricing is too high for small rooms. No good facilities and also room linen okayish. '}, {'Review_Rating': '2.8', 'Review_Heading': 'HORRIBLE‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Please dont book this hotel.  I had a very bad experience here. This hotel is located on top of a hill. While booking they say free breakfast is available. But nothing such is available. Moreover, there is absolute no restaurants beside this place where you can go and eat. Also they do not have a kettle in the room for us to have tea or coffee.
The internet is so bad and there is no range to make normal phone calls.
Overall DO NOT BOOK YOUR ROOM HERE,'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice rooms with nice staff ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "The room is so good and clean and the staff was so good they are very helping and Don't intrupt us."}, {'Review_Rating': '4.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Okaies for 1 night stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Do not expect anything apart from bed and ac.
Location is kind of very alon. You will not find any shop or even people around the location(avoid going in nights alon, as no street lights in the are).

Staff is ok ok. dont expact anything.'}, {'Review_Rating': '3.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Poor management‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'No drinking water and food available, staff is very rudeüëø. No extra bed facilities.'}, {'Review_Rating': '3.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Pathetic apartment ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Had a disgusting experience at this apartment. It‚Äôs not a villa or hotel, it‚Äôs an apartment. Staff members are so rude. They don‚Äôt have anything there such as water, food etc. Place is also not good. Manager always roam outside the apartment and you need to wait at reception for 10-15 minutes. I won‚Äôt recommend anyone to stay here.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Value for money ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I had to book an hotel due to some work at Portugal consulate. Found this one very near, 5 min walking distance via steps, got it for 1000 bucks.
Checked in at 9 am. Logged in for remote work. Wifi is good, no canteen or tea coffee in facility.
Cleanliness- 7
Staff- 9
Location- 8 near famous panaji church but secluded and vehicle must have. Not walkable, on a hill.
Will recommend only if you have work nearby and on a tight budget.'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Bad hotel and staff‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Don't book this hotel..bad hotel and staff.."}, {'Review_Rating': '2.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Never book for couple: creepy place ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Never book for couple: creepy place
Rooms are not like the pics mentioned. Unclean and creepy rooms. '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': '4star‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good for stay , nice property nice location'}], 'price': '1,594', 'img_link': 'https://q-xx.bstatic.com/xdata/images/hotel/840x460/412154541.jpg?k=59a882d5d489406ffa73f9ef1b7c9be8c1bee293cda4dafac00a0ef78cc3a628&o=', 'room_size': '11m¬≤', 'amenities': ['Shower', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'TV', 'Air conditioning'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/oyo-68034-roshan-villa/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&tspTypes=-1&los=1&searchrequestid=68e9a36c-cbca-4eb0-b3e0-c2ad18a7c6bf'}
