[{'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Best hotel in the budget. ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Little more cleanness is needed '}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Worst customer service‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Never recommend.. scam happened with me'}, {'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Cheating‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I have booked standard hotel room for 1 day for 1800 and later on I extended my stay for another day this time I have got it 1000 rupees, the receptionist said he can‚Äôt accept the booking and demanded extra 500rupees for stay otherwise asked me to check out. And this is legally unfair practice, the staff are also rude to me. I have called to oyo regarding this issue for 2 times and they put me on call for 15 times and later disconnected. Bad experience for me.'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Okay for Emergency Stay ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Rooms very conjusted and looks like prison rooms. Good for Emergency Stay and pricing is too high for small rooms. No good facilities and also room linen okayish. '}, {'Review_Rating': '2.8', 'Review_Heading': 'HORRIBLE‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Please dont book this hotel.  I had a very bad experience here. This hotel is located on top of a hill. While booking they say free breakfast is available. But nothing such is available. Moreover, there is absolute no restaurants beside this place where you can go and eat. Also they do not have a kettle in the room for us to have tea or coffee.
The internet is so bad and there is no range to make normal phone calls.
Overall DO NOT BOOK YOUR ROOM HERE,'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice rooms with nice staff ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "The room is so good and clean and the staff was so good they are very helping and Don't intrupt us."}, {'Review_Rating': '4.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Okaies for 1 night stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Do not expect anything apart from bed and ac.
Location is kind of very alon. You will not find any shop or even people around the location(avoid going in nights alon, as no street lights in the are).

Staff is ok ok. dont expact anything.'}, {'Review_Rating': '3.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Poor management‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'No drinking water and food available, staff is very rudeüëø. No extra bed facilities.'}, {'Review_Rating': '3.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Pathetic apartment ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Had a disgusting experience at this apartment. It‚Äôs not a villa or hotel, it‚Äôs an apartment. Staff members are so rude. They don‚Äôt have anything there such as water, food etc. Place is also not good. Manager always roam outside the apartment and you need to wait at reception for 10-15 minutes. I won‚Äôt recommend anyone to stay here.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Value for money ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I had to book an hotel due to some work at Portugal consulate. Found this one very near, 5 min walking distance via steps, got it for 1000 bucks.
Checked in at 9 am. Logged in for remote work. Wifi is good, no canteen or tea coffee in facility.
Cleanliness- 7
Staff- 9
Location- 8 near famous panaji church but secluded and vehicle must have. Not walkable, on a hill.
Will recommend only if you have work nearby and on a tight budget.'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Bad hotel and staff‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Don't book this hotel..bad hotel and staff.."}, {'Review_Rating': '2.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Never book for couple: creepy place ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Never book for couple: creepy place
Rooms are not like the pics mentioned. Unclean and creepy rooms. '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': '4star‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good for stay , nice property nice location'}]

details:
{'Location': 'Igrezawadda, val, Agonda,, Agonda, Goa, India, 403702', 'overall_rating': 'Select your room', 'Name': 'Aquila Boutique Resort Agonda', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent Experience‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The villa was comfortable, food was good and staff was very friendly.'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Passable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The only good thing is the rooms and location of the resort as it is right on the beach which is very clean. The food is okayish.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Wonderful‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Excellent staff'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Beautiful stay on the beach‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Awesome rooms, great location on the beach. Great live music in the dining area on the beach. Parking also available for your vehicle. Located near market area.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Great relaxing stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The location is great- right on the beach. The huts themselves were quite basic but clean with everything you would need. The staff were very helpful. Sam is constantly one step ahead of the game, making sure you have everything you need. The food and drink at the restaurant was very good.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'overall good.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'it is a beach facing property,nice rooms.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice place!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nice comfortable stay with serviceminded staff!'}, {'Review_Rating': '1.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Worst experience ever!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "We had booked 2 sea facing beach huts many months in advance. Upon arrival we were told that they have got a notification from Bookings.com that it is 2 ground floor rooms. And they didn't even have that! Only one room was available. They gave us one beach hut in the next property Silent Waves. The windows in this one did not face the sea. The construction is so makeshift that it shakes when you walk about. There is no chair in the room and not even a hook in the bathroom to hang your towel.No electric kettle or tea cups etc. Besides,after bathing the water collects like a mini pond on both ends.Added to that there was a rat jumping about in the room!!! 
But a word for Sandy who works for Aquilla. He knew they were at complete fault so upon asking he sent the kettle etc and someone to wipe away the mini pools in the bathroom.
Lalit from Silent Waves gave us very good service brought our orders all excellently made to the balcony attached to the hut. So no complaints about the staff. 
But there was a major goof up on the part of the management with the booking,and Sandy was the fall guy."}, {'Review_Rating': '9.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Wonderful‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The food and the hospitable staff Sam and Knowledge who made the stay very comfortable and the overall experience worth repeating..a special mention for the food which was very good'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Ambience, attendants are very friendly, good food'}], 'price': '3,111', 'img_link': 'https://q-xx.bstatic.com/xdata/images/hotel/840x460/426098020.jpg?k=cb58dea21ce8d46da2156c477842dfb39d3eef921680f80e30ee1267c3d65ffc&o=', 'room_size': '0', 'amenities': ['Free Wi-Fi', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Air conditioning'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/aquila-boutique-resort-agonda/hotel/all/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&tspTypes=2&los=1&searchrequestid=68e9a36c-cbca-4eb0-b3e0-c2ad18a7c6bf'}

details:
{'Location': 'Fort Aguada Road, Opp. The O.L. of PietyChapel & Govt. Primary School, Dando, Candolim, Goa, India, 403515', 'overall_rating': 'Select your room', 'Name': 'Per Avel Beach Holiday Home', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'This guest house was worst , owner of this property was rude and not supporting and taking charge for everything even cleaning '}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Bad‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very poor '}, {'Review_Rating': '4.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Ok'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Please mind everything ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'In single word hotel stay were good but you can mind each and everything even if you have 2 year old child they want to charge and spoke as person , their one boy whoes responsibility is to take care of reception was so awkward '}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Above average‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'they charge 25% extra for 3+year kids. will get better resorts for this price.'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Decent experience‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Although I have read the reviews on Google, before I checked in, So I have very few expectations from the property.
I have heard very bad reviews - owner asking money for each and every service, which is true.
As I knew this would happen, so I didn‚Äôt interacted with the property manager or staff. So I have the nice experience without expectations.

If you don‚Äôt have any place to stay or you are staying only for one day- this place is good. Otherwise, I would suggest look for another place.
This place is close to beach. I have booked my room through Agoda, so breakfast was not included. Hence, I payed for the breakfast. Breakfast charges was decent and the food was good.
Rooms were decent, clean - pls don‚Äôt expect much facilities. It‚Äôs just a room to spend the night.
Overall, decent experience.'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Room is too small with no view balcony '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nice'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Above average‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good for solo travellers'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Pleasant Stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'They don‚Äôt allow early or late check in or check out it‚Äôs chargeable otherwise it is a pleasant place to stay with all clean and neat rooms with the beach near by as well all the supermarkets'}, {'Review_Rating': '3.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Worts destination for stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'If you wanna ruin your day in goa ,then please stay here.You will get treated absolutely Ill fate manner.Drunkad will rush into you started teasing or even ask for ur number.No at all safe for girls,couple,or family.No security at the place.For extra waterbottle they will tell you as if water is their priperty'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Location: convenient; Staff: greedy‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The location was best suited, for ease of exploration. However, the staff could charge for anything and everything with a lack of politeness and basic courtesy of hospitality.'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Not so good.... üòû '}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Staff behaviour‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Hi hotel was good and very good location  extra 10percent for room service, easy check in but once you checkout staff manager behaves like stranger they will make you to use there washroom itself. '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'good for the price‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'we stayed in Peravel for one day with friends. it was good for the price. Please note that parking is not available at the property.'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.4', 'Review_Heading': 'No Facilities ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Cons
No Toiletries are provided, everything is paid chargeable even the service staff.
Too many power cuts with no power back up or invertor.
 Many terms and conditions note was given while checking. 
No electric cattle, no water bottle, no tea or coffee.
Room was dirty.
Pros
Location Was great since Beach was just 2 min walk.
Markets and Restaurants were welkin.
'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Beach Resort on a budget‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Best Place for the ones looking for a hotel close to the beach. Ideal place for beach lovers on a shoe string budget, looking for very basic well kept rooms just to relax for a day or two. Hotel room which I was staying was equipped with latest and modern sanitary ware, good room with a small balcony attached. Breakfast was basic however slightly on a higher side as compared to most places in Goa. Lunch and Dinner are not offered in the hotel but there is a bar counter for the ones looking to relax and get into the Goan mood. I have heard very bad reviews - owner asking money for each and every service, which is true.
As I knew this would happen, so I didn‚Äôt interacted with the property manager or staff. So I have the nice experience without expectations.

If you don‚Äôt have any place to stay or you are staying only for one day- this place is good. Otherwise, I would suggest look for another place.
This place is close to beach. I have booked my room through Agoda, so breakfast was not included. Hence, I payed for the breakfast. Breakfast charges was decent and the food was good.
Rooms were decent, clean - pls don‚Äôt expect much facilities. It‚Äôs just a room to spend the night.

Pros

details:
{'Location': 'Gawde Wada, Morjim, Goa, India, 403512', 'overall_rating': '8.6', 'Name': 'The Artist Cottages', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '9.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Top! Top! Top!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It is a beautifully located property at a stone‚Äôs throw from the beach. Nice, spacious, airconditioned cottages with a lovely lil sit out. Madhuri the caretaker is a delight to meet! Extremely helpful, prompt to respond to any query, and always smiling - she ensured that I had a very comfortable stay.'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Pleasant‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The breakfast and location were good'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Wonderful‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The breakfast options were really nice. The staff was sweet, friendly, and very helpful.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Wonderful‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The staff the cottage!'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'they are super friendly and helpful. close to the beach and main road.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Home feeling in Goa. Definitely recommended!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'staff, coziness, cleanliness'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Relaxing, rejuvinating‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It is a beautiful cozy property, just 2 mins walk away from Morjim beach and all the nearby beachside restaurants. Maintained well, serves good breakfast. However, the service is slow and options are limited for breakfast but the quantity and taste are amazing. The property manager Madhuri was very polite and helped you whenever we needed her.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'enjoyed it so much we extended our stay.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The property is rustic and intentionally feels older than it really is. The rooms have concrete floors and facilities are fairly basic but they are spacious and have fans and air conditioning. The beds are large and very comfortable and the verandas are shady and nice to sit the morning and evening. The experience centres around Madhuri and her calm kindness. Nothing is too much trouble.
Artists Cottage is within five minutes of miles of beautiful beaches accessed through the Silver Sands resort of bamboo beach bungalows and a large bar / restaurant / great for sunset beers and good food as long as you don‚Äôt mind loud Goan trance music as your backdrop. Other restaurants close by are also excellent and offer quieter vibe.
We were the oldest people there by 30 odd years but liked it so much we cancelled our next hotel and stayed three extra days.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'lovely, relaxing stay.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'the property is clean and private, its close to the beach shacks. The staff are amazing and helpful and the breakfast was the highlight of our stay!!!'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Wonderful‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The location is perfect, on Morjim beach..which kinda is one the best beaches now in North Goa. The staff is helpful and polite. The property is beautiful, the cottages give you a true holiday vibe! You want to go there and spend your days just doing nothing!!'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Location/ Host / Food - everything was excellent!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The lovely host Madhuri made sure we were so comfortable and took care of all our requests - we were promptly provided with a scooty and recommendations for lunch and dinner . 

Breakfast was wholesome and filling , we were so tired of eating smoothie bowls , a well done omelette , poe and masala chai was a welcome treat . 

Loved the rooms , loved the artwork. 

We will definitely come back here next time !'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Artistic Indeed üòä‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "We had initially booked another hotel in Arambol and didn't like it at all. Then I found Artist cottages on Booking.com and decided to check it out. The rooms are impeccably done, loved how every single corner was well thought of. Madhuri and all the other staff we met were wonderful. Lovely breakfast. We extended our stay for a few more days. Beach is very close as well. Morjim Beach is spectacular!"}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Miss Madhuri, the manager, is a true gem and really worked harder for us than the call of duty required. She moved our room when I felt unwell and was disturbed by nearby new year parties, got v best prices, for everything, including a significant rebate when a driver charged us too much. She also managed to courier my travel guitar to Mumbai for collection. A true champ and one of the best people I met in my 3 months in India. 

The rooms are comfortable and well appointed, breakfast was very good. All in all a fantastic experience, highly recommended for everything, but particularly from customer care perspective. Thank you madhuri!!'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exactly the kind of relaxing vacation we wanted, thank you!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Madhuri, Sameer and her team were so lovely! we had an amazing time and felt really welcomed. They were always there to help us with anything we asked for. The location was perfect if you want to have a low key beach vacation. I will be coming back again if I can help it!'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Superb‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The room was big and beautiful. Comfy bed, nice toiletries, filtered water and fridge. Great breakfast included. Staff were super friendly and helpful.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'location, cleanness, amenities, friendly staff, breakfast'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Superb‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Great location close to the beach and very friendly staff! reviews:
[{'Review_Rating': '9.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Top! Top! Top!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It is a beautifully located property at a stone‚Äôs throw from the beach. Nice, spacious, airconditioned cottages with a lovely lil sit out. Madhuri the caretaker is a delight to meet! Extremely helpful, prompt to respond to any query, and always smiling - she ensured that I had a very comfortable stay.'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Pleasant‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The breakfast and location were good'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Wonderful‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The breakfast options were really nice. The staff was sweet, friendly, and very helpful.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Wonderful‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The staff the cottage!'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'they are super friendly and helpful. close to the beach and main road.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Home feeling in Goa. Definitely recommended!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'staff, coziness, cleanliness'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Relaxing, rejuvinating‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It is a beautiful cozy property, just 2 mins walk away from Morjim beach and all the nearby beachside restaurants. Maintained well, serves good breakfast. However, the service is slow and options are limited for breakfast but the quantity and taste are amazing. The property manager Madhuri was very polite and helped you whenever we needed her.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'enjoyed it so much we extended our stay.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The property is rustic and intentionally feels older than it really is. The rooms have concrete floors and facilities are fairly basic but they are spacious and have fans and air conditioning. The beds are large and very comfortable and the verandas are shady and nice to sit the morning and evening. The experience centres around Madhuri and her calm kindness. Nothing is too much trouble.
Artists Cottage is within five minutes of miles of beautiful beaches accessed through the Silver Sands resort of bamboo beach bungalows and a large bar / restaurant / great for sunset beers and good food as long as you don‚Äôt mind loud Goan trance music as your backdrop. Other restaurants close by are also excellent and offer quieter vibe.
We were the oldest people there by 30 odd years but liked it so much we cancelled our next hotel and stayed three extra days.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'lovely, relaxing stay.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'the property is clean and private, its close to the beach shacks. The staff are amazing and helpful and the breakfast was the highlight of our stay!!!'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Wonderful‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The location is perfect, on Morjim beach..which kinda is one the best beaches now in North Goa. The staff is helpful and polite. The property is beautiful, the cottages give you a true holiday vibe! You want to go there and spend your days just doing nothing!!'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Location/ Host / Food - everything was excellent!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The lovely host Madhuri made sure we were so comfortable and took care of all our requests - we were promptly provided with a scooty and recommendations for lunch and dinner . 

Breakfast was wholesome and filling , we were so tired of eating smoothie bowls , a well done omelette , poe and masala chai was a welcome treat . 

Loved the rooms , loved the artwork. 

We will definitely come back here next time !'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Artistic Indeed üòä‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "We had initially booked another hotel in Arambol and didn't like it at all. Then I found Artist cottages on Booking.com and decided to check it out. The rooms are impeccably done, loved how every single corner was well thought of. Madhuri and all the other staff we met were wonderful. Lovely breakfast. We extended our stay for a few more days. Beach is very close as well. Morjim Beach is spectacular!"}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Miss Madhuri, the manager, is a true gem and really worked harder for us than the call of duty required. She moved our room when I felt unwell and was disturbed by nearby new year parties, got v best prices, for everything, including a significant rebate when a driver charged us too much. She also managed to courier my travel guitar to Mumbai for collection. A true champ and one of the best people I met in my 3 months in India. 

The rooms are comfortable and well appointed, breakfast was very good. All in all a fantastic experience, highly recommended for everything, but particularly from customer care perspective. Thank you madhuri!!'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exactly the kind of relaxing vacation we wanted, thank you!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Madhuri, Sameer and her team were so lovely! we had an amazing time and felt really welcomed. They were always there to help us with anything we asked for. The location was perfect if you want to have a low key beach vacation. I will be coming back again if I can help it!'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Superb‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The room was big and beautiful. Comfy bed, nice toiletries, filtered water and fridge. Great breakfast included. Staff were super friendly and helpful.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'location, cleanness, amenities, friendly staff, breakfast'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Superb‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Great location close to the beach and very friendly staff! I would definitely come back.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'location'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Wonderful‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The space (rooms, bathrooms, overall) was beautifully put together. We enjoyed our stay there thoroughly. The staff was professional and helpful. A special note to Madhuri who was clear and communicative, helped us with a smooth check-in and check-out process and was a warm presence throughout.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Wonderful hospitality, great value.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Excellent service by the entire team, very cosy and luxurious rooms for the price we paid.'}]

Dona Paula beach is walkable and that sorts one of the spot in the list. Breakfast was very good and staffs were helpful in arranging hired two wheeler for a reasonable cost. Miramar beach is also closeby. Rooms were very clean and unlike other hotels they don't charge for water. The localty is very quiet and humble. Food options are available in couple of mins walk. Perfect place to stay ..!! details:
{'Location': 'No.79 Nagwaddo, Colva, Goa, India, 403713', 'overall_rating': '8.2', 'Name': 'Jasminn South Goa - AM Hotel Kollection', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Good place to stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'nice rooms and staff are helpful, Agoda has problem during booking so in night we spend almost 30 min but finally both side and solved. Breakfast is nice ...  people are good. '}, {'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Very poor experience.Not at all recommended if you have babies or small kids along.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The room was not at all clean..the bed linens were stinking seems the room was unused since long time. Due to which the moisture stink was there in the room and linens which was unbearable. We had 6 months old baby with us. We checked another room also but that was even more worst in condition. we called housekeeping staff and told them to mop the floor and clean the washroom again since the floor was dusty too..Not at all a happy stay and wise decision to booked this hotel next day we changed because my baby started pucking.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent place Nice hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Location is too good '}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nice and quite place in South Goa just a few KM of the beach. Decent food and stay would definately reccomend.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Lovely food at the restaurant and helpful staff made the holiday special '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Good staff‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Quite helpful staff'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Hotel is good ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'good location, co-operative starff'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Good comfortable stay. Good Food.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'better cleaning of rooms will help.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Comfortable Hotel ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We stayed for 3 days at Jasminn hotel, South Goa. The ambience, food, cleanliness and other facilities were excellent. The staff was courteous and always willing to help. Over all, excellent value for money.'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Decent hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "It's a decent hotel for the price but needs some improvement. Looks like they have recently renovated the rooms which look quite old. The premium suite room was quite big and the king size bed would accommodate 3 adults easily.

The bathroom was smelling of new paint. The renovation looks like partially done. The floor tiles look quite old though it is clean. The wooden furnitures are visibly very old which can be repaired and repainted. The hotel has a swimming pool which was good. There restaurant and bar was decent and served tasty food. But but expensive to eat everytime. There are no other places to eat in that area. You have to go 1 km. Overall it was good okayish hotel for family. Area is very calm."}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Fantastic location with beautiful hotel ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I stayed here for 2 days and I must say hotel is very beautiful, luckily I got it at very good price and it was value for money. Staff is good and the entire property is very beautiful and clean.  I will definitely consider this hotel for my next stay.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Cool and calm stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It was great to stay at Jasminn and the rooms were great and the staff was very co-operative!!
The hotel has good pool as well which was quite clean and it was peaceful bustling in the nature'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It was a wonderful stay in jasminn... From sept9 to sep 12really the staffs are too good  especially housekeeping staff.Housekeeping staff had given a cute surprise for my lil one,a toy üêï made of hand towels....it was soooo cute . Martin corner,camron and fishka is nearby from the hotel....Room is quite spacious and well maintained ... definitely visit again '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Best place is south Goa for every traveller‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Love this  place. What a Location!
Extremely welcoming staff.
Very good connected restaurant....Melati

Extra comfortable Bed.... wonderful stay. I love it! I recommend'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Waste of money!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Cleanliness 0.5/5  ( There were bugs on bedsheets & also lizards in both the rooms we booked)

Staff 1/5 (asked them to change bedsheets but they took forever to change it)

Breakfast 1/5 (No english breakfast, and no table was available so I had to setup table and chair by myself from pool area)

Booked 2 rooms for 25000 for 2 nights - complete waste of money. cottage or hostel can give better services than this ppl! '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Highly recommend ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The reception team Ashwini and her colleagues were very courteous good hotel for family '}, {'Review_Rating': '4.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'This place is far away from main highway about 3 kms and beach is about more than 2km.but hotel is loacted at very peaceful area. But the property is maintained.i took deluxe room, very few amenities available like hair dryer on request, only one water bottle, dental kit paid, only soap and shampoo, ac room, safe locker, led, airport drop paid. Cleaning will be done after 2 days. In morning buffet breakfast, there are very few options available. For lunch and dinner, if you dine in or want room service they will charge extra service charge. Try to avoid hire scooty from hotel. You can hire near by. Thanks'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Lovely stay. Great rooms, clean ,  superb staffs. 
The only thing they can improve is the breakfast!'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'One of the best stay in south goa‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Really liked the property, nice interior(very thoughtful), well behaved staff and location is so peaceful. We loved it.  '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'It was my first trip to goa‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I have enjoyed stayed at this hotel. I can recommend this hotel to any one. I fully trust this hotel as its very pleasant stay. 
'}], 'price': '4,843', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/305672/-1/92d7d73382459bf87203b06452d7b7d4.jpg?ca=13&ce=1&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '25m¬≤', 'amenities': ['Garden view', 'Balcony/terrace', 'Shower', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Roll-in shower', 'Cleaning products', 'Hair dryer', 'Mirror', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Board games/puzzles', 'Books/DVDs/music for children', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Pool facilities', 'Satellite/cable channels', 'Telephone', 'Adapter', 'Air conditioning', 'Alarm clock', 'Daily newspaper', 'Fan', 'Linens', 'Sleep comfort items', 'Soundproofing', 'Wake-up service', 'Coffee/tea maker', 'Free bottled water', 'Mini bar', 'Desk', 'Interconnecting room(s) available', 'Outdoor furniture', 'Seating area', 'Sofa', 'Tile/marble flooring', 'Trash cans', 'Window', 'Wooden/parqueted flooring', 'Closet', 'Clothes rack', 'Ironing facilities', 'Accessible by stairs', 'Fire extinguisher', 'Individual air conditioning', 'In-room safe box', 'Laptop safe box', 'Locker', 'Safety/security feature', 'Smoke detector'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/jasminn-hotel/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&tspTypes=2&los=1&searchrequestid=7ae9307a-e5c0-42fb-9467-97934516fb8b'}

Food was good.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Great time‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nice hotel with huge rooms.... Nice view from balcony.... Food in restaurant lovely.... details:
{'Location': 'Agonda Beach Road, Near Church Left side just 100 Meters Right side., Agonda, Goa, India, 403702', 'overall_rating': 'Select your room', 'Name': 'Maria Paulo Guest House ', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Basic ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We stayed here at our first stop in India. The staff were nice when checking in, but we struggled a bit for the remainder of the stay to communicate a little.

We had a big issue on the second night where they had locked the main door and we ended up locked out, we weren‚Äôt told about any curfew, it was just after midnight. We ended up having to wake up another guest who was understandably irritated- however, they should have raised this with the staff as opposed to shouting at us! 

The rooms smelt incredibly damp and weren‚Äôt cleaned throughout our stay. There were lots of lizards (which we didn‚Äôt mind) but subsequently a lot of lizard poo all over the room too. 

Good if you want a basic stay.'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Nicely located home run guest house with utter lack of professionalism‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'This is a nicely located guest house. Its approximately 200 meters from the beach which is a walk away. 

First the good things  - 

i) The cook is amazing and the food is quite good . The cook goes one step further and customizes the dishes and even prepares special dishes which is very helpful especially if you are travelling with a young one or a toddler. They even prepared Maggi noodles on request for my toddler son. So a thumbs up for that !
ii) The owner Henrique and his wife and family are very courteous and helpful

Now the negatives - 

i) The staff are completely unhelpful and impolite. Room service seems like they are giving the guests a favour. Infact right after checking in - one of the service boys told me that they cant provide room service as they are only two people. 

ii) Breakfast  takes an hour to be prepared . Beware !!

iii) Total lack of professionalism. Not something you expect in Goa.  

Go for some other hotel in Agonda. Dunhill is byfar the best!'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Great place‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'A very basic hotel, but clean and quiet, with a very nice staff. A great value. '}, {'Review_Rating': '3.2', 'Review_Heading': 'pathetic‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I would not recommend this to anyone travelling with family.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Very nice stay. ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Stuyed four nights upon arrival in Agonda. Good location, very close to the beach and near to restaurants. We really liked the church sounds and didnt find them  to be a problem.

Name: Maria Paulo Guest House
reviews:
[{'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Basic ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We stayed here at our first stop in India. The staff were nice when checking in, but we struggled a bit for the remainder of the stay to communicate a little.

We had a big issue on the second night where they had locked the main door and we ended up locked out, we weren‚Äôt told about any curfew, it was just after midnight. We ended up having to wake up another guest who was understandably irritated- however, they should have raised this with the staff as opposed to shouting at us! 

The rooms smelt incredibly damp and weren‚Äôt cleaned throughout our stay. There were lots of lizards (which we didn‚Äôt mind) but subsequently a lot of lizard poo all over the room too. 

Good if you want a basic stay.'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Nicely located home run guest house with utter lack of professionalism‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'This is a nicely located guest house. Its approximately 200 meters from the beach which is a walk away. 

First the good things  - 

i) The cook is amazing and the food is quite good . The cook goes one step further and customizes the dishes and even prepares special dishes which is very helpful especially if you are travelling with a young one or a toddler. They even prepared Maggi noodles on request for my toddler son. So a thumbs up for that !
ii) The owner Henrique and his wife and family are very courteous and helpful

Now the negatives - 

i) The staff are completely unhelpful and impolite. Room service seems like they are giving the guests a favour. Infact right after checking in - one of the service boys told me that they cant provide room service as they are only two people. 

ii) Breakfast  takes an hour to be prepared . Beware !!

iii) Total lack of professionalism. Not something you expect in Goa.  

Go for some other hotel in Agonda. Dunhill is byfar the best!'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Great place‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'A very basic hotel, but clean and quiet, with a very nice staff. A great value. details:
{'Location': '23, Kinfe Towers, Bambolim, Bogmalo, Goa, India, 403201', 'overall_rating': 'Select your room', 'Name': 'Flagship Dewa Near Dabolim Airport', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Waste of Money‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'To start with the location is not correct . 
The staff are useless and demand and demand more money even if u have paid  online
Never visit this hotel '}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Horrible experience ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'There were no one at the gate and we kept knocking and looking for 1 hours. Eventually when we got checked in the room was completely different from the shown in picture. Breakfast was also mentioned cover but they denied it. '}, {'Review_Rating': '2.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Worst room.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "The people are running a scan. This is a room in an apartment. No privacy at all. Listing doesn't says anything about it. Got a small room when I chose king  suite. Please don't book, waste of money. They are scamming people. "}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'There is know one available totally fake‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "When we arrive at hotel there is know one available to speakp .. I also called them but they did not pick the call . It's totally waste of money. I am very disappoint "}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Not the place ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "It's very hard to locate the place with no signage. First staff said no place, then said it will cost extra when I said there is a confirmed booking. Was made to wait 30 minutes. Mosquitos added to the misery.  Overall, why suffer this place for a good location. There are many places for the same price in the neighborhood."}, {'Review_Rating': '2.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Breakfast not include, extra charge for checking at reception.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'No any breakfast provided by hotel staff
And at check in extra 224 rupees I paid for checking.
This is very bad experience for me
'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Worst place not safe for couples/ family‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'This is the worst place to stay! We booked it as it was close to the airport we just wanted to stay for the night but the staff was drunk and could not even talk properly '}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Hotel is at different place‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Hotel is at different place than shown in websites and even on map. location shown on map is for Deva apartment.'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very bad‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Already told that we are coming late, they not even allowed us in the hotel. Waited for 1 hour outside the hotel.

Very bad never recommend it to anyone '}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Not at all recommended‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Room was having foul smell with no cleanlisess at all. Bathroom was leaking contiously. Ac is making noise like tractor engine. Too small for families or more than 1 person is not possible to accomodate. They asked for 500 extra when checkin. Food very costly and so is liquor'}, {'Review_Rating': '3.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Average ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nr to airport but not recommend for long stay'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.0', 'Review_Heading': "They don't change bedsheet‚Äù", 'Review_Body': "I stayed there, and when I started checking out then one maid came , she cleaned the room and didn't even change bedsheet or pillow cover to anything. I got Skin irritation. "}, {'Review_Rating': '2.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Worst experience ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'There was only home stay and it was horrer experience. Nobody was there on reception area it was not safe'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': "Don't Ever Stay here‚Äù", 'Review_Body': "Worst place ever. Totally different from photos and location is different too. There are cockroaches/bedbugs everywhere. Not a good location to be in. please don't stay here."}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'They deny room when you reach.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "The room shown is not available at this location.
Hotel manager says OYO and AGODA sell this room and they can't help it.
I had to pay extra 500 and get a room in nearby hotel of same franchise.

Agoda customer support do not exist. Email support said they are in talk with hotel and waiting for the reply.

I have now returned from my vacation but they did not reply on my grievance.

"}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Extra charge‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'They charged extra for the room. Owner was saying pay more or just leave.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Easiest‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Near to the airport, hotel staff is too good.'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Water bottle mrp 15 selling 60rs 
Coke bottle mrp 10 rs selling 45 rs'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Worst Hotel I stayed in my life‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Room was very small, worst part was bathroom, commode seat was broken, water supply was also very slow. Staff was not professional and helpful. there was no complimentary water available in room. for one water bottle he was asking 50 rupees, but I have given only 20. He didn't help to guide me to go to airport, and asking 200 rupees for 1 KM by scooty, as I was not having any luggage .. wtf.. I went by walk "}, {'Review_Rating': '2.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Katastrophe!! auf keinen Fall buchen!!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Schwer zu finden und gibt es kein Personal sondern nur einen security Mann. Das hotel ist einfach nur √ºberall dreckig und kaputt. Die W√§nde schimmeln!! Der Schrank in meinem Raum sah aus als h√§tte er einen Weltkrieg, Hausbrand, Wasserschaden und ein paar Umz√ºge hinter sich: eine T√ºr fehlte die anderen beiden waren kaputt dazu war noch die beschichtung ab und alles verf√§rbt und gammlig. Das Zimmer war dreckig √ºberall Haare von anderen Menschen, am Waschbecken war sogar noch zahnpasta Rest...
Alles in allem einfach die schlimmste hotel erfahru g die ich je hatte!
'}], 'price': '1,320', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/9782372/-1/5a2ebe2b50f73c92fb66c8225b7cc3bc.jpg?ca=9&ce=1&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '16m¬≤', 'amenities': ['Non-smoking', 'Shower', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Bathrobes', 'Mirror', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Satellite/cable channels', 'Air conditioning', 'Blackout curtains', 'Fan', 'Linens', 'Free bottled water', 'Desk', 'Fireplace', 'Seating area', 'Closet', 'Fire extinguisher', 'Individual air conditioning', 'Smoke detector'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/oyo-60494-dewa/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&los=1&searchrequestid=7ae9307a-e5c0-42fb-9467-97934516fb8b'}

details: {'Location': 'Aguada - Siolim Road, Nossa Senhora de Piedade Chapel, Candolim, Goa, India, 403516', 'overall_rating': '8.9', 'Name': 'LA STATION CALANGUTE', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice place‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "I stayed with my mum, the place was clean, staff was very courteous. The manager was very considerate and allowed early check in and late check out at a nominal fee. It's walkable to Calangute beach but it takes you to the isolated front of the beach where there are no shacks. Food was good at the hotel. The location was accessible to bars, medical shops etc. "}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good for family '}], 'price': '2,522', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/36253046/-1/3f7c3dba6c05831a69731d4144ca215c.jpg?ce=0&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '120m¬≤', 'amenities': ['Shower', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Additional toilet', 'Toiletries', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'TV [flat screen]', 'Air conditioning', 'Fan', 'Linens', 'Private entrance', 'Mini bar', 'Seating area', 'Trash cans', 'Closet', 'Clothes rack', 'Ironing facilities'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/la-station-hospitality/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&tspTypes=-1&los=1&searchrequestid=7ae9307a-e5c0-42fb-9467-97934516fb8b'}

details:
{'Location': '48 10 Village Majorda, Adao Waddo Salcette, South Goa, Goa, India, 403713', 'overall_rating': '8.8', 'Name': 'Alila Diwa Goa India', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'For Peaceful trip‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'If you are looking for a place away from hustle-bustle to release stress, this is it! not otherwise!'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good hotel and kind staff, everything was good .  It would have been better if hotel has its own transportation (taxi ) as the taxi service outside is very high'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Perfect Getaway ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Amazing Location , Great Breakfast , Classy Rooms & the most Courteous Staff (specially Vishaka, Ruella & Ramcharan) ‚Ä¶.. made it the most exciting & memorable vacation post Covid ‚Ä¶‚Ä¶. Thank you so much Alila Diwa '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Loved our stay in Alila .. the staff is super friendly.. well organised. They make sure to clear your doubts if any. Loved the food especially at Bistro. 
Special thanks to Christopher at the reception and Godwin at Bistro for their service.. we really appreciate it. Wish we could stay longer ... üòä
Would definitely revisit..

'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Great Resort‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'A hidden gem for the traveler that is looking for a quality experience '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent Staff‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'the staff was exceptionally helpful and did everything to make us comfortable, special thanks to jiten and chadwik, who went out of the way to make our stay memorable, cheers to them and to rest of the alila staff, the property is extremely beautiful scenic '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Fabulous stay! ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'My husband and I stayed here for 3 days in April 2021. It was our first holiday since the pandemic and we were extremely satisfied with our choice to stay here. The highlight of the property is the infinity pool which overlooks the paddy fields. The resort is made in a Balinese style and is very beautiful! The beach is a short walk from the property and they have shuttle service to drop and pick from the beach. Our room was clean and spacious. The breakfast spread was good too.  The staff was courteous and very welcoming. Overall, we thoroughly enjoyed our stay and would highly recommend for a luxurious stay. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Best Place ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Best Place to Stay in South Goa . I Wish U start accepting Pets. That would be great !! As Pet Friendly Hotels are less'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Beach is not near. That is the only negative point. Otherwise excellent hotel. Friendly staff. Cleanliness good. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Great place to relax‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Excellent food, staff and rooms'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Wonderful hotel with amazing hospitality.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'From ensuring guest safety to their splendid views, cleanliness, spacious rooms and unparalleled hospitality, this hotel is the best you can get in South Goa. Loved our 3 days stay. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Beautiful hotel surrounded by nature ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We had a terrace room which was spacious, clean and modern with a peaceful terrace stepping out to the gardens. The restaurants are very reasonable, we really loved the spice studio and was surprised how inexpensive it was. I had two treatments at the spa which were amazing! The hotel itself is decorated so uniquely and is just stunning, the views from the pool are beautiful. Only a 7 min walk to the beach or you can jump on the shuttle bus which takes 2 mins. Just be warned the men working at the beach will try hard to get you to use their facilities but if you don‚Äôt want to, just walk down the beach a bit (to the right) & there‚Äôs a quieter row of sun beds further back where the men are polite and let you have some space! The restaurant there is also good and cheap. 
You will have a lovely stay at Alila Diwa Hotel. I can‚Äôt wait to go back. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Expect  the unexpected ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'This hotel has everything  everything  live music nights,best goan food,staff so welcoming. Beautiful  beautiful  stay there .Will definitely  come back.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'All really excellent '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Luxury '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Great place, great staff‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "I was there with a couple of friends for a 3 day get away.
The resort is fabulous and is located in a quiet corner with great amenities.
- Two bars (one of them has happy hours in the evening too)
- Two restaurants (we did multiple room service calls)
- A lovely infinity pool
- Spa and Salon (got treatments done in both)
- Access to a beach via a buggy service

Alila has a fantastic breakfast spread in the mornings and the staff in general are very courteous. Alisha did our check in formalities and gave us a tour of the resort before taking us to our rooms. It's a great place to get some peace and quiet.

At nights, Martin's Corner is a short walk of about 400 meters from the place. That place has good food and music to end the night."}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'What an idyllic location‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'A fantastic hotel in a suberb location with a backdrop of coconut trees.  A Balinese style hotel with  beautiful gardens.  One of its unique advantage is the quality of staff who give impeccable service.  All those I encountered were very helpful and courteous.  A short distance to the beach which you can either walk too or the hotel provide a courtesy bus.  One of the swimming overlooks the rice fields with a wonderful view when having a swim.  A great hotel just perfect!!  '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'This was true 5star hotel. ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "I loved everything.... they upgraded my room. ALILA has live music, big pool even kids pool was bigger than any other places. Beach was far from hotel but no worries they have buggies for pick up and drop. They provide towels as well for beach. If you are a walking person its beautiful path that crosses small farms. It was one of the best and clean beach in Goa. I usually don't repeat my hotels but this one I would love to go again. "}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Above average‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'small property that was completely occupied by a wedding including pool and bar should have been highly discounted, no activities on property .. staff have little or no knowledge of things around, beaches recommendation. They dont have their own beach that sucked.  Great as perhaps a business hotel or a place for a marriage but doesnt do justice to the true goa experience.. '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent stay!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Alila was a fantastic experience. Beautiful decor, clean environs, delicious breakfast spread and evening chaat counter, and a luxurious spa experience!! We really enjoyed our stay. Pool is small but ver well maintained and good for young childrens.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Location is good, lot of restaurants are nearby. Candolim and Sinqurrim beaches are walking distance.
Food quality is good, must include mire varieties of fish curries in menu.
Staff is very helpful. We reached early and check inn time was 2pm. Mr Prakash at reception gave us room to change. 
I recommend Acron Sea Way Resort, value for money.
'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice, spacious and Clean‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very good stay if you are coming in with hound children, plenty of space especially if you book the premier garden side room, extra money spent is work it, also pls take in breakfast option, it‚Äôs good'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Decent stay in Candolim‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'This is a medium range resort which is very decent to stay‚Ä¶it‚Äôs just in the main road so easily accessible to all major places ‚Ä¶.the buffet breakfast had good options‚Ä¶.ideal for stay if you‚Äôre looking hotel around Candolim'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Impeccably good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Please go ahead and book as this hotel has almost everything you need to enjoy your vacation. '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Awesome stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Very beautiful rooms n service....I had read some reviews where PPL wrote that they don't provide breakfast which is not right they have breakfast buffet n well within the premises "}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Best hotel at candolim Area,Near candolim beech.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good & cooperative Staff,
Thank'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional service by Rajeev‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'All over good experience.
Especially the staff Rajeev at reception is very good. His behaviour is great and helped a lot for everything'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Kindest Staff with Beautiful Property ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'They let us do early check-in and it was a big relief since we were sleepless from our flight. Staff is always there for any kind of help whether to book a cab or even bargain with them. Loved the positivity of the surrounding area. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good place stay, close to beach, market and on-road‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "I've been to Candolim 3 times already and I booked this resort, they have bigger beds than others, their breakfast buffet is lavish and its on the main-road and just 5 mins walk to the beach just like any other hotel as almost all are located on the main road so they're all the same whether its Radisson or this. The staff was friendly and service was good.

The included breakfast buffer had good variety and appropriate for everyone. For eg. it always had Dosa, Idli, sambhar, One out of these (Stuffed Parantha / Poori Bhaji / Chole Bhaturey), Milk, Tea, Green Tea, Fresh Fruits, Boiled Eggs, Omlette, Chicken Sauages, Bread Toast, butter, jam, Milkshake (Choclate / Banana), Fruit Juice, Cornflex etc.

Its in the market of the market and other restaurants. The room had all the facilities like ac, big tv with tata sky, big bed in which we were were able to sleep properly. The room was spacious enough and balcony was also good and big (atleast mine was).

The service was quick and crisp. They catered to all my demands. We went to casino and left our kids in the room and told the manager at the reception and he assured me that they will be safe and sound and that is what I got. Very good service :)

The swimming pool was good and we enjoyed the dip in the pool. It was relaxing.

I would definitely come to them again. "}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Value for money‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Value for money and food is excellent. The beach is also very near to the hotel.'}], 'price': '8,599', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/643/6434701/6434701_19011618060071380409.jpg?ca=13&ce=1&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '33m¬≤', 'amenities': ['Shower', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Streaming service like Netflix', 'Telephone', 'TV [flat screen]', 'Air conditioning', 'Fan', 'Linens', 'Wake-up service', 'Coffee/tea maker', 'Free bottled water', 'Free welcome drink', 'Desk', 'Fireplace', 'Tile/marble flooring', 'Closet', 'Clothes rack', 'Safety/security feature'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/acron-seaway-resort/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&tspTypes=1&los=1&searchrequestid=7ae9307a-e5c0-42fb-9467-97934516fb8b'}

The rooms are clean, pool is small sized but decent, staff is kind enough and the breakfast is good.'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Above average‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Hotel is very old  and pool not clean , price very   high '}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Family resort. Good breakfast . Aircondition is bad ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "The location is good but you can get better options at this cost. The air conditioning is very bad in the rooms.  They have provided remote but actually the AC is controlled centrally. So remote is only to switch on and off. Many people complained for AC cooling. Breafast is really great. Lot of options. The rooms are spacious. The king size bed doesn't look that big so if you're with kids will have to accomodate. Small pool but sufficient enough for some fun in water."}, {'Review_Rating': '3.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Not good! ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "The hotel is overrated. There is no staff to help you with the luggage. The room was on the fourth floor and there was no lift. The key card didn't work and we had to literally kept climbing up and down. The breakfast arena was super crowded and the omllettle had egg shells in it. 
Only one staff Mr. Debrata was very kind and helpful. So he deserves a mention.  "}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Above average‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'AC not working entire night '}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Worst place to stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'You‚Äôll regret every second of your stay here. Good breakfast . Aircondition is bad ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "The location is good but you can get better options at this cost. The air conditioning is very bad in the rooms.  They have provided remote but actually the AC is controlled centrally. So remote is only to switch on and off. Many people complained for AC cooling. Breafast is really great. Lot of options. The rooms are spacious. The king size bed doesn't look that big so if you're with kids will have to accomodate. Small pool but sufficient enough for some fun in water."}, {'Review_Rating': '3.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Not good! ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "The hotel is overrated. There is no staff to help you with the luggage. The room was on the fourth floor and there was no lift. The key card didn't work and we had to literally kept climbing up and down. The breakfast arena was super crowded and the omllettle had egg shells in it. 
Only one staff Mr. Debrata was very kind and helpful. So he deserves a mention. "}, {'Review_Rating': '2.8', 'Review_Heading': "Don't recommend.‚Äù", 'Review_Body': "Zero value for money. details:
{'Location': 'Dovalkazon Agonda Canacona, Agonda, Goa, India, 403702', 'overall_rating': '6.3', 'Name': 'Agonda Heritage', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Location location location ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Charming Room with all the facilities and it‚Äôs right on the beach. Can walk to amazing restaurants. Brilliant for solo or couple. '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'A superb location for vacation however pathetic Admin‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'My rating
Location - 10/10
Resort - 8/10
Staff - 5/10
Admin - 1/10

Location & Resort ambiance is great, however their tie-up with nearby restaurant (Hidden Gardens - which is eventually owner by same group) and service they provided and the majority of staffs behaviour all were pathetic, except one staff who was not business minded. Staffs in the resort were ok-ok, however they sadly did not know whats the scene with this restaurants and they even did not have few basic stuff like extra glasses when we had asked for. Stay was peaceful, view was amazing, less crowd outside the resort and beach area. If you have high patience level, you can tolerate with the restaurant stuffs.   

If they could do something for their restaurant tie-up stuffs, 10% additional service charges for restaurant, parking in front of the house, etc, it will be amazing, they can really run this for long too (efficiently).

details: {'Location': 'NaPalms Resort, Varca Road, Varca, Salcete, South Goa, Goa, IndiaGoaGoaIndia403724, Colva, Goa, India, 403724', 'overall_rating': '6.9', 'Name': 'Capital O 700591 Royale Palms', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Worst stay ever‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It all started with the fact that the correct address details of the reception were nowhere mentioned (only the address of the room, not the reception!). We searched for the reception for more than a hour and sent the property several messages (there was also no telephone number listed online, on the booking page or booking confirmation). They did not respond to any of those messages nor our request to call us. Check-in time turned out to be later than stated online, so we had to wait first.  Once we got to the room, it was horrible.  The kitchen cupboards were terribly disgusting - full of leftover food -, the bathroom was filthy, the towels had dirty stains and there were ants everywhere. Also the air conditioning was not working initially and could not be repaired until the next day. During the night the power went out three times. The strangest thing was that the next morning our door was locked from the outside with a sliding lock, while we stayed on the top floor of the building where no others stayed. We had to knock loudly on the door and shout until someone opened the door from outside. EXTREMELY dangerous. We have booked the stay including breakfast (also stated in the booking confirmation), but in te next morning the accommodation insists that it does not provide any breakfast. The managers are downright antisocial and rude. They talk through you when you want to explain the situation, show no understanding at all and offered no solution whatsoever. The problem with the ants got worse and worse.  At one point they were even in our clothes.  It was a terrible stay. NEVER book a room here!'}], 'price': '1,896', 'img_link': 'https://q-xx.bstatic.com/xdata/images/hotel/840x460/410595648.jpg?k=35d4b58c00c18792937cd86d597b30739299fbd84375e95a2f044786c8c82699&o=', 'room_size': '15m¬≤', 'amenities': ['Shower', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Telephone', 'TV', 'Fan', 'Linens', 'Trash cans'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/capital-o-700591-beach-palms/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&los=1&searchrequestid=7ae9307a-e5c0-42fb-9467-97934516fb8b'}

{'Location': 'Opposite Arrosim Beach Road, Cansaulim, Goa, South Goa, Goa, India, 403712', 'overall_rating': '8.2', 'Name': 'Treehouse Nova', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Fantastic stay at Nova‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Facility is clean and the housekeeping staff is very friendly. We had a good stay - all our requests for supplying non - plastic water were complied!'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.4', 'Review_Heading': 'A hotel without any food at all‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I stayed at the hotel for few hours only since I checked in early morning and checked out the same day. My flight was quite early so needed a temporary stay. I was travelling with an infant and when I asked that if any food can be ordered from the kitchen they first said kitchen will open at 11am and then they finally said no cooking can be done that day. Pathetic. Please avoid this hotel'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent service‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "We were pleased by the owners help with onward travel arrangements. I don't usually leave a review but it went above and beyond. Thank you"}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Best property for stay in south goa‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Best property in south goa, suprb clean, staff are good, specially their manager Vijay, he attended us at first and has very polite and positive attitude towards guest. Kitchen staff are also very polite and changed their menu just for us, thats a very good service I ever seen in hotel.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Perfect small hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I suggest changing nothing: Clean room, hot water and AC all working to order. Simple, filling breakfast. Friendly staff and good location.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Best place and save to‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Manager Mishra welcome u in grand way 
Enjoyed stay'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.4', 'Review_Heading': 'No proper room services‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "There is no proper room services. We don't even get a coffee/tea in the morning until 9am. We need to walk for more than 1.5 km to get a morning tea. No other restaurants are near by as well.  its a remote village with no proper connectivity as well."}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Perfect hotel for family‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'This was the best stay I have ever had in hotel. Manager Mr. Mishra is one of a gem kind of person. 
First of all rooms are big and very decent. Cleanliness is maintained very keenly. Everything is spotless clean. Whatever time you reach hotel staff takes care of your luggage, there is no need to lift your single baggage. Room service is very quick and efficient. 
Swimming pool is very well maintained. Clean and pleasant. 
Breakfast is awesome! Me and my family enjoyed food very much. 
Staff is very friendly, they even make your family and kids comfortable. I extended my stay over here because of their great service. Manager Mr Mishra provides personal attention to each and every visitor. I have also seen him taking care of his staff very well. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Awesome stay!!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Location was really good away from city‚Äôs chaos. Hotel staff service experience was good. Variety needed in breakfast, very less choices. Manager was really friendly and helpful.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The property is clean and near to the beach. The staff is really nice and very helpful.
The only issue was the food service was a bit slow as there was only one guy taking care of breakfast arrangements.
'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Not 3 star‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Basic services motel type'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Very Nice hotel.. Clean rooms.. staff is also good.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nice place to stay with very clean rooms.  Beach is approx 1 km away. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Beautiful hotel and Good staff ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Hotel  cleaning staff very good'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'An awesome place to stay!!!!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Brilliant location, great staff, beautiful & clean rooms-- highly recommended for budget travellers and peoplwho want the best value on their money. Love to visit once again!!!! BTW the food is awesome üëåüòéüòãüòÄüòõüòõüòõü•∞ü•∞ü•∞ my kids were so happy watching Nova and we had an absolute gala time.....'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Great hotel at a great price and location‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Just one kilometer from the beach, the location is perfect. The hotel has really good aesthetic, inspired by Portuguese art style. The rooms were very modern and clean. Our stay was underwhelmed however by annoying guests who checked in at 1 AM in the night and were yelling and shouting in the corridor. '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Good for relaxing holidays‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Pros:
* far from the crowded place
* walkable distance to Arossim beach
* friendly staff

Cons:
* no restaurants or shops in the vicinity
* very limited recreational facilities
* breakfast quality is average
* bathroom fixtures not maintained regularly'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Neat and clean rooms. We enjoyed our stay here.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Beautiful Place , Clean Friendly service location near to a very nice beach . Totally enjoyable experience. Isa Najjar from  Boston, USA'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Above average‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Beautiful hotel. Friendly and helpful staff. Frequent 5min power outages during July monsoon. Room lighting could have been a bit brighter. '}], 'price': '3,565', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/1632416/-1/e03527303fb0f66a12260a5e562ab68e.jpg?ce=0&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '18m¬≤', 'amenities': ['Shower', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Hair dryer', 'Mirror', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Satellite/cable channels', 'Telephone', 'Air conditioning', 'Alarm clock', 'Daily newspaper', 'Fan', 'Hand sanitizer', 'Linens', 'Sleep comfort items', 'Slippers', 'Soundproofing', 'Umbrella', 'Wake-up service', 'Coffee/tea maker', 'Free bottled water', 'Refrigerator', 'Desk', 'Laptop workspace', 'Tile/marble flooring', 'Closet', 'Clothes rack', 'Accessible by elevator', 'Accessible by stairs', 'In-room safe box', 'Locker', 'Safety/security feature', 'Smoke detector'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/treehouse-nova/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&tspTypes=2&los=1&searchrequestid=7ae9307a-e5c0-42fb-9467-97934516fb8b'}

details:
{'Location': 'H. No 122, near Patnem Beach, Palolem, Canacona, Goa 403702, Palolem, Goa, India, 403702', 'overall_rating': 'Select your room', 'Name': 'Om Shanti Residence', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Thank you for unforgettable holiday!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It was a magnificent New Year Holiday at Om Shanti Residence! The hotel (residence) is located at the nice area close to Arabian Sea. The rooms are brand new, spacious with AC, nice bathrooms and balconies. The staff is super friendly. Rooms are clean, fresh towels and bedlinen. Room services at any moment. The Residence has its own sunbeds at the beach with a cosy restaurant where you can have a perfect breakfast with fresh fruits, delicious lunch with shrimps and beers plus live music and of course outstanding dinner with fresh sea food at the beach! Guests are very friendly, staff is caring, the atmosphere is very relaxing. I wish I could stay at this place more than two weeks!! Definitely will recommend this property to spend nice holidays, also good for big family holidays! Would like to thank again the Owners and Staff for their work! You are all a nice team! See you next season!'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent stay at Om Shanti Residence ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Exceptionally good host , clean room and excellent service. We loved our stay there felt like our second home . Mr Nanu,the owner was very polite and helpful.  This place is very close to Patnem beach . We would love to stay at this place again in future. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'ticked all my boxes!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Affordable, clean, great location, friendly staff, made our stay wonderful & wouldnt hestitate to come back again for sure!'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good place to stay in Canacona‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Big room with nice bathroom. Everything works perfectly including shower and aircon. Nice balcony to sit and have coffee. Reasonable price. Helpful staff. Not far from the beach, shops and restaurants. '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice stay with decent facilities ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We stayed at this place for 2 days, it is very close to patnem beach. They have their own beach shack and give you 10%off on food. Service is also good'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Amazing stay, Great staff‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I loved our stay here. It was our first time in Goa but the staff was super helpful. '}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'only advantage was, near to beach, rest talking about value for money, well room was very average i opted for deluxe room for 3200 a night. there was no refrigerator, no kettel, interiores were very average.

moment you will enter reception area, you will find its very good hotel. and room will be great.

but it was below average rooms you will find, no doubt staff and room service were good.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "I would highly recommend it to everyone. Rooms very clean, staff very keen to help for offering us transport, changing towels, cleaning, giving us more coffe, etc. They even stayed until late for giving us the keys.
It is closed to a very beautiful and non turistic beach. Don't hesitate in going there"}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': '◊û◊ß◊ï◊ù ◊û◊ß◊°◊ô◊ù ◊ï◊†◊ß◊ô'}, {'Review_Rating': '3.2', 'Review_Heading': '◊ß◊®◊ï◊ë ◊ú◊ó◊ï◊£ ◊§◊ê◊ò◊†◊ù ◊®◊ó◊ï◊ß ◊û◊û◊®◊õ◊ñ ◊î◊¢◊ô◊†◊ô◊ü ◊ë◊§◊ê◊ú◊ï◊ú◊ô◊ù ◊ô◊ó◊°◊ô◊™‚Äù', 'Review_Body': '◊û◊ß◊ï◊ù ◊†◊ó◊û◊ì , ◊ú◊ê ◊õ◊ú◊õ◊ö ◊†◊ß◊ô ◊ê◊ë◊ú ◊°◊ë◊ô◊® ◊ú◊î◊¢◊ë◊ô◊® ◊©◊ù ◊ú◊ô◊ú◊î, ◊¢◊ï◊ë◊ì◊ô◊ù ◊ú◊ê ◊õ◊ú◊õ◊ö ◊û◊ë◊ô◊†◊ô◊ù ◊ê◊†◊í◊ú◊ô◊™ ◊ê◊ë◊ú ◊†◊ó◊û◊ì◊ô◊ù ◊°◊î◊õ! ◊î◊ô◊™◊®◊ï◊ü ◊ñ◊î ◊©◊î◊û◊ß◊ï◊ù ◊ß◊®◊ï◊ë ◊ú◊ó◊ï◊£ ◊§◊ê◊ò◊†◊ù ◊û◊©◊ù ◊ê◊§◊©◊® ◊ú◊®◊ê◊ï◊™ ◊™◊©◊ß◊ô◊¢◊ï◊™ ◊î◊ô◊§◊ï◊™ ◊ë◊§◊ê◊ú◊ï◊ú◊ô◊ù..◊û◊ô ◊©◊ú◊ï◊ß◊ó ◊®◊ô◊ß◊©◊î ◊ê◊ï ◊ê◊ï◊§◊†◊ï◊¢ ◊ñ◊î ◊†◊°◊ô◊¢◊î ◊©◊ú 8 ◊ì◊ß◊ï◊™ ◊ë◊¢◊®◊ö ◊ú◊û◊®◊õ◊ñ ◊î◊û◊°◊¢◊ì◊ï◊™ ◊ï◊î◊ó◊†◊ï◊ô◊ï◊™ ◊©◊ú ◊§◊ú◊ê◊ú◊ï◊ú◊ô◊ù'}], 'price': '2,500', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/34484590/0/59f97970034aaa6c886a5a0bc5c11839.jpg?ce=0&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '14m¬≤', 'amenities': ['Mountain view', 'Balcony/terrace', 'Shower', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Accessible vanities', 'Additional toilet', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Air conditioning', 'Fan', 'Linens', 'Private entrance', 'Sleep comfort items', 'Soundproofing', 'Wake-up service', 'Refrigerator', 'Desk', 'Seating area', 'Tile/marble flooring', 'Closet', 'Clothes rack', 'In-room safe box'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/om-shanti-residence/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&los=1&searchrequestid=7ae9307a-e5c0-42fb-9467-97934516fb8b'}
