[{'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Thank you for unforgettable holiday!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It was a magnificent New Year Holiday at Om Shanti Residence! The hotel (residence) is located at the nice area close to Arabian Sea. The rooms are brand new, spacious with AC, nice bathrooms and balconies. The staff is super friendly. Rooms are clean, fresh towels and bedlinen. Room services at any moment. The Residence has its own sunbeds at the beach with a cosy restaurant where you can have a perfect breakfast with fresh fruits, delicious lunch with shrimps and beers plus live music and of course outstanding dinner with fresh sea food at the beach! Guests are very friendly, staff is caring, the atmosphere is very relaxing. I wish I could stay at this place more than two weeks!! Definitely will recommend this property to spend nice holidays, also good for big family holidays! Would like to thank again the Owners and Staff for their work! You are all a nice team! See you next season!'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent stay at Om Shanti Residence ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Exceptionally good host , clean room and excellent service. We loved our stay there felt like our second home . Mr Nanu,the owner was very polite and helpful.  This place is very close to Patnem beach . We would love to stay at this place again in future. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'ticked all my boxes!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Affordable, clean, great location, friendly staff, made our stay wonderful & wouldnt hestitate to come back again for sure!'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good place to stay in Canacona‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Big room with nice bathroom. Everything works perfectly including shower and aircon. Nice balcony to sit and have coffee. Reasonable price. Helpful staff. Not far from the beach, shops and restaurants. '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice stay with decent facilities ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We stayed at this place for 2 days, it is very close to patnem beach. They have their own beach shack and give you 10%off on food. Service is also good'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Amazing stay, Great staff‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I loved our stay here. It was our first time in Goa but the staff was super helpful. '}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'only advantage was, near to beach, rest talking about value for money, well room was very average i opted for deluxe room for 3200 a night. there was no refrigerator, no kettel, interiores were very average.

moment you will enter reception area, you will find its very good hotel. and room will be great.

but it was below average rooms you will find, no doubt staff and room service were good.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "I would highly recommend it to everyone. Rooms very clean, staff very keen to help for offering us transport, changing towels, cleaning, giving us more coffe, etc. They even stayed until late for giving us the keys.
It is closed to a very beautiful and non turistic beach. Don't hesitate in going there"}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': '◊û◊ß◊ï◊ù ◊û◊ß◊°◊ô◊ù ◊ï◊†◊ß◊ô'}, {'Review_Rating': '3.2', 'Review_Heading': '◊ß◊®◊ï◊ë ◊ú◊ó◊ï◊£ ◊§◊ê◊ò◊†◊ù ◊®◊ó◊ï◊ß ◊û◊û◊®◊õ◊ñ ◊î◊¢◊ô◊†◊ô◊ü ◊ë◊§◊ê◊ú◊ï◊ú◊ô◊ù ◊ô◊ó◊°◊ô◊™‚Äù', 'Review_Body': '◊û◊ß◊ï◊ù ◊†◊ó◊û◊ì , ◊ú◊ê ◊õ◊ú◊õ◊ö ◊†◊ß◊ô ◊ê◊ë◊ú ◊°◊ë◊ô◊® ◊ú◊î◊¢◊ë◊ô◊® ◊©◊ù ◊ú◊ô◊ú◊î, ◊¢◊ï◊ë◊ì◊ô◊ù ◊ú◊ê ◊õ◊ú◊õ◊ö ◊û◊ë◊ô◊†◊ô◊ù ◊ê◊†◊í◊ú◊ô◊™ ◊ê◊ë◊ú ◊†◊ó◊û◊ì◊ô◊ù ◊°◊î◊õ! ◊î◊ô◊™◊®◊ï◊ü ◊ñ◊î ◊©◊î◊û◊ß◊ï◊ù ◊ß◊®◊ï◊ë ◊ú◊ó◊ï◊£ ◊§◊ê◊ò◊†◊ù ◊û◊©◊ù ◊ê◊§◊©◊® ◊ú◊®◊ê◊ï◊™ ◊™◊©◊ß◊ô◊¢◊ï◊™ ◊î◊ô◊§◊ï◊™ ◊ë◊§◊ê◊ú◊ï◊ú◊ô◊ù..◊û◊ô ◊©◊ú◊ï◊ß◊ó ◊®◊ô◊ß◊©◊î ◊ê◊ï ◊ê◊ï◊§◊†◊ï◊¢ ◊ñ◊î ◊†◊°◊ô◊¢◊î ◊©◊ú 8 ◊ì◊ß◊ï◊™ ◊ë◊¢◊®◊ö ◊ú◊û◊®◊õ◊ñ ◊î◊û◊°◊¢◊ì◊ï◊™ ◊ï◊î◊ó◊†◊ï◊ô◊ï◊™ ◊©◊ú ◊§◊ú◊ê◊ú◊ï◊ú◊ô◊ù'}]

details:
{'Location': 'Palolem, Goa, India', 'overall_rating': 'Select your room', 'Name': 'Cafe Blue Hotel', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Amazing stay right at the beach‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Location is phenomenal ofcourse as it's on the beach. The room has everything except a fridge and kettle, but the staff will be happy to oblige by helping you with your beer chilling and warm water needs. 

Staff is super helpful- thanks to Krishna and the whole team. They helped make our stay more comfortable in every way possible. 

Wifi is amazing. "}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Great location‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The hotel has great Sea view'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'No good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Not upto the mark
Not picking up the call
Location is not accurate '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional ‚ô•Ô∏è‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'All staff are very friendly and helpful. Everything was great. Great food, excellent environment. Pomfret tandoor was excellent.'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Memorable stay at cafe blue‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very satisfying stay. We stayed for 3 days and Krishna,smiling Rama even young Dilli and rest of the staff (a math graduate)made my stay memorable.Krishnas energy and joie de vivre was infectious.I feel people make the place and the entire staff were very sweet, helpful, knowledgeable  about the place ,committed to your wellbeing to make Cafe blue a blissful place. The location is incredible...a little away from the main crowd therefore more relaxing.Food is great.And the candlelight dinner they provide made my day.Thank you Cafe Blue for my second honeymoon. '}, {'Review_Rating': '2.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Poor Service and Badmouth Staff‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Situated at the north end of Palolem with no direct access to road. Need to walk with luggage from road to hotel (200M). Water pressure in the bathroom is very less ( one mug takes more than a minute to fill). No room service, no hair dryer or water kettle in the room. On top of it some staffs are completely ill mannered to pass on unpleasant comments.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Amazing experience!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "We stay at Cafe Blue Hotel for ten days. It was an amazing experience! The hotel is just a few steps from the beach; you can sleep listening to the waves and have your meals while watching the sea. The restaurant is perhaps the most remarkable factor of this hotel. They have a wide variety of food and the quality of the meals is gorgeous. We tried a few other restaurants but none of them were similar to Cafe Blue Hotel. Most importantly, the staff was incredible. They made sure our stay was the best and took care of every single detail. Rama, in particular, was the best host. He was simply amazing! He took care of everything, from our food till the taxi, the ATM, or even some fireworks we wanted to buy for new year's eve. We recommend this place! "}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good service by Rama and team from the time we entered the property... rooms super clean.
Food was good.... The  only issue we faced, was the parking.  (Had to park the car at the beach main entrance and walk, the govt parking gets full fast, so parked at a private spot @150 for each day. ).. but overall, it was a good stay.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Good stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Hotel is on the beach and view is amazing if you take sea view facing room. food is also good. only one problem is reaching to  hotel is very hectic thing. uou will not find it easily. you cnt directly take bike or car till hotel. you have to park bike away from hotel and the walk. walking road from parking till hotel os not good.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice stay for beach lovers ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Everythi went well !! We liked the place !! If u like beach then this place is perfect for peace and lonely time !! '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nice position on north end of Palolem beach. Room was clean and comfortable. Friendly staff. We upgraded ourselves on arrival to a beach front room but didn‚Äôt use the  beach facing balcony as we were always on the beach loungers. '}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Above average‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Most of the day power cut and no back up. 
Restraunt does not follow price listed in the menu. Though it‚Äôs remote and infront of the sea Regular sea food also expensive.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Superb experience nice staff.... excellent location‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It was a delightfull experience staying here infront of the beach, nice beach huts, good food and awesome staff arranged all things we asked for in seconds....must book...!
Will surely visit again.....'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'A great place to stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I can recommend this to everyone who likes beaches and the sea.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Awesome Beach resort‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Must visit.went in March 2016 to celebrate my anniversary.awesome place.nice Beach front bar.seashore is just 10 steps away.u can have a relaxed and peaceful stay.best Beach Resort in palolem Beach.great place and excellent staff.good service.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Best Spot on the Beach‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'From the airport via A/C taxi it took about 1.5 hours and cost 1400‚Çπ. The roads for the most part are smooth and there is not much traffic. As you get closer to the hotel the road becomes curvy so, it would be best to take an anti-nausea pill if you are sensitive to motion. As you drive through the little town and make your way to the beach front you will notice: fruit vendors, mini convenience stores, restaurants, clothing shops, jewelry shops, souvenir shops, travel agencies, cash exchanges, and even a Baskin-Robbins. Once you reach the beach you will need to go on foot about 5 minutes north along the beach shore. The beach and water are clean and well kept. The sea is calm and easy to swim in. We found that the best food was served at the hotel. They hit it out of the park when it comes to Goan Dishes such as: fish curry 250‚Çπ, prawn balchao 300‚Çπ, and prawn biryani 350‚Çπ. If you are looking for a whole fish, upon request they will show you all the fresh options they have for the day along with price. They offer a variety of classic and signature cocktails ranging from 200 to 250. At the time of our stay the special was buy one get one free on the mint mojitos and they were delicious. The staff is kind, attentive, and welcoming. Every morning they lay out fresh towels on the beach front reclining chairs and in the evening change over to their dining set for one to enjoy the sunset. Our first room (Delux Sea View) was #503 and it contained: ceiling fan, A/C, large bathroom, 1 large firm bed, mosquito net, closet, mattress (for 3rd person), and mini front porch with chairs. We then moved over to a similar room (Front Sea View) #508 that directly faced the water and offered an amazing view of the beach. The rooms and facilities are clean and well kept. Our accommodations included breakfast. The portions are large and satisfying. The manager, Aadi, aided us in having and amazing stay at the blue hotel Cafe. We strongly recommend this hotel and will be sure to book her u'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.7', 'Review_Heading': 'Relaxed time in Palolem‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Sea front bungalow, quietness, hotel staff'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.3', 'Review_Heading': 'great staff.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'staff, location, food'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.7', 'Review_Heading': 'Relaxing get-away‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Location, friendlyness and honesty of the staff, good quality food'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.3', 'Review_Heading': 'Loved it here ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Great location, helpful staff, hot shower'}], 'price': '3,500', 'img_link': 'https://q-xx.bstatic.com/xdata/images/hotel/840x460/332931570.jpg?k=5aa6ad68f30e6b85d41f89e188efe9eb82cb2679420ac971af6fa497bbbb6ea2&o=', 'room_size': '24m¬≤', 'amenities': ['Sea view', 'Balcony/terrace', 'Shower', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Accessible vanities', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Walk-in shower', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Air conditioning', 'Fan', 'Hand sanitizer', 'Linens', 'Mosquito net', 'Sleep comfort items', 'Free bottled water', 'Carpeting', 'Trash cans', 'Closet', 'Clothes rack', 'Individual air conditioning'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/cafe-blue-hotel/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&tspTypes=6&los=1&searchrequestid=30ac5c34-7b2f-4949-9102-f9f2aa9aa8b1'}
Location: Palolem, Goa, India
Name: Cafe Blue Hotel

details:
{'Location': '1 Spice Garden  Aguada-Siolim Road  Candolim  Bardez  North Goa Goa Goa 403516 India, Candolim, Goa, India, 403516', 'overall_rating': 'Select your room', 'Name': 'OYO 85326 Corinthia Boutique Rooms', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Above average‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'No breakfast, no water bottles, no toothbrush, bad experience i had'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Smelly rooms with no  ventilation‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Look for some other options'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.8', 'Review_Heading': 'SCAM‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I booked AC room they where like this is oyo rooms first come first serve. They gave us non ac room and started playing mind games if you want ac room pay more 500per day more charges.
Their is no mobile network in hotel and will booking its mention wifi and ac room,they where saying that we dont that much money to provide wifi and all.its really bad experience.

Guys dnt book any OYO Rooms in goa their is some what scam i going on their'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good experience‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It was a nice experience considering at affordable price and owner of this property is good. I would recommend to stay here!'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'No Proper airflow inside property‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "The property is at good location, but there is no proper ventilation and sunlight inside.  Due to this there is lot of dampness and very strong smell of Damp Walls when you enter the property.

They don't provide even water and you've to buy it separately."}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Suffocating Place‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'There is not a single window in entire hotel
Its literally suffocating.
I visited the place and immediately canceled my booking'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Fraud & Rude‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We booked a room in this hotel via agoda app for the discount price RS. 870. When we reached the hotel, they refused to give the room for the booked amount, they told us to go search any other hotel. Then they asked us 2000 rs only in cash to check in. As we had no other option (searching rooms with luggage is difficult as we are new to goa) we paid the extra amount in cash and checked in, no receipt given. Hotel owner is very rude, she said they don‚Äôt care about the online booking amounts (don‚Äôt know why they made this hotel available online). No proper curtains, no wifi, and Don‚Äôt believe the good online rating. During check out they are asking us to take out our phone and give good rating infront of them. Worst experience on the 1st day. '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Almost Average‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "I got this booking in a reasonable rate for two days
Pros: 1. prime location in Candolim.
2. host was warm (older lady) 
3. open area attached with all rooms
4. spacious rooms and comfy clean beds 

Cons : 1. difficulty in finding the hotel because of spa like small entrance. 
2. extreme dampness smell all over the entrance, lobby and rooms. 
3. No dustbin provided
4. the entrance and lobby area is almost like you are entering in a cave with no lights ON, i used to use my phone torch to unlock the room 
5. No drinking water provided, for 1ltr I payed 30rs...you have to buy and keep your own bottles

Special Note: the owner asked me to give rating and review in front of her during checkout which is a big NO NO. (obviously I didn't :)  ) 
"}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Affordable and clean rooms‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Owners were very humble and polite..

Would like to recommend Every one to try this hotel..

reviews:
[{'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Above average‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'No breakfast, no water bottles, no toothbrush, bad experience i had'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Smelly rooms with no  ventilation‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Look for some other options'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.8', 'Review_Heading': 'SCAM‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I booked AC room they where like this is oyo rooms first come first serve. They gave us non ac room and started playing mind games if you want ac room pay more 500per day more charges.
Their is no mobile network in hotel and will booking its mention wifi and ac room,they where saying that we dont that much money to provide wifi and all.its really bad experience.

Guys dnt book any OYO Rooms in goa their is some what scam i going on their'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good experience‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It was a nice experience considering at affordable price and owner of this property is good. I would recommend to stay here!'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'No Proper airflow inside property‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "The property is at good location, but there is no proper ventilation and sunlight inside.  Due to this there is lot of dampness and very strong smell of Damp Walls when you enter the property.

They don't provide even water and you've to buy it separately."}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Suffocating Place‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'There is not a single window in entire hotel
Its literally suffocating.
I visited the place and immediately canceled my booking'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Fraud & Rude‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We booked a room in this hotel via agoda app for the discount price RS. 870. When we reached the hotel, they refused to give the room for the booked amount, they told us to go search any other hotel. Then they asked us 2000 rs only in cash to check in. As we had no other option (searching rooms with luggage is difficult as we are new to goa) we paid the extra amount in cash and checked in, no receipt given. Hotel owner is very rude, she said they don‚Äôt care about the online booking amounts (don‚Äôt know why they made this hotel available online). No proper curtains, no wifi, and Don‚Äôt believe the good online rating. During check out they are asking us to take out our phone and give good rating infront of them. Worst experience on the 1st day. '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Almost Average‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "I got this booking in a reasonable rate for two days
Pros: 1. prime location in Candolim.
2. host was warm (older lady) 
3. open area attached with all rooms
4. spacious rooms and comfy clean beds 

Cons : 1. difficulty in finding the hotel because of spa like small entrance. 
2. extreme dampness smell all over the entrance, lobby and rooms. 
3. No dustbin provided
4. the entrance and lobby area is almost like you are entering in a cave with no lights ON, i used to use my phone torch to unlock the room 
5. No drinking water provided, for 1ltr I payed 30rs...you have to buy and keep your own bottles

Special Note: the owner asked me to give rating and review in front of her during checkout which is a big NO NO. (obviously I didn't :)  )

details:
{'Location': 'Curilo Waddo, Majorda, Salcete, South Goa, Goa, India, 403713', 'overall_rating': '8.1', 'Name': 'The Treehouse Blue', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Service like a 5 star ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The staff was extremely helpful and had one of my best experiences in this hotel.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Best hotel in south goa'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Best Stay I had in so many years. ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The hotel was beautiful, full of r√©cr√©ational games, carrom, TT, Pool, foozebal and other stuffs.

Good big rooms with lots of eminities and space.

Very keen staff to help you in every thing.

No inhouse restro so you need to order from Swiggy and Zomato. 

Lovely hotel

Overall 4.5/5
'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Best place to stay relax, with family, safety & cleaned place üòÅ'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'The Treehouse Blue FTW‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Absolutely loved Treehouse Blue, the view from my room was nice & scenic. Plus it's super close to a lot of wonderful beaches for couples to visit."}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Best stay near to multiple Beaches‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Great and well maintained appartment with wonderful and helpful staffs. Appartment is equipped with all amenities for cooking if interested. Under 3km to beautiful beaches in south goa. Ample parking space outside and inside the appartment. Breakfast is available with limited options but good. There is no restaurant present onsite. Swiggy and Zomato delivery is there and as said Owen and all present for heating and cooking if required. Lots of famous eateries near by like Martin's corner. 
"}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'One of the Best Hotels I ever lived.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Property and people are really nice. It's near to Sunset and Utorda Beach, so location wise it's nearby to the beaches. Property provides good indoor activities as well as good Swimming pool. Hospitality  is just awesome. So Overall really good experience."}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Staff is very helpful ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Shubhankar who works at the hotel is really helpful, and the hotel is in a really nice place surrounded by coconut trees and nice ambience. Also, the cat there, named coconut is really friendly. Totally recommended place to be in south goa. '}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Poorly maintained rooms‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The rooms look nothing like the pictures. Poorly maintained. Broken stuff, nearly all rooms have overused mattresses which need to be replaced. Only if you are a large group and need big room then useful'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Hospitality was great. The staff was really accommodating. We had  a delay in check out by an hour as my spouse was not feeling well. They helped us to feel relaxed. The insects in the kitchen was the biggest drawback. Rest all it was a wonderful stay'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'BREAKFAST & SWIMMING POOL USAGE‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'BREAKFAST WAS PATHETIC , WHO EATS PURI BHAJI AND CHOLLE BHATURE IN BREAKFAST , NO QUALITY TEA COFFEE FACILITY IN BREAKFAST , NOTHING GOOD TO EAT ONLY BOIL EGGS AND BHURJI WAS GOOD , BUT WHAT ABOUT OTHERS WHO DONT EAT NON VEG , NOTHING GOOD TO EAT , ATEAST THEY SHOULD KEEP , IDLI , MEDU WADA CHUTNEY , UPMA AND POHA OPTIONAL DAILLY , ADD SOME FRUITS LIKE WATER MELON , BANANA , PAPAYA,SO WHO DONT EAT NON VEG THEY CAN HAVE THAT LIGHT FOOD. NO BODY KEEPS CHOLLE BHATURE AND PURI BHAJI IN MORNING BREAK FAST.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Great Stay Option if You Are Looking For Central Place in South Goa‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "It;s a great option if you are looking for a central place to stay in South Goa. It's Could be your second home, Do not Consider it like a hotel. Rent a car and Drive to all major beaches which are maximum at 60 minutes drive and nearest Best-being Colva which is at 15 Minutes easy drive.  Both Majorda and Utorda beaches are under 5 Minutes Drive and are good to visit for sunrise walks and jogs, 

If you are looking for a property with a view then probably this is not the best choice. But if you want a central hub which is safe, gated for your kids has a pool and activities then it is the place. Rent a 1 BHK , you get a proper kitchen with maintained utensils."}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'well furnished spacious rooms‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Firstly i really loved the spacious and well equipped rooms.Secondly the staff were curteous and friendly.Would definitely visit this property in the future too.Thanks to Sapna (GM) and Sunil from the security.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'good value for money‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We came to Goa for a Wedding and found Treehouse Blue suited our needs perfectly.
the Apartment was clean and had everything we wanted except for a hair dryer which was promptly provided once asked for. the staff were very helpful and unobtrusive, and saw to all our needs. I would definitely recommend Treehouse Blue to friends and family.'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very Basic property with inadequate infrastructure ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Cockroaches in the room, inadequate staff and strange location. It‚Äôs in midst of nowhere. Avoid if possible '}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Neat, tidy place, courteous staff with the only drawback being lacknof restaurants nearby. Of course, they provide you with takeaway options but maybe a better breakfast plan other than make your own stuff will go a long way in stepping up the game.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'wow‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'super location n clean hotel n superb swimming pool... omly thing is u should hv your own transport either two wheeler or four wheeler.. but awesome'}, {'Review_Rating': '3.2', 'Review_Heading': "Far from station. We r leaving 1 day b4 booking as they get 2 know don't want 2 clean room. Pathetic‚Äù", 'Review_Body': 'Only Parimal in staff is good. Girl sitting on reception we called lot of time for different issue but she is not professional. We left room one day b4 called so many time to her to clean the room but she was reluctant to send housekeeping. No water in tap at afternoon. Only good for couple who want to b alone. For family everything is far away. Majorda beach is 2.5 km. No grocery shop nearby. Only one good thing they provide utensil induction n microwave to cook. Because no restaurant in walking distance. We hv to order on phone n than it come. If family with children want to stay its not suitable place. Bathroom sliding door was not working. Dry breakfast is there which is repeated. Nothing is close to hotel which u can go n see no beach, no restaurant, no grocery shop is nearby. Better to book any other hotel or resort.'}, {'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Worst experience of my life'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent service, very happy and satisfied. ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Only problem is very near to railway line and always very noisy day and night. '}], 'price': '4,000', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/296801/-1/0e2f868a33a60e1e4b76c014606ba152.jpg?ca=7&ce=1&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '40m¬≤', 'amenities': ['Garden view', 'Balcony/terrace', 'Shower', 'Kitchenette', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Additional toilet', 'Mirror', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Satellite/cable channels', 'Air conditioning', 'Fan', 'Linens', 'Sleep comfort items', 'Soundproofing', 'Coffee/tea maker', 'Free bottled water', 'Full kitchen', 'Microwave', 'Refrigerator', 'Desk', 'Outdoor furniture', 'Seating area', 'Sofa', 'Tile/marble flooring', 'Trash cans', 'Closet', 'Clothes rack', 'Ironing facilities', 'Accessible by elevator', 'Fire extinguisher', 'In-room safe box', 'Private apartment in building', 'Safety/security feature'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/the-treehouse-blue/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&tspTypes=1&los=1&searchrequestid=30ac5c34-7b2f-4949-9102-f9f2aa9aa8b1'}

details:
{'Location': 'Calangute, Calangute, Goa, India, 403516', 'overall_rating': '7.2', 'Name': 'Nimbus Neelams The Glitz Hotel', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Overall a good experience here at nimbus Neelam the glitz !!
The crowd here was decent .
Location is the best part .. with all the main beaches at a small distance. 
Food was too good ! '}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Break fast and room‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Rooms are old breakfast was stell'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Old property without maintenance.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "This was used to be a very well maintained hotel however these days  I discovered that they are spending zero money for property maintenance.  To mention some, leakage in bathroom, old torn furnitures, balcony door latches does not work,  doesn't provide dental kit or shaving kit. Not even a toothpaste. 
For breakfast they made us walk to another hotel.  These days the hotel is in a Very disappointing and pathetic condition. Maybe the new owner's doesn't want to maintain the hotel. If you don't want to spoil your vacation, run in the opposite direction. "}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Rated Average‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "I would say that the place is average for a person always staying in ITCs and Marriotts. However, it serves the purpose for stags and men. The location is good (not too close to beach). The in dining was not available since the hotel was under renovation. But that's understandable. However, they had made arrangement for breakfast at their other hotel (Neelam Grand or Glitz Grand, don't remember the name exactly), which was just 50 meters away, and they were trying to manage things well. The breakfast and the spread was limited and the taste was average (taste differs from person to person). The mid staff like reception is helpful and tried to make sure to cater to your requests. However the boys and other staff can be trained more on hospitality. I had got a shampoo and conditioner, but no shower gel. No proper shower kit. But understandable for the price you are paying. Though there are a lot of things that can be improved, but like I said, if you are a stag, only boys or men, you can do with this place. Not bad at all.
To all ladies! I'am totally a feminist person, even if the review sounds otherwise, however the nature has hard wired the genders differently. Its like men can read conditioner as shower gel and go ahead, but its a show stopper for the fairer sex."}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Good Hotel, Good Location‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Walkable to Calangute still away from hustle bustle. Great breakfast and meal options.'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Location Advantage‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'overall Good hotel with good location, breakfast was Good and has many options but in amenities they have least number of options, Room was clean and Good. The food was fantastic, too.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.0', 'Review_Heading': 'great location, decor, close to Arambol beach (by walk), nice cafe, really good food.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nice location'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The sea view'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Great stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Go for Room 205..the best view possible!'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Chilled out place, magical sea view, lovely staff -- worth the stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Awesome staff, extremely helpful.
Would like to extend my thanks to Mr Lavlesh, and Mr. Sonu. They are lovely.

View to the sea is awesome

Great hookah, and reasonable rates

Food, drinks, sheesha at reasonable rates, not overpriced
(Of course, we went during off season in mid August)'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Pleasant‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The front beach location and view. 
Food
Pet friendly 
Very friendly owners
All Toiletries provided
Good Staff'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Ok stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Location Beachfront, outside benches. Pet friendly.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'This place is really great. Loved the location. The food is great.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The place is really good. The food is amazing. Being a vegetarian I am always apprehensive of Goa food. But this place surpassed my expectations. They have a perfect variety of cuisines. Alu parantha was really good. Their pad Thai is a must-try. (This place has almost Delhi-like food).

The location is also great. You have a beach view and you can take a walk on the beach. The beach was not very crowded. During the daytime, there is almost no crowd on the beach. But you might get sunburnt. So be careful about that.'}], 'price': '4,950', 'img_link': 'https://q-xx.bstatic.com/xdata/images/hotel/840x460/340052221.jpg?k=8c70170b9df059242b9ff7e066f21e5424bc8c29235b6739f7f8b5b0e638398b&o=', 'room_size': '0', 'amenities': ['Sea view', 'Balcony/terrace', 'Shower', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'TV [flat screen]', 'Air conditioning', 'Fan', 'Carpeting', 'Seating area'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/chique-shanti-resort/hotel/all/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&tspTypes=2&los=1&searchrequestid=30ac5c34-7b2f-4949-9102-f9f2aa9aa8b1'}

Washrooms need a complete revamp as they stink, and to add to that, water supply was not throughout.
It is close to beach, walking distance, however, overall, I wouldn't recommend at this price point as better options are available in vicinity."}, {'Review_Rating': '2.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Apart from location nothing is good ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The resort is not well maintained and the staff are not really helpful.

details: {'Location': 'Rua Heliodoro Salgado, Treehouse Neptune Inn, Panaji, Goa, Panaji, Goa, India, 403001', 'overall_rating': '5.4', 'Name': 'Treehouse Neptune Inn', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Above average‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Agoda charge to much for the kind of hotel '}, {'Review_Rating': '2.8', 'Review_Heading': "Hotel are only show-off on image, no car parking, rooms are very dirty, and fully throws ur money's in garbage ‚Äù", 'Review_Body': 'Hotel are only 1 star rating, please hotel ke photo dekhkar mat book karna, '}, {'Review_Rating': '3.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Worst hotel in panajim‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Don't have kitchen even can't have tea in the morning ..Rooms are very small and only 1 chair to sit...No fridge nothing"}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Do not book‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'At around 3K per night this is NOT the hotel for tourists to stay. This hotel is overpriced with basic Oyo type rooms and should not be worth more than 1000. The reason for its overprice is the main market is right in front hence this hotel is booked often by traders. As a tourist hotel with no breakfast and building walls broken at many points and away from beach or Fontainhas this is not for you. You can get much better hotels in central panjim at this price. I booked this by mistake and in a hurry as in Goa with poor network and connectivity (purposely done by leaders for middlemen to flourish when villages in far flung India have excellent network) I was struggling to book. \nThe receptionist Ashwini was good and helpful and possibly the only positive. '}], 'price': '5,568', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/32613129/0/6a131bbba0c440730ba8900527b115c6.jpg?ce=0&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '240m¬≤', 'amenities': ['Free Wi-Fi', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Air conditioning', 'Individual air conditioning'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/treehouse-neptune-inn-h32613129/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&los=1&searchrequestid=30ac5c34-7b2f-4949-9102-f9f2aa9aa8b1'}

This hotel is overpriced with basic Oyo type rooms and should not be worth more than 1000. The reason for its overprice is the main market is right in front hence this hotel is booked often by traders. As a tourist hotel with no breakfast and building walls broken at many points and away from beach or Fontainhas this is not for you. You can get much better hotels in central panjim at this price. I booked this by mistake and in a hurry as in Goa with poor network and connectivity (purposely done by leaders for middlemen to flourish when villages in far flung India have excellent network) I was struggling to book. \nThe receptionist Ashwini was good and helpful and possibly the only positive. {'Location': 'Arossim Beach, South Goa, Goa, India, 403712', 'overall_rating': 'Select your room', 'Name': 'ITC Grand Goa, a Luxury Collection Resort & Spa, Goa', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Location is suitable for family ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Property is clean & well maintained . Breakfast menu is elaborate and varied. Overall its  a pleasant stay.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Amazing ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'This is a beautiful property. We went with a small kid and so our idea was to stay in the propertu only. Beach entry was from the hotel itself.. and then kiddie pool and Ollie club kept our child entertained. Loved burnt garlic fried rice and fish in pavilion restaurant l.

It‚Äôs very near to the airport . I think 25 mins 
'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nice place to spend the time without any disturbance. Well trained specialists in saloon. Especially sharin. Thanks for the service '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very Good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "ITC Grand has an excellent location, a fantastic very clean beach, beautiful lawns within the property and very professional staff. The rooms are spacious and the food is excellent.

But like most hotel chains like this, it is precise, crisp & professional. You can't point a finger at anything to say - that was wrong, but with a bit more relaxed Goan attitude and more friendliness it could be an even better hotel than the very good one it already is."}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': '2 day stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Great kitchen and staff, food was tasty but price was on the higher end. 
Good beach and property to walk around'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent Hotel ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nice Luxurious hotel with awesome beach side views. Its a massive property spread across 45 acres. Personal pool rooms are awesome! '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Dreamy heaven‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Never been to a place this good, it is out if the world! I've been to many 5stars but there's no hotel like this! If u visit one, you will definitely want to visit here everytime u come to goa"}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Clean private beach, friendly staff, nice food, it was fun place to stay with family!'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent Hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Its an excellent hotel, just the location is a bit in the outskirts but yeah that‚Äôs how the property is so vast and lush green. Highly Recommended '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Awesome staff‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The property is breathtaking with a very clean beautiful beach.  They have exceptional staff namely Shahnawab, Ruchika at front desk, Chef Sumit  was very helpful with my diet needs and overall staff very friendly and helpful. I thoroughly enjoyed my stay at ITC and will be going there every year, loved my stay. üòÉ'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Fabulous ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Overwhelmed
üòòüòò'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'OUTSTANDING üòä‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The location of property was superb. Resort was quiet a spacious. Staff is so courteous.
They made u feel like privileged. Must visit for everyone.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'One of the best properties to stay ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'No doubt the resort has everything you need but what stands out the best is food quality, catering to individual needs and exceptional customer service. Special thanks to Chef Anshul for catering to food requirements of our child. '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Beautiful resort‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We went to Goa at the end of the year and had a great time at the resort.
Had always heard that at year end it is crowded and service is bad but we had a wonderful stay at the resort.
Had some issues with Agoda booking so would not recommend it.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent Property ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Beautiful location & excellent service will make you happy!'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.0', 'Review_Heading': 'If you want to pay through your nose‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Just to attend listen to wedding music everyday'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'A great stay and highly recommended ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We stayed here in the month of October‚Äô21. I have always loved staying in ITC properties. This specific property is really good, with great rooms and hospitality. Worth the money :) '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Loved the Place‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "The Property is awesome. There are 2 big & 1 small pool. The property has its own private beach.
The staff is very friendly. My 8 year old LOVED it. He would get a juice, Ice-cream, Jelly, cake without asking.
We got dal that was a tad spicy and it was immediately taken away and the chef came and asked us how we wanted the food .. the staff was curtius enough to remember that we took less spicy food.
We loved the place and will go back again for sure.
The only downside is that there isn't really anything else around and if you want to go anywhere ... its atlest an hrs drive."}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Sameer‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Great Property, Awesome food '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good property, however staff responsiveness is very slow. food options are also limited‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good property, however staff responsiveness is very slow. food options are also limited'}], 'price': '30,000', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/5862122/-1/fe498b4dcf5179bc6f3db18969e3a382.jpg?ca=29&ce=0&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '0', 'amenities': ['Lagoon view'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/itc-grand-goa-a-luxury-collection-resort-spa-goa/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&tspTypes=1&los=1&searchrequestid=30ac5c34-7b2f-4949-9102-f9f2aa9aa8b1'}

The only downside is that there isn't really anything else around and if you want to go anywhere ... its atlest an hrs drive."}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Sameer‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Great Property, Awesome food '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good property, however staff responsiveness is very slow. food options are also limited‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good property, however staff responsiveness is very slow. food options are also limited'}]

details:
{'Location': 'Morjim Beach Road, Morjim, Goa, India, 403512', 'overall_rating': '8.2', 'Name': 'De Soul Sante Morjim Goa ', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Trip to remember‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good place, near the beach and very pretty interiors and facilities '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Go for it‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The property and its staff is simply amazing!
Loved my stay'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'A hotel with a lot of potential ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Great location, good size rooms. Staff were friendly and helpful. Special mention to Krishna, who went above and beyond to make sure we were comfortable.  We had a few requests on arrival and the reception staff took care of them.
Breakfast was lovely. Although, the coffee machine needs to be looked at, as it didn't always work.
We experienced a lot of power cuts throughout the day, but it's a North Goa wide issue.  Hot water was an issue and staff tried to fix it.
Our stay was comfortable and we felt safe. 
This hotel has a lot of potential, some lovely design features, however, some bits need working on."}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We stayed at De Soul Sante in August 22, the location of the property is very good, across the road is the beach. And good shacks, across the road.

As I was travelling with seniors & requested for an early check in, they accommodated it. 
The owner & staff are very courteous.

As it was off season, it was low staffed & requests were taking time to get delivered. This might be different in season.

Special mention of Krishna who played the host there for us making our stay comfortable & pleasant. From cleaning to cooking & serving graciously he was managing it very efficiently. And always with a smile helped with the request that we made.'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Once a good stay, not anymore ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "The resort, not sure if it can be called so currently, is definitely not at its best. First of all, the property is not sea facing exactly but they have an adjacent plot which is next to the beach. But monsoon season has done it's damage in the property.
The beach adjacent plot is in ruins, no huts and not even places to sit. Currently it's just a non-lit path to the beach from the actual property.
The property itself is not at its best. The reception entrance and exit was not clean, hence the initial impression it self was not good. We got a corner room which was facing backside of some other buildings and hotels, wasn't a garden view cottage at all. We requested for another room but all were either used as store room, or leaking or let to other guests (we could only find one other person apart from us staying there). The room just had basic amenities, good space and rustic feel. AC was working well.
The breakfast was basic and limited but good. The property care takers like Krishna did their best to listen and resolve our concerns to some extent possible within there limitations due to the current condition of the resort.
The price they quote is at par with 3 or 4 star hotels and Resorts, but in it's current state it is not justifiable. I guess you may skip this resort if travel plan is before October 2022."}], 'price': '4,590', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/29853372/-1/9ee5e1d0dfc9a99e6fd5f6164d253626.jpg?ce=0&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '25m¬≤', 'amenities': ['2 single beds', 'Garden view', 'Balcony/terrace', 'Shower', 'Shared bathroom', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Additional bathroom', 'Cleaning products', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Satellite/cable channels', 'Air conditioning', 'Fan', 'Hand sanitizer', 'Linens', 'Sleep comfort items', 'Wake-up service', 'Coffee/tea maker', 'Free bottled water', 'Seating area', 'Sofa', 'Trash cans', 'Closet', 'Clothes rack', 'Exterior corridor', 'Fire extinguisher', 'Safety/security feature'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/de-soul-sante-morijim-goa/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&los=1&searchrequestid=30ac5c34-7b2f-4949-9102-f9f2aa9aa8b1'}

details:
{'Location': 'Ourem Road, Yoga Teacher Training (YTTC) - Anand Yoga Village, Palolem, Goa, India, 403702', 'overall_rating': '7', 'Name': 'Anand Yoga Village', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Yoga village?‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "I was here during the NYE period and while there were some cool events (circus, party), these cost extra, unlike what you would find in other places like the Lost Hostel. The cafe couldn't do a proper tea/coffee and the wifi signal on this property was nonexistent despite there being about 5 different networks. The bed situation was good, in that there were only two bunks in each room, though this could be awkward if you were sharing with a stranger. The toilets were also fairly clean, which is a positive. But I was surprised that there was very little info about drop-in yoga... there were two yoga shalas but they only seemed to be in use in the mornings, and when I tried to join one of the later classes advertised, the staff seemed clueless as to whether yoga was happening or how to join. "}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice Place but needs some improvement ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "When I wanted to check in, I didn't feel welcome at all. I was just shown to my room and received the wifi password. They did not inform me, if and where there is breakfast, yoga classes or generally a quick overview of the place. 
Although the room was clean, there where stains in the sheets and towels and also mold in the sink. 
Apart from that the place looked nice and the restaurant in the backyard was good and the staff there was friendly.
I think Anand Yoga Village could be a great place, if they where more welcoming and I also recommend to replace the sheets and towels with newer ones. "}, {'Review_Rating': '3.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Reality was different than what I saw on website‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'This was bad experience.  I got a room to live where the maintenance workers working there will also refuse to live.  They created false impression about the ambiance but the what I got was nowhere close to the expectations.'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Waste of money ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "I booked this Anand yoga Village. But tha Hotel staff ask me to give more money for complete booking. After that I didn't check in their room. so I wasted my 1700 hard earned money üò≠. I recommend you to keep away from these properties. My bad experience at this Anand yoga Village. "}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Room wasn't proper "}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Tr√®s bien situ√©...quand on l'a trouv√© , ce qui n'est pas facile!!
Pas fiable si on demande des services genre r√©servation de taxis
Tr√®s rarement quelqu'un √† la r√©ception "}], 'price': '3,354', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/32692888/609188662/b9334077dc13d618827a5078f084825f.png?ce=0&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '180m¬≤', 'amenities': ['Garden view'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/anand-yoga-village/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&los=1&searchrequestid=30ac5c34-7b2f-4949-9102-f9f2aa9aa8b1'}

details:
{'Location': 'Arambol Beach Road near second pay parking, Arambol Beach, Goa, India, 403524', 'overall_rating': '7.6', 'Name': 'Arambol Grande', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'good stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'close to the beach . clean'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Not so good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The location was good. Walking distance from the beach'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Great location, helpfully staff.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.0', 'Review_Heading': 'a comfort source‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Attentive and helpful staff
the best treatment'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very conveniently located. Walkable distance to arambol beach and nearby famous places . Staffs are very friendly and helpful. All of them are available on a call whenever u need . We stayed here for three days. Pls book through bookings.com to get good deals .'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Overall it was a great experience to stay there. Beach is only few steps away. Restaurants are just below the building w‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Excellent property with very nice, clean and hygienic rooms.
Property is just few steps away the beach and overall ambience and vibes are very good.
Hotel staff is very friendly and cooperative.
They look after their guests very well.
They will help you in any need.
They have arranged me taxi to the airport on a very short notice that too in the middle of the night without any extra charges.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'This is arguably one of the best places to stay on a budget in Arambol. Highly recommended.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "The hotel is in the center of hustle and bustle of the Arambol beach road market. But still, the rooms are very quiet and peaceful. You can sit in their common area balconies (which are open for all the guests), have a drink, and watch people passing by. The rooms are very neat and clean. Just 2 mins walk from the beach. There's also a cozy coffee shop and an amazing restaurant in the same building on the ground floor which is open for service till late at night. The hotel staff is very courteous and helpful. Arguably this is one of the best places to stay on a budget in Arambol."}, {'Review_Rating': '3.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Cheap, close to the beach but very dirty‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'If you like the beach the location is very close'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.0', 'Review_Heading': 'A Good Comfortable Stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Easy and fast check in .. Very friendly staff who warmly greeted me every day. Room cleaning was offered every couple of days and was done upon my request.The refrigerator ,AC and hot water worked fine. Location was ideal just off the main beach road so a bit more quiet ,near to many good restaurants and less than five minutes to the beach ‚õ±Ô∏è'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Family run, friendly hotel in a great location. Nice balcony.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Family run business, and staff always on hand to help. For the price, I was really happy with my room. Lovely balcony and bathroom. Fridge was a bonus. Walking distance from the beach'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Great location, helpfully staff.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.0', 'Review_Heading': 'a comfort source‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Attentive and helpful staff
the best treatment'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very conveniently located. Walkable distance to arambol beach and nearby famous places . Staffs are very friendly and helpful. All of them are available on a call whenever u need . We stayed here for three days. Pls book through bookings.com to get good deals .'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Overall it was a great experience to stay there. Beach is only few steps away. Restaurants are just below the building w‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Excellent property with very nice, clean and hygienic rooms.
Property is just few steps away the beach and overall ambience and vibes are very good.
Hotel staff is very friendly and cooperative.
They look after their guests very well.
They will help you in any need.
They have arranged me taxi to the airport on a very short notice that too in the middle of the night without any extra charges.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'This is arguably one of the best places to stay on a budget in Arambol. Highly recommended.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "The hotel is in the center of hustle and bustle of the Arambol beach road market. But still, the rooms are very quiet and peaceful. You can sit in their common area balconies (which are open for all the guests), have a drink, and watch people passing by. The rooms are very neat and clean. Just 2 mins walk from the beach. There's also a cozy coffee shop and an amazing restaurant in the same building on the ground floor which is open for service till late at night. The hotel staff is very courteous and helpful. Arguably this is one of the best places to stay on a budget in Arambol."}, {'Review_Rating': '3.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Cheap, close to the beach but very dirty‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'If you like the beach the location is very close'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.0', 'Review_Heading': 'A Good Comfortable Stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Easy and fast check in .. Very friendly staff who warmly greeted me every day. Room cleaning was offered every couple of days and was done upon my request.The refrigerator ,AC and hot water worked fine. Location was ideal just off the main beach road so a bit more quiet ,near to many good restaurants and less than five minutes to the beach ‚õ±Ô∏è'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Family run, friendly hotel in a great location. Nice balcony.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Family run business, and staff always on hand to help. For the price, I was really happy with my room. Lovely balcony and bathroom. Fridge was a bonus. Location just near all the main shops and cafes.'}]

Restaurant for breakfast was on backyard with No AC ( considering Goan climate it was hot and humid)

It is not worth to stay in this hotel paying premium amount. While  you can get better hotel in Panaji with lesser tariff.

The bathroom glasses are completely see through. Also the bathrooms are stinking. No proper wifi system but still they charge bomb amount per night around 3000. 
Don‚Äôt waste your money here'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Average stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'No pool, Not couple friendly.'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Above average‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "My stay here was really comfortable and pleasent...it was worth my money... moreover it's situated in middle of place where everything is easily accessible.."}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice Location‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nice location,hotel staff not so friendly ,room picture not as in photos,bed no blankets,breakfast not much options,at that price many better hotels are available'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Good location and nice rooms.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nice room and good location with lots of eateries outside. '}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Hotel Good, Breakfast Good Though With Limited Options, All Over a OK Hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Hotel Good, Breakfast Good Though With Limited Options, All Over a OK Hotel'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Above average‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I would  also not recommend to book through  your site.. you charge GST.but do not provide the invoice for the same... '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Rude receptionist and manager‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The manager was very rude. Place is pretty nice. But the look on the staffs face knowing that you have booked online is pathetic. They look down upon you as if you have committed a crime. I was treated disrespectfully, when I asked for a proper bill. '}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Careless Management‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Our room encountered problem in AC - mechanic came fixed it - took half an hour.
The day we were supposed to check out - AC was non-functioning since 6 AM.

This shows that either the repair work was makeshift or was lackadaisical. The mechanic told "At times the card does not work after a power outage". So every time there was a power outage, our room AC went off. Terrible'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Dissapointing‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good:
Fast service, clean rooms, affordable price
Bad
Small bed, third bed on the floor as no movable cots, small room, noisy, checkout process was frustrating as they double charged me and could not process credit card refund and ended up giving cash in Indian rupees when I was leaving. Would never stay there and would gladly pay a little bit more to stay in a better location.'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Value for money in hotel in Panjim city center‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Excellent location in Panaji city center, close to MG road'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'No parking available‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'No parking available at the hotel and bad wifi signal'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Gr8 place to stay....'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Good for short trip business traveler‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Not a good value for money during high season. Room amenities should be improved.  Location is good for business traveler, just 2 -3 nights stays. '}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'A budget hotel.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The room and bathroom was small.  However, the staff cleaned the room daily.
The breakfast had limited items .  '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Fabulous ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We as a couple stayed there for a night and it was a very good experience..
Room was clean,staff was very friendly and helpful..
Basically whatever we hoped we got..
Would definitely recommend for stay..'}], 'price': '5,653', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/109536/451701109/28dbf1ec3218c42258da0133ac543fdd.png?ca=23&ce=0&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '0', 'amenities': ['Shower', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Toiletries', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Satellite/cable channels', 'Telephone', 'Air conditioning', 'Blackout curtains', 'Coffee/tea maker', 'Free bottled water', 'Daily housekeeping', 'Desk', 'Sofa', 'Closet', 'Ironing facilities', 'In-room safe box'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/grande-delmon/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&tspTypes=1&los=1&searchrequestid=546d7db3-f1c6-4372-9d70-90c979e8ad96'}

We were also connected with a local driver via the hotel named Manoj, he was excellent!'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Not value for money ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Restaurant is not in house. Overall good experience '}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Not upto the mark‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very basic rooms and amenities in the hotel.. no views at all.. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Beautiful property!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Beautiful property at an amazing location!'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Sheela shetty‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'V friendly staff... superb service.. good breakfast.. safe parking facility.. clean spacious rooms .. would definitely recommend to stay in North Goa'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good comfortable stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It was a good comfortable stay. The room and the bathroom were sufficiently spacious and clean. Staff members were very polite and courteous. Only one flaw found in the sliding door knob which was in broken condition and the door couldn‚Äôt be locked. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Best stay ever‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We were three girls on a trip and trust me the resort just added to the perfect trip we had.
From offering the most spacious rooms, to taking care of our every request to the super comfortable breakfast. We were happy customers and will definitely go backüòá'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'nice‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'nice'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Worth your money! ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Totally love this hotel, this is just 10 minute to bagha and titos lane. This is surely a upscale hotel in Anjuna. Curliers, shivas cafe as well as artjuna all the places are nearby. Completely safe place to stay. The bathrooms were really nice and clean. Must visit.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'nice stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'location is good . staff polite . parking available . nearby good restaurants . central if wana visit all north goa beaches . swimming pool scope for improvement . value for money breakfast n food .. overall good to stay for family ..'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Fantastic experience ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'A quaint little property in Anjuna in close proximity to both the Anjuna and Vagator beaches. The staff is very friendly and accommodating, they take care of your every need be it transportation, special requests like late check out or as in my case replacement of a lost room key. The property has a small pool, may consider adding a fitness centre also. The breakfast buffet is adequate, some variety would definitely make it wholesome. The rooms and the property on the whole is spotlessly clean. We had a wonderful stay, and would definitely visit again, hopefully in better times than now. Thank you & happy tidings.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Amazing stay ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'This is one of the best properties I have stayed at. The service, The room , the ambience , the staff everything is upto the mark . Aptly located and great food . Had an amazing time at this property '}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Not recommended for Honeymoon ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good for getaways from routine life. But not at all recommended for honeymoon couples. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Awesome, comfortable and the Best‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "We stayed in Feb' 20 for 04 nights, and the best part of this hotel is it's location , service, room and food.  Anjuna beach is just 5 minutes walk. Room cleanliness was very good. Their in-house restaurant Zaffran serves delicious food. All the staff is very helpful and friendly. We'll surely visit next  time. Thanks IVY ANJUNA."}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Great customer service.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The people at the front desk were extremely helpful. They arranged for  a cab for sightseeing and to the airport at very reasonable prices. They provided beach towels to take with us. 
The restaurant is not that great. Very limited breakfast menu. We did not have dinner there so cannot comment about the dinner menu.'}], 'price': '6,300', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/3121979/-1/805ce63f91db332429071706d168c045.jpg?ca=6&ce=1&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '40m¬≤', 'amenities': ['2 single beds', 'Garden view', 'Balcony/terrace', 'Shower', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Bathrobes', 'Bathroom phone', 'Mirror', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Satellite/cable channels', 'Telephone', 'Air conditioning', 'Alarm clock', 'Fan', 'Heating', 'Linens', 'Wake-up service', 'Coffee/tea maker', 'Free bottled water', 'Mini bar', 'Refrigerator', 'Seating area', 'Closet', 'Fire extinguisher', 'Smoke detector'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/the-ivy-anjuna_2/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&tspTypes=6&los=1&searchrequestid=546d7db3-f1c6-4372-9d70-90c979e8ad96'}

We were happy customers and will definitely go backüòá'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'nice‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'nice'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Worth your money! ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Totally love this hotel, this is just 10 minute to bagha and titos lane. This is surely a upscale hotel in Anjuna. Curliers, shivas cafe as well as artjuna all the places are nearby. Completely safe place to stay. The bathrooms were really nice and clean. Must visit.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'nice stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'location is good . staff polite . parking available . nearby good restaurants . central if wana visit all north goa beaches . swimming pool scope for improvement . value for money breakfast n food .. overall good to stay for family ..'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Fantastic experience ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'A quaint little property in Anjuna in close proximity to both the Anjuna and Vagator beaches. The staff is very friendly and accommodating, they take care of your every need be it transportation, special requests like late check out or as in my case replacement of a lost room key. The property has a small pool, may consider adding a fitness centre also. The breakfast buffet is adequate, some variety would definitely make it wholesome. The rooms and the property on the whole is spotlessly clean. We had a wonderful stay, and would definitely visit again, hopefully in better times than now. Thank you & happy tidings.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Amazing stay ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'This is one of the best properties I have stayed at. The service, The room , the ambience , the staff everything is upto the mark . Aptly located and great food . Had an amazing time at this property '}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Not recommended for Honeymoon ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good for getaways from routine life. But not at all recommended for honeymoon couples. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Awesome, comfortable and the Best‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "We stayed in Feb' 20 for 04 nights, and the best part of this hotel is it's location , service, room and food.  Anjuna beach is just 5 minutes walk. Room cleanliness was very good. Their in-house restaurant Zaffran serves delicious food. All the staff is very helpful and friendly. We'll surely visit next  time. Thanks IVY ANJUNA."}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Great customer service.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The people at the front desk were extremely helpful. They arranged for  a cab for sightseeing and to the airport at very reasonable prices. They provided beach towels to take with us. 
The restaurant is not that great. Very limited breakfast menu. We did not have dinner there so cannot comment about the dinner menu.'}]

{'Location': "2nd Tito's Lane, Baga, GOA, Baga, Goa, India, 403516", 'overall_rating': '7.2', 'Name': 'Hotel Rezos', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '4.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Place no way worth more thn 2k.....
No space for car parking.....
Rooms were good n spacious but exterior wr nt at all maintained '}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Do not stay at this hotel. ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'One of the worst. I felt so unsafe.  Even the rooms are horrible. They do not have any facilities.  '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The hotel manager Mr. Naveen is a fantastic guy. He helped us for the rental bike , taxi, food n etc..'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice stay ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Rooms are near to Baga Beach, rooms are very good and clean, free breakfast available but with limited options, dinner and lunch they don't provide, you can order food online or visit nearby restaurants"}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Best stay if you are in goa for beaches ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "I only choose this hotel as it was within walking distance to most happening places in Baga i.e. Tito's Lane and Baga beach and access to famous shacks. Also, the hotel is executive style with all kinds of amenities. "}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Everything Good But....‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "It was a great stay. Just a 2 mins walk from the TITO's lane and Baga Beach. The hotel was clean and neat. 
Check in check out process was simple. 
They also arranged two wheeler at a competitive rate. 
Only issue was breakfast. They dont have any inhouse restaurent. so they are completely dependent upon out side food. no options in breakfast. only 2 veg and 3 eggs options which is same for all days. which is the only issue i faced. 

Rest all is good. Many mosquitos are there so be aware. All night u wl hear dhichuk dhichuk music. if you are party lover, you will stay here forever. 
"}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Suitable for budget group travel.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'One should definitely know that the hotel is in an excellent location. 2-3 mins walk from Baga beach. 5 mins walk from titos lane. I would say it is a standard property (Apart-hotel). Breakfast menu needs to be improved if they really consider getting good ratings.'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Breakfast provide very poor quality
No parking arrangement.
Bathroom is very small
'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Best Location Hotel in BAGA‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Staff is very friendly and caters your requests with best available options...Dennis the guy at reception is  very friendly and help you with all your queries and thing related to  Goa...'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Pleasant Stay ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It was a very pleasant 3 days at Hotel Rezos. The staff is good and helpful. The location is good on Baga beach.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'comfortable stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Although it is located very near to Tito lane, it is peaceful. Small hotel, good location - may be the best location in North Goa, Safe also.'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.0', 'Review_Heading': 'really bad experience ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "having faced a really bad experience.  First of all service was really poor , if asking for anything they ignore like nothing.  Food quality not good in breakfast and finally the manager  or owner is too rude . Maybe he don't know how to behave with customers. "}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'A must stay at Rezos if you r in baga. Very frndly staff and very cooperative. Always looking to help with a big smile. Felt like being at home. Will come here again. '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Confusing and Complicated‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The place is tucked inside near Baga and has no parking facility. The cost is too high and there are better hotels in the same price. The staff is friendly and the hotel is clean. '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Quiet rooms in a busy area.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The Hotel staff is very friendly. The guy from the reception (called himself Justin) did give some really good / important comments to make the Holiday even more safe. The Hotel is located not far from the main local Party Zone. But it is very quiet in the rooms. The Hotel is not easy to find, if the Driver from the Airport is not dropping you directly at the front of the Hotel. The Hotel offers free Wifi with a good Connection.'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'An oasis surrounded by bush‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Hotel Rezos is a modern new facility in the hub of Baga,which is rare to find in Goan standards. Beach and party access is a minute walk to the road behind. Surroundings are unkempt and in a state of disrepair . However rooms are new with modern furnishings 
No restaurant no lobby and access to hotel is difficult'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Loca»õie noua ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Hotelul este mai degrabƒÉ pensiune, foarte frumoasƒÉ, nouƒÉ »ôi bine situatƒÉ. '}], 'price': '3,713', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/1195653/7386001/413e42fea629356ba6c3ab89ddfe462d.jpeg?ce=0&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '28m¬≤', 'amenities': ['Street view', 'Balcony/terrace', 'Shower', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Hair dryer', 'Mirror', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Walk-in shower', 'Whirlpool bathtub', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Mobile hotspot device', 'Satellite/cable channels', 'Telephone', 'Air conditioning', 'Fan', 'Hand sanitizer', 'Linens', 'Sleep comfort items', 'Coffee/tea maker', 'Refrigerator', 'Desk', 'Outdoor furniture', 'Seating area', 'Sofa', 'Tile/marble flooring', 'Trash cans', 'Closet', 'Ironing facilities', 'Accessible by stairs', 'Fire extinguisher', 'In-room safe box', 'Locker', 'Safety/security feature'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/hotel-rezos/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&tspTypes=2&los=1&searchrequestid=546d7db3-f1c6-4372-9d70-90c979e8ad96'}
