details:
{'Location': 'Ramada Caravela Road, Fatrada Beach Road Varca, Cavelossim, Goa, India, 403721', 'overall_rating': '8.2', 'Name': 'The Center Court Goa', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Center of all the attractions | Must stay here‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very friendly staff
Very tasty and fresh food
Very Spacious and well maintained rooms
30 Km from Airport Dabolim
50 Km from Dudh Sagar Waterfall
8 Km from Colva beach (for Water sports)
32 Km from Palolem beach
3 Km from nearest beach
Nearby Car/Scooty rental also available at cheap price and very good condition vehicles
Thank you team Center Court'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Value for money‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Best holiday spent by my parents and other two same age couples, wonderful food and near to beach. '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Good option under 4k‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good hotel to stay in South Goa. It is like 1 km away from the beach and have all the basic requirements which should be there in the hotel. Swimming pool was under construction but  I am sure it must be completed by now. The staff is amazing and always there to help you with your queries. They have a resturant which is a good one but I felt the service was little slow and could have improved. You can enjoy hookah by sitting near the pool.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good hospitality!!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Owner is very kind and good. He personally ensure the travellers gets top quality stay with good food served. 
We really liked being here and would recommend this homly place as must visit.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Surprisingly good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "I wasn't expecting the hotel to be so good with the size of the room, facilities and amenities available. Most of the staff was generous. I wanted the room only for a night stay but they have good swimming pool, small gym, spa, pool, restaurant, etc."}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Great place to stay ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'stay and pure veg restaurant is amazing.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'One of the few pure inhouse vegetarian restaurant and the food is tasty too.

Staff is also very cooperative. The owner makes regular rounds and stays there only.

Only thing is it is little away from the beach . So it would be nice if they have some sort of beach pickup and drop as optional service .'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Over all our stay was awesome and food is also awesome'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Above average‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Its Vegetarian Hotel, however they have a separate kitchen to cook non-veg food, which can be ordered through room service. reviews:
[{'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Center of all the attractions | Must stay here‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very friendly staff
Very tasty and fresh food
Very Spacious and well maintained rooms
30 Km from Airport Dabolim
50 Km from Dudh Sagar Waterfall
8 Km from Colva beach (for Water sports)
32 Km from Palolem beach
3 Km from nearest beach
Nearby Car/Scooty rental also available at cheap price and very good condition vehicles
Thank you team Center Court'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Value for money‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Best holiday spent by my parents and other two same age couples, wonderful food and near to beach. '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Good option under 4k‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good hotel to stay in South Goa. It is like 1 km away from the beach and have all the basic requirements which should be there in the hotel. Swimming pool was under construction but  I am sure it must be completed by now. The staff is amazing and always there to help you with your queries. They have a resturant which is a good one but I felt the service was little slow and could have improved. You can enjoy hookah by sitting near the pool.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good hospitality!!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Owner is very kind and good. He personally ensure the travellers gets top quality stay with good food served. 
We really liked being here and would recommend this homly place as must visit.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Surprisingly good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "I wasn't expecting the hotel to be so good with the size of the room, facilities and amenities available. Most of the staff was generous. I wanted the room only for a night stay but they have good swimming pool, small gym, spa, pool, restaurant, etc."}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Great place to stay ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'stay and pure veg restaurant is amazing.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'One of the few pure inhouse vegetarian restaurant and the food is tasty too.

Staff is also very cooperative. The owner makes regular rounds and stays there only.

Only thing is it is little away from the beach . So it would be nice if they have some sort of beach pickup and drop as optional service .'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Over all our stay was awesome and food is also awesome'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Above average‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Its Vegetarian Hotel, however they have a separate kitchen to cook non-veg food, which can be ordered through room service. If visiting during peak times you may not get proper parking space. The staff is quite helpfull and friendly. overall its a good place.'}]

{'Location': 'Khalchawada, Arambol Beach, Goa, India, 403524', 'overall_rating': 'Select your room', 'Name': 'Madan Motels', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Good location ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "It's close to a nice beach and you can explore the market and lake near by. It's tricky to find the place though as Google maps will take you on the wrong direction, that wasn't fun at 7am... Look for the German bakery, it's just there. Staff was helpful and friendly, my bathroom was all dirty with sand when I arrived but they cleaned it fast."}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Wifi problem ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Wifi must good in hotel stay. Wherever we are staying'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Agoda is deceiving‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Room booked and paid  but entry not allowed at property. We had a very hectic last moment experience at Goa because of this, costing us a fortune. Agoda hasn't refunded my paid amount yet."}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Good location ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'No hot water, but good location'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice Location, friendly owner‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The property is very close to Arambol beach with 1 min walk. Can enjoy the sound of sea waves.
Mr. Paressh, the owner, is very friendly.
Shops (including wine shops + hotels) are available in and around.
Personally, I feel more comfortable and peaceful with less local crowd & no loud music.
'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nice location. Helpful staff.'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Worst‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I left the same day I check in. I lost my money too. Very bad place no hill view. There is no specification regarding a/c non AC room. details:
{'Location': 'Near Harimandir, Malbhat, Madgaon, Goa, India, 403601', 'overall_rating': '6.9', 'Name': 'Hotel Panchsheel', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Old hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Hotel location is good.but bed sheets are not clean,a.c not working properly, toilet also not good,no parking for car.staff behaviour was good.24hr hot water available.
It's a old hotel.if you are solo traveler then you can choose.if you are a business traveler or you are going with family it's not good choice.you will get 3 star good hotels at same price."}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Near to madgoan railway station 10 minutes away‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Hotel is good... to stay'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Still staying. Pleasant '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Above average‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Budget hotel with average cleanliness. The Agoda app mentioned that there would be a tea/coffee maker, however the same wasn't provided. Confirmed the same with the receptionist and I was informed that they do not provide a tea/coffee maker, but he was helpful enough to arrange boiling water in a kettle numerous times during my stay. The rooms could be slightly a bit more ventilated and clean. However for the price, no complains whatsoever. Wifi not available."}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Toiletries‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Provided towel was torned wid big hole in it and I had to ask for change. Atleast check things before you place then in room. Staff if good and allowed me to stay at reception after check out too'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Good Hotel but can be better‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Rooms are very spacious. Good Cleanliness.
One major con is they do not have their own restaurant i.e. no room services, no menu card in room.
Only they offer breakfast in their hall with limited menu.
They should provide room service for food i.e. snacks,lunch and dinner.
They should also improve on their reception response to calls or any requests'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Above average‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good hotel but location abit inside from the main road. Good stay for families.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Good location hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Value for money and within 2 Km from the Madgaon railway station platform no. 3. One can choose it to visit south Goa and Colva beach.'}, {'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Staff is most discourteous!Awful house keeping!Zero admin!No restaurant!3rd rated BF!Disappointed!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Wonder how Agoda could select such a poorly located Hotel with ill mannered staff!
Cramped soiled lift adequate for 2 persons only.
We asked for drinking water.Got a Jug with water.
As we poured in a glass,ants were floating in the Jug!
Luckily did not sip or would hv become victim of severe allergy.
Drew attn of the so called Reception.They changed the water without any remorse.
Tel of the room was non functional.Got it rectified.
Wash room shower was lying broken !
The 109 room key was left at the counter with instructions to clean.
On returning at 9.30 pm to our dismay observed that room remained uncleaned.
On reminder at 10 pm,the Hotel staff half heartedly cleaned the room!
The only USP of the hotel is its proximity to Rly station & Bus stand!
I may tweet our stay experience in Hotel Panchsheel,Goa!
I booked only because of Agoda Tag & repented!

{'Location': 'Survey no 193/3B, Porba vaddo, Calangute bardez, Goa, Baga, Goa, India, 403516', 'overall_rating': '7.1', 'Name': 'BELLS BEACH RESORT, a unit of Resort De Balneaire ', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Worth!!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nice place with large rooms'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': '2nd Time ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I like the Large Rooms, Parking Space, Easy access to Taxi, Nearby eateries and Good breakfast, Good for Family. 
Its walkable distance 10 min from (Calangute and Baga Beach)  and close to Candolim beach as well if you wish to explore.

Wifi was not working this time though.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Awesome & Best its Stay for Morphoüíì‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Place & Veg. Food & staff r all of the good behaviour & Great Stay for them Again
üëçüéâüéâ'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Above average‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Wifi was hopeless and didn't even work most of the time.   Also a roomboy with a master key came into my room unannounced, lucky I was in the room.   I gave him an earful as no one should be coming into my room without my permission. Positives were the breakfast and other staff members. "}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Awesome Experience ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Love the room....highly cleaned rooms'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Room is good but the service is poor‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "It took hours for them to deliver packaged water bottles to the room (outside food and items are not allowed as per their policy, most of the items on the restaurant menu are never available, and the TV was out of service as they didn't recharge and it took more than 12 hours for them to recharge it (after multiple follow up calls). "}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': "Don't have enough linens ‚Äù", 'Review_Body': 'Rooms were not provided on time, but very late at 3:30 p.m., housekeeping dint had linen to get the Rooms Ready. There was a Fight Going in between Housekeeping Manager, Front Desk person Shayoni and Higher level Manager Mr Manoj Kataria. Manoj did not Provided linen on time to Housekeeping and manoj was asking front desk to tackle us. It was Really Disappointing that Mr. manoj Kataria was not able to Arrange Linen in 4 hours we waited there from 11:30am till 3:30 pm for our check in, instead was very keen on fighting with Housekeeping staff, shouting on them to Reuse the Used Linens, to get the Rooms Ready, he even shouted on front desk staff, for not been able to handle us and pursuade us for further more late check in. All the Mess from 11:30 am to 3:30 pm spoiled our first day in Goa.  Full Day was wasted sitting on reception, from 11:30 to 3:30 pm, thanks to the wonderful mismanagement by manoj Kataria. '}, {'Review_Rating': '4.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Horrible service‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Even a cup of tea would take 1 hour... and things like towel or shower gel they don't even feel like giving."}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Average place ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good location very close to Baga and Calangute but we went in peak season with marked up room price which was not worth the money spent '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Family and friends ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'best hotel to stay with friends, for couples, family.
'}], 'price': '5,000', 'img_link': 'https://q-xx.bstatic.com/xdata/images/hotel/840x460/228901264.jpg?k=cf41984a9caaba2895e3a19645e256ab0814108ec434d1d6757ec03f91b3790c&o=', 'room_size': '30m¬≤', 'amenities': ['Outdoor view', 'Balcony/terrace', 'Shower', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Additional toilet', 'Hair dryer', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Walk-in shower', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Pool facilities', 'Satellite/cable channels', 'Telephone', 'Adapter', 'Air conditioning', 'Fan', 'Linens', 'Sleep comfort items', 'Soundproofing', 'Wake-up service', 'Coffee/tea maker', 'Free bottled water', 'Wine glasses', 'Fireplace', 'Outdoor furniture', 'Seating area', 'Sofa', 'Tile/marble flooring', 'Window', 'Closet', 'Clothes dryer', 'Ironing facilities', 'Accessible by elevator', 'Accessible by stairs', 'Fire extinguisher', 'Safety/security feature', 'Smoke detector'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/resort-de-balneaire/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&tspTypes=4&los=1&searchrequestid=546d7db3-f1c6-4372-9d70-90c979e8ad96'}

The staff wer helpful and kind had a great time in goa must visit this hotel'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': "Goa's Vibe‚Äù", 'Review_Body': 'The lovely Hotel with best hospitality.

'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very bad experience ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Took Extra Charges, they ask money first before giving service, hotel location exact near to railway station so train Horn buzzing at middle night. staff was ridiculous, no one came to welcome us.  receptionist was totally unaware of hotel services. 
I will not recommend this hotel to anyone. please find other hotels. '}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Those who are looking for stay only‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The Hotel is good but, the location and surroundings are not so good. Overall, a very good hotel.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Great Modern Hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Modern and clean hotel , comparable to western standards and within walking distance to the railway station. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Awesome Stay ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We were family of 6 people and stayed in execution rooms. A solo traveler can easily walk to calangute, baga and candolim beaches. They provide all the amenities for a four-star hotel. 2) Suraj is a supportive host, and he did everything possible to make us feel comfortable. But dependency on untrained staff made him struggle at times.
3) Hot water provided at day time
4) Ease of checkin
5) Rooms were clean
6) AC as provided was working fine
7) Parking was provided, but it's in a busy area, so we had issues parking the vehicle on the streets

details:
{'Location': 'Candolim Road, Calangute, Goa, India, 403519', 'overall_rating': 'Select your room', 'Name': 'LE SEASONS RESORT', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '4.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "1. The 4 star rating of the hotel is simply misleading. 
2. Location is very good but the property is very small. 
3. Superior rooms do not look superior and rooms are congested for two.
4. Only one chair, instead of two, are provided in the balcony. This may be simply due to a very small balcony attached to superior rooms. 
5. Very good and efficient house keeping staff. 
6. They have very limited options for breakfast. 
7. In the name of fruit juice they shamelessly serve frooti in the breakfast. 
8. The kitchen and dining service is very slow and poor. 
9. The service area for breakfast is very conjusted and accident prone. 
10.  They have very ordinary gymnasium and swimming pool. We didn't find the location of swimming pool very appealing. 

Overall, the property does not deserve more than 3500/- per night for its superior rooms on any day of the year. "}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Location is excellent, room is also good'}], 'price': '5,700', 'img_link': 'https://q-xx.bstatic.com/xdata/images/hotel/840x460/405435102.jpg?k=dd9dfaf2bcfef78bc7bd069c607cbc1dd03d177f0e3470e09cf43b7d47a1b90a&o=', 'room_size': '30m¬≤', 'amenities': ['Outdoor view', 'Balcony/terrace', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Cleaning products', 'Toiletries', 'Free use of business areas', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Satellite/cable channels', 'Telephone', 'Air conditioning', 'Fan', 'Heating', 'Private entrance', 'Soundproofing', 'Coffee/tea maker', 'Dining table', 'Free bottled water', 'Kitchenware', 'Microwave', 'Mini bar', 'Refrigerator', 'Wine glasses', 'Fireplace', 'Seating area', 'Separate dining area', 'Tile/marble flooring', 'Trash cans', 'Closet', 'Clothes rack', 'Ironing facilities', 'Individual air conditioning', 'In-room safe box', 'Smoke detector'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/le-seasons-resort/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&los=1&searchrequestid=18d700e7-651f-4402-abd4-aa9f328d75d8'}

{'Location': 'Next to Milroc Kadamba , Panjim Old Goa By-Pass , Baiguinim, Old Goa, Old Goa, Goa, India, 403402', 'overall_rating': '7.6', 'Name': 'The Fern Kadamba Hotel And Spa', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Very Very poor quality of breakfast. ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The quality & spread of breakfast is very poor. Gone from bad to worse. Have in previous reviews said the same also updated the management. But in vain. The idli & vada were stale, also the cakes & other bakery items were stale. VERY VERY POOR. '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Best Hotel polite staff ,delicious food & best hospitality.'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.4', 'Review_Heading': 'worst experience ever‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'My stay in The Fern was terrible. There were no amenities provided by the hotel management in the name of covid precautions.

The breakfast was terrible with very limited options and the quality was also very bad. I ordered dal and roti, but dal was so salty that we had to leave it and there was no response from the hotel about the quality.

The room was smelly, had to call multiple times for simple things, but took forever to deliver. And on top of it, the staff was not helpful.
I thought I would get 5-star experience, but it was as same as a 2-star hotel.

DO NOT EXPECT 5 STAR EXPERIENCE.'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'NO REGARD FOR HOUSE GUEST‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We stayed there for one night, as the place was close to the School, our kids wanted to go, however, inspite of repeated request, the hotel kept playing extremely loud music till wee hours in the morning. The hotel was hosting party and preferred step motherly treatment to their own room guest. Absolutely SHITTING AND UNPROFESSIONAL.
'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Good only for SAT Test‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Walking distance from Sunshine Intl School. Hence good only for this purpose.
However, restaurant had poor service and said any order placed would take minimum 30 mins. Had first agreed to a late check-out by an hour but next day were rude and said it needs to be checked out on time.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Beautiful hotel in quiet district but close to railway, and tourist highlights.
Staff incredibly helpful in all ways including assistance with booking trains etc.
Restaurant and pool wonderful, we were happy to eat in and chill out around the pool after a big touristy day'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'For a quick fly by view of Goa old town, perfect‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Looks more like a business hotel but after being down the south of Goa in lesser accommodation this was perfect. Close to a nice Indian restaurant and a few shops but also a short ride into the main tourist hub of viewing the SFX Jesus Basilica and other churches/museums. The hotel is on a busy road so nothing much you can walk to so if you were basing yourself for more than a couple of days it may not be right but if you want reliable comfortable surroundings, a big pool and a gym this is great value for money despite a slightly disappointing breakfast selection.'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'In the middle of no where‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Maybe this is a new property, resulting in the goof up. Very small property with one restaurant and a bar. They claim it to be a star property. If you just want to be locked up in the rooms than it is a good one as the rooms are good and clean, but the location is awful. As local transportation is costly in Goa, you end up paying to the taxis.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Everything good except Taxi Service‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Hotel is very good.  Hotel staff is also very co-operative.  Facilities are very good.  Breakfast is also very good.  Only Taxi Service is not good. Specially when you are with family and you trust the hotel taxi driver most. But when he takes you to cruize or to see the dolphins he should select a good vendor.  Unfortunately this experience was very bad.  He gives priority of his choice (may be according to commission percentage). This was unfortunate.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Very Good Stay... Good Hotel.. Pleasent Environment...‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Only thing is bit out side of City takes 15 Mins from Panjim.. But doesn't dominate on comfortable stay and family-friendly surroundings...

Thanks Agoda and Team Kadamba"}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Amazing food, hospitality & cleanliness‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Superb staff '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'my stay at the fern kadamba was very nice the staff over there was very nice n over all i rate it a nice place to stay nice food n nice rooms'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good hospitality as per the name the fern  ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'WiFi was not connecting in the rooms'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Bien plac√© pour visiter Old Goa ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'H√¥tel moderne avec une petite piscine pr√®s de laquelle il n‚Äôy a que 6 si√®ges. Les chambres sont grandes et bien √©quip√©es. Old Goa n‚Äôest qu‚Äô√† 10 minutes en rickshaw. Au restaurant le personnel a peu d‚Äôattention pour vous si, comme c‚Äô√©tait le cas, il y a une f√™te (le midi) ou un groupe (le soir). '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Fantastique ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Le personnel attentionn√©, la nourriture excellente un endroit √† retourner '}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Fantastique ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Propret√©, personnel attentionn√©, services impeccable et nourriture au restaurant de l'h√¥tel excellente n'h√©sitez pas tout est succulent. "}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'un soggiorno di lusso nella capitale stile coloniale‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'un hotel che merita le 5 stelle. La brutta posizione √® stata compensata dal buon prezzo e da una navetta saltuaruia. ristorante eccellente con personale intelligente, gentile e professionale.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Êóß„Ç¥„Ç¢„Å´Ëøë„ÅèÈùô„Åã„ÅßËêΩ„Å°ÁùÄ„ÅÑ„ÅüÈõ∞Âõ≤Ê∞ó„ÄÇ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'ÂæìÊ•≠Âì°„ÅåÁúüÈù¢ÁõÆ„ÅßË™†ÂÆü„Å´ÂØæÂøú„Åó„Å¶„Åè„Çå„Çã„ÅÆ„ÅßÈÄ±Êú´„Å®‰ªï‰∫ã„ÅÆ5Ê≥ä„ÇíÊ∞óÊåÅ„Å°ËâØ„ÅèÈÅé„Åî„Åô„Åì„Å®„Åå„Åß„Åç„Åü„ÄÇ

Had first agreed to a late check-out by an hour but next day were rude and said it needs to be checked out on time.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Beautiful hotel in quiet district but close to railway, and tourist highlights.
Staff incredibly helpful in all ways including assistance with booking trains etc.
Restaurant and pool wonderful, we were happy to eat in and chill out around the pool after a big touristy day'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'For a quick fly by view of Goa old town, perfect‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Looks more like a business hotel but after being down the south of Goa in lesser accommodation this was perfect. Close to a nice Indian restaurant and a few shops but also a short ride into the main tourist hub of viewing the SFX Jesus Basilica and other churches/museums. The hotel is on a busy road so nothing much you can walk to so if you were basing yourself for more than a couple of days it may not be right but if you want reliable comfortable surroundings, a big pool and a gym this is great value for money despite a slightly disappointing breakfast selection.'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'In the middle of no where‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Maybe this is a new property, resulting in the goof up. Very small property with one restaurant and a bar. They claim it to be a star property. If you just want to be locked up in the rooms than it is a good one as the rooms are good and clean, but the location is awful. As local transportation is costly in Goa, you end up paying to the taxis.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Everything good except Taxi Service‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Hotel is very good.  Hotel staff is also very co-operative.  Facilities are very good.  Breakfast is also very good.  Only Taxi Service is not good. Specially when you are with family and you trust the hotel taxi driver most. But when he takes you to cruize or to see the dolphins he should select a good vendor.  Unfortunately this experience was very bad.  He gives priority of his choice (may be according to commission percentage). This was unfortunate.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Very Good Stay... Good Hotel.. Pleasent Environment...‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Only thing is bit out side of City takes 15 Mins from Panjim.. But doesn't dominate on comfortable stay and family-friendly surroundings...

Thanks Agoda and Team Kadamba"}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Amazing food, hospitality & cleanliness‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Superb staff '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'my stay at the fern kadamba was very nice the staff over there was very nice n over all i rate it a nice place to stay nice food n nice rooms'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good hospitality as per the name the fern  ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'WiFi was not connecting in the rooms'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Bien plac√© pour visiter Old Goa ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'H√¥tel moderne avec une petite piscine pr√®s de laquelle il n‚Äôy a que 6 si√®ges. Les chambres sont grandes et bien √©quip√©es. Old Goa n‚Äôest qu‚Äô√† 10 minutes en rickshaw. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Fantastique ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Le personnel attentionn√©, la nourriture excellente un endroit √† retourner '}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Fantastique ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Propret√©, personnel attentionn√©, services impeccable et nourriture au restaurant de l'h√¥tel excellente n'h√©sitez pas tout est succulent. was a very very good and pleasant stay.
'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Disappointing!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "The amount paid for this hotel was not worth at all. details:
{'Location': '166 Cavelossim Rd, Cavelossim, Goa, India, 403731', 'overall_rating': '8.6', 'Name': 'Radisson Blu Resort Goa Cavelossim Beach', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Best place for peace‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We really enjoyed a lot specially kids '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Very pleasant experience‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The rooms are very hospitable.
Staff members are very cooperative and respond very quickly.
Abhishek, Lily and Sebastian were few staff members we interacted, they are very soft spoken and dependable.
Felt the Buffet at night was bit expensive. Could have been atleast ‚Çπ400 less per head.
Huge Variety of foods and tastes good.
Welcome ritual was pleasent and unique.
Swimming pool has clean water with very less clorine content. Enjoyed atlot.
My rating would be 4.8/5'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'One of the best resorts is south Goa. Very spacious and full of greenery. Restaurant is biggest I have seen in a resort. Food is delicious. Waiting to go again. '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good place to stay ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Stayed with family for 2 days. The rooms are small but clean. Mattresses,blankets,towels are clean. Bathrooms are again small but well  maintained. The property is attached to beach.You have to cross Novotel hotel( which is in the same premises ) to reach the beach. Beach is clean. Breakfast is very nice with lot of variety. The breakfast area is clean. 
The location of hotel is strategic with easy access to good food joints.Good food joints are nearby.
My wife and children loved the stay.I recommended this hotel wholeheartedly. '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'NICE PROPERTY IN SOUTH GOA‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Its a good hotel to chill out in south goa. Beach is walkable and they have amazing pool.'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Bakwas service ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Staff is not cooperative. No communication between reception and room service and housekeeping.During two nights three days stay they clean washrooms only once only after insisting two three times. Very irritating staff. They spoiled our Goa tour '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Overall nice experience with private beach‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'A family traveller with below 5yrs kids, Overall nice experience with private beach just 5mints walking from the property, there is buggy option for traveling upto beach. Hotel is well maintained with polite and understanding staff just one thing was missing was lesser amenities for kids as compared to other hotels belongs to same category. '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Best of both worlds ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The location of the property allows you to go from calm serene beach to a quaint little corner of bustling restuarants and a small shopping arcade.

During Covid or as a practice now the staff is calling the guests everyday for the length of the stay to enquire on health and safety, gives so much confidence üëçüèºüëçüèº'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Lovely place‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Enjoyable stay, enjoyed all facilities'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Awesome stay. ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Every thing about this property is 10 out of 10. Looking forward for the next trip.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Great location with private walk to beach just 500mts away‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Fantastic location close to the beach, rent a bike and go inwards to the beautiful countryside + lots of fantastic restaurants with live bands +++'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Totally unreliable. Book at your own risk!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We had a paid confirmed booking for two days at Radisson. We even called the property whne we landed in Goa that our 3 years old daughter was not feeling well and it would be nice to get a room without waiting to which they assured we‚Äôll get a room as soon as we reach there.

We arrived there at 4pm with a kid with extreme motion sickness and after waiting for 1 hour at the reception they told us they have given our room to some Foreign tourist group and they did this to everyone to was checkinb at that time with us.

Can you imagine the height of unprofessionalism here. Despite of paying around 30k we were denied our room. We had a 3 year old who was really unwell. He kept pleading to provide a room to us so that we could cater to our kid but they didn‚Äôt do it.

The manager even refused to talk to us and sat inside a restricted room. 
Special thanks to Mr. Adil who tried to help us in this difficult situation. He offered us stay at some other property for which we again had to travel and due to so much travelling our kid‚Äôs condition deteriorated further and we had to take her to a Doctor. 

We were given our room the next day and rooms are very small in size and not worth the money. The buffet spread is also limited.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Best ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Neat and clean stay with happy staff around..‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We stayed in Radissonblu cavelossim from March 10 to 13,2022. Our stay was very pleasant and relaxing.. The property is huge with big rooms and beach access.. 
Beach stretch big, clean with white sand and water sports activities  available at shore.
Restaurant serves wide spread of breakfast which accommodates all taste buds.. 
Special thanks to Adil, Aridam, Vikas, Farhad, Defhney and Cynthia( I m not sure of the name but the girl at the reception)
Each of them always had a smile at face which made our stay more memorable....'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Great property, food n service'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'A BEAUTIFUL GETAWAY‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Stayed at this property for 03 days. Cool and comfortable stay except that the AC set at 24 Degrees in the room is not very comfortable at night n the guest cannot adjust the temp. The B/Fast was a very lavish  spread however the cut fresh fruits served were either not fully ripe or were not sweet. Overall the quality of fresh fruits needs to be improved. The staff at the reception, the House keeping and in the Restra were outstanding in their conduct, dealing and behavior. Over all a wonderful experience.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Superb Stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The resort is amazing. Well suited for travel with Family. Very clean and spacious rooms and easy beach access. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Beautiful place ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We stayed for 2 days and absolutely it was an wonderful experience. The location is extremely beautiful  peaceful and calm. The breakfast is awesome you will get lot of varieties. You will fall in love with this location especially the cottage is beautiful. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone in my network and relatives '}, {'Review_Rating': '3.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Disappointed ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'For the price that they are charging and for the brand name of Radisson,  it was disappointing to stay at a not so well maintained property, it‚Äôs been poorly renovated and maintained, has a unresponsive staff particularly in the restaurant. Would definitely recommend other places for this price '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Great stay! Highly recommended.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'This was our second time innlast 4 yrs. Yet again a wonderful experience. Great location, peaceful and clean property with pleasant staff members.

A small feedback:
Can offer pool table at no charge as most 5 star resorts do that & include few more games/activites for the kids.'}], 'price': '65,700', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/9456610/423894415/8c0a58c83c1241cce79bf59d62a9691b.jpg?ca=22&ce=0&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '35m¬≤', 'amenities': ['Pool view', 'Balcony/terrace', 'Non-smoking', 'Shower', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Accessible toilet', 'Adapted bath', 'Bathrobes', 'Bathroom phone', 'Hair dryer', 'Mirror', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Reading light', 'Satellite/cable channels', 'Telephone', 'Adapter', 'Air conditioning', 'Alarm clock', 'Blackout curtains', 'Concierge', 'Daily newspaper', 'Linens', 'Private entrance', 'Slippers', 'Soundproofing', 'Wake-up service', 'Coffee/tea maker', 'Free bottled water', 'Mini bar', 'Refrigerator', 'Daily housekeeping', 'Desk', 'High chair', 'Seating area', 'Trash cans', 'Closet', 'Ironing facilities', 'Trouser press', 'Accessible by elevator', 'In-room safe box', 'Locker', 'Safety/security feature', 'Smoke detector'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/radisson-blu-resort-goa-cavelossim-beach/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&los=1&searchrequestid=18d700e7-651f-4402-abd4-aa9f328d75d8'}

details:
{'Location': '7/32, SALMONA, SALIGAO, Calangute, Goa, India, 403511', 'overall_rating': '6.0', 'Name': 'HOTEL 69', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good rooms but lacks cleanliness‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We booked two classic rooms and thankfully got deluxe rooms as per the room availability during the checkin. The rooms were spacious. The hotel is located  at approx. 10-15min distance from Calangute beach, so its a silent place. 
The rooms however lacked basic cleanliness and maintenance. 
1. The garbage bin was filled with wrappers and other stuff from previous customer visits. 
2. The flooring was bit sticky due to improper cleaning of the beach sand. 
3. Few areas in the room still had the beach sand spread across the floor. 
4. TV, mini fridge, AC, hot water, ceiling fan available but TV had no recharge, mini fridge was unclean, fan was not working. 
5. The surface under the table had bits of cigarette and other wrappers which were lying there since long time it seemed!! 
6. The hanger in the bathroom was broken and there was no other place to hang clothes. 

I agree that the budget at which hotel provided the spacious rooms was extremely adorable, but basic cleanliness and hygiene should be provided irrespective of the price the customer is paying. reviews:
[{'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good rooms but lacks cleanliness‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We booked two classic rooms and thankfully got deluxe rooms as per the room availability during the checkin. The rooms were spacious. The hotel is located  at approx. 10-15min distance from Calangute beach, so its a silent place. 
The rooms however lacked basic cleanliness and maintenance. 
1. The garbage bin was filled with wrappers and other stuff from previous customer visits. 
2. The flooring was bit sticky due to improper cleaning of the beach sand. 
3. Few areas in the room still had the beach sand spread across the floor. 
4. TV, mini fridge, AC, hot water, ceiling fan available but TV had no recharge, mini fridge was unclean, fan was not working. 
5. The surface under the table had bits of cigarette and other wrappers which were lying there since long time it seemed!! 
6. The hanger in the bathroom was broken and there was no other place to hang clothes. 

I agree that the budget at which hotel provided the spacious rooms was extremely adorable, but basic cleanliness and hygiene should be provided irrespective of the price the customer is paying. {'Location': 'Simwaddo Anjuna, Bardez , Anjuna, Goa, India, 403509', 'overall_rating': '7.4', 'Name': 'Annapurna Boutique Hotel', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '4.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'This place is not at all value for money. 
You can get better place to live in less than or equal amount. Wifi doesn‚Äôt work inside the rooms and drinking water is at times not available at reception, you have to buy your own water bottles. '}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Not good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Not quality in huge money '}, {'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'service is not good. no ketly in room. no tv recharge no unlimited break fast. qty also very less. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'About my stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It was really good 
Such a good stay with cool hospitality and arrangements 
Easily reachable to near locations 
They have a locker for your valuables
And renting a bike is easy 
there its right opposite to the stay
Its roundly set with oxygen plants so you get clean air and a good vibe around 
Much appreciated for the whole team work at this stay üôå
'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Wonderful , Cozy & Positive vibes‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'An amazing place to stay. Very positive,Cozy n cool Atmosphere in and around the property. Beaches nearby. Food is amazing but a little expensive. Over-all must visit for a Cozy stay.'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Pathetic‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'To start with the rooms inside the place was pathetic and the bed head was broken and curtains were dirty so please help me understand what kind of precautions were taking for this kind of things during this pandemic and I even paid extra 500 to the reception guy just because he said its early check in'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Would stay there again‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The owner and staff were very friendly and respectful, the place is lovely and maintained with love. A peaceful place with character in the midst of a busy tourist hotspot. '}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'worth to pay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Pros
 -Cleanliness
 -Fashionable furnitures

Cons
 -Far from beach(around 2.5 km away from Anjuna beach)'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Good Decent hotel. Rooms have a heritage look. Location is around 10 mins from beach. ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good Service. No breakfast if u book from Agoda. Rooms were comfortable .  Need a bike to visit different places. 10 mins away from Anjuna beach'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Annapurna Vishram Dhaam‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'No WiFi connection or had problems. Very good location to stay in North Goa Close to Arpora Saturday night Market. & Club Cabana and other nearby places. Close to Anjuna & Vagator beaches. Friendly staff.'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Terrible staff, and unhygienic hotel.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "We stayed here for a day, they let us check-in an hour early. We were three people we had payed everything in advance but there are group of people in the hotel they try scamming you. They pretend that they are bargaining for you and getting you the best price but no they are just scamming.

Location: Only good thing about the location is that its close from Saturday night market, that was the only reason at the first place we chose this hotel, that also we couldn't benefit because that day market got shifted to Sunday due to Holi.

Cleanliness and Hygiene: None of the towels we got were clean, one of the towel had a hole in it. When I asked them to send a new towel and toiletries the room service guy told me that today is your check-out, towels will come from laundry after 11 only so can't give u a new one. Then when the room service guy came in to give me toiletries I showed him the hole in towel then he went and brought me a new that one wasn't clean so had to check 4 towels before I found a clean one. 
Foul smell was there in the washroom.


Value for money: I don't think the hotel was worth the amount I paid. We paid for breakfast inclusive, it wasn't buffet we had to chose one item from the limited menu and we weren't allowed to repeat also. If you prefer heavy breakfast don't include breakfast, you will be disappointed. 

Restaurant: It was overpriced. but food was tasty.

Staff: The staff are not trained properly. There few guys mostly they were business partners or staff not sure they tried scamming us. When we wanted to rent bikes they setup with 2 dio which were in bad condition. And when we asked for a cab, they pretended that they are talking to a driver on phone and negotiating the price but the driver never turned up, they dropped us in a personal car and charged us the same 1000 Rs for 5 kms. The manager didn't even know that we had asked for a Cab.


I would never recommend this hotel to anyone. Its better to pay a bit more and stay in a Star proper"}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice place at nice rate‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Me and my wife were more interested in roaming around Goa than staying back at the room. If that's your intention as well, AVD is a really good hotel to go for!"}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'An excellent option for those who want to have a clean place to rest post s long day. Excellent staf‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Don't expect amenities galore - there is a reason for us to be looking at economic options right? While I was nervous, I was extremely surprised and super pleased by the place. Lovely homely staff, were around to help. Clean rooms and bathrooms. We were in Classic Superior so the size of the room was perfect.

Very good location to stay in North Goa Close to Arpora Saturday night Market. & Club Cabana and other nearby places. Close to Anjuna & Vagator beaches. Friendly staff.'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Terrible staff, and unhygienic hotel.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "We stayed here for a day, they let us check-in an hour early. We were three people we had payed everything in advance but there are group of people in the hotel they try scamming you. They pretend that they are bargaining for you and getting you the best price but no they are just scamming.

Location: Only good thing about the location is that its close from Saturday night market, that was the only reason at the first place we chose this hotel, that also we couldn't benefit because that day market got shifted to Sunday due to Holi.

Cleanliness and Hygiene: None of the towels we got were clean, one of the towel had a hole in it. When I asked them to send a new towel and toiletries the room service guy told me that today is your check-out, towels will come from laundry after 11 only so can't give u a new one. Then when the room service guy came in to give me toiletries I showed him the hole in towel then he went and brought me a new that one wasn't clean so had to check 4 towels before I found a clean one. 
Foul smell was there in the washroom.


Value for money: I don't think the hotel was worth the amount I paid. We paid for breakfast inclusive, it wasn't buffet we had to chose one item from the limited menu and we weren't allowed to repeat also. If you prefer heavy breakfast don't include breakfast, you will be disappointed. 

Restaurant: It was overpriced. but food was tasty.

Staff: The staff are not trained properly. There few guys mostly they were business partners or staff not sure they tried scamming us. When we wanted to rent bikes they setup with 2 dio which were in bad condition. And when we asked for a cab, they pretended that they are talking to a driver on phone and negotiating the price but the driver never turned up, they dropped us in a personal car and charged us the same 1000 Rs for 5 kms. The manager didn't even know that we had asked for a Cab.


I would never recommend this hotel to anyone. Its better to pay a bit more and stay in a Star proper"}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice place at nice rate‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Me and my wife were more interested in roaming around Goa than staying back at the room. Location: Sy No. No 98/13-B, Gaura Waddo, Calangute, Calangute, Goa, India, 403516
Name: HALF Hotel, Calangute
reviews:
[{'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very nice room, the staff is very nice also and very helpful. We would definitely recommend this hotel.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Superb‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'This is a very good hotel tucked into quiet and posh neighborhood of Calangute in Goa. The hotel is managed by a smart guy who comes and meet every morning all customers around breakfast time to ensure their stay is pleasant and nice . The beach is around 15 mins walk and so is market to buy stuff like booz or grocery . There are many restaurant around to eat . The hotel has a cute little pool to keep you cool in a hot afternoon and also have a nice common area to relax and laze around with a big book shelf to read from . WIFI is nice . The beds are comfortable and rooms are clean . The hotel staff is very supportive to guide you or help you with anything you need. They give you few decent options to choose from in breakfast and prepare them in onsite kitchen . However this kitchen would not prepare anything else during the day for lunch or dinner . Although you can use the big refrigerator to keep your stuff in case your room mini fridge is not good enough for you .Overall a good value for money boutique hotel with a modern and cool vibe to it.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The hotel is nice and staff is very good'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Lovely‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Lovely stay here, Jitu was brilliant and helped us with everything we needed including renting a scooter. Rooms are spacious and clean, would definitely recommend for a relaxing couple of days.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Clean, friendly, comfortable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'A very nice stay. Staff were extremely friendly & helpful, exceeding expectations. The room and bed were comfortable. Everything was supplied. A quiet location with a small walk to the main street. Probably hard to find a better (at this price..)'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'One of the best stay in CALANGUTE‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good Staff, very helpful, couple friendly;
vehicle arrangement also done by them;
near to beach; good service; housekeeping on request;'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice stay in a quiet place away from the usual chaos‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Stagg, clean toilets, just enough fixed breakfast,  rental scooter availability within the hotel, quietness, no chaos area'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Superb‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The property is a short walk from Calangute beach and a short drive to Baga beach and Baga central. The hotel is secluded from the busy Main Street. the staff were great and the breakfast was too. staff all very friendly and willing to go out of their way to help'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Wonderful‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Deluxe Junior Suite is one of the comfortable stay which we experienced. This room has a special appearance of living room in the lower part and an attic level which makes it look cool and classy. We felt at home. The staff were very cooperative and jovial.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Fantastic boutique hotel for tailored stay in North Goa.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Half Hotel is a fantastic boutique hotel tucked away in northern Goa in Calangute. 

It is run by a staff of 5-6 people headed up by Jitu. From arrival to checkout and more, the staff have been fantastic. They go out of their way to accommodate reasonable breakfast request. They were able to help with advice on local tourism and help book cabs for wherever we wanted to go. All in all, they were fantastic. 

We also had the pleasure of meeting the owner, Charles. Like his team, Charles is also excellent as a host, providing a swathe of various activities and a full range of itinerary options. Moreover, on my arrival to Goa, I had a medical issue relating to back problems. Charles immediately requested for a physician to come in and help, and that made the difference to ensure I could go about enjoying my holiday as opposed to being bed bound. 

The hotel itself is not massive, so it doesn't take 10 mins to access your room. The pool is lovely and clean, with shade and chairs to sit in the sun. Within the rooms, towels are provided and an assortment of soaps and shower gels. The balcony has a good pool view, but note, you can also see the main road etc. The room is clean, and the odd mosquito or two can be warded off easily with the repellent. The front desk were happy to provide extra repellents on demand. 

In general the room is incredibly clean and tidy and pleasant to stay in. The apartment with 2 double beds doesn't have a separating door FYI, just that it is up a set of stairs. 

In general this hotel is a fantastic stay and close to lots of local tourist opportunities. 10/10 would stay again!"}]

You get your own private beach view and everything is close by, the shacks, sweet water lake, keri beach. They host various events and it was an overall great experience.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Location'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.0', 'Review_Heading': 'it was good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Amazing view on the ocean 
Good stuff 
Comfortable bed 
Cozy room'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'ATS Hostel is one of the best places I‚Äôve stayed so far. The location is absolutely beautiful and the staff (big shoutout to Jase and all the lovely other people who where working there).
After you wake up from the sound of the waves you can directly take a dip in the awesome bay just in front of the hostel. 
All people there where so nice and welcoming. After a short walk from the town center, you reach ATS, built into the cliffs with this stunning view. 
Absolutely recommend this place!'}, {'Review_Rating': '1.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Bad‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nothing'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Best View view & view hostel in Goa‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Location location & location 
Nothing can beat the view of this hostel. I can say best hostel in Goa only because of its view. And offcourse private beach is icing on the cake. I booked dorm bed and came solo but make so amazing friends in the hostel.staff was very friendly & helpful. Though there is no network apart from BSNL but wifi was working fine & I was able to get wifi calls. ATS cafe is spectacular. Beautifuly decorated & I could see only great crowd in the cafe as compared to the nearby areas. They are newly built so I guess more things to come from them but I would rate it 100/10 for there efforts & dedication. Kudos to Team ATS!!'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Amazing‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Really loved the private beach and food candle night dinner was amazing and beautiful'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Passable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The view is great'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'The property grows on you‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Location! Location! Location! 
Imagine waking up to the sound of waves hitting the rocks everyday and only water as far as your eyes can stretch. 

- Private Beach Property
- Welcome Drinks
- Friendly Staff - Warm Smiles
- Off beat location
- Strong Wi-Fi
- Access to flea markets

reviews:
[{'Review_Rating': '1.0', 'Review_Heading': 'horrible experience‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'location'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Great Place‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The location is as good as it gets. You get your own private beach view and everything is close by, the shacks, sweet water lake, keri beach. They host various events and it was an overall great experience.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Location'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.0', 'Review_Heading': 'it was good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Amazing view on the ocean 
Good stuff 
Comfortable bed 
Cozy room'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'ATS Hostel is one of the best places I‚Äôve stayed so far. The location is absolutely beautiful and the staff (big shoutout to Jase and all the lovely other people who where working there).
After you wake up from the sound of the waves you can directly take a dip in the awesome bay just in front of the hostel. 
All people there where so nice and welcoming. After a short walk from the town center, you reach ATS, built into the cliffs with this stunning view. 
Absolutely recommend this place!'}, {'Review_Rating': '1.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Bad‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nothing'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Best View view & view hostel in Goa‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Location location & location 
Nothing can beat the view of this hostel. I can say best hostel in Goa only because of its view. And offcourse private beach is icing on the cake. I booked dorm bed and came solo but make so amazing friends in the hostel.staff was very friendly & helpful. Though there is no network apart from BSNL but wifi was working fine & I was able to get wifi calls. ATS cafe is spectacular. Beautifuly decorated & I could see only great crowd in the cafe as compared to the nearby areas. They are newly built so I guess more things to come from them but I would rate it 100/10 for there efforts & dedication. Kudos to Team ATS!!'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Amazing‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Really loved the private beach and food candle night dinner was amazing and beautiful'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Passable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The view is great'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'The property grows on you‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Location! Location! Location! 
Imagine waking up to the sound of waves hitting the rocks everyday and only water as far as your eyes can stretch. 

- Private Beach Property
- Welcome Drinks
- Friendly Staff - Warm Smiles
- Off beat location
- Strong Wi-Fi
- Access to flea markets
- 4 min away from Sweet Water Lake - Kayaking & Paragliding

Though reaching here is a task but totally worth it. I promise you guys.'}]

{'Location': 'Opposite Don Bosco Hostel, Tivai Vaddo,, Calangute, Goa, India, 403516', 'overall_rating': 'Select your room', 'Name': 'Sinq Beach Resort', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice property ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nice property for couple '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Average hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The location of the hotel is good. The hotel was very clean, however near their se=wimming pool there were scooters, very small pool. Vibe of the place is very okay. If you just need a room to sleep, then its a good hotel, clean rooms. Rest evrything is average. There were no staffs to pick up our luggage as well while checking out. '}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Poor stay .‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I would not recommend this property to anyone. Firstly the location is bad few rooms are having view of Hostel which is adjacent to the building. There are six rooms with Pool facing but that is also OK. 
Secondly breakfast I don‚Äôt remember how can one have diffrent variety of Upma everyday. Entire South Indian breakfast with only one live counter for Eggs. 
Thirdly Ac was not working in the room, bed was pathetic one can swim inside the bed was the state of affair. Room service was pathetic when I asked for room service the guy refused to change the bed sheet and pillow cover stating we change after every two days. When I insisted he changed the same. 
Over all it‚Äôs not recommend to anyone. I have heared they have their property on Calangute Beach with same name Sinq Resort where they also have a night club inside that property has a good review which I came to know when I enquired upon. 

Hope my recommendations works.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Great Stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Great place to stay when you are at goa. All important places to visit in North goa are nearby from this location. Courteous staff and good amenities. The food was also too good. Full paisa vasool stay'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'UNSATISFACTORY‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Room was small, breakfast was not great and staff weren't great either. Do not recommend this hotel."}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'It Was Not Excellent But Value for Money.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "It is a good place for a couple to stay. Rooms are small but clean and nice. Food was good. I was just put off by the bath towels kept for us, they were torn. And they don't have english breakfast at all. But other than that it was a good experience."}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Lovely place to stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "We stayed here previously last January.  Our 2nd visit was as good as the first.  The manager has changed but hotel is still being kept to a high standard. 
Pool area is good and relaxing
Breakfast choice is good changing dishes daily  but don't expect a 'full English '.
Bedrooms have air-conditioning and fridge. 
Road outside of hotel is very dusty but thats Calangute.
Great place too relax  with staff that are always willing you help"}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': "It's good‚Äù", 'Review_Body': "Ya it's good bt service is too slow, last time arrange pool party and not allowing other guest to use pool it's not genuine as they don't told us "}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'It was great, full value for money, nice rooms, clean washrooms,great swimming pool‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It was great, full value for money, nice rooms, clean  washrooms, awesome swimming pool just that food in the hotel is little costly and staff in the reception can be a little more soft and friendly, all in all great experience of 4days and 3 nights'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Lovely place to stay ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "I had stayed here for a short trip to Goa. It's a good 3 star hotel with a lovely pool. Staff are very friendly.  "}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Good facilities‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good '}, {'Review_Rating': '4.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It was good'}, {'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good experience'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'parking‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Improve ur parking facilities.very conjusted parking'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'nice‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'nice'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'V good stay and enjoyable. Staff went out of the way to help. Kids and senior citizens were well taken care of.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Everything was good. Food should have some more variety specially goan fish thali and fries. The travellers reaching early should be put up into a comfortable room rather than waiting out at the reception though the staff made us very comfortable . Some vehicle availability to travel to close by areas should be made available. Otherwise it was a great stay. And a spa to relax would be great.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Best location,  Staff is good &  generous. ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Pool side Plantation,  Location,  Supporting Staff '}, {'Review_Rating': '5.0', 'Review_Heading': 'A Poor Experience‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The location was very convenient.....The rooms were spacious...The prices were reasonable.'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.3', 'Review_Heading': 'Sin q beach resort review‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The food was decent, the reception staff was polite and there was hot water 24/7'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.3', 'Review_Heading': 'Awesome Location with Clean swimming pool‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Cleaniless, Swimming Pool, Ambience'}], 'price': '4,162', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/237866/-1/82643564785e46e2f7ee97c875de0b85.jpg?ca=14&ce=1&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '25m¬≤', 'amenities': ['City view', 'Shower', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Hair dryer', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Air conditioning', 'In-room safe box'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/sinq-beach-resort/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&tspTypes=1&los=1&searchrequestid=c3b2c7bc-a23d-44d1-833f-915783448cd7'}

{'Location': '5/158, Near St. Sebastian Chapel, Fontainhas, Mala, Panaji, Goa, India, 403001', 'overall_rating': 'Select your room', 'Name': 'am¬øtays & Trails La Maison Fontainhas                                                       ', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Fawlty Towers of Panaji‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very poor wifi, broken lamps, no desk, manager with zero customer service skills.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Clean room,well appointed great view bright bathroom‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Towels.were frayed,but replaced immediately!'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Arrogant owner spoils the fun‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "The place is quaint 
Location so so 
Staff is excellent 
Do NOT mistake this as a boutique hotel
It's just a guest house 
Never recommend this place to anyone 
I think Agoda should de list this property 
Breakfast is from 8 to 930 
But god bless you if you miss it 
No room service 
The little crap of a passage that is converted into a restaurant closes with the breakfast 
Not even a cup of tea is available at 935
Food is decent at dinner but exorbitant for the quantity that is served 
It's a no smoking place which is fine 
There's also no parking 
The wifi rarely works 
The towels were inherited from the owners ancestors 
Just don't bother considering this dump 
Steep staircase goes up to the rooms 
No elevator 
BAD NEWS - OWNER IS A LOOSER "}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice stay but not a second time‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Location is  good. Right in the old quarter. I stayed during monsoon season, mid- July for three nights. I had a small single room. Great wi-fi connection in my room. My room faced St. Sebastian Road and it was lovely to hear the singing from the old church just at the end of the street early Sunday morning from my window. I only ate breakfast there. Good coffe but the meal was fixed and disappointing considering the rate this hotel charges. Interior of the hotel is well placed but a tad conservative for me especially the dining area. I was the only guest and the hotel was very quiet which was the best feature.  Nice stay, but in my opinion not worth the high rate charged. I stayed at the Crown Royal previous, and the employees there were exceptional and a nice variety at the buffet breakfast. I had an expensive pair of Bose ear buds taken from my room. Unexplained lost. Disappointing. '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': "Can't be better‚Äù", 'Review_Body': 'Nice location in the middle of Fontainhas, good wi-fi connection, well maintained room and friendly staff at a reasonable price.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.3', 'Review_Heading': 'Great accommodation ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Friendly staff, lovely room, perfect location '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.7', 'Review_Heading': 'Clean Hotel in a Great Location‚Äù', 'Review_Body': '1) The Cleanliness. 2) The Friendliness of the staff and management. 3) The location of the hotel.'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'No flexibility in charging extras‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Quality of rooms, Location, Overall decor'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Tr√®s bien ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Seul point faible, pas tr√®s propre sous les lits, j‚Äôavais perdu quelque chose et j‚Äôai d√ª regard√© sous le lit et ... 
une terrasse sur le toit serait tr√®s bien car pour le prix rien en ext√©rieur.   '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'H√¥tel de charme avec peu de chambres et tr√®s convivial. ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Tr√®s bon restaurant, petit d√©jeuner parfait. '}], 'price': '13,000', 'img_link': 'https://q-xx.bstatic.com/xdata/images/hotel/840x460/35168665.jpg?k=8f66b02331d0fd76a762d710e3b7e94e02cb06cf8a098de50f87ecc995595bdf&o=', 'room_size': '18m¬≤', 'amenities': ['Shower and bathtub', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Accessible toilet', 'Hair dryer', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Reading light', 'Satellite/cable channels', 'Telephone', 'Adapter', 'Air conditioning', 'Blackout curtains', 'Slippers', 'Coffee/tea maker', 'Free bottled water', 'Seating area', 'Trash cans', 'Closet', 'Ironing facilities', 'Accessible by elevator', 'Safety/security feature', 'Smoke detector'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/la-maison-fontainhas-boutique-hotel/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&los=1&searchrequestid=c3b2c7bc-a23d-44d1-833f-915783448cd7'}

details:
{'Location': 'Escrivao vaddo candolim, Candolim, Goa, India, 403515', 'overall_rating': '8.0', 'Name': 'Dmellos Sea View Home', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '9.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Superb‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Dmellos Sea view home is around 200 meters from the main candolim - aguada road, away from the hustle and honking of scooties. Beautiful property, well kept and maintained, each room has its own space. the property has a beautiful garden with hammocks and lounging area to work. the WiFi a bit sketchy at times. 
Beach is hardly 100 meters from the property and is one of the best beaches of North goa, clean and golden sand with scanty tourist.
The Non AC sea view rooms on 2nd floor are absolutely a rare find, book in advance.
the Family/host also provides home cooked breakfast and rest you can order from Dmellos Shack.

reviews:
[{'Review_Rating': '9.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Superb‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Dmellos Sea view home is around 200 meters from the main candolim - aguada road, away from the hustle and honking of scooties. Beautiful property, well kept and maintained, each room has its own space. the property has a beautiful garden with hammocks and lounging area to work. the WiFi a bit sketchy at times. 
Beach is hardly 100 meters from the property and is one of the best beaches of North goa, clean and golden sand with scanty tourist.
The Non AC sea view rooms on 2nd floor are absolutely a rare find, book in advance.
the Family/host also provides home cooked breakfast and rest you can order from Dmellos Shack.
Must book, enjoy the beach, live your time.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Best calm and quiet stay in one of the best property‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Location and food in the shack'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'near to beach, there restaurant nearby on the beach‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'location was very good, owners of the property are very friendly, they also have there restaurant at the beach which is very very nearby'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Lovely beach holiday‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The property itself, the rooms, surroundings, proximity to sea, the shack, the calmness, the old charm of the property, the staff everything'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'the view was just amazing'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Wonderful‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'location clean

{'Location': 'Colomb Bay, Palolem, Canacona, Goa, Palolem, Goa, India, 403702', 'overall_rating': '8.2', 'Name': 'BRAMHA COTTAGES', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '9.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Superb‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Large,  deep,  very comfortable mattress...Nice location between Palolem and Patnem,  with a couple of great eateries next door.  Balcony with sunset view.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Everything about the stay and the entire experience here was exceptional. Our host Sandy is very courteous and kind , goes out of his way to help out in every way possible'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'hidden gem in palolem‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "If you're looking for a quiet and peaceful retreat in Palolem, look no further than Brahma Cottage. This guest house is truly a hidden gem, with only four spacious and impeccably clean rooms that make you feel like you have the entire place to yourself. The best part? Our room had an amazing sea view!

From the moment we arrived, we were struck by the warmth and dedication of the staff. They went above and beyond to make us feel comfortable, and were always available to provide us with any services we needed, such as laundry and motorbike rentals. The prices were very reasonable and the service was top-notch.

Brahma Cottage is truly a place where you can relax and unwind. The surroundings are peaceful and tranquil, and the sound of the ocean waves will lull you to sleep at night. It's the perfect place to disconnect from the outside world and enjoy the natural beauty of Palolem.

We loved our stay at Brahma Cottage and can't wait to come back. The combination of the stunning location, spacious and clean rooms, and the friendly and dedicated staff made for an unforgettable experience. If you're looking for a serene and beautiful place to stay in Palolem, Brahma Cottage is the perfect choice. Highly recommended!"}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I thoroughly enjoyed my stay at Bramha Cottages...The property is hardly 5-7mins walk away from Palolem beach, and rooms are spacious with a balcony facing the beach, but the best thing about the property is the guy managing it (Sandy). He has been a great help in arranging transportation for me, patiently listening to any suggestions I offered, and has been very friendly. As a travel blogger, the way customers are treated matters the most to me, and I found this place excelling in that department. Would recommend it without a doubt...!'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.0', 'Review_Heading': 'good value for the money.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nice big room with terrace and a bit of seawiew.
Friendly staff, the walue vas really good for the money. my room had a frigide!'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Will definitely visit again‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Comfortable stay with friendly staff.
Got a taxi right from the entrance. 
Has restaurants right around it. 
Next to the beach.
Nice and calm'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'nice big rooms, warm to hot water, AC
the owner was so helpful with everything. definitely recommend.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The bed is unbelievably comfortable, great balcony to view the sunset, friendly and helpful owners. Right in the middle of 2 different beaches just a few minutes walk to each, a Brilliant tandoori restaurant 2 doors down aswel , highly recommend'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Location, access to both patnem and palolem from this place.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Amazing hosting‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Sanesh was the best host, so so accommodating and helpful and kind. The room feels like you are in a tree house with big beautiful windows and Colomb Bay is just lovely!'}], 'price': '2,950', 'img_link': 'https://q-xx.bstatic.com/xdata/images/hotel/840x460/408469411.jpg?k=2f3ce6997ec5240aef8856931d26b63bd829a1c0d3d46b782ed8310f201b54fc&o=', 'room_size': '20m¬≤', 'amenities': ['Balcony/terrace', 'Shower', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Air conditioning', 'Alarm clock', 'Fan', 'Linens', 'Private entrance', 'Soundproofing', 'Wake-up service', 'Seating area', 'Clothes rack'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/bramha-cottages/hotel/all/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&los=1&searchrequestid=c3b2c7bc-a23d-44d1-833f-915783448cd7'}

details: {'Location': "Near St. Ann's Church, Agonda Beach, Goa, Agonda, Goa, India, 403702", 'overall_rating': '8.4', 'Name': 'Royal Orbit Resort Agonda', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'good sized room, a decent shower, nice balcony, good ac and fan. great location. gardens are lovely'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Everything about royal orbit resort was good and according to expectation. We enjoyed the stay and happily recommended the place to visiting friends.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice little resort between beach and jungle‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'This small resort is in a good and green location.
