While having breakfast we already saw Langurs, other monkeys and many species of birds since the jungle starts just on the other side of the river. The staff was super friendly to us and our 4 year old daughter. Especially Shankey did a great job. Thanks to him and all others, kitchen staff, management, front office, cleaners and gardeners who made our stay fun.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Rooms was nice, food was exallent and cheap, all staff were brilliant'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'pleasant and relaxing‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'good location , close to the beach, neat and clean rooms, good service by the staff and excellent food from the kitchen'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice place for few days‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nice little hotel behind the beach. had a small pool and a nice bar. details:
{'Location': 'Titos Lane,saunta vaddoo,baga, 7/31, Baga, Goa, India, 403519', 'overall_rating': '9.4', 'Name': 'Ariv Inn', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': "Best budget stay in Tito's lane.‚Äù", 'Review_Body': "Perfect for all types of travels who wants to enjoy the night life at baga beach and Tito's lane. Alk the famous north goa night clubs are just a walk away from hotel. Beach is just a 3 mins walk. Hotel is a newly renovated one and thanks to the owner/manager Mr Vikrant Bathla for providing us the most homely stay at goa. All the staffs were helpful. We were missing home food there at goa after enjoying almost 6-7 meals outside, then the cook prepared homely food for us(less spicy) and we were literally amazed. Will definitely recommend it to all. And for my next visits too, gonna stay there with your hosting, brother Vikrant. "}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Courteous staff! Great service.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Staff and the management are extremely courteous and are willing to serve 24x7.

One thing that‚Äôs missing in the room is a cupboard. Some rooms are spacious, some are average but all rooms are neat and tidy.

details:
{'Location': 'H No 1656 Deulwada Anjuna Vagator Goa, Vagator, Goa, India, 403509', 'overall_rating': '7.8', 'Name': 'The Peace Poshtel', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Wow! This is the best hostel I have stayed at so far in India! The cleanliness is really good! It seems pretty new, its in a quiet location so you will have a good nights rest, if thats what you want! 
I was there only for one night, I even got the 4 bed dorm by myself. But I will definitely come back here next time in Vagator!'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'friendly owner, ample parking space, cool property'}, {'Review_Rating': '3.0', 'Review_Heading': "The staff wasn't comfortable‚Äù", 'Review_Body': 'Facilities were good'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Beware of the Pervert at the front desk.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "The young boy at the front desk seemed really friendly at first and asked me to take a selfie with him the next day which was fine but the next morning as I was sitting outside in the common area, he came down with sunglasses and was recording me on his phone, I could see this happening through the reflection in his glasses and even moved my hands to confirm if it was true. He sat like that for almost 10mins and it wasn't till the very end that I noticed.
This incident made me very very uncomfortable, also recording me without my permission and consent isn't only immoral but also illegal."}, {'Review_Rating': '7.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nothing'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "It feels like you are staying at your friend's place. 

Too good! 

Thanks to Satish and dimpi the owners of the property to give their time and attention! 

On request they provided early check-in and late check-out! What else do you ask for."}, {'Review_Rating': '3.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Poor‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Room lacked basic facilities like hand wash & dustbin.
Mattress was super old & cranky. Springs coming out of it gave me backpain which is gonna take quite some time to recover now.

Overall bad hygiene & comfort.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Clean room and clean beds, Mini fridge inside the room!! Running hot water. Super host.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Came on a one day trip to Goa. The hostel is in the prime location. Crew members were really helpful and super friendly.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nothing I could think of.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'It was an awasome, excellent experiance and the best place for a holiday break‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The room which had choosen for my stay were very pleasent, cosy & clean,  especially felt like "homely my room feeling". Through out my stay @ The Peace Poshtel I had get an extraordinary positive vibe , the crew has always been friendly, patient, gently and helpfull... I would like to give full score to the entire team, specialy Dimpy and Deepak. I will choose and reffer  "the peace Poshtel" as my first Fave place in Vagator'}], 'price': '1,500', 'img_link': 'https://q-xx.bstatic.com/xdata/images/hotel/max500/410351566.jpg?k=76ccb1f28face9956008967d55a7c8947411d9d349888f587dd29ca0732a126a&o=', 'room_size': '17m¬≤', 'amenities': ['Outdoor view', 'Balcony/terrace', 'Shower and bathtub', 'Kitchenette', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Cleaning products', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Mobile hotspot device', 'Satellite/cable channels', 'Streaming service like Netflix', 'Adapter', 'Air conditioning', 'Electric blanket', 'Fan', 'Hand sanitizer', 'Linens', 'Private entrance', 'Sleep comfort items', 'Soundproofing', 'Coffee/tea maker', 'Dining table', 'Free bottled water', 'Full kitchen', 'Microwave', 'Mini bar', 'Refrigerator', 'Carpeting', 'Desk', 'Fireplace', 'Outdoor furniture', 'Seating area', 'Separate dining area', 'Tile/marble flooring', 'Closet', 'Dressing room', 'Ironing facilities', 'Washing machine', 'Carbon monoxide detector', 'Fire extinguisher', 'Individual air conditioning', 'Laptop safe box', 'Locker'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/the-peace-poshtel/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&tspTypes=3&los=1&searchrequestid=c3b2c7bc-a23d-44d1-833f-915783448cd7'}

details:
{'Location': 'P S Guest House, 2/59, Near Little Flower Of Jesus High School, Naikwaddo, Bardez, Goa, Calangute, Goa, India, 403516', 'overall_rating': 'Select your room', 'Name': 'SPOT ON Ps Guest House Near Calangute Beach', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "good for budget room, room location near calangute beach 2km, room owner is very humble all service good , room very clean, suggest for all friend's ,all experience is very good"}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Dont even think to stay there even if someone offer you for free.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'If was the worst experience ever. There is absolutely no service. If there is a female traveler with you dont even think once to stay there. Bathroom is full of insects. The owner is like a landlord who reminds you 5 times in a day to pay for every night like you a thief and will run away. She is not helpfull at all. We took bike from her that was our 2nd mistake, we need to go out just for 5 min for breakfast on our check out day and she clearly denied us and make us walk 1 km for that. She came at our door one day earlier of our check out date at 11 in night for money. It was very frustrating dealing with her. We called 3 time a day for 5 days just to get 1 glass of hot water. Very Very Very bad service and experience. Free main bhi mile to mat lena. We went to goa from Dec 23 to Dec 28, 2021 in the peak season and there was plenty of stay we could have found there soo dont panic and just book 1 or 2 days of stay from online and rest you can find there easily at very affordable price. But Dont stay in this guest house. You can mail me on jaygupta1221@gmail.com if you want to know more about my experience, i will be happy to assist you.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent location in a budget‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Pros : 
owner is friendly and helpfull
Place is just 2km from Calangute beach
Bikes are on rent at the hotel itself

'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Awesome‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good for budget as well location is 2km from nearest beach calingut . Freeze available .

There is absolutely no service. If there is a female traveler with you dont even think once to stay there. Bathroom is full of insects. The owner is like a landlord who reminds you 5 times in a day to pay for every night like you a thief and will run away. She is not helpfull at all. We took bike from her that was our 2nd mistake, we need to go out just for 5 min for breakfast on our check out day and she clearly denied us and make us walk 1 km for that. She came at our door one day earlier of our check out date at 11 in night for money. It was very frustrating dealing with her. We called 3 time a day for 5 days just to get 1 glass of hot water. Very Very Very bad service and experience. Free main bhi mile to mat lena. We went to goa from Dec 23 to Dec 28, 2021 in the peak season and there was plenty of stay we could have found there soo dont panic and just book 1 or 2 days of stay from online and rest you can find there easily at very affordable price. But Dont stay in this guest house. It's a new building  but maintained so badly because no one to take care...i think it's because of cost cutting....couples be care full"}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'A small boy in reception was always sleeping, always rude answer‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'A small boy in reception, is always rude in his answer, if not he will not answer, always sleeping till morning 9 am, very worst behaviour, rest rooms are neet and good I stay 4 days in hotel, only if we ask they are doing maintenance job'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Muggy smell in room‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "I was there for just about a few hours.

"}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Budget hotel with new construction‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Don't expect much services but good for family with kids as they have kitchen. 1 km far from main road/ market. Stayed here for 4days.
Highly Recommend for Couples,Families.

 overall experience is Satisfied and giving a thumbsup for OYO 24443 Beach Side Studios.üëçüëç'}], 'price': '1,613', 'img_link': 'https://q-xx.bstatic.com/xdata/images/hotel/840x460/429294145.jpg?k=91bdf15529689cc2aa9519aacfacc217e996597b59c902a8c35fbe1e6a8ed343&o=', 'room_size': '17m¬≤', 'amenities': ['TV', 'Air conditioning', 'Fan'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/oyo-24443-beach-side-studio-calangute-goa/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&los=1&searchrequestid=c3b2c7bc-a23d-44d1-833f-915783448cd7'}

They said once AC is on it will go. But it didn't happen. The smell was continuously present from afternoon 2pm till night 11pm my checkin checkout time. "}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Budget hotel with new construction‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Don't expect much services but good for family with kids as they have kitchen. 1 km far from main road/ market. Good deal only if you get below 1k"}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Clean and Perfect stay for Couple.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Rooms are very clean as shown in photographs.Provided all the facilities like Hot water,Induction stove,Utensils,Refrigerator,AC etc which a home studio should have.
Good thing is Parking is also available even for car.
Stayed here for 4days.
Highly Recommend for Couples,Families.
Little bit inside but near to Hotels and super markets.
 overall experience is Satisfied and giving a thumbsup for OYO 24443 Beach Side Studios.üëçüëç'}]

{'Location': 'Maddo Vaddo, Calangute, Goa, India, 403 516', 'overall_rating': '7.3', 'Name': 'Calangute Grande Hotel', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Grate experience‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good hotel'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Good Overall‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The location, staff, and rooms are good, however its too highly priced, with fixed breakfast options '}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Clean and hygiene is bigger concern ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Mirror broken bathroom too short balcony view is a worst'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice Budget stay and very close to Calangute beach ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Its a nice hotel to stay very popular North Goa destinations like Calangute, Candolim , Baga area...staff is very helpful and cooperative and takes care of all your requests.. Recommended for families and friends..'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very unhygienic conditions‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Poor quality of housekeeping, stinking premises and very rude staff'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Average hotel to stay... ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': '3 ratings to hotel out of 5'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Not as Expected!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Ambience is not good. They don't use light much so always dark. Breakfast is average.  Even restaurant ambience is not good at all. You won't get feeling of holiday hotel atmosphere.  After reaching at Calangute, I have realized that there are many more option with same price and of course its much much better than this one. "}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Overall nice place to stay and enjoy ....!!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Hotel is neat and clean, staff is polite, location is near the beach (5-8 minutes walk) so very convenient. Surely recommend to others.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Awasome cleanness and perfect service.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "I really loved this place. It's around 2 km from Calangute Beach. Everything is easily accessible from this place.

By the way it's my personal experience and it can vary from person to person but I really enjoyed their room services and the cleanliness of rooms also staff was very helpful and they have swimming pool services overall it's a nice experience staying there you can check it out one time. Make sure you request for the room that is bigger in size and on upper floor. Rest I liked.

Enjoy staying in Calangute Grand."}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Best budget Hotel for Goa Trip Feb 2022‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "We definitely recommend this Hotel to family and for solo travellers as well. One of the best budget hotel. Staff was very helpful. Breakfast was awesome. 4 different menu for all 4 days. 24 hrs hot water, clean rooms, all AC rooms, hot water kettle, small fridge in room these are few basic amenities you will get in this hotel. Room service you will get till 11 pm but everything is so near that even at 2 am you will get food around. Beach is hardly 8 to 10 mins walkin distance.  Nahida from reception and Sudarshan from F&B were very helpful right from booking to all other arrangements. Pool is also okay to enjoy. Tip : If you are looking Taj kind of facilities then please avoid this property üòÖ but if you are looking for budget hotel with all basic amenities then this is the best hotel I can recommend. Don't waste too much of money on Hotel room coz there are too many things to do where you can actually spend money,my personal opinion üòÉ. I hope this review will help others to plan their Goa trip. Cheers ... "}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': "That's it‚Äù", 'Review_Body': 'Many other good options available with same budget

No value for money'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Location‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Every popular beaches are close from this hotel'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Need to maintain the cleanliness of bedsheets ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The hotel is situated in a prime location. This is advantageous for those looking to head to Calangute beach. The staff are friendly and the reception is always willing to accommodate to the requests of the guests. 

The only downside was the bedsheets had  stains on them every single day, even though it was changed every day. details: {'Location': 'Dom Carlos Resort, Ghorbhat Waddo, Near Monte Carlo Retreat, Arpora, Goa 403516, India, Baga, Goa, India, 403516', 'overall_rating': 'Select your room', 'Name': 'Dom Carlos Resort', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'The best homely stay in Goa.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We stayed there from 22nd January to 25th January. And without any exaggeration I would like to say that my stay there was simply amazing. We booked a deluxe queen suite which was very very spacious .... like a very huge 1 bhk apartment. The location was very peaceful and serene and they even have their own parking with a security guard round the clock. There was hot water supply 24x7. The caretaker Ashwin was helpful beyond words. The stay made us feel very homely and frankly even though its 1 km from Baga still we got everything we needed. We were able to get scooty on rent just next to the hotel as well and at very cheap rates. Name: Dom Carlos Resort
reviews: [{'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'The best homely stay in Goa.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We stayed there from 22nd January to 25th January. And without any exaggeration I would like to say that my stay there was simply amazing. We booked a deluxe queen suite which was very very spacious .... like a very huge 1 bhk apartment. The location was very peaceful and serene and they even have their own parking with a security guard round the clock. There was hot water supply 24x7. The caretaker Ashwin was helpful beyond words. The stay made us feel very homely and frankly even though its 1 km from Baga still we got everything we needed. We were able to get scooty on rent just next to the hotel as well and at very cheap rates. The room service was also excellent.'}]

details:
{'Location': '4th Ward, Colva Beach, Colva, Goa, India, 403708', 'overall_rating': 'Select your room', 'Name': 'Graciano Cottages', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice Stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It was nice stay.. clean rooms and lovely location'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Disappointed ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Bathroom was not much cleaned, bedsheets odour was very bad, given regular water for drink no packed bottle..car parking was very good. Not given any doormats these all r basic things. '}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent location, close to beach‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good breakfast '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Above average‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'EXECUTIVE ROOMS ARE GOOD BUT MAINTAINCE OF SUPERIOR ROOM IS NOT UPTO MARK ,NO DUSTBIN IN ROOM, NO HOT WATER  KETTLE WERE PROVIDED STAFF BEHAVIOUR IS GOOD LOCATION IS PEACEFUL AND CALM AND WALKIN TO BEACH IS ADDEED ADVANTAGE  '}, {'Review_Rating': '2.8', 'Review_Heading': 'worst ever ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Photo on wab side is very old current cottage condition is very bed room size in small bathroom condition is very bed AC is not on working mode toilet seat and bath tub very old with many creak.'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Good one.....‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Location is good.......close to colva beach.....offers much in such price.....'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Pathetic Service and Worst Experience ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Rooms are not worth the money , they will not provide wifi , also there are lots of useless restrictions like you cannot bring outside food and drinks '}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "The property was very big, but the maintenance was so poor! I felt really sad while staying at this hotel. No matter how hard the staff tried to soothe the boarders, the hotel needs a thorough renovation.

The rooms did not have TVs...
The hot water was available only for 2 hours in the morning...
The in-house restaurant was inadequate for food options, but the taste was good :)....

Other than the excellent location, I did not find, sadly, any other points that could help me to come back to the cottages. 

Once again, so great a location and so big a property, so poorly maintained.....

It's a loss! "}, {'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Worst place ever been in life‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'First of all Agoda is a trap...once you are in there is no coming back. Whatever shown in photos are complete lie. No TV, No WiFi, No Hot water, No food, No clean linens. Next opt No to Agoda...will put review and photos in Google as well. '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice place‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good staff'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Cottage is not good as it describe‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Cottages is not so good. Photo on online was too old. The place was not as it describes. Wifi only in reception. No TV. No dust bin. Fan speed too slow. AC only on / off button works. Also bathroom was treble. Need to change toilet sit.'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Worst experience ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Worst staff
Poor cleaning
No swimming pool, but in booking they mentioned swimming pool.
No bathtub üõÅ, in booking mentioned bolathtub.
Staff behavior weired.
'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Good hotel near the colva beach‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'This is very nice location hotel. All shops and Restaurants are nearby in 500m and beach is also 500m also very good place to stay '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Recommended‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good manager and support people.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very good hotel.
Near to beach.'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Just OK!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "If you don't find any good hotel, then it is ok to stay here. Food is very costly. Presently restaurant is temporarily closed. Location is not so far from Colva beach. "}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Colva blued‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'First in house restaurant is not there. Also bathroom needs updating. Room was also stinking as not used for a while '}, {'Review_Rating': '4.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very bad place. Not recommended‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Had  booked the Superior room for my parents, was quite affordable but they left the hotel without checking in. AC was not working, bad smell in the room (probably not opened for many days), no toilet seat, unclean washroom, broken basin, etc. They could not even shift my parents to another room as the hotel was fully booked (no idea about the conditions of the other rooms). Would not recommend unless these issues are solved (Based solely on the room seen). 

However the hotel Manager Mr. Saji Jose was very hospitable and tried to help my parents in the best way he could.'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'best place at colva beach'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'noone was cleaning the room unless checkout'}], 'price': '2,200', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/109532/-1/f41dec3273f4c874581888e9217abcee.jpg?ca=0&ce=1&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '12m¬≤', 'amenities': [], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/graciano-cottages/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&tspTypes=3&los=1&searchrequestid=9e7d8c57-2bfa-43e9-a43f-cedad0007b7e'}

details: {'Location': 'Shalom Indus Residency, 1 Bamon Vaddo, Candolim, Goa, Candolim, Goa, India, 403515', 'overall_rating': '6.4', 'Name': 'Good Stays', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Go for this option only if you are desperate to visit North Goa‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Building needs big time maintenance as it's a very basic interior set up. Strange smell in the room, I assume the lenins are changed only once they bare stains from 10+ visitors, broken door handles, washroom is huge but needs basic accessories, pool is to wash vessels/mostly used by house keeping staff, you'll find tobacco/pan stains almost everywhere in the property, owners number mentioned in agoda's email is always switched off. Overall ratings 1.8/5 for the location. "}, {'Review_Rating': '4.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Mixed Experience ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The rooms were not as per hotel standards, however the food was amazing. details:
{'Location': 'Ourem Road, Palolem, Palolem, Goa, India, 403702', 'overall_rating': 'Select your room', 'Name': 'Palolem Guest House', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Neat & clean, Close to Beach‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Its just 400 mtrs walk to beach‚Ä¶ very nice hosts.. clean room and bathroom.. '}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Not Helpful‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'did not like the management behavior and the hotel cancellation policies.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Good value and solid build‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "On first impression, the Guest House may serm very basic, but:
-It's very clean
-Air Con works to full Power
-Water in toilet and shower is abundant and hot water readily available.
-Wifi works very well.
-We were allowed to an extra shower after checking out and staying in the beach for a while.
Bearing all this into account, I would recommend it without hesitation. details: {'Location': 'Dom Carlos Resort, Ghorbhat Waddo, Near Monte Carlo Retreat, Arpora, Goa 403516, India, Baga, Goa, India, 403516', 'overall_rating': 'Select your room', 'Name': 'Dom Carlos Resort', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'The best homely stay in Goa.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We stayed there from 22nd January to 25th January. The stay made us feel very homely and frankly even though its 1 km from Baga still we got everything we needed. We were able to get scooty on rent just next to the hotel as well and at very cheap rates. reviews: [{'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'The best homely stay in Goa.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We stayed there from 22nd January to 25th January. And without any exaggeration I would like to say that my stay there was simply amazing. We booked a deluxe queen suite which was very very spacious .... like a very huge 1 bhk apartment. The location was very peaceful and serene and they even have their own parking with a security guard round the clock. There was hot water supply 24x7. The caretaker Ashwin was helpful beyond words. The stay made us feel very homely and frankly even though its 1 km from Baga still we got everything we needed. We were able to get scooty on rent just next to the hotel as well and at very cheap rates. The room service was also excellent.'}]

details:
{'Location': '4th Ward, Colva Beach, Colva, Goa, India, 403708', 'overall_rating': 'Select your room', 'Name': 'Graciano Cottages', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice Stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It was nice stay.. clean rooms and lovely location'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Disappointed ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Bathroom was not much cleaned, bedsheets odour was very bad, given regular water for drink no packed bottle..car parking was very good. Not given any doormats these all r basic things. '}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent location, close to beach‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good breakfast '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Above average‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'EXECUTIVE ROOMS ARE GOOD BUT MAINTAINCE OF SUPERIOR ROOM IS NOT UPTO MARK ,NO DUSTBIN IN ROOM, NO HOT WATER  KETTLE WERE PROVIDED STAFF BEHAVIOUR IS GOOD LOCATION IS PEACEFUL AND CALM AND WALKIN TO BEACH IS ADDEED ADVANTAGE  '}, {'Review_Rating': '2.8', 'Review_Heading': 'worst ever ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Photo on wab side is very old current cottage condition is very bed room size in small bathroom condition is very bed AC is not on working mode toilet seat and bath tub very old with many creak.'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Good one.....‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Location is good.......close to colva beach.....offers much in such price.....'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Pathetic Service and Worst Experience ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Rooms are not worth the money , they will not provide wifi , also there are lots of useless restrictions like you cannot bring outside food and drinks '}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "The property was very big, but the maintenance was so poor! I felt really sad while staying at this hotel. No matter how hard the staff tried to soothe the boarders, the hotel needs a thorough renovation.

The rooms did not have TVs...
The hot water was available only for 2 hours in the morning...
The in-house restaurant was inadequate for food options, but the taste was good :)....

Other than the excellent location, I did not find, sadly, any other points that could help me to come back to the cottages. 

Once again, so great a location and so big a property, so poorly maintained.....

It's a loss! "}, {'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Worst place ever been in life‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'First of all Agoda is a trap...once you are in there is no coming back. Whatever shown in photos are complete lie. No TV, No WiFi, No Hot water, No food, No clean linens. Next opt No to Agoda...will put review and photos in Google as well. '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice place‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good staff'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Cottage is not good as it describe‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Cottages is not so good. Photo on online was too old. The place was not as it describes. Wifi only in reception. No TV. No dust bin. Fan speed too slow. AC only on / off button works. Also bathroom was treble. Need to change toilet sit.'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Worst experience ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Worst staff
Poor cleaning
No swimming pool, but in booking they mentioned swimming pool.
No bathtub üõÅ, in booking mentioned bolathtub.
Staff behavior weired.
'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Good hotel near the colva beach‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'This is very nice location hotel. All shops and Restaurants are nearby in 500m and beach is also 500m also very good place to stay '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Recommended‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good manager and support people.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very good hotel.
Near to beach.'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Just OK!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "If you don't find any good hotel, then it is ok to stay here. Food is very costly. Presently restaurant is temporarily closed. Location is not so far from Colva beach. "}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Colva blued‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'First in house restaurant is not there. Also bathroom needs updating. Room was also stinking as not used for a while '}, {'Review_Rating': '4.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very bad place. Not recommended‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Had  booked the Superior room for my parents, was quite affordable but they left the hotel without checking in. AC was not working, bad smell in the room (probably not opened for many days), no toilet seat, unclean washroom, broken basin, etc. They could not even shift my parents to another room as the hotel was fully booked (no idea about the conditions of the other rooms). Would not recommend unless these issues are solved (Based solely on the room seen). 

However the hotel Manager Mr. Saji Jose was very hospitable and tried to help my parents in the best way he could.'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'best place at colva beach'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'noone was cleaning the room unless checkout'}], 'price': '2,200', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/109532/-1/f41dec3273f4c874581888e9217abcee.jpg?ca=0&ce=1&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '12m¬≤', 'amenities': [], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/graciano-cottages/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&tspTypes=2&los=1&searchrequestid=4d306e74-6b82-4fa4-a298-ebaf60456655'}

details: {'Location': 'Shalom Indus Residency, 1 Bamon Vaddo, Candolim, Goa, Candolim, Goa, India, 403515', 'overall_rating': '6.4', 'Name': 'Good Stays', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Go for this option only if you are desperate to visit North Goa‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Building needs big time maintenance as it's a very basic interior set up. Strange smell in the room, I assume the lenins are changed only once they bare stains from 10+ visitors, broken door handles, washroom is huge but needs basic accessories, pool is to wash vessels/mostly used by house keeping staff, you'll find tobacco/pan stains almost everywhere in the property, owners number mentioned in agoda's email is always switched off. Overall ratings 1.8/5 for the location. "}, {'Review_Rating': '4.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Mixed Experience ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The rooms were not as per hotel standards, however the food was amazing. They need to improve a lot and invest in their property to make it livable.'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good can be better‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Rooms are spacious and modern bathroom but room allocated to us had some spider nest on wall...Sink water was not clearing quickly...\n\nSuggestions to hotel is to repaint the room with some colourful wallpapers ...Mirror in the room is recommended..Can't use bathroom mirror all the time."}], 'price': '2,237', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/34243553/0/4fb2857abc42d44f693aca074e7e4054.jpg?ce=0&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '20m¬≤', 'amenities': ['Free Wi-Fi', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Air conditioning'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/good-stays/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&los=1&searchrequestid=4d306e74-6b82-4fa4-a298-ebaf60456655'}

Apart from the location everything is pathetic about this place.. Staff.. facilities.. hospitality.  Stay away from this place !!!!!!!!! '}]

Friendly and very cooperative staff.'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'More of a Guest House‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It is more of a guest house, with AC, Balcony, refrigerator & kettle in it. 
Breakfast is super & is like home made food. 
Will recommend for solo travellers with  tight budget. 
Beach is just 5min walk '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'best at price‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'nice staff cooperation, best at location, all things good and will suggest to other to stay.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Centrally Located‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Main road facing and close to all major eateries and clubs in Goa. The staff is very helpful and would go out of their way to make things easier for you. 

My only suggestion is to place a wiper in all bathrooms. '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Value for money paid Rs.890‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "The best part was the two people in the reception who were extremely sensitive to the traveler's needs and well behaved.
The rooms were clean and good for couples as well (remember what you are paying). As far as I understand this area of Goa this is a decent room for upto 1000 per night."}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Not happy‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Okay for travelers on tight budget. Bed sheets were not clean, AC doesn't work properly we checked 2 different rooms. Bathrooms are clean but very stinky.. probably from outside.

Okay for boys, ladies won't like it for sure."}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Staff are very friendly and helpful, couldn‚Äôt do enough for us . The only con I would say is that they have karaoke on Fridays Sundays and Tuesdays , so if your staying in a room on the side of the bar next door then you won‚Äôt be getting any sleep untill that‚Äôs finished around 12am . Food was good. '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Go for the 2nd building‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The location is at center of Candolim and Baga and very close to the Calangute Beach'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Good place‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Clean, accessible, reasonable, value for price. Food ordered in is very nice. Breakfast was ok ok. But I would suggest to opt to explore different breakfast locally. '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nice hotel'}, {'Review_Rating': '4.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Worst option‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Lies before entering the hotel.. asked that the pool is working.. receptionist said no.. pool is not operational in whole goa. But seen hotels have opened their pool and people are enjoying it'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Not a good place to stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The rooms are too dull and old.  No fun in staying there it is just boring. Overpriced you get better options on the same budget.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Good location and rooms near Calangute beach‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Advantage is lot of food options near by, Calangute, Baga and 2 more beaches nearby and Agoda Fort also.'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Good But Laid Back Staff‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Hotel & Location are good but they had huge load and less staff. Swimming Pool was not clean on time, etc. etc. 
They should give extra care for families with young children & toddlers.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'In the heart of Calangute and very thing near by‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Hotel Calangute Towers is located just in the heart of the Calangute. Everything is near like beach, shopping area, clubs, bar, wine shops, taxi stand, bus stand. 

Though it located in market area but it best. Vibharthi at reception is very helpful and very quick for service. 

This hotels rooms are well equipped with AC, TV, Mini Bar with Beer, Whisky, Vodka and Cold Drinks. They give you complimentary 2 Water Bottles daily,  1 Red Wine, Dental Kit, Hair Dryer, Iron. Apart from this lien quality was superb and very comfortable. Swimming was clean with bar, Sunbed and Child Pool. This is safe place for family and couples with very good security staff. 

It has lovey restaurant with multi cuisine and Local Goan Food. 

I will surely next time if i will be in Goa again. '}, {'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Worst hotel till date I stayed in. ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Seriously it's the worst of all the hotel I stayed in my life. Plz don't go there and waste your money. "}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good hotel and facilities‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good things are swimming pool,breakfast, cleanliness,staffs'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'I paid for the room in advance but they charged 2000 extra for my kids‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "It is not even a two star hotel and charging five star rates with minimum facilities.Even the lift in the hotel doesn't work and we were given room on 3rd floor.Staff and the manager are not cooperating at all."}, {'Review_Rating': '2.4', 'Review_Heading': 'I reached there at midnight  but they had‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "not aware about my reservation. To use their swimming pool they charges money. I didn't  get upper room as per my requirement"}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'value for money  breakfast was very good  and staff was excellant.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'A memorable stay . Strong recommended to others. ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Hotel is located 15 min walking distance from calanguate beach. Distance from Airport is about 55 mins and pre paid taxi takes approx Rs 1220 for AC fare.Also bikes are easily available for Rs 300 per day. Petrol expense are on us which is Rs 60 per litre. Bang opposite to hotel is KFC and just 5 min walking there are couple of pure veg hotels. Also dominos is available.

Hotel breakfast is as per AP and has some variety of south indian dishes and juices fruits  which changes every day. Taste wise its good.

Hotel staff are also very generous helpful and friendly. Also swimming pool is cleaned daily. But also pool is directly under trees one will find few leaves, bugs , flowers etc in water. except this all seemed well.

Finally, my suggestion in case if you are planning to stay here. please stay. ingore all other bad reviews. i was there from 22 Nov till 25 Nov 16. Also rooms very clean n toilets too clean. with basic facilities like hair dryer, fridge tea coffee maker  tea coffee whiter bags etc'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Decent place for staying in Goa ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Location is perfect for trip to North Goa. '}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Good stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We stayed at this hotel for 3 days. The hotel is pretty close to the beach and other restaurants. It takes about 10-15 mins walking to Calangute beach as there is lot of traffic so make sure you have your own vehicle or rent a car/ bike as cabs charge a high price. The hotel has a shuttle to the beach but we didn‚Äôt know as we had to inform an hour in advance. In all we had a comfortable stay and would give it a 3 star rating for the following.

Pros:
‚Ä¢	We booked a deluxe room which was quite spacious and clean.
‚Ä¢	The beds had clean sheets and they were changed every alternate day.
‚Ä¢	Bathroom was clean and hot water was available at any time.
‚Ä¢	AC was in a good working condition.
‚Ä¢	Food ordered via room service was good in quantity and taste, though a bit highly priced.
‚Ä¢	Wifi connection was good. Make sure you ask details at the reception as they don‚Äôt provide it otherwise.
‚Ä¢	They cleaned the room on a daily basis. They also changed the towels and kept two bottles of water.
‚Ä¢	There was a mini fridge and tea kettle in the room.
‚Ä¢	Reception was courteous and staff was polite.

Cons:
‚Ä¢	Few taps in the bathroom was leaking so it was always wet. 
‚Ä¢	The power sockets were far from the bed and also had loose connection.
‚Ä¢	TV was small and far from the bed.
‚Ä¢	They don‚Äôt have bells outside the room so people have to knock on the door.
‚Ä¢	We got a room in the old wing of the hotel where there was some repair work going on so there was disturbance.
‚Ä¢	They have a pick up and drop facility from the airport for Rs. 3000 for both ways on a sharing basis which is more expensive than the cabs. We got cab which is just outside the hotel Rs. 2600 approx both ways.
'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Not good hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Location is far from main market. Food was not good.  Toilet were dirty. Room was not good. Every thing was bad. Worst experience '}], 'price': '4,320', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/175361/-1/0b27622939916eb739d53ada233c2d67.jpg?ca=14&ce=1&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '23m¬≤', 'amenities': ['Outdoor view', 'Balcony/terrace', 'Shower', 'Shared bathroom', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Additional toilet', 'Cleaning products', 'Hair dryer', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Walk-in shower', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Pool facilities', 'Satellite/cable channels', 'Telephone', 'Air conditioning', 'Daily newspaper', 'Fan', 'Linens', 'Sleep comfort items', 'Wake-up service', 'Alcohol', 'Coffee/tea maker', 'Free bottled water', 'Fruits/snacks', 'Mini bar', 'Wine glasses', 'Desk', 'Outdoor furniture', 'Seating area', 'Separate dining area', 'Tile/marble flooring', 'Trash cans', 'Wooden/parqueted flooring', 'Closet', 'Clothes dryer', 'Clothes rack', 'Trouser press', 'Accessible by elevator', 'Accessible by stairs', 'Fire extinguisher', 'In-room safe box', 'Locker', 'Safety/security feature', 'Smoke detector'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/hotel-calangute-tower/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&tspTypes=2&los=1&searchrequestid=4d306e74-6b82-4fa4-a298-ebaf60456655'}

It has lovey restaurant with multi cuisine and Local Goan Food. 

I will surely next time if i will be in Goa again. '}, {'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Worst hotel till date I stayed in. ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Seriously it's the worst of all the hotel I stayed in my life. Plz don't go there and waste your money. "}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good hotel and facilities‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good things are swimming pool,breakfast, cleanliness,staffs'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'I paid for the room in advance but they charged 2000 extra for my kids‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "It is not even a two star hotel and charging five star rates with minimum facilities.Even the lift in the hotel doesn't work and we were given room on 3rd floor.Staff and the manager are not cooperating at all."}, {'Review_Rating': '2.4', 'Review_Heading': 'I reached there at midnight  but they had‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "not aware about my reservation. To use their swimming pool they charges money. I didn't  get upper room as per my requirement"}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'value for money  breakfast was very good  and staff was excellant.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'A memorable stay . Strong recommended to others. ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Hotel is located 15 min walking distance from calanguate beach. Distance from Airport is about 55 mins and pre paid taxi takes approx Rs 1220 for AC fare.Also bikes are easily available for Rs 300 per day. Petrol expense are on us which is Rs 60 per litre. Bang opposite to hotel is KFC and just 5 min walking there are couple of pure veg hotels. Also dominos is available.

Hotel breakfast is as per AP and has some variety of south indian dishes and juices fruits  which changes every day. Taste wise its good.

Hotel staff are also very generous helpful and friendly. Also swimming pool is cleaned daily. But also pool is directly under trees one will find few leaves, bugs , flowers etc in water. except this all seemed well.

Finally, my suggestion in case if you are planning to stay here. please stay. ingore all other bad reviews. i was there from 22 Nov till 25 Nov 16. Also rooms very clean n toilets too clean. with basic facilities like hair dryer, fridge tea coffee maker  tea coffee whiter bags etc'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Decent place for staying in Goa ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Location is perfect for trip to North Goa. '}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Good stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We stayed at this hotel for 3 days. The hotel is pretty close to the beach and other restaurants. It takes about 10-15 mins walking to Calangute beach as there is lot of traffic so make sure you have your own vehicle or rent a car/ bike as cabs charge a high price. The hotel has a shuttle to the beach but we didn‚Äôt know as we had to inform an hour in advance. In all we had a comfortable stay and would give it a 3 star rating for the following.

Pros:
‚Ä¢	We booked a deluxe room which was quite spacious and clean.
‚Ä¢	The beds had clean sheets and they were changed every alternate day.
‚Ä¢	Bathroom was clean and hot water was available at any time.
‚Ä¢	AC was in a good working condition.
‚Ä¢	Food ordered via room service was good in quantity and taste, though a bit highly priced.
‚Ä¢	Wifi connection was good. Make sure you ask details at the reception as they don‚Äôt provide it otherwise.
‚Ä¢	They cleaned the room on a daily basis. They also changed the towels and kept two bottles of water.
‚Ä¢	There was a mini fridge and tea kettle in the room.
‚Ä¢	Reception was courteous and staff was polite.

Cons:
‚Ä¢	Few taps in the bathroom was leaking so it was always wet. 
‚Ä¢	The power sockets were far from the bed and also had loose connection.
‚Ä¢	TV was small and far from the bed.
‚Ä¢	They don‚Äôt have bells outside the room so people have to knock on the door.
‚Ä¢	We got a room in the old wing of the hotel where there was some repair work going on so there was disturbance.
‚Ä¢	They have a pick up and drop facility from the airport for Rs. 3000 for both ways on a sharing basis which is more expensive than the cabs. We got cab which is just outside the hotel Rs. 2600 approx both ways.
'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Not good hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Location is far from main market. Food was not good.  Toilet were dirty. Room was not good. Every thing was bad. Worst experience '}]

details:
{'Location': '5, near Miramar Beach, St. Marry Colony, Panaji, Goa, India', 'overall_rating': '7.3', 'Name': 'OYO 9517 Hotel Sunheads', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nice '}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Booking confirmed but no room were available‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I had confirmation but no rooms were available for agoda'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Perfect place+budget friendly hotel to stay near panjim/miramar location....specially when your on official trip '}, {'Review_Rating': '4.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Decoacroaching needs to be done for rooms..breakfast was far below par‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The restaurant was not operational and the same was not informed on the website...so no meals could be ordered or had in the hotel...the breakfast was brought from outside and was piss poor.....the rooms need more cleanliness in terms of better quality and clean linen and decoacroaching.....hot water facility was not available in the bathroom.....Oyo needs to review their hotels on a serious note...'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Good service‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Hotel Sunheads delivers everything that it promises..big spacious room, walking distance from miramar beach, peaceful surroundings. .Good experience. .thanks'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Staff knocks on the door at 3am, and then rings the phone‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "First room that we received was full of mildew, we asked for another and received one that only the curtains and bathroom was with visible mold.  The smell was masked at first with perfume but consisted throughot the stay.
Dust was also everywhere.
I also don't know why the staff decided to knock on the door in the middle of the night and after that ring the phone.
Area of hotel is nice and quiet, but I would choose another hotel."}], 'price': '2,670', 'img_link': 'https://q-xx.bstatic.com/xdata/images/hotel/840x460/327009590.jpg?k=2afe5bc01012aa74c8e31e552dd8561fbeaa48df698c1bfd0c829f1d2566fc7f&o=', 'room_size': '0', 'amenities': ['Free Wi-Fi', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Air conditioning'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/oyo-9517-hotel-sunheads_2/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&tspTypes=2&los=1&searchrequestid=4d306e74-6b82-4fa4-a298-ebaf60456655'}

details: {'Location': 'Agonda Beach Road Agonda, Agonda, Goa, India, 403702', 'overall_rating': '9.2', 'Name': 'Sea 2000 Resort', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'lovely family nice clean rooms convenient to all amenities‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'the position close to beach with plenty of places to eat close by'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Best Homestay at reasonable price‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'It was a pleasant stay for 3 nights... At walking distance from Arambol Beach and some good restaurants'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Great hotel, great staff, everything was very pleasant.'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.0', 'Review_Heading': 'We banged the Goa trip at 1 st visit itself‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Teremok Hotel is simple and budget hotel in prime location in Aarambol Beach.
2 min walk from the hotel and they have their own beach restaurant in the beach and the customer can use those fecilities with free of cost (not compelling to have the restaurant food)

I want to specifically mentioned about Harish who is the manager of that hotel, The guy is very co operative and friendly. 

I am the 1 st time visitor to Goa and I approched him to guide me to enjoy the place, he guided us so nicely and he understood us what ever we were looking for and we enjoyed to the core

In 2 night stay , I almost talk to Harish 2 hours a day to know and explore the place . He is calmly replied with all best option to enjoy. We really enjoyed the place 

If i visit Goa next time, Teremok is my 1 st preference and Harish is the only reason for that. Thanks to Harish

We had fun in Goa in all perspect'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Best place in Arambol‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Location is very good, and overally I had really good time in this place, room was very good and clean, stuff is very welcoming and friendly. 5‚òÜ, I would highly recommend to stay in this place!'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'It was an awesome experience well behaved staff amazing food home like environment value for money overall a very beauti‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Neat and clean environment yummy food well behaved well cultured cooperative staff üëçüèªüòç'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Absolutely outstanding hotel perfectly located. 2 mins walk for beach. It was my friend birthday during our stay, which we had not mentioned, but they obviously saw that at the check in. It was a lovely suprise when they managed the cake in the room! {'Location': 'Panjim City, Panaji, Goa, India, 403001', 'overall_rating': '7.6', 'Name': 'Treehouse Neptune', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '4.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nothing there not even room service or anything '}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Not recommended ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Not worth 4k... They didn't provided parking even though it was confirmed in booking.breakfast was tasteless.. balcony is very small and hot air from ac exhaust is coming directly on face .. it took 20 mins to get luggage in room.. no other facilities... "}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'No Facilities‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Restaurant is closed even no tea facility in room, Room not cleaned, furniture is also durty and disabled. If teriff is Rs. 800 to 1000 than ok'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Ok..‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Not bad but didn't feels like we are staying 4 star, room was not clean properly spider webs was there on top of the mirror and the room was not looks like the same we saw in the picture... But like the location very much... "}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Best experience‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very good location '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Unprofessional staff‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I booked this stay for three members of my family. When we checked-in, the room only had bed for 2 people. 
On enquiring about it, they put a mattress on the floor.
When asked for bed, they said they don‚Äôt have beds. 
And then they didn‚Äôt even provide blankets. On further requests they managed to get a blanket. 
Read ‚Äúrequests‚Äù as heated debates.
Won‚Äôt recommend to anyone else and won‚Äôt stay again. '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Surprised positively‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Pros - walking distance to casinos and river area, nice location (safe, clean, convenient). Overall pretty decent value for money as for a reasonable price one gets - spacious room, decent location, quiet rooms, nice smiling staff. 
Cons - nothing much to say really. small niggle - rooms can be maintained better especially the electrical plugs. '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good location . Okay facility for short stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Pro good location
Con so so food. Cleanliness'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'I did my booking in Treehouse neptune but the hotel gave me a booking in Treehouse neptune inn‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I made my booking in the Treehouse neptune for 2 nights but when i reached the hotel they told me me as you have paid less amount (5500 for 2 nights) so we can give you in this hotel , we have another hotel Treehouse neptune inn we will give you in that hotel '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Best stay option in Panaji‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'This is one of the best stay options in Panaji which is at drive away distance for many nearby attractions. Hotel staff were very hospitable and the rooms were very clean. I would recommend this stay.'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Centre of Panjim‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Loacation is good. 
Room service has fixed menu but taste is good.
Breakfast has limited option , no live counter.
Staffs are very good. '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Very helpful staff. Room cleaned reguallary,. Highly recommended ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Would be good if has a gym, but there was a spa in the same hotel. '}, {'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Acceptable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "We had booked the hotel for 13th June to 14th June, we could not make it as there was a death in the family, but we didn't receive any reminder call or any other call from the hotel."}, {'Review_Rating': '4.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Average Stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'In photos this hotel looks very good. But in actual this is average hotel.
 Location is in market place with shops on ground floor which is not good when you go to beach destination. In off season you can get much better hotels in same budget. '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "they don't have car parking. if you go in car bit tough especially on working days"}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Above average‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'i booked a street facing room and instead was given a garbage bins facing room. The display photographs show nice toilets with neatly rolled towels, unfortunately no hand towels were there in toilets. not at all value for money'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Smashing new hotel ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Great Staff and nice location.Well worth a look'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Hotel is good & clean inside. Outside around hotel is not impressive.Staff is very nice & helpful.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Every thing else is good except for some noice of people, door banging which disturbs the sleep during the mid night.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We stayed at Treehouse Neptune for 3 nights from November 13 to 16. Overall, it was a comfortable and pleasant stay. Mostly because the hotel staff were friendly and helpful In particular, i would like to mention the reception staff Helan and Pranab were very good and Dhiraj, who served at breakfast was very attentive to our needs.
Regarding the room, it was a little small and could have been better with some closet space and drawers. Also, the bathroom needed an absorbent foot mat. Other than that, the room was comfortable. 
Easy access to restaurants and shopping.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Clean & comforable‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Staff are friendly and helpful. Location close to Marine Dr and easy walking to other areas.'}], 'price': '7,438', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/112/1122555/1122555_20030617220089128692.jpg?ca=10&ce=1&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '25m¬≤', 'amenities': ['City view', 'Balcony/terrace', 'Smoking allowed', 'Shower', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Satellite/cable channels', 'Telephone', 'Air conditioning', 'Blackout curtains', 'Daily newspaper', 'Fan', 'Linens', 'Wake-up service', 'Coffee/tea maker', 'Free bottled water', 'Mini bar', 'Refrigerator', 'Desk', 'Seating area', 'Closet', 'Clothes rack', 'Ironing facilities', 'In-room safe box', 'Locker'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/treehouse-neptune/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&tspTypes=4&los=1&searchrequestid=6d8a25cf-5b75-4d54-8c1e-a7f622e52ff7'}

details:
{'Location': 'CALANGUTE BAGA ROAD, KHOBRA VADDO ,BARDEZ,NORTH-GOA, Baga, Goa, India, 403516', 'overall_rating': 'Select your room', 'Name': 'HOTEL VIVA BAGA', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good Stay Near Baga Beach‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'A good stay near baga beach for family, was a bit heavily priced and the hotel did not had lift. Though the staff was friendly and the room service guys was helpful but I guess they had full hotel booked and hence there was a delay in the service with only a limited staff. We went there during the 26th Jan weekend and It charged a whooping 5K/night, overall room service was poor with basic free water bottles not been provided in the room and no bedsheets were changed. We stayed there for 2 nights for 2 rooms and had to shell around 22K. Would recommended to visit during non holiday season it should not cost more than 2K/night. I have stayed in Goa for 5-6K/night rooms with great room, good pool, inhouse restaurant and service. I would rate it 3/5 just because the owner was a good guy and so were the staff.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Reasonable Price Best In Hotel ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Rooms were Big Decorative Vry Gud Clean Bathroom were Appropriate Clean.
Bt I Dindt Like Check out time is vry Earlier 
10 AM and Take Extra Money for Late Check Out.
No Restaurant no canteen No Tea.'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': "Don't stay ‚Äù", 'Review_Body': "Hotel staff very rude and not helpful.. didn't service any extra things..no water they given.. other wise room condition is okay..."}, {'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Low amenities‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very highly priced for the '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Good place to stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good location, quiet rooms, good hot water and staff are friendly........ front desk manager even arranged taxi to airport and cost less then taxi on the street......... overall good 3 night stay'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good budget hotel ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nice budget hotel. The owner and staff were very friendly and rooms were large and comfortable. 

The location is close to bars, restaurants, shops and the beach. '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice place‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Good place to stay. Not on the beach, but a very reasonable walk to the beach and main tourist street.  Staff was very helpful arranging tours, bus tickets, and taxi's."}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Decent budget stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Good sized room with AC. Decent budget hotel. Receptionist doesn't really speak English, but the owner(?) was very nice and helpful. Airport taxi was 1500 Rs.  You can probably get cheaper."}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Pleasantly surprised modern, clean friendly staff ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Everything was great but could of had a pool and offered breakfast overal happy '}], 'price': '2,872', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/119/1195672/1195672_19012617200071716283.jpg?ca=7&ce=1&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '10m¬≤', 'amenities': ['2 single beds', 'Non-smoking', 'Shower', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Towels', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Satellite/cable channels', 'Telephone', 'Air conditioning', 'Fan'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/hotel-viva-baga/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&los=1&searchrequestid=6d8a25cf-5b75-4d54-8c1e-a7f622e52ff7'}

Name: HOTEL VIVA BAGA
reviews:
[{'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good Stay Near Baga Beach‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'A good stay near baga beach for family, was a bit heavily priced and the hotel did not had lift. Though the staff was friendly and the room service guys was helpful but I guess they had full hotel booked and hence there was a delay in the service with only a limited staff. We went there during the 26th Jan weekend and It charged a whooping 5K/night, overall room service was poor with basic free water bottles not been provided in the room and no bedsheets were changed. We stayed there for 2 nights for 2 rooms and had to shell around 22K. Would recommended to visit during non holiday season it should not cost more than 2K/night. I have stayed in Goa for 5-6K/night rooms with great room, good pool, inhouse restaurant and service. I would rate it 3/5 just because the owner was a good guy and so were the staff.'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Reasonable Price Best In Hotel ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Rooms were Big Decorative Vry Gud Clean Bathroom were Appropriate Clean.
Bt I Dindt Like Check out time is vry Earlier 
10 AM and Take Extra Money for Late Check Out.
No Restaurant no canteen No Tea.'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': "Don't stay ‚Äù", 'Review_Body': "Hotel staff very rude and not helpful.. didn't service any extra things..no water they given.. other wise room condition is okay..."}, {'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Low amenities‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very highly priced for the '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Good place to stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good location, quiet rooms, good hot water and staff are friendly........ front desk manager even arranged taxi to airport and cost less then taxi on the street......... overall good 3 night stay'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good budget hotel ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Nice budget hotel. The owner and staff were very friendly and rooms were large and comfortable. 

The location is close to bars, restaurants, shops and the beach. '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Nice place‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Good place to stay. Not on the beach, but a very reasonable walk to the beach and main tourist street.  Staff was very helpful arranging tours, bus tickets, and taxi's."}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Decent budget stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Good sized room with AC. Decent budget hotel. Receptionist doesn't really speak English, but the owner(?) was very nice and helpful. Airport taxi was 1500 Rs.  You can probably get cheaper."}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Pleasantly surprised modern, clean friendly staff ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Everything was great but could of had a pool and offered breakfast overal happy '}]

details: {'Location': '518 A Waddy, Opp Dona Alcina Resort Candolim, North Goa, Candolim, Goa, India, 403515', 'overall_rating': '8.9', 'Name': 'Time & Leisure Hotels', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Everything was fine location excellent'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Simple and comfortable place near the beach‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Simple and comfortable hotel in a decent location. details: {'Location': 'E-212 31st January Road,, Panaji, Goa, India, 403001', 'overall_rating': '8.7', 'Name': 'WelcomHeritage Panjim Pousada Hotel', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Excellent staff very friendly and helpful, good position for Portuguese area and waterside for river cruises. '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Historical‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "This place is just so historical. From chairs and tables in dining room to beds and mirror in our room, everything is antique. The only thing what doesn't fit are the bathrooms which don't fit the standard of the rest of the place. But the receptionists are just so sweet and everyone is just helpful and nice."}, {'Review_Rating': '8.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Very good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'very nice and smart hotel ...our room where in a ...art gallery !!!typical room as in english colony .so amazing .i recommend this hotel '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Quaint, clean place in itself but...‚Äù', 'Review_Body': '....but: though it is in a run down area of Panjim, not comparable to Pulau Penang, Malacca...Goa is going through a rough period, bit dilapidated, dirt and old cars, motor cycles everywhere and every nice house has nearly a vacated ruin next to it! The 3 wings in itself are great. Rooms are spacious and have a lot of character and antique style. Food is good, buffet breakfast was one day superb with cottage and cheese scrambled egg! Coffee is Nescafe. For me that is a no go, in any place of that class. The staff are very helpful and the owner with hat is a legend and distills his own fenny, a local liquor! Even after several reminders the wifi issue was not resolved till the last day. The bed sheets were always dirty and also the pillow covers. Breakfast did not have variety & the menus was repeated on every alternate day. Also both our rooms have major issue of red ants in the balcony and in the room. They make up rules that are not mentioned anywhere on their policy list. ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'This is not a hotel. Its a modified villa with staff working from 9-6. If there‚Äôs any issue after that time there is no one available except one security gaurd who has no clue about anything. The most aggressive and stubborn of the staff is Gauri, she wouldn‚Äôt even give me her full name to lodge a complaint stating we aren‚Äôt authorized to give our name to anyone. '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.8', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very nice place to stay! But if you want to the beach you have to rent a bike. Stuff is very gentle and carry. '}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent property to stay although it is little far from centre of the Goa. ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Dressing table is something which is definitely missed here & had to rely on wash besin mirror. "}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional but not in a beach ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'This place is exceptionally clean, rooms are exceptionally large (60sqm), balconies have beautiful views of greenery, staff are decent; however, this property is not near a beach and they strangely serve curries in the breakfast.'}, {'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Pathetic to say the least‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'complete trap hotel, do not even have cupboards in room, I had booked a luxury room & they provided me a regular delux room. details:
{'Location': 'H.No.364/2, Madhlawada Near Main Arambol Bus Stop, Arambol, Goa, India, 403524', 'overall_rating': '8.6', 'Name': 'Aaria Residency', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Oasis of Calm!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I am so terribly grateful to Mr. Manjit and the staff at Aaria for helping me at a terrible time: I got out of the taxi in Arambol, two hours out of the Goa airport, and discovered I had left my passport on the plane! Mr Manjit went out of his way to call people and get forms ready and offer advice, in a way that helped me out myself back together again. As for the hotel, it is spotless, quiet, beautifully situated and eith comfortable huge rooms - no small rarity in Arambol!'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Sevice is great'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The rooms were big and enough for all our luggage.
The cafe next to the hotel was amazing and comfortable to eat and drink there in the evening'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Superb‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Property was clean and rooms were neatly set.
Food quality was good.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Superb‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Staff was perfect,specialy Manager Mangit was very helpful,give us many usefull information,hotel is within 15 mintues of Arambol beach, its kinda commercial beach with lot of good resturant,you can swim and relax at beach. Next you can find lake that has amazing view.around of hotel there are many shops that you can find all type of fruites and local food.traffic is horrible! So its better rent a bike and see other nearby beaches.you can find some cafes for night life activity with live music.for ordering food even you tell NO SPICY , you will get spicy :). Arambol was reasonbly Safe, other beaches also safe and more local culture.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Best place to stay and relax‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I really appreciate the owner Manjeet and his executive, all are so cooperative, bliv me if u want to enjoy the nature,this is the right place to stay'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Pool & cleanliness.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'fantastic holidays spent at Aaria‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Amazing stayed at Aaria.up to mark hospitality by hotel.all was wonderful experinence to stayed at Aaria.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Awsome stay‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "well maintained..specially this time,when is moonsoon.room was so cleaned and specious,warmed welcome by Aaria's Team."}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Everything about the place'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Their staff are very helpful and kind'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'value for money‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Staff is nice and warm, the property is also very decent'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Great value for money. Room is generally clean, clean towels provided. Could do better with cleaning the sofa and some corners. Cafe Mish is really good - try their breakfast platter.'}, {'Review_Rating': '7.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good budget hotel in central location‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The apartment is spacious and very clean. The location is ideal as it‚Äôs away from the busy Main Street and within 10 minutes walking distance to the beach. The food is incredibly good with simple options to choose from and the cafe staff are really helpful and pleasant.'}, {'Review_Rating': '1.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Bad‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Good location if you're just for the stay only.
Not for Vegetarians. Never."}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Not great, not terrible. The price is too high for the service you get.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Rooms are cosy, good furniture, bed and sheets. Restroom is also comfortable(except hot water problems). Hotel itself is in a quiet place, bot close to the bus stand and all infrastructure. There is a swimming pool.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Facilities'}, {'Review_Rating': '1.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Not a value proposition‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Id proof had to be surrendered'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Its nice.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Clean rooms and cordial staff. The property is small, but its in a quiet place. If you like to wake up to the sounds of church bells and cock crows - look no further.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The staff, service and food'}], 'price': '5,250', 'img_link': 'https://q-xx.bstatic.com/xdata/images/hotel/840x460/234255922.jpg?k=629315f8b1c69e49bc417e0bb61ff2e9456a7c57c8d23547b0bb8cd83e3ff05b&o=', 'room_size': '14m¬≤', 'amenities': ['Outdoor view', 'Shower', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Roll-in shower', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Walk-in shower', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Satellite/cable channels', 'Air conditioning', 'Alarm clock', 'Fan', 'Hand sanitizer', 'Linens', 'Mosquito net', 'Private entrance', 'Sleep comfort items', 'Soundproofing', 'Wake-up service', 'Free bottled water', 'Wine glasses', 'Desk', 'Interconnecting room(s) available', 'Tile/marble flooring', 'Trash cans', 'Clothes rack', 'Fire extinguisher', 'Individual air conditioning', 'In-room safe box', 'Locker', 'Safety/security feature', 'Smoke detector'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/aaria-residency/hotel/all/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&los=1&searchrequestid=1346aa35-d925-491d-90a0-5fd8f464715f'}
