details:
{'Location': '528/1,Big Vagator Bardez,North Goa, Vagator, Goa, India, 403509', 'overall_rating': '8.6', 'Name': 'Royalstar Resort', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '1.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Pathetic‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Very pathetic'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Met some great people and overall it was one of the best stays I have had in Goa. Would definitely recommend this place‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The property location couldn‚Äôt get better, it is very close to the beach, chapora fort, restaurants, bars, clubs etc. 

The owner, is the very best, full of life/ happy go lucky and he went above and beyond to make my stay comfortable as a female solo traveller and was very accommodating.

The place has a dormitory option as well as cottages and both are value for money. The pool was clean and you can also rent a bike here. 

It is a well rounded place at a great price with great people. 10/10 for me.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Beautiful place with great stuff‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Very nice, helpful and professional staff. You can also rent bike and they will arrange taxi for airport.

The place is beautiful and peaceful and just 10 min walk to the beach. It has a very natural touch. I even saw a peacock. 

Rooms are spacious and have a closet and good mattress. The are parties going on around Vagator, but here you'll manage to have a good sleep. Nighttime there was a watchman. 

The pool is very clean but I would need an umbrella also.
I had amazing time here and will definitely come back again."}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "It's very quite and clam place to stay. Good owner and good staffs. Very beautiful place üòçüòçüòç"}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Excellent property  and good management üëç üëå‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I really like Royal  star resort because  of green beautiful  garden and clean swimming pool. I would  definitely  will come back again  to stay in this resort'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': '10 von 10 danke‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'War alles bestens. details:
{'Location': 'Titos Lane 2, Calangute, Saunta Vadda, Baga, Baga, Goa, India', 'overall_rating': '6.1', 'Name': 'OYO Flagship 6956 Hotel Joaquim', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '2.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Rude staff ...no car parking...‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Rude Staff....No Car Parking....Bad rooms'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'It is Worthy it‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We can visit again it is very clean and neet. We cannot say it is bad.. it is near to the beach also.. coming to service non of them are come to you untill unless you have to go reception and tell something... Receptionist also not like the people who come from Agoda app.. I saw that overall it is fine to visit.'}, {'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Only book when it on offer‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Staff no response, no cleaning, no towels, soaps. Book only when offers discount, no extra bed provided for 3rd person, then only worth to book, Location is good, delux Rooms are good spacious. '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Staff is very good specially recipient totally very good but we book hotel with breakfast so dnt add breakfast in booking '}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Love it because of location‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'All is good'}, {'Review_Rating': '2.8', 'Review_Heading': 'WORST place in Goa‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "There were many serious problems with this so-called hotel (Previous name: Joaquim Guest House!):
1. The behavior of staff, especially the receptionists was terrible. The atmosphere was scary as everyone stared at us. They were not welcoming, friendly or even helpful.  The only time I saw a smile was the time we were checking out and they were looking for a tip! 
2. Hygiene. We stayed there for 5 nights. The first 2 nights we stayed in a room on the back of the guest house. The WC was a real disaster. The tiles and sink were too dirty and we couldn't touch anything. The bed sheet was a bit cleaner and tolerable.
3. Noise! The whole area was under construction and we weren't able to sleep after 9 am. There were many workers around our room. The view of the balcony was a brick wall by 2 meters distance AND under construction. The first night,  some Indian children were playing in the corridor around 5 am! so we called the reception but nobody answered. 
4. The TV didn't work."}], 'price': '1,175', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/5041412/-1/d2d7f6044209f4dfe8a4898d30289905.jpg?ca=8&ce=1&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '16m¬≤', 'amenities': ['Non-smoking', 'Shower', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Free Wi-Fi in all rooms!', 'Satellite/cable channels', 'Telephone', 'Air conditioning', 'Blackout curtains', 'Fan', 'Linens', 'Desk', 'Seating area', 'Closet', 'Fire extinguisher', 'First aid kit'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/oyo-6956-hotel-joaquim_2/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&tspTypes=-1&los=1&searchrequestid=1346aa35-d925-491d-90a0-5fd8f464715f'}

This is fraud.. Either by booking.com or the resort.'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Descent place‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Located right next to palolem beach.. hardly 1 min walk from sea shore. Decent place.. cleanly maintained..'}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Pleasant‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Staff were really good behaviour 
Don't expect luxuries in beach huts
AC ,hot water ,and perfect bed"}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'The ambience is great as well as the staff is very helpful.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Great place!‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Great huts very close to the beach, the location is just perfect! I wanted to do yoga and there is school right around the corner, so it was perfect for catching the early morning sessions. The hut was comfortable and clean, it had everything I needed and the staff was incredibly helpful, going above and beyond to make sure I was comfortable. {'Location': 'Umtavaddo, Bardez, Calangute, Goa, India, 403516', 'overall_rating': '6.7', 'Name': 'Olive Calangute Mira ‚Äì by Embassy Group', 'reviews': [{'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Loved it'}, {'Review_Rating': '8.4', 'Review_Heading': 'Well Maintained ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Near to Calangute beach'}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'I liked very much, the staffs are also very helpful. '}, {'Review_Rating': '9.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Exceptional‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good budget hotel'}, {'Review_Rating': '5.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Good ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Good '}, {'Review_Rating': '7.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Average hotel with prime location ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Dont keep very high expectations.. Hotel is not too good and not too bad. 
You will get what you paid for,  thats it.  Room size are big and Hotel is hardly 7-8 min walking distance from Calangute Beach '}, {'Review_Rating': '3.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Discusting hotel..Avoid at all costs !!! ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Beds filthy stained mattresses and pillows, dirty pool with rats running around during the day, staff rude and unhelpful, hotel needs condemning in my opinion. '}, {'Review_Rating': '3.2', 'Review_Heading': 'This photo of hotel is from years ago it has deteriorated and anything thats broken stays broken ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': ' my husband got seriously burnt when the hot shower tap flew off the wall flooding the room no one had the ability to help they sent the gardener up to help. Vomit in the sink toilet leaking rats running about  because food left out. Pillows mouldy and ripped . We spent the entire holiday with problems holiday was the worst due to trying to get things done they dont clean the rooms you have to ask . Then it still wasnt done. The manager just smirked . This was once a thomas cook hotel but they took it off their list i can see why it needs money spending on it and they havent . We never got breakfast offered  to us but i would not eat there if they had we never went in the pool it was dirty with rusty drains around it then when i saw a rat in it one night even that died in there . It just got fished out in the morning and left in a bucket. No hygiene at all. We wanted to leave but flights were expensive and we needed the money we had to spend whilst there so we were stuck prison wud bet'}, {'Review_Rating': '3.2', 'Review_Heading': 'This "hotel" is the absolute pits.!! ‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'This "hotel"is the pits and must be avoided at all costs, filthy rooms even the so called deluxe rooms, filthy stained mattresses and pillows  ignorant staff who just laughed in your face when you tried to make a complaint, the rooms shown in the ad are nothing like the ones you get, rats running around the swimming pool during the day and the pool was so filthy you couldn't even use it, felt more like a prison sentence than a holiday in this filthy dump..!!! couldn't wait to leave and as a result our holiday was completely ruined and tomorrow I will be seeking legal advice as this was blatant miss selling and we didn't get anything we were promised and what we paid for..!! '}, {'Review_Rating': '3.6', 'Review_Heading': 'Bad Facilities‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'We had booked the hotel for 4 nights and when we checked into a room we found the AC was not working but just blowing hot air.
We informed and checked but told us it is working. We waited for 4 hours and the situation did not change. We had to shout at them to give us another room.

This is not the kind of experience a traveller wants to have.'}], 'price': '1,500', 'img_link': 'https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/545302/404704543/172f990c005ff37e8da2b04b0c6b99d8.jpg?ce=0&s=1024x768', 'room_size': '18m¬≤', 'amenities': ['City view', 'Balcony/terrace', 'Non-smoking', 'Shower', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Mirror', 'Toiletries', 'Towels', 'Satellite/cable channels', 'Telephone', 'Wi-Fi [free]', 'Air conditioning', 'Blackout curtains', 'Fan', 'Linens', 'Sleep comfort items', 'Wake-up service', 'Free bottled water', 'Free welcome drink', 'Refrigerator', 'Desk', 'High floor', 'Tile/marble flooring', 'Trash cans', 'Window', 'Clothes rack', 'Accessible by stairs', 'Safety/security feature'], 'city': 'Goa', 'link': 'https://agoda.com/en-gb/hotel-mira/hotel/goa-in.html?finalPriceView=1&isShowMobileAppPrice=false&cid=1844104&numberOfBedrooms=&familyMode=false&adults=2&children=0&rooms=1&maxRooms=0&checkIn=2023-03-18&isCalendarCallout=false&childAges=&numberOfGuest=0&missingChildAges=false&travellerType=1&showReviewSubmissionEntry=false&currencyCode=INR&isFreeOccSearch=false&isCityHaveAsq=false&tspTypes=3&los=1&searchrequestid=1346aa35-d925-491d-90a0-5fd8f464715f'}

There were no complimentary water bottles provided, when asked, manager told, no resorts in Goa provide those, which is incorrect as we had shifted from another hotel to this one. In complimentary breakfast, choice was between omelette or poha, I chose omelette, it was served half omelette, and restaurant told it is being told by management. Coming to room, rooms are very bad, only twin beds available, no house keeping happened even when stayed for two days. Room phone is kept on floor, to call reception, we had to dial a mobile number via our mobile phone. Definitely the worst hotel, I have stayed in Goa in last 8 years.'}, {'Review_Rating': '10.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Best and affordable hotel‚Äù', 'Review_Body': 'Hotel was very good in terms of cleanliness, staff, location, food. Staff was very polite and very professional and approachable any time when needed. Rooms were clean and maintained properly including pool. Thanks alot for the entire staff at HLN for making my stay a memorable. Special thanks to Anthony, Rahul, Baban and Anil. \nRegards\nRahmat Zubair '}, {'Review_Rating': '6.0', 'Review_Heading': 'Good location, quiet area‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "Decent place for budget travelers. The rooms were ok, but were not cleaned at all during our stay (we could probably have asked for it, though). However, the cleanliness of the hallways were probably testament that this was not the cleanest place. The staff were friendly, but the internet didn't work in the rooms, so this is definitely something they should fix. We paid around ‚Ç¨15 per night."}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Stinky rooms and poorly managed property.‚Äù', 'Review_Body': "This was my second visit to this hotel after a year. I felt that the service levels have gone down. The room was in the new building and it was very stinky with foul smell coming out. I complained and asked for a room freshner at least. The staff didn't bother much about it. Even after multiple sprays of room freshner, the bad smell didn't go away. The location is excellent and 2 minutes walking distance from Baga beach. There is hardly any space to park your car and moreover, the hotel is difficult to locate for a first time visitor. They have increased the rates for their rooms but did not improve anything and it's rather gone down. There is a swimming pool and a restaurant. The pool is good but the restaurant charges too much for the most ordinary and average tasting food. "}, {'Review_Rating': '5.2', 'Review_Heading': 'Staff is good.
